mt: Chen Guangming's conscientious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of praise, he said: " There is no one saved, this is my responsibility. "
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of " female college students lost in Qinghai tourism " search and rescue work continues-Xinhuanet
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin and Zhou Zhe) Recently, " a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai " has attracted the attention of netizens.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, is still out of contact, and police in many places are going deep along the route where Huang Moumou lost contact and actively carrying out search work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau in Haixi Prefecture received a notice from its superiors that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5, and turned off his mobile phone and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River at Sonandajie Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province on July 9, asking for assistance in finding it.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19: 54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud at 4: 00 on July 7.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8: 00 on the same day, Huang Moumou, a missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City to G109 National Road, and arrived at the Sonandajie Protection Station in Hoh Xil at 12: 00. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Moumou arrived at the Qingshui River area near the Sonandajie Protection Station at 15: 00 on the 7th and shut down in the area until 18: 00 on the 9th.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17: 07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Naqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at Nanshankou, Golmud City. Because there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle. The police can only drive along the way to search and coordinate with the checkpoints along Tibet. If Huang is found, immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1: 00 a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search for the unfrozen spring protection station and Sonandajie protection station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway, and actively contacted Sichuan police, Tibet police and Nanjing police to carry out joint work. At present, the search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and all sectors of society will provide relevant clues to Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in time, so as to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts reminded that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized in outdoor activities, always pay attention to roadside warning signs, do not risk entering no man's land, and call the police in time for emergencies.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Navy Day-Xinhuanet
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the celebration of Navy Day.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Kimbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters took part in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years. The Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the official newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: The cadres, employees and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Union walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the employees and demonstrate the " hard core power " of the trade union with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the consolation group of Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff in 12 isolation points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering, volunteered to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the dormitory and new employees, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: " From July 21, we will find out the cadres and employees who stick to the front line of the war' epidemic', and adopt online orders and door-to-door delivery by merchants to supplement the purchase of epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line employees in Urumqi. "
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Union told the reporter that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they made every effort to ensure the prevention and control of the epidemic, steadily promoted the development of transportation, and created a strong atmosphere of fighting the " epidemic " together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At present, it is high temperature in summer. Trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put " sending cool " care into practice.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a condolence activity of " sending coolness " to front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, card points and health systems throughout the county received drinks, fruits and other condolence items.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: " Trade union cadres should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade union organizations in rallying and uniting employees, ensure epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights of employees, and send care to front-line employees. "
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing in 2020-Xinhuanet
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from graduates of ordinary colleges and universities in 2020.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and civilian general majors in 64 categories, such as computer, automation and machinery, with emphasis on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, small languages and other majors, with an increase of nearly 2,000 compared with last year.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: Young candidates can inquire about the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment majors in various regions through the National Recruitment Network (website: http: / / www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit registration information online if they meet the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the places where they are recruited.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to professional recruitment and program restrictions can participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years they have studied in ordinary institutions of higher learning according to the prescribed school system is regarded as service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: This year, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers is uniformly organized by the recruitment offices of the provincial or prefectural and municipal people's governments. The majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the educational level of the applicants, the results of professional courses during school, and obtaining vocational qualification certificates; scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges and universities that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the requirements of epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not arrange to report for themselves in principle, and will be organized and transported into the camp simultaneously with conscripts.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers into the army starts from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue orders for non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The receiving unit of the army will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training plans, and carefully organize training; after the training is completed, in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security-chinanews.com
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26 (Xinhua) According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom answered a question on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China have interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies with patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. When investigating and characterizing network events, sufficient evidence should be produced, and no unreasonable speculation should be made.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesman said that a series of incidents such as " Prism Gate " in the past proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber theft operation.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but obtained through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a big country in innovation and intellectual property rights.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas-chinanews.com
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health Commission, reported the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on the 26th, saying that at present, most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are further evaluating the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Press Office of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 0: 00 to 24: 00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 pneumonia in Urumqi (including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection) and 38 new asymptomatic infections.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24: 00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections in Urumqi.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were basically screened through the city's free nucleic acid testing.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the nucleic acid test results, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested personnel, the cooperation of the tested personnel when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), the testing environment, the operation proficiency of the inspectors, etc.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: For various reasons, false negative results will also appear in nucleic acid testing.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, people who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases usually need two nucleic acid tests to be excluded.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a negative nucleic acid test may be false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are needed to rule out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting from today, Urumqi will conduct a second free nucleic acid test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and carry out " checking for omissions " at the same time.
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House epidemic expert Forge: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: On the 25th, he made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He reminded that it is not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be. " The only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution. "
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in the United States has reached 4.176 million, with 146,000 deaths.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Forge said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place, and a response plan based on local conditions is needed, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: An epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: " Now is not the time to be complacent" , Forge said. " Our work is not finished, we must intensify our efforts and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty of the future. "
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of " cocktail therapy " for AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: " Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus. "
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He Dayi called on the public to use their own practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up the research and development of COVID-19 treatment drugs and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leaders Foundation is a non-profit organization whose purpose is to promote international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Asian-Pacific Americans in the United States and cultivating young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Congressman Meng Zhaowen and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leaders Foundation, spoke at the meeting respectively.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to the Asia-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as " social distance " to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: Representatives of the US-China Trade Talks met in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as reporting on the 25th that Liu He, head of China's trade negotiation team and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, co-leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first phase of the China-US trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has significantly increased its purchases of American agricultural products in the past few months, due to the COVID-19 virus epidemic and other factors, China's purchases are still some distance from the amount promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say that the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, may undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement came into effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be " an important turning point " for both parties to assess the progress of the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: However, this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8 has met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. Disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of the COVID-19 virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn in a single day and bought a lot of soybeans, " this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached. "
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government consultant also believes that due to poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and " trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations. "
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: However, he revealed that China's economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. " We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult. "
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jiening, vice president of the US-China Trade National Committee, said that it is " more important than ever " to maintain the momentum of the first-stage agreement, and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening up its financial markets to US companies this year.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: An analyst at Plenum, an independent research firm, said: " It is better to talk than not to talk, although it may only be regarded as routine. "
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu'ebao earnings decline " post-90s " but " retaliatory " to save money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the decline in Yu'e Bao's earnings, the " post-90s " not only did not escape Yu'e Bao, but began to save money in a " retaliatory " manner?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: The " Yu'ebao Post-90s Savings Report " (2020 version) recently released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, the " post-90s " are more likely to save money: the amount of money saved per capita increased by nearly 40% compared with 2019.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, " post-90s " tend to save from a small sum of money, with 60% saving less than 20 yuan on average...
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu'e Bao has also become the saving habit of " post-90s. "
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Data shows that among the 700 million Yu'e Bao users, 134 million are " post-90s. "
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million " post-90s " in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 " post-90s " in the country are saving money with Yu'e Bao.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of monetary funds such as Yu'ebao has fallen to about 1.5% from a level higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of " post-90s " saving money.
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: Under the background of the improvement of Yu'e Bao's " money saving effect" , many young people who are used to using Yu'e Bao have directly transformed into " basic people. "
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new " basic people " on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved " advanced " financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu'ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of monetary funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that " post-90s " girls are more likely to save more money, with an average of 20% higher than that of boys. Among the users who hold funds on Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods than men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what are the plans of the " post-90s "?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that the " post-90s " have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the largest number of users take travel as their saving goal.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many " post-90s " save money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of cinemas also provides a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, affected by continuous rainfall in southern China, the situation of flood control and flood fighting is very severe, causing disasters in 26 provinces (regions and cities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong and Hubei.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: Disaster situations are orders, disaster areas are battlefields, and in front of disasters, the party flag is the war flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people's soldiers resolutely implement the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping on flood control and disaster relief work, and quickly join the front line of flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief, becoming the backbone of the people in the disaster areas and a new force in the fight against floods.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is the embodiment of loyalty and the call of mission.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a flag.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres demonstrate a high degree of loyalty to the party, listen to the call of the Party Central Committee, and with the actions of " look at me" , the pace of " follow me " and the courage of " I go first" , build iron fortresses that cannot be washed down and erect the backbone of China that cannot be bent.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood-fighting levee, which is the holding of the position and the horn of the charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of floods, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the " emergency call " to fight floods, planted bright party flags on the flood-fighting levees, and the majority of party members and cadres and people's soldiers stuck to the flood-fighting positions. With the will and actions of " the party flag is in the position " and " the flood will never retreat" , they have become the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster areas.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, it shows the true qualities of party members. At a time when people's lives and property are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, people's children's soldiers give up their families and take care of everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take responsibility, and take winning the tough battle of flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground for a comprehensive test of ability, style and literacy. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster areas to overcome the disaster, and gathers a strong spiritual force to win flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: " The people are supreme, life is supreme " is tested not only in peacetime, but also at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood-fighting levee, the majority of party members and cadres and the people's soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, add luster to the party flag with the steel dam that cannot be washed down by the flood, and let the bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC Trade Ministers Meeting Says It Will Accelerate Regional Economic Recovery-Xinhuanet
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The video conference of trade ministers of APEC members was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to work to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC informal leaders' meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: The joint statement issued after the meeting stated that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties undertake to ensure that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, and will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, while complying with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers pledged to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in necessary commodities, and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to prevent the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that the economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO regulations, and promise to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the necessary commodity flow under the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for APEC cooperation after 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agrees to hold APEC-related meetings in the form of video, but does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the informal meeting of APEC leaders at the end of the year.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights organizations and several American cities and counties have sued the US federal government, saying that the Trump presidential palace's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the distribution of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: " It won't work" , Sarah Brannon, an executive attorney for the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA.
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of the people surveyed in the census is difficult to do and " not very reliable. "
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, " The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County and cannot let this illegal attempt scare people away and reduce the number of our immigrant communities succeed. "
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a " victory " for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, " The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents living legally. "
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The US Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit data on undocumented people from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from the census figures of each state and determine whether each state increases, decreases or maintains seats in the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets layout, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as " Shanghai Real Estate ") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as " Shanghai Urban Investment ") intend to transfer part of the company's shares held by agreement through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); the audited net asset value per share of the company in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investor in Greenland. According to the public announcement information, it is estimated that the new strategic investor will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to acquire the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, Greenland is still expected to have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may undergo major changes.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the state-owned holding and employee-owned shareholding system; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, high-tech capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliance (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliance implemented modern corporate management methods such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned enterprises in the new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new reform idea of adapting to local conditions and tailoring clothes. By introducing new excellent strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: Can Andy Lau and Liu Qingyun " dismantle " new sparks-Xinhuanet
ref: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "create” a new spark - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: " Bomb Disposal Expert 2 " recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first scheduled film for the New Year.
ref: The filmmaker recently announced that the Shock Wave 2 would be released on December 24th, becoming the first film to be finalized for the Lunar New Year.

mt: The second part is still directed by Qiu Litao, supervised and starring Andy Lau, and unfolds with a brand-new story.
