mt: It is reported that the addition of the " nuclear bomb " element in the second part also makes the challenge faced by the bomb disposal experts more difficult. The few stunning shots in the trailer have made people hang on the line. The mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by fire are quite shocking.
ref: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the Shock Wave 2 also makes the challenge faced by bomb squad even more difficult, several glimpses in the preview have already made people's hearts hang on the line, and the mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by flames are quite shocking.

mt: Three years ago, " Bomb Disposal Expert " produced by the original team won the May Day box office champion of that year, and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the eyes of the audience.
ref: Three years ago, the Shock Wave, produced by the original team, won the May 1st box office champion and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Qiu Litao × Liu Dehua also became the gold partner in the audience's mind.

mt: This time, " Bomb Disposal Expert 2 " also makes people look forward to whether this pair of ace combinations can spark new sparks.
ref: This Shock Wave 2 also makes people look forward to whether this ace combination can spark a new spark.

mt: " Bomb Disposal Expert 2 " tells a brand-new story: former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the explosion and was listed as a suspect by the police.
ref: The Shock Wave 2 tells a brand-new story: The former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Liu Dehua) faints at the scene of the bombing and is listed as a suspect by the police.

mt: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his good friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.
ref: In order to find the truth, he had to seek help from his good friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.

mt: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector eager to solve the case and Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, was also involved.
ref: Pang Ling (played by Ni Ni), the female inspector who is eager to solve the case and Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

mt: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but from the preview of the file, you can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role: he broke a leg, put on a prosthetic limb, and was chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.
ref: It's still the Shock Wave, but we can feel the complexity of Liu Dehua's new role from the preview: he breaks a leg, puts on a prosthetic leg, is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and is directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

mt: What is the relationship between the three people, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert. All kinds of mysteries make people curious.
ref: What is the relationship between the three persons, what did Liu Dehua do in Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

mt: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the on-site shooting of Hong Kong's world landmarks, coupled with the top special effects production team, which brings shocking and realistic visual impact.
ref: It is understood that the main event of the film is to take pictures of the world landmarks in Hong Kong on the spot, and with the top special effects production team, so it brings shocking and vivid visual impact.

mt: (Reporter Nie Qing)
ref: (Reporter Nie Qing)

mt: chinanews.com, July 26 (Xinhua) According to a comprehensive Russian satellite network report, July 26 is Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate Navy Day are held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - Integrated Sputnik reported that, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.
ref: Vladimir Putin, Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, and in this place, 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

mt: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.
ref: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day, and passed by the ships that were about to participate in the naval parade in a small boat in the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the troops under review at the main viewing platform.
ref: It’s reported that Putin celebrated naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, sailed by the naval ships which would appear in the maritime parade on the Gulf of Finland in a small boat, and then reviewed the paraded troops on the main viewing stand.

mt: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.
ref: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improved.

mt: Putin said at the military parade on Russian Navy Day: " The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment. "
ref: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade that, "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircrafts and other air vehicles, unique weapons and special equipment. ”

mt: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory of the Great Patriotic War.
ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digital and effective defense means to gain unique advantages.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.

mt: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with 46 ships participating, including the frigate " Admiral Kasatonov " and the large anti-submarine ship " Vice Admiral Kulakov" , as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates and submarines.
ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, a series of ships were statically displayed next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which was the copied Russian first battleship " Poltava " in the early 18th century.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: In order to avoid the spread of the COVID-19 virus, only local residents and specially invited guests can enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The last Sunday in July every year is Russian Navy Day.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: chinanews.com, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with chinanews.com that his grandfathers have been fishing in Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he has been fishing with his father, shaking his boat, walking along Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to longevity. Every time he leaves home, it is ten and a half months, and he depends on fishing to support his family.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into the town, there are more and more residents in Gaoanchang town, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: " The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open. "
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, so far, Chongqing has withdrawn 3,403 fishing vessels and signed 4,643 fishing vessels, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4,404 people who have retired, 4,267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Old-age insurance covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects in the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of " three phosphorus " (referring to phosphate ore, phosphorus chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir), clean-up and rectification of small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the work of banning and returning fishing in the Yangtze River Basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25-Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Affairs and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing difficult conditions due to the " storm of legislative amendments " and the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There is no obvious sign of capital outflow from the banking system. On the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offerings in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communication, free flow of information and capital, and simple and low tax system, which make Hong Kong a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the " Epidemic Prevention and Anti-epidemic Fund " to create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR Government has also launched the " Thousand Talents Plan " to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses, so as to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's financial technology talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet published an article praising China's anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from experience-chinanews.com
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past ten years, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for the COVID-19 much better than that for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world of the threat of the COVID-19 virus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. When the country declares a state of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly. In May and July, the results of the progress made in the early trials of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are worth learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisive reliance on scientific basis to make correct decisions, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way to society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the COVID-19 virus. Their suggestions provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to " close the city " on January 23; When experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building a cabin hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; At the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: Finally, the article emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Front desk reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people in the accident.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: Duisburg prosecutors, Wesel County Police Department and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a two-seat small plane crashed into a house on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: On the same day, it took off from Mal City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, stopped at the airport in Wesel County and took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not yet recovered.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene pictures reported by Deutsche News Agency showed that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and firefighters could see that the house was seriously damaged after extinguishing the fire.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is still unclear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rhine Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: The police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: German Interpol is working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the judgment on the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's " Auspicious Ruyi " shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award-Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Director Dapeng's first realistic film " Auspicious Ruyi " was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at the Shanghai Film Festival. At the same time, the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Poster side for photos
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film " Auspicious Ruyi " is director Dapeng's first realistic work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returned to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to make a literary film for his family during the New Year, but encountered a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for making the film completed the final gathering.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, sits in the middle of the screen smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and the foreground is the red lanterns that Chinese people must hang on holidays.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lanterns, which symbolize joy and reunion, form a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement of this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of " third uncle " Wang Jixiang, which is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of " Good Luck " originated from " a providence. " A series of sudden changes in the family during the filming forced the original filming plan to be changed. Life without a script was finally recorded as a movie, but the tension beyond design was released.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this " providence " and how should he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that " Auspicious Ruyi " is full of experiments. The lineup of almost all people and innovative audio-visual style turn life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of the family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts will be evoked.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

mt: From 8:00 am on July 25th to 8:00 am on July 26th, 2020, the Contingency Coordination Center for the Covid-19 received a total of 292 requests for information.
ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: " Chinese Doctors " prepares to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes-Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers' heroes fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Pictures Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), held a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the production of the anti-epidemic film " Chinese Doctors ".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Pictures hopes to use " Chinese Doctors " to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting in the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of the film " The Captain " to make the film " Chinese Doctors " under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau. This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the front line of fighting the epidemic in Wuhan. It will take Wuhan medical staff and provincial and municipal medical teams as the background. From the perspective of human nature, it uses unique narrative and powerful lens language to show the touching story of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice on the front line of fighting the epidemic.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unsealed, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to exchange understanding and collect information with hundreds of medical workers face-to-face. So far, it has interviewed white angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, including Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, Guangzhou's first aid to Wuhan, Guangdong's medical team, as well as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and photographed a large number of precious first-hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: " I look forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who have made more public appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line. They are the majority. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen " Me and My Motherland " and " The Captain " before and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: " Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China. "
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the dissemination of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: " In addition to being shown in China, it is best for this film to be shown abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with the true humanistic spirit in a way that domestic and foreign audiences can understand. "
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film " People at Their Middle Ages " in the 1980s, " After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was " People at Their Middle Ages ". At that time, my doctor friends abroad were all crying. If " Chinese Doctors " can play such a role, it would be great. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if " Chinese Doctors " can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, " I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. "
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, since the primitive society, mankind has survived thousands of difficulties and dangers. Nowadays, modern society has advanced medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. " Next, we must pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to soothing people's hearts. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)
ref: (By Wang Jinyue)

mt: Cultural Tourism " Red Fruit " Gathers in Shaoshan-Xiangtan First Red Expo-Today's News-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: Red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and local products in the old revolutionary area are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.
ref: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: " This Red Expo is not only a demonstration of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths. "
ref: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and discuss the ways of development. ”

mt: According to the relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is " Promoting Red Culture and Boosting Cultural Tourism" , with a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000 square meters, with an atmosphere creation area, a scenic spot display area and an online shopping experience area for red cultural tourism online games.
ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: 137 enterprises and units from 8 provinces and cities including Jiaxing in Zhejiang, Zunyi in Guizhou and Yan'an in Shaanxi, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou in our province, were invited to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 kinds of exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be open until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan exhibition area has many bright spots.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The red industrial exhibition area displays 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises such as Hualing Xianggang, Hualing Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area displays nearly 200 products from 27 units such as red series books, red series food, red series cultural and creative products.
ref: The Red Industry Exhibition Area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co., Ltd., and XEMC. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by Chen's cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut works of art.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects " Ansai Paper-cut" , " Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs " and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting, focused on promoting Yan'an folk custom products, and took this opportunity to communicate with enterprises in other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the " greenhouse effect " -chinanews.com
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the " greenhouse effect "
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: News from our newspaper reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team has made significant progress on the " membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide " and successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The " greenhouse effect " is a major environmental problem perplexing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit responsible for the " greenhouse effect. "
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and utilize the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of attention of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: " Membrane separation method " is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology. It separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, which has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material " breathe deeply " and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty in capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation method.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the membrane material is more uniform and " more breathable" , which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of this kind of membrane material.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: " The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. "
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University, said: " We hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play an important role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. "
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: Established a special committee for the first time and collectively signed a " long agreement " The third CIIE exhibitors alliance to build a " link " -Xinhuanet
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance, which was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitors Alliance of the Third Import Expo set up a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of special committees set up included the Special Committee on Public Health and Epidemic Prevention and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry. 35 member enterprises also signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum, and the role of the Exhibitors Alliance of CIIE has been continuously strengthened.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of exhibition alliance member companies such as Hyundai of South Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and Aslikon of the United Kingdom signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest articles of association, the exhibition alliance will introduce the rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will put forward suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition with large and small, and build the Expo into a gathering place for industry enterprises.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman unit of the 3rd CIIE Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Special Committee, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third CIIE set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established at the initiative of exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for exchanges and cooperation among high-quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing among exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) in the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies of new coronavirus infection-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of COVID-19 infection and was the youngest patient to die of COVID-19 in the country.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Katri said that the girl had other serious diseases before she was infected with the COVID-19 virus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth recently died of the COVID-19 virus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Katri said that 85% of the newly diagnosed people in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded healthy and younger people not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: " Although it is rare for young people to die from COVID-19 infection, no one is immune now. "
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Belgium increased by 89% from the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from COVID-19 infection, which was higher than the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the COVID-19 virus in the Belgian population was " among the best " in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the COVID-19 virus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Katri warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger and eventually causes an " avalanche. "
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature]
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media action " Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation " -Today's News-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client, July 25 (This reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media operation " Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation " hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the eyes of the guests at the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out, " 2020 is a milestone year. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centennial goal. 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the decisive battle against poverty. "
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action " Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation " is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation propaganda.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities across the country, dig fresh poverty alleviation stories, directly attack the great changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers break through the dilemma of survival and development and move towards the road of becoming rich.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: The operation will last for more than three months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter started from Xuzhou and divided into two roads, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey exceeds 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of reporting format, " Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation " boldly integrated.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through CCTV Financial Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the noon news program " World Finance " of CCTV Financial Channel (premiere time: 12: 00-13: 00 from Monday to Sunday), and the prime news column " Economic Information Network " of CCTV Financial Channel will set up a poverty alleviation report column (premiere time: 20: 30-21: 30 from Monday to Sunday).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast each village live on the CCTV Finance client for up to one hour. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, " Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation " has the courage to make breakthroughs and pioneered the " Outfield New Media Caravan. "
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide and 3.98 meters high. The box adopts hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can turn up to 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The studio area can also be expanded automatically, with an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai team up to support muscular teenagers-Xinhuanet

ref: Their identities are unexpected; Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare player and a winner of the Warriors Medal for three times.

mt: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole. The long-lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.
ref: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audiences sweat for them.

mt: In the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of “Sports Boy”, also watched the game seriously.
ref: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, also watched the game carefully.

mt: In the comment section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraged the teenager who lost the game, and helped every mistake in the process of resuming the game.
ref: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping him to review every mistake in the process.

mt: Sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist. She makes no secret of her appreciation for the youths who are online.
ref: Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, is a fancy assistant, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers who have beauty strength.

mt: When I learned about the daily training of sports teenagers who are overloaded, I admire them even more.
ref: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, she was even more admired.

mt: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also the sports leaders, have their own styles. One is a “prophet” of the calm and relaxed school, and the other is a “preliminary girl” who uses a smile to dispel the tension.
ref: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles; one is a calm “prophet”, and the other is a “girl with prehistorical power” who dispels tension with a smile.

mt: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.
ref: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: Diocese volunteer admit arson is usually kind and reticent - chinanews.com
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous religious and historical architectural treasures of Nantes, France, the famous Cathedral of Saints Peter and Paul Church, were severely damaged in a fire, and the large pipe organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a diocese volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been indicted on charges of “arson and destruction.”
