ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has admitted that he was lighting the fire in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old volunteer from the diocese of Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The person’s lawyer said that the arsonists now regret doing such a thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: This person entered France through the route of asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and taken in in the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police station.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But the church said that he still couldn’t believe that this very kind, smiling, but quiet believer would destroy the church he loves so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day the fire broke out on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of a logical problem in the narrative, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows firefighters at the scene rescue.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, because professional engineers from the laboratory of the Central Police Department in Paris obtained new evidence, this person was once again interrogated.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted to his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if the crime of deliberate arson and destruction is convicted, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to reports, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of Saints Peter and Paul Church. The pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunel, the chief architect of the French historical preservation building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane “Hanna” landed in US Texas, may trigger river surges and flash floods - chinanews.com
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26, comprehensive foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, hurricane “Hanna” landed in Texas, United States, will bring strong storms and rain to Texas, rivers surge, and may cause life-threatening flash flood .
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said that hurricane “Hanna” is expected to carry heavy rain, sweeping parts of southern and northeastern Texas. The rain may cause some streams to skyrocket and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: According to reports, the most severely affected by Hurricane Hanna is the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and the Rio Grande Valley may have a large-scale flash flood.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: “Any hurricane is a huge challenge.”
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency due to the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that as Texas is hit hard by the COVID-19, the hurricane can no longer bring more casualties to Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also appear in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, “Hanna” formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland will withdraw from European treaty that prevents violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty for the Prevention of Violence against Women.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty required schools to teach students on gender issues and violated the rights of students’ parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements that we consider to be harmful.”
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them are women) held protests against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held up banners that read “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters report)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to the Viet News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Greivoli said that Russia and the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN’s improvement of its status and the promotion of its image to the outside world.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He emphasized, “ASEAN should thank Vietnam for this.”
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivori said that analysts approve of Vietnam’s peace initiative.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures on the issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Greivoli believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperation relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Greivoli proposed to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Greivoli also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to actively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups that have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Bac Giang Province will complete the submission and approval of the Prime Minister’s decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the two industrial-city-service areas in the province, Ansan-Beilong and Anlu. Documents of the master plan for the development of Vietnam’s industrial zone in 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Bac Giang Province is striving to speed up the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in the industrial park clusters of Hephu, Gwangju, Sungai-Neihuang, etc., to form a land fund for investment attraction.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in the planning of industrial parks and industrial clusters and provide suggestions and suggestions for inclusion in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park clusters with the protection of national defense, the protection of the ecological environment, and the protection of food security, thereby boosting the balanced development of the industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is connected with urban construction and trade. Services, workers’ housing and other social infrastructure such as health care, education, etc. are combined.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province is calling for investment projects in high-tech and clean technology in the fields of electric power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructure of the logistics center of Beijiang City, and develop simultaneously with the industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop more Combined transportation, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Network) In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases in multiple days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government made an interim decision on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th. People entering the UK from Spain must be isolated for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists who were on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger when they heard about this decision, because the news came so unexpectedly that they were caught off guard.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps (Grant Shapps) is currently on holiday in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway would be quarantined for 10 days.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon their plans for vacations in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and social distancing cannot be maintained between people. The police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: It’s safe here
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the country’s epidemic was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: “Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists.”
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist destinations is much lower than that of the British mainland.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the “foot ban”.
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to greatly affect the tourism industry in Spain.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: An Jing/Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to the high temperature and heat and starts the rain mode-Xinhuanet
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year’s “Zhongfu”.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: Convective weather with strong winds and showers in the early hours of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and heat that had been shrouded in Beijing for several days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11 o’clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily maximum temperature of only 27℃; 23°C.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: From the 24th to the 25th, the city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37°C, and the local high temperature exceeded 40°C.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sweltering day of the year. There are “three-volts” throughout the year, and the hottest is in mid-volt. The Chinese people say “bitter summer” at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the vault, every family fills up the barn. There is a folk saying that “one dumpling and two noodles”.
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, there will be more rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The Meteorological Department reminds the public to minimize travel in mountainous areas and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year’s “Zhong Fu” has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the “Zhong Fu”, people will feel fatigue and loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: In the diet, you can choose mung beans, barley, and other foods that have the effects of clearing heat and relieving heat, invigorating the spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: “Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher” will be online next week, led by Xue Zhaofeng as “Knowledge Promoter”-Xinhuanet
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There is another variety show online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program “Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20th.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth classroom for all ages, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will enter the battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the public minds in the past, “Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher” gathers a group of intellectual representatives with both beauty and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young intellectual role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “joke players” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining and entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models as “knowledge sharing officers” will challenge interesting knowledge classes.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to show the most interesting aspect of their subject through the attitude of knowledge output to impress the audience present.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The “You Dao Questioning Group” composed of audiences of all ages will raise ever-changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult to teach the “Knowledge Sharing Officer” and adding a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to reports, the “Knowledge Sharing Officer” includes outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examinations, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will present to the scene in unexpected ways. The audience showed the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the “knowledge initiator” of the program, and joined the “Dingdong assistants” Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create a “public youth youth class”.
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and all efforts are being made to fight the epidemic - chinanews.com
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government Zhang Jianzong said on the 26th that the situation of the COVID-19 in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic turns worse, the Special Administrative Region government will decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce business operations. Citizens go out space.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the SAR government has no intention to issue a “stay at home order” or a “foot-free order” to restrict citizens from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled “The Situation is Severe and Fully Fight Against the Epidemic”.
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in six months, and the next two weeks will be very critical. We must try our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation of citizens are also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contacts and eat out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: Citizens should cooperate with the mandatory measures to wear masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and frequent hand washing. They should also suspend non-essential gatherings or gatherings of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government’s epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the testing capabilities and refitting the Asia World Expo Hall to work similar to “square cabin hospitals.” .
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the SAR government has provided free virus testing for specific high-risk groups, namely, nursing homes, disabled homes and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers, and property management employees, and the free virus testing has been fully launched, involving as many as 40 people. Million.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about the infection cases that have appeared in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny’s Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories and is expected to provide 700 additional isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build 2,000 more quarantine rooms at the Penny’s Bay Quarantine Center and strive to be completed by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: In addition to the 800 quarantine centers that have been put into use, the Penny’s Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3,500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: Hong Kong currently has four quarantine centers in operation, providing a total of about 2,600 quarantine rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR government reopened the Leiyumen Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who have the ability to take care of themselves.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: The U.S. launches an anti-subsidy investigation against China for the first time with the “undervaluation of the renminbi exchange rate”
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the recent announcement of the US Department of Commerce, it decided to initiate an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation against cable ties (cable ties) products originating in China, and to initiate an investigation on the “RMB exchange rate undervaluation” project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: The Ministry of Commerce of China pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has initiated an investigation into the so-called “RMB undervaluation” project in an anti-subsidy case. China firmly opposes this.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: China’s Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasizes that overall, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been undervalued.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the renminbi has appreciated against the US dollar by more than 17%.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the renminbi appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%. It is the strongest currency in the G20 economy and the largest appreciation in the world. One of the currencies.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States revised its regulations in February this year to conduct anti-subsidy investigations on the exchange rates of other countries. It has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many quarters.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: According to the press release, even in accordance with US regulations, the content of the applicant’s complaint contains a large number of errors and does not possess the necessary elements for countervailing such as financial assistance, benefit granting, and specificity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop countervailing investigations into the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate.”
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the increased tension in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the US$1 to RMB 7.0 mark.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the US Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force the renminbi to rise is worthy of attention.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The central parity of the renminbi against the US dollar under official regulation was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: The 26th is the day before Philippine President Duterte’s fifth State of the Union address (SONA) during his term. On that day, the Philippines has confirmed more than 80,000 cases of COVID-19, including the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions. Increased to 25 cases.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte’s press release of SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte’s SONA method.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to plan A, Duterte will announce SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators at the scene, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants can enter the parliament building after passing a quick test on the same day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tested positive, plan B was initiated, that is, President Duterte announced SONA at the Presidential Palace in Malacañang, and fewer seats were arranged for the audience.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: As usual, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte’s family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanar said that President Duterte’s SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the COVID-19 and restore social and economic life; he will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely, anti-government corruption, combating illegal drugs and Poverty reduction.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who are suffering from the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulations-Xinhuanet
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish an online game health review system; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel …… The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Draft for Comment) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own “health law.”
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early, the above-mentioned draft for comments proposes that the health department should develop a basic catalog of health examination items based on factors such as age and occupation.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The cost of the health check-up within the scope of the basic list of health check-up items shall be paid by the social medical insurance coordinating fund at the standard of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The draft for comments clearly stated that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange staff working hours, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workloads to avoid excessive loss of human functions or physical and mental health damage to employees’ health, and strict implementation Paid leave system for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health checkups.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: Regarding the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and at the same time the sales location of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For violations of the regulations, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a penalty of 30,000 yuan. fine.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to “prohibition”, minors must also “exercise more.”
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the requirements of the draft, the school should arrange more than one hour of student sports activities every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, the public security, culture, broadcasting, television, tourism, sports, network supervision, health and health departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and communication culture for the healthy growth of young people.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and that medical and health institutions will be fined 20,000 yuan for leaking patients’ privacy without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that various departments in Shenzhen are formulating plans involving urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological environmental protection, and biomedical industry development. , Before the regulatory documents and approval of major construction projects and implementation of major public service projects, the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population should be assessed.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Those that have not been assessed or will have a serious adverse effect on urban public health or the health of residents shall not be formulated, promulgated or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Hoh Xil Tibetan antelope enters migration season-Xinhuanet
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze Source Park, Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes had migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth. The littering is gradually ending, and the cubs are beginning to return to their original habitat.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: Monitoring pictures near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station showed that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led 3 Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway. The Tibetan antelopes have begun to relocate. .
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: Experts have analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the relocating sheep herd accounts for one-quarter to one-fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope flocks.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: “In the early stage of the migration, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs.”
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to the statistics of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning is generally increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes returning was 4860, an increase of 338 from 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said: “It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes this year will end in early September, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase.”
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Qinghai Sanjiangyuan, Qiangtang in Tibet, Altun Mountain in Xinjiang and other places go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, a Tibetan antelope conservation expert in my country and a researcher at the Shanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: “Tibetan antelope migration is a process in which the female Tibetan antelope returns to the habitat with the cubs one after another after the female Tibetan antelope has finished giving birth. The relocation groups of the larvae are relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographic populations and along different paths.”
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continue to carry out video surveillance and patrols in the main relocation area.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If a flock of Tibetan antelopes is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will conduct temporary traffic control as soon as possible to allow the flock to safely pass through the wildlife passage and ensure that it is as little as possible to be disturbed by humans on the way back.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how to relieve heat in daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that you should avoid high temperature periods when you go out in summer, and it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is the strongest during this time period and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out during this period, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat, and sunglasses. If possible, it is best to apply sunscreen to protect you from injury.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Choose light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk as much as possible for clothes, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to lose heat in time when you sweat a lot, causing heat stroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: In the hot and sultry weather, you should prepare plenty of water and drink it in time. Don’t wait until you are thirsty, because once you feel thirsty, it means that your body is dehydrated. Drink 150ml to 200ml of water each time. Boiling water, do not drink ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 to 2 liters of water a day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 to 5 liters of water a day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When you sweat a lot, you can add some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the human body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent refreshing drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: Eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content in summer, such as lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a moisture content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can both replenish water , And can meet the body’s nutritional needs.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people who work in a high-temperature environment should appropriately supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the body’s metabolism is strong, and the consumption is also high, and it is easy to feel tired.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say that the best bedtime is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to wake up is from 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: Be careful not to lie under the air-conditioning vents and electric fans during sleep to avoid air-conditioning diseases and thermal colds.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperatures can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Water or Huoxiang Zhengqi Pills and other heatstroke prevention medicines, or place them in the nearest workplace for use at any time to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate art exhibition moved into shopping mall for charity exhibition-Xinhuanet
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the “cloud graduation” season of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened last weekend warmly.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it is neither in the art museum nor on the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City. It is open to the public for free and will last until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has collected 50 works/groups of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China, and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. Use the light box in the building to display the graphic works, to highlight the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season to the greatest extent.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Pingping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the’cloud’ back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people can see the young people’s exploration of themselves and the understanding of the world. The healing power of art for society and the soul.”
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates of several major art colleges and selected suitable for commercial space display. The forms of the works range from traditional paintings and sculptures on the shelves to new media installations and interactions. Animation, VR panorama, volume and richness are the most in history.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in this epidemic through a mix of mechanical and manual creative language in “The First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying discussed “Sound Money” through the work “Sound Money” created by the Ethereum blockchain. Themes such as “cryptocurrency”, “credibility creation”, and “transaction”; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that often accompany humans, and we can see the young artists’ relationship between humans and animals. Understanding; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith—Gifts” reminds young people who are growing up, “When one day a successful career, do not forget the original intention, remember that simplicity and sincerity.”
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who personally set up the exhibition is Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: “I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and I did a COVID-19 test three days in advance. I brought the alcohol cotton and the test report to the exhibition.”
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work Yesterday is Like a Mystery has a complicated structure and must be done by himself.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: “The exhibition was set up until 4:30 in the morning, and then repairs were made. The time is very tight, and I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is a bit regrettable.”
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he and his classmates would come to Beijing to see his work exhibition.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Rewarded 50,000 yuan in Enshi, Hubei, praised Shaziba landslide as “first person in early warning” - chinanews.com
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City reported to Chen Guangming, a geological hazard point monitor who had made important contributions to the early warning of Shaziba landslides, and gave him a bonus of 50,000 yuan.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, the city’s party members and cadres are called upon to learn from his spirit of dedication, daring to take responsibility, initiative and dedication.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, causing the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracks in the walls of the villagers’ homes and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: As soon as he walked five to six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split four to five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert and immediately sent photos of the road cracking to the township “geological disaster monitor contact group”.
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Natural Planning Institute of Tunpu Township inspected and judged on the spot, the possibility of landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming’s timely warning gave 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people from 315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: No one was injured or killed in this major geological disaster.
