ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming’s conscientious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of praise, he said: “There is no one saved, this is my responsibility.”
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of “female college students who lost contact during a trip to Qinghai”, search and rescue work continues-Xinhuanet
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin and Zhouzhe) Recently, “a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has attracted the attention of netizens.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian-Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a certain university in Nanjing, is still out of contact. Police in many places are going deep along the route where Huang Moumou lost contact and are actively seeking work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud City, Haixi Prefecture received a notice from a superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a certain university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5 and was in Yushu, Qinghai Province on July 9. The mobile phone in the southwestern area of Qingshui River in the Sonangdajie Protection Station in Qumalai County of the Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture was turned off and lost connection, and asked for assistance in finding it.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation by the Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 1954 on July 6, and arrived in Golmud at 4 on the 7th.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8 o’clock on the same day, Huang Moumou, a missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud to G109 National Road, and arrived at the Hoh Xilison Dage Protection Station at 12 o’clock. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Moumou returned at 15:00 on the 7th. Arrived at the Qingshuihe area near the Sonang Dje Protection Station until 18:00 on the 9th and shut down in the area.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: During further investigation, the police discovered that Huang Moumou had passed through the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: The Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City in the Tibet Autonomous Region at Nanshankou, Golmud City. Since the checkpoint does not have video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle on which he was traveling. If Huang XX is found at the checkpoint, immediately contact the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1:00 am on July 26, the Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment and went to the Qinghai-Tibet Highway Non-freezing Spring Protection Station and Sonan Dage Protection Station to search, and actively cooperated with Sichuan police and Tibet police. The Nanjing police got in touch and started work together. At present, the search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that if the majority of netizens and all walks of life have relevant clues, they will provide them to the Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, so as to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts reminded that tourists should be standardized, rational, and civilized during outdoor activities, always pay attention to roadside warning signs, do not risk entering no-man’s land, and call the police in time when encountering emergencies.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Navy Day-Xinhuanet
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the celebration of the Navy Day.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Issued by Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Kimbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the establishment of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic, Black Sea, Caspian and Pacific fleets held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located. A total of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participated.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters participated in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years. The Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with a unique hypersonic strike system in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, the Russian Navy’s commander-in-chief Yevmenov recently said in an interview with the Russian Defense Ministry’s newspaper “Red Star” that Russia’s plan to build ships has been effectively implemented. The number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the lager number of new ships in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a naval fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The last Sunday in July is the Russian Navy Day.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participate in the epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: The cadres, employees, and model workers of the Tianshan North and South Trade Unions walked into the neighborhood communities and residents to carry out activities such as food delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the employees and demonstrate the “hard core power” of the union with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the consolation team of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff in 12 quarantine points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak, Tianshan District invested more than 1.05 million yuan in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of the First Construction of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering Co., Ltd., and chairman of the labor union, received the company’s notice on the prevention and control of the epidemic.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities for the workers who lived in the unit dormitory and newly recruited employees, and organized personnel to send them daily necessities every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: “Starting from July 21, cadres and workers on the front line of the fight against the’epidemic’ will be investigated, and orders will be placed online and merchants will deliver them to their door. First, 704 front-line workers in Urumqi will supplement the purchase of anti-epidemic supplies and living materials. ”
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Union told reporters that in the face of sudden epidemics, they will do their best to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote various tasks in transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere for fighting the “epidemic” together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At present, it is the high temperature in summer. Trade unions at all levels are keeping an eye on front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and putting “sending coolness” into practice.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a “sending cool” sympathy activity to front-line workers for epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, checkpoints, and health systems throughout the county received such sympathy as drinks and fruits.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: “Trade union cadres must further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people’s hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting employees, ensure epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of employees, and send care to frontline employees. “
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is in full swing in 2020-Xinhuanet
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission have recently jointly issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary colleges and universities graduates in 2020.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year’s direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 general military and civilian majors in 64 categories, including computer, automation, and machinery. The focus is on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and minor languages. The scale of recruitment has increased by nearly last year. 2000 people.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: Young applicants can check the requirements for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruiting majors in various regions through the National Recruitment Website (URL: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), and submit the registration information online if they meet the professional scope and recruiting conditions, and based on the land requisition The military service agencies uniformly require that they participate in follow-up recruitment work such as physical examinations and political assessments.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment of majors and program restrictions can participate in the recruitment of conscripts. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years enrolled in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed school system is regarded as service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year is organized by the recruitment office of the people’s government at the provincial or municipal level. Majors with rich potential for registration will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the academic level of the applicants, the performance of professional courses during the school period, and the vocational qualification certificates obtained; scarce majors Targeted recruitment will be directed to local colleges and universities that meet the professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: In accordance with the requirements for the normalization of the epidemic prevention and control, this year’s direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not arrange self-registration in principle, and will organize operations in battalions simultaneously with conscripts.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The time for direct enlistment of non-commissioned officers shall be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the appointment of non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The army receiving unit will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training plans, and carefully organize training; after the training is completed, in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to corresponding professional and technical positions.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security - chinanews.com
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26. According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom responded to reporters’ questions about erroneous statements about cyber attacks.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesperson emphasized that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China have interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that have patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. Sufficient evidence should be presented when investigating and identifying cyber incidents, and no unreasonable guesses should be made.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesperson said that a series of incidents such as the “Prism Gate” in the past proved that the United States has been conducting the world’s largest cyber theft.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesperson pointed out that China’s achievements in technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but were obtained through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a country of innovation and intellectual property rights.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Free COVID-19 testing in Urumqi, most districts have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas - chinanews.com
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen and Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and COVID-19 testing in Urumqi, at present, most areas of Urumqi’s free COVID-19 testing work have been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The expert group of the State Council and the experts of the autonomous region and Urumqi City are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of COVID-19 testing and epidemiological investigations.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Press Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and its prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new cases of COVID-19 were confirmed in Urumqi (5 of them were asymptomatic infections transferred to confirmed cases), and 38 new cases of asymptomatic infections were added.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, Urumqi City has 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The newly-added asymptomatic infections on the 25th were basically detected through the city’s free COVID-19 test and active screening.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi Quanquan City have basically completed free COVID-19 testing.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the results of COVID-19 testing, such as the sensitivity of the test reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested person, and the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen Not taken in place) and the testing environment, the operating proficiency of the inspectors, etc.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: For various reasons, false negative results can also occur in COVID-19 testing.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed an infected person, but the COVID-19 test result is negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases, two COVID-19 tests are usually required to exclude them.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas of the epidemic, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a negative COVID-19 test may have a false negative, so two COVID-19 tests are needed to rule out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that, in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi City will conduct a second free COVID-19 test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District, and carry out “checking for omissions” at the same time.
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He reminded that it is not yet clear how the COVID-19 will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be. “The only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution.”
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21.00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the COVID-19 in the United States has reached 4.176 million and 146,000 have died.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and requires a response plan tailored to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close contact between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: The epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: “Now is not the time to be complacent,” Fauci said. “Our work has not been completed. We must intensify our efforts and we must also be vigilant about the uncertainties in the future.”
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of AIDS “cocktail therapy”, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 in the United States has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: “Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus.”
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He Dayi urged the public to use their own actions to buy time for scientists to speed up the development of COVID-19 treatment drugs and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leaders Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Congressman Meng Zhaowen, and the founding chairman of the International Leaders Foundation Dong Jiling gave speeches at the meeting.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who were fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to anti-epidemic guidelines such as “social distancing” to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: Representatives of the US-China Business Talks meet in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong’s “South China Morning Post” quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as reporting that Liu He, the head of China’s trade negotiation team and vice premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, co-leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the performance of the two parties. The situation of the first phase of the US trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has substantially increased its purchases of American agricultural products in the past few months, due to factors such as the COVID-19, China’s purchases are still some distance from the amounts promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say that the recent closure of each other’s consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, may undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement will take effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the high-level trade framework group formed by the two sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be “an important turning point” for both parties to assess the progress of the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two parties may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the trade agreement to meet every six months.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. Disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of the COVID-19 virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record-breaking amount of US corn in a single day and has also bought a lot of soybeans, “but this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached.”
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government consultant also believes that due to poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and “trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations.”
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: However, he revealed that Chinese economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. “We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult.”
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the US-China Business Council, said that maintaining the momentum of the first phase of the agreement is “more important than ever” and that China has made progress this year in further opening up its financial markets to US companies.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: An analyst at Plenum, an independent research firm, said: “It is better to talk than nothing, although it may only be regarded as a routine matter.”
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu’E Bao’s revenue declines, “post-90s” but “retaliation” to save money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the decline in Yu’E Bao’s income, the “post-90s” not only did not escape from Yu’E Bao, but began to “retaliate” to save money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: The Yu’E Bao Post-90s Post-90s Savings Report (2020 version) recently released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, post-90s are more likely to save money: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: What’s interesting is that “post-90s” tend to start saving from a small amount of money, and 60% of the savings are less than 20 yuan per transaction...…
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu’E Bao has also become the habit of saving money for “post-90s”.
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Data shows that among the 700 million Yu’E Bao users, 134 million are “post-90s.”
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million “post-90s” in China, that is to say, about 3 out of every 4 “post-90s” in the country are using Yu’E Bao to save money.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of currency funds such as Yu’E Bao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of “post-90s” saving money.
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: In the context of the enhancement of Yu’E Bao’s “saving money effect”, many young people who are accustomed to using Yu’E Bao have directly transformed into “basic people”.
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new “basic people” on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved “advanced” financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu’E Bao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that “post-90s” girls tend to save more, on average 20% higher than boys. Among users who hold funds on the Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose more than men. A more robust financial management method.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what plans does the “post-90s” have?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that “post-90s” have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal to save money.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many “post-90s” save money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, under the influence of continuous rainfall in southern my country, the situation of flood prevention and flood fighting is very severe, causing 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei to suffer disasters.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster situation is the command, the disaster area is the battlefield, and in front of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people’s children have resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly joined the front line of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief. Become the backbone of the people in the disaster area and a new force in the fight against floods.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call of duty.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a banner.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have shown a high degree of loyalty to the party, heeded the call of the party central committee, and acted with “watch me”, “follow me” pace, and “I go first” , To build a steel fortress that can’t be broken, and a Chinese backbone that can’t bend is erected.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a stronghold of position and a clarion call for charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of flood disasters, party organizations at all levels acted swiftly and sounded the “Charge” to fight floods and planted bright party flags on the flood-fighting embankment. The majority of party members and cadres and the people’s soldiers stood firmly on the flood-fighting positions and used the “party flags to fight the floods.” The will and actions of “in” and “the flood never retreats and will never retreat” have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster-affected areas.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, it shows the true qualities of party members. When people’s lives and property are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, people’s children’s shelters, small families, care for everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take responsibility, and win the tough battle of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief as a comprehensive test The main battlefield and parade ground for ability, style, and quality are precisely this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disaster, and gathers a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: “The people are supreme, life is supreme” is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood-fighting levee, the broad masses of party members and cadres and the people’s children and soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, struggling figure, and voice of encouragement at any time and anywhere, and use the steel dam that can not be washed by floods to add luster to the party flag and make every facet. The bright party flags are flying high on the flood-fighting embankment!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC member trade ministers meeting said it will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhuanet
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) A video conference of APEC trade ministers was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to work to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of flexibility and sustainability And inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year’s APEC informal leaders’ meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: The joint statement issued after the meeting stated that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time. .
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties pledged to ensure that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, and will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, while complying with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers promised to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection through strengthening the flexibility of the supply chain, and minimize the interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers restricting the trade of necessary commodities, and reiterated their commitment to promoting the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to prevent the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that the economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in compliance with WTO regulations, and pledged to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the flow of necessary commodities during the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: The Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, Azmin Ali, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year’s APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for APEC post-2020 cooperation is proceeding in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings in the form of video, but it does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the end of the APEC informal meeting of leaders.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi Finance urgently releases 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - chinanews.com
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People’s Liberation Army who rushed to help the local flood fight took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County grab peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and the losses would increase if they were not picked in time.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: Photo by China News Service reporter Fu Tian
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial government urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds for flood control. Provide financial guarantee for emergency rescue and disaster relief work.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: The flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and the disaster-affected area is 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan for the central disaster relief fund.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the provincial emergency management special funds, the provincial disaster relief funds of 20.3 million yuan were issued in three consecutive batches to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China’s largest freshwater lake, is slowly receding from a high level.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: At 18:00 on the 24th, the Jiangxi Provincial Defense Command lowered the flood control emergency response to level II; the provincial disaster relief emergency response level was adjusted from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning-Economic Observer Network
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health Commission, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases from 0-24 on July 25, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia and 3 in Guangdong). Cases, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (Inner Mongolia 1 Case, 1 case in Shanghai).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more severe cases than the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, a total of 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are currently 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), a total of 78,908 cured and discharged cases, and a total of 4,634 deaths. A total of 83,830 confirmed cases have been reported, and there are 3 suspected cases.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 confirmed cases were converted to confirmed cases on the same day (no imported from abroad); 10 medical observations were lifted on the same day (from overseas) Enter 7 cases); 292 cases of asymptomatic infection are still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: A total of 3009 confirmed cases have been notified from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, 2505 cases were in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases were discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases were discharged from Macau Special Administrative Region (46 cases were discharged), and 458 cases were discharged in Taiwan (440 cases were discharged, 7 cases died).
ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights organizations and several US cities and counties have sued the US federal government, claiming that Trump’s Presidential Palace’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The US Census will determine the distribution of seats in the US House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, “This will not work.”
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump’s requirement to determine the citizenship of the census in the census is difficult and “not very reliable.”
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump’s executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, “The US Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we must not let this illegal attempt scare away. People and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities have succeeded.”
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump’s executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a “victory” for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, “The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents living legally.”
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The US Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing the Secretary of Commerce of the US Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census. In addition to the number, and use this to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years based on demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: New book broke the news: Prince Harry thinks his brother is “snobbish and arrogant”
ref: Exposures from New Book: Prince Harry Thinks His Elder Brother “Snobbish and Arrogant”

mt: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” serialized a new book titled “Finding Freedom”, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.
ref: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” have published a new book titled “Finding Freedom” in installments, which describes the psychological journey of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle during their living of the royal life.

mt: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they had not accepted the author’s interview or provided any content.
