mt: Inter Milan unlocks 3,000th Serie A game
ref: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A match - www.chinanews.com

mt: In the early morning of July 26th, Beijing time, Inter Milan, the traditional giant of Serie A, ushered in the milestone battle.
ref: Www.chinanews.com Client, July 26 - In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Inter Milan, a traditional top club of Serie A, ushered in a milestone battle.

mt: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3,000th Serie A match in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri are also the first team to unlock this milestone.
ref: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

mt: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.
ref: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

mt: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa was the 3,000th game in the history of the Nerazzurri.
ref: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri.

mt: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa by three goals.
ref: In this milestone match, Inter Milan won Genoa C.F.C. by three goals away game.

mt: Lukaku scored twice, and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.
ref: In this match, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

mt: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the attack was finally converted into a goal in the 34th minute.
ref: The match entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the crazy attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

mt: Bilagi's cross from the left, Lukaku's header in the middle.
ref: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku made a header from the middle.

mt: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan concocted the right way, Moses broke through the back cross, and Sanchez made a good shot in the middle; before the end of the game, Lukaku completed the second time, Brozovic sent a long-distance direct block in the counterattack, and Lukaku rushed into the penalty area to shake Romero and pushed the open goal to score, setting the score at 3: 0.
ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter Milan's 3-0 away win over Genoa lifted them above Atalanta into second place, four points behind leaders Juventus with a game in hand, and they still retain hope of winning the title.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: So far, in the 3,000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1,489 of them, drawn 834 and lost 677, with a win rate of 49.6%.
ref: So far, Inter Milan has won 1489 of the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, drew 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

mt: During that time, the team scored 5,038 goals and conceded 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.
ref: During the period, Inter Milan scored 5,038 goals and lost 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

mt: The Nerazzurri have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.
ref: The Nerazzurri have won league titles 18 times and have never been relegated.

mt: Liu Yunlong, the old face of the spy drama, plays a stammering leading man - Xinhua.com
ref: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy war drama, plays a stuttering leading actor - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, and Li Liqun, the large-scale spy drama "Chance" landed on Guangdong TV's "Vitality Theater" at 7:30 p.m. on July 16.
ref: The large-scale spy war drama “Winner”, produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starred by Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., landed in the GRT Satellite Channel’s “Golden Drama” at 7:30 pm on July 16.

mt: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Chinese Communist Party lurking in the Japanese pseudo-police station, who joined forces with Soviet agents to assassinate the leader of the Japanese agents and smash the Japanese army's shocking plot.
ref: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurked in the Japanese puppet police station, who joined Soviet agents to assassinate the Japanese agent leader and smash the terrible conspiracy of the Japanese army.

mt: "The Odds" is based on historical facts, and the material is taken from the Soviet military archives that have been sealed for many years.
ref: The “Winner” is adapted from historical facts, and its material is taken from Soviet military archives which have been dusty for many years.

mt: During the defense of Moscow, the Soviet Red Army's Far East elite marched westward to help, and at this time, the Japanese Kwantung Army's "northward faction" thought that it could take advantage of it and wanted to send troops.
ref: During the Fight for Moscow, the elite of the Far East of the Soviet Red Army rushed westward to help, while the "Northward School" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought that there was an opportunity to send troops.

mt: In order to relieve the danger of the enemy, the CCP and the intelligence personnel of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union jointly implemented the "Mudan-Ula" plan.
ref: In order to solve the crisis of being attacked from both sides of the abdomen, the intelligence personnel of the CPC and the CPSU jointly implemented the "Mudan Ula" plan.

mt: According to this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been polished several times, making the plot twists and turns burn the brain.
ref: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well-known screenwriter, has polished this film several times, which makes the plot tortuous and brain-burning.

mt: Liu Yunlong served as both the producer and the leading actor in "The Odds."
ref: Liu Yunlong is the producer and the leading actor in the “Winner”.

mt: In the drama, he plays Tang Fei, the head of the criminal section of the Linhe Police Department, a stammering policeman with a sense of joy and even a bit of anger, whose real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In the play, Tang Fei, played by Liu Yunlong, is the criminal section chief of Linhe Police Department; and he is a stuttering policeman who is quite happy and even a little angry, but his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

mt: Cai Meng, the heroine of the rival play, is the section chief of the Linhe Security Bureau, deeply appreciated by the Japanese boss Fukuhara, and there is a subtle relationship between Tang Fei, who is also an enemy and a friend, and ambiguous.
ref: Cai Meng, the heroine who played the opposite play, is the head of Linhe Security Bureau, who is highly appreciated by Japanese boss Fukuhara; and there is a subtle relationship between Cai Meng and Tang Fei, which is both enemy and friend and ambiguous.

mt: Su Qing has tried a lot of different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Years We Are Young" to Er Qing in "Yanxi Raiders," all of which have impressed the audience and been recognized for their acting skills.
ref: In recent years, Su Qing has tried many different roles, from Lu Ruowen in the “Those Years We Are Young” to Er Qing in the “Story of Yanxi Palace”, all of which impressed the audiences deeply and were recognized by the audiences for her acting skills.

mt: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time, and the setting of the stuttering sheriff with the charming policewoman is quite interesting and new.
ref: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time; and the arrangement of stuttering police chief with charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.

mt: In addition to the two main characters, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi in "The Odds." The old drama is also one of the highlights of the play.
ref: In addition to the two protagonists, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi in the “Winner”, and the old actors are also one of the highlights of this film.

mt: It is understood that the production of "Chance" is also very sophisticated, and the crew traveled nearly 2,000 kilometers across Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces to shoot scenes.
ref: It is understood that the “Winner” is also very sophisticated in production, and the crew spans nearly 2,000 kilometers in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces for shooting and framing.

mt: In order to restore the bizarre cityscape of the Northeast Japan period, the production team's art and props team worked day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, making the scenes in the play exquisite and rich in historical texture.
ref: In order to restore the grotesque city features during the Japanese occupation period in Northeast China, the artists and props group of the crew worked day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, which made the scenes in the play delicate and rich in historical texture.

mt: Greenland opens a new round of mixed reform Shanghai's state-owned assets plan to transfer 17.5% of shares -Economic Observer-Professional financial news website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observer Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "prompt announcement on the state-owned shareholders' intention to transfer part of the company's shares and resumption of trading through public solicitation of transferees."
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the shareholding structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai City Investment") intend to transfer part of the shares held by the company through public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred does not exceed 17.5% of Greenland's total share capital.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred is not lower than the higher of the following: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days prior to the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investor of Greenland. According to the information released in the announcement, it is estimated that the new strategic investor needs to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of the transfer of shares, it is expected that Greenland still has no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out a number of institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; from 2015 to the present, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Zhuhai Alum, led by Gaolu Capital, took over a 15% stake in Gree Electric (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a small shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented a modern corporate management method such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises in a new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and tailor-made. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "demolish" a new spark? - Xinhua

mt: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film scheduled for the Lunar New Year.
