ref: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the Shock Wave 2 also makes the challenge faced by bomb squad even more difficult, several glimpses in the preview have already made people's hearts hang on the line, and the mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by flames are quite shocking.

mt: Three years ago, "The Bomb Disposal Expert," produced by the original team, won the May 1st box office champion of the year and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards. Qiu Litao and Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the minds of the audience.
ref: Three years ago, the Shock Wave, produced by the original team, won the May 1st box office champion and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Qiu Litao × Liu Dehua also became the gold partner in the audience's mind.

mt: This time, "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people once again look forward to whether this pair of aces can create new sparks.
ref: This Shock Wave 2 also makes people look forward to whether this ace combination can spark a new spark.

mt: "Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a new story: former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (Liu Dehua) fainted at the scene of the bombing and was listed as a suspect by the police.
ref: The Shock Wave 2 tells a brand-new story: The former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Liu Dehua) faints at the scene of the bombing and is listed as a suspect by the police.

mt: In order to find the truth, he has to ask for help from his friend Dong Zhuowen (Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.
ref: In order to find the truth, he had to seek help from his good friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.

mt: Pang Ling (Ni Ni), a female inspector who is eager to solve the case and is also Pan's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.
ref: Pang Ling (played by Ni Ni), the female inspector who is eager to solve the case and Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

mt: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but you can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the trailer: he has a broken leg, wears a prosthetic limb, and is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.
ref: It's still the Shock Wave, but we can feel the complexity of Liu Dehua's new role from the preview: he breaks a leg, puts on a prosthetic leg, is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and is directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

mt: What exactly is the relationship between the three, what did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases was he involved in, and what twists and turns did his career as a bomb disposal expert go through, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.
ref: What is the relationship between the three persons, what did Liu Dehua do in Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

mt: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the on-the-spot filming of Hong Kong's world landmark buildings, coupled with the top special effects production team, bringing a shocking and realistic visual impact.
ref: It is understood that the main event of the film is to take pictures of the world landmarks in Hong Kong on the spot, and with the top special effects production team, so it brings shocking and vivid visual impact.

mt: (Reporter Zou Qing)
ref: (Reporter Nie Qing)

mt: China News Service, July 26: According to the comprehensive Russian satellite network, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - Integrated Sputnik reported that, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: Russian President Vladimir Putin, the Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt to take part in the celebrations, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.
ref: Vladimir Putin, Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, and in this place, 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

mt: On July 28, 2019 local time, Russia held a grand military parade in St. Petersburg to celebrate the Navy Day.
ref: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day, and sailed in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the naval parade, and then reviewed the troops at the subjective podium.
ref: It’s reported that Putin celebrated naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, sailed by the naval ships which would appear in the maritime parade on the Gulf of Finland in a small boat, and then reviewed the paraded troops on the main viewing stand.

mt: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improving.
ref: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improved.

mt: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade: "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment."
ref: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade that, "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircrafts and other air vehicles, unique weapons and special equipment. ”

mt: On June 24 local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.
ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective means of defense to achieve unique advantages.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.

mt: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with a total of 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Vice Admiral Kurakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, etc.
ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, a series of ships were on static display next to the Winter Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which was the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: In order to avoid the spread of the new coronavirus, only local residents and special guests will be able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The last Sunday of July each year is the Russian Navy Day.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: In an interview with a reporter from China News Network, 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandparents fished in the Longxi River, and since he was 11 years old, he has been fishing with his father, rocking a small boat, traveling along the Longxi River, going up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Longevity. Every time he leaves home, it is ten days and a half months, and he supports his family by fishing.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually flocked to the town, the number of residents in Gao'an town has increased, and the environmental pollution has become more and more serious.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical factories and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had turned into a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The fish scales that were caught were all black, and the inside was also black after being cut open."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that it is more and more difficult to fish after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including clear drifting, river patrol, and aquatic resources management and protection.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also switched from fishing to production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic biological reserve of Chongqing and the relevant waters of the main urban area have been completely banned.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has withdrawn a total of 3,403 fishing vessels and 4,643 fishing vessels that have signed a withdrawal agreement, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been returned, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4,404 people who have been recaptured, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the recaptured fishermen.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Pension insurance protection covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the Yangtze River main stream shoreline utilization project, complete a new round of Yangtze River inlet sewage outlet survey and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphorus ore, phosphorus chemical industry and phosphogypsum depot) rectification task, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of the special rectification of illegal wharves and illegal sand mining on the Yangtze River main stream, and further promote the ban on fishing in the Yangtze River basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly, said Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong SAR Government.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong and Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Association) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the "revision storm" and the new coronavirus epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The Hong Kong dollar exchange rate is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There are no obvious signs of capital outflows from the banking system. On the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total deposits of banks have also continued to increase in the past few months, and there has been a series of public offering and fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have risen frequently.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the coronavirus outbreak has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has a number of advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, the free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong continue to be a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the HKSAR government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the HKSAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Programme" to fund local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, employ local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby regions.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: Lancet article praises China's anti-epidemic efforts, encourages countries to learn from experience
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: According to an article published in The Lancet on the 25th, China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new coronavirus epidemic at this stage, and there has been no further widespread transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new coronavirus than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The authors said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially because the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were quickly able to identify the virus species, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close cooperation within the country. In May and July, the results of the progress of early trials of the new coronavirus vaccine developed by China were published in the Lancet.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are well worth learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, it is necessary to have a strong high-level decisively rely on scientific evidence to make the right decision, which makes the new crown epidemic effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in a way that is best for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early days of the outbreak, China's National Health Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to "close the city" of Wuhan on January 23; when some experts proposed the necessity and urgency of building a cabin hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the widespread participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: The article concludes by emphasizing that in response to the global health emergency, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Chief Taiwan Correspondent Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, NRW, Germany, killing a total of three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg prosecutor's office, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement on the evening of the same day, saying that at about 14:40 on the same day, a two-seater small plane crashed into a residential building on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from the city of Marl in the Ruhr region of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County and took off again, then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The dead were identified as a female resident of the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the house suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not been calmed.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene footage reported by the German news agency showed that smoke billowed from the house where the accident occurred. After the firefighters extinguished the fire, the house was severely damaged.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rheinische Post quoted police as saying there were indications that the plane may have broken up before hitting the residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: The police said that many parts of the crashed aircraft were found in the area of the accident site.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: German criminal police are working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the consulate had contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Dapeng director's "Good Luck" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Dapeng's first reality-themed film, "Good Luck," was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival, and the film's first poster was officially released.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: A poster for the film
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film "Jixiang Ruyi" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and it is also the second time he has been associated with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy film director who, on a whim, returns to his hometown in the rural northeast, hoping to make a literary film about how a family celebrates the New Year, only to encounter a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members who had gathered for the film completed the final gathering.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family, "Third Uncle" Wang Jixiang, sits in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette. In the background is the northeastern black land dressed in silver, and in the foreground are the red lanterns that Chinese people must hang on New Year's Day.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes celebration and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, and seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "third uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The film's experimental audio-visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality, bringing the audience a new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Jixiang Ruyi" originated from "a providence," a series of sudden changes in the family during the shooting, so that the original shooting plan had to be changed, and life without a script was finally recorded as a film, but it released tension beyond design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this "providence," and how does he continue to meet the various changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Good Luck" is full of experimentation. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a film. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of the family gathering in the film, it evokes a series of thoughts.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

mt: NEWS.GOV.MO: New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center Inquiry Hotline Statistics (July 25 08H00 - July 26 08H00)
ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

mt: From 08H00 on July 25 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the inquiry hotline of the New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center received a total of 292 telephone inquiries.
ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: 291 inquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up.
ref: The 291 enquires about the COVID-19 pandemic were transferred to the representatives of relevant departments for follow-up, as shown below:

mt: 271 cases in the Health Bureau (involving: inquiries about isolation; inquiries about nucleic acid testing; inquiries about two land marks; health codes; others.)
ref: Health Bureau: 271 enquiries (involving: quarantine; nucleic acid testing; two-site licenses; health code; and others. )

mt: 17 cases at the Public Security Police Station (involving: inquiring about entry and exit measures; inquiring about entry and exit measures for vehicles registered in Guangdong and Macao; inquiring about the Zhuhai government hotline; inquiring about the stay of documents.)
ref: Public Security Police Force Headquarters: 17 enquiries (involving: entry-exit measures; entry-exit measures for vehicles with Canton and Macao’s driving licenses; Zhuhai’s hotline for government affairs; and Visa stay period. )

mt: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiries about quarantine hotels.)
ref: Tourist Administration: 1 enquiry (involving: hotels for quarantine )

mt: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau 1 case (involving: enquiring about ways for Macao students to return to the UK to study)
ref: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau: 1 enquiry (involving: how Macau students can return to the UK for study. )

mt: Marine and Water Bureau 1 case (involving: asking whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare to the Marine and Water Bureau and nucleic acid testing related matters.)
ref: Marine and Water Bureau: 1 enquiry (involving: whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare to the Marine and Water Affairs Bureau, and the matters concerning nucleic acid testing. )

mt: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.
ref: Marinichev said that the change in value was influenced by the devaluation of the Rouble and the pandemic, etc.

mt: He said: "The cost of services is increasing.
ref: He said, “The cost of services is increasing.

mt: Because of the epidemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet."
ref: For reason of the pandemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet. ”

mt: Marinichev did not rule out a serious rise in Internet prices next year, arguing that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with rising prices.
ref: Marinichev did not rule out a major rise in the annual prices of the Internet, and he thought that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the rise in price.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" plans to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhua
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers for anti-epidemic heroes, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) held a discussion with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor."
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctors" to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, Bona Film is organizing the original team of the film "Chinese Captain" to make the film "Chinese Doctor," which is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic, with Wuhan medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities as the background characters. From the perspective of human nature, using a unique narrative and a highly impactful camera language, the panorama shows the touching story of Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice on the front line of the anti-epidemic.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that on the first day of the lifting of the lockdown in Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a filming team to the front line of the epidemic to communicate with hundreds of medical workers face to face to understand and collect information. At present, it has interviewed a large number of precious first-hand video materials, including Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team, and the white angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard on the front line, which is the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain China" before, and thought that it was a good way to tell the big picture story from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to screening in China, it is best to screen the film abroad, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, I was most impressed by the film "Man to Middle Age" after the reform and opening up. At that time, doctors' friends outside China were crying. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be very great."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control. "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, from the primitive society to the present, human beings have overcome thousands of difficulties and dangers. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will not be as passive as before.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)
ref: (By Wang Jinyue)

mt: The first Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's news - Hunan Daily News - Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui, Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing red boat mold, Lushan Mao Zedong bronze statue, Yan'an cloth pile flower crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival opened in Lushan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held at the Lushan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: The red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and the local products in the old revolutionary area are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy.
ref: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: "The Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."
ref: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and discuss the ways of development. ”

mt: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Red Expo in Xiangtan, the theme of this Red Expo is "promoting red culture to help the tweet brigade warm up," with a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000 square meters, setting up an atmosphere-building area, a scenic display area and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.
ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: Eight provinces and cities, including Jiaxing in Zhejiang, Zunyi in Guizhou and Yan'an in Shaanxi, as well as 137 enterprises and units in Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Zhangzhou in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 kinds of exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition and sales area will be open until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The red industrial exhibition area displayed 31 exhibits from six companies, including Hualing Xiangsteel, Hualing Cable, and Hunan Electric Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area displayed nearly 200 products from 27 units, including red series books, red series food, and red series cultural and creative products.
ref: The Red Industry Exhibition Area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co., Ltd., and XEMC. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the display of cloth and flower handicrafts and paper-cut art.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, said that the exhibition carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products in Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansei Paper Cutting," "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial non-heritage project Yanchuan Cloth Painting, focusing on the promotion of Yan'an folk products, and took the opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps to crack the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of the new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Our reporter Shang Rui reports: Recently, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University has made great progress in the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: The related results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect."
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane material, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck difficulty of using membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: Tianjin University research team innovative ideas, through repeated experiments, to explore the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable," which effectively enhances the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the hybrid matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation limit of such membrane materials at present.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign a "long-term contract" for the third CIIE exhibitor alliance to build a "CIIE bond" - Xinhua
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third Import Expo established a professional committee for the first time here. The first special committees established included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Special Committee and the Dairy Special Committee. 35 member companies also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the bond of the Expo Exhibitor Alliance continued to increase.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the third CIIE held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of the exhibition alliance, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum. The revised and improved exhibition alliance charter was also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The scene of the founding ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest charter, the exhibition alliance will introduce a rotation mechanism for leading units and strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, the integration of the industry's entire industrial chain resources, with large and small, will drive affiliated enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the Expo into a highland for industry enterprises to gather.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new coronavirus.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman of the public health and epidemic prevention special committee of the third CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronavirus epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The scene of the founding ceremony of the Professional Committee for Public Health and Epidemic Prevention in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third CIIE has set up a public health epidemic prevention zone for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global companies have registered to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established on the initiative of exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, a platform for connecting exhibitors to share information and resources, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: Three-year-old girl dies of new coronavirus infection in Belgium - Xinhua
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of new coronavirus infection, the youngest new coronavirus death in the country.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Budwin Katri, a spokesman for the Belgian health department, said that the girl had other serious diseases before she was infected with the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old recently died of the new coronavirus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Katri said that last week, 85% of the newly diagnosed people in Belgium were under the age of 60.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He cautioned healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "Although it is rare for young people to die from the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, Belgium's new confirmed cases of new coronavirus increased by 89% from the previous week, and an average of 2.9 people died of new coronavirus infection every day, up from an average of 1.7 people per day in the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of new coronavirus infections in the Belgian population was among the highest in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data shows that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Katri warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger, eventually causing an "avalanche."
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant rules for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media campaign "Go to the village live to see poverty alleviation" starts - Today's news - Hunan Daily News - Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client July 25th (Reporter of this newspaper) On July 25th, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud broadcasting system were sent by the guests on the scene and slowly drove out of the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a moderately prosperous society in an all-round way and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty."
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media campaign "Going to the Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure for the financial program center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go into poverty-stricken villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government, dig up fresh stories of poverty alleviation, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers can break through the difficulties of survival and development and move towards the road to prosperity.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: The operation will last for more than three months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: Starting from Xuzhou, the reporter divided into two routes and took the southwest route, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route took the northwest route, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, covering more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In the form of reporting, "Going to the village to see poverty alleviation" is boldly integrated.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel of the Central Radio and Television General Station, the Voice of the Central Guangxi Economy, China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the midday news program "Tianxia Caijing" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), and the gold news program "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Finance Channel will open a column on poverty alleviation (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a one-hour live broadcast on the CCTV financial client for each village it visits. Viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV financial app.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" bravely broke through and pioneered the "New Media Caravan in the Outfield."
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud broadcasting system, using 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and television broadcasting.
