mt: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.
ref: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

mt: Since the reform of the league in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.
ref: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

mt: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th game in the history of the Blue and Black Corps.
ref: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri.

mt: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan beat Genoa with three goals away.
ref: In this milestone match, Inter Milan won Genoa C.F.C. by three goals away game.

mt: Lukaku scored twice in this game, and Sanchez, who appeared as a substitute, also contributed a goal.
ref: In this match, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

mt: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the strong attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.
ref: The match entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the crazy attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

mt: Biraji passed from the left, Lukaku outflanked the header and scored the goal.
ref: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku made a header from the middle.

mt: Inter Milan did the same in the 82nd minute, Moses broke through the right and scored, Sanchez outflanked and scored successfully; Lukaku scored twice before the end, and Brozovic sent a long-distance straight stopper in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and swung Romero and scored an empty goal, setting the score at 3: 0.
ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter Milan won Genoa 3-0 away, and the points overtook Atlanta to second place, 4 points behind the leader Juventus in the case of one more game, still retaining the hope of winning the championship.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: At this point, in this 3,000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan won 1,489 of them, tied 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.
ref: So far, Inter Milan has won 1489 of the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, drew 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

mt: In the meantime, the team scored 5,038 goals, lost 3,102 goals, and scored 1.68 goals per game.
ref: During the period, Inter Milan scored 5,038 goals and lost 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

mt: The Nerazzurri have won the league championship 18 times and have never been relegated.
ref: The Nerazzurri have won league titles 18 times and have never been relegated.

mt: Liu Yunlong, the old face of the spy drama, plays a stuttering actor-Xinhuanet
ref: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy war drama, plays a stuttering leading actor - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Produced by Liu Yunlong and directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun and others, the large-scale spy war drama "Winning" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Dynamic Theater" at 7: 30 pm on July 16.
ref: The large-scale spy war drama “Winner”, produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starred by Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., landed in the GRT Satellite Channel’s “Golden Drama” at 7:30 pm on July 16.

mt: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China lurking in the Japanese-puppet police station, who teamed up with Soviet agents to assassinate the leader of the Japanese agent and smash the Japanese conspiracy.
ref: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurked in the Japanese puppet police station, who joined Soviet agents to assassinate the Japanese agent leader and smash the terrible conspiracy of the Japanese army.

mt: "Winning Chance" is adapted from historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives for many years.

mt: Green space opens a new round of mixed reform of Shanghai state-owned assets to transfer 17.5% of shares-Economic Watch-Professional Finance News website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observation Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenfield Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "suggestive notice that state-owned shareholders intend to transfer part of the company's shares and resume trading through public solicitation of transferees."
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (Hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (Hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") intend to transfer some of the shares held by the company through public solicitation of transferees. The proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total equity of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: The arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days before the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the company's audited net asset value per share in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, the new strategic investor in Greenland is still inconclusive. According to the announcement, it is estimated that the new strategic investor will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% equity transferred in this mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may undergo major changes.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenfield Holdings has carried out many institutional and mechanism reforms: From 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a whole and has become a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: The current mixed reform plan of Greenland is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented modern corporate management methods such as an executive incentive plan and no actual control structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure taken by Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises and accelerate the new phase of state-owned state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new ideas of reform adapted to local conditions and tailored to local conditions. By introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: China News Service, July 26, a comprehensive Russian satellite network reported that July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far retired 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, the 53-year-old Li Daiguo said that his grandfathers were fishing in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he has been fishing with his father, shaking his boat, moving along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to longevity. Every time he leaves home, he is ten and a half months, relying on fishing to maintain his family life.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, there are more and more residents in Gaoanchang Town, causing more and more serious environmental pollution.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River has become a smelly ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The scales of the fish caught are black, and the inside is also black after being cut open."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and converted to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to data from the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has retired 3,403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing vessels that have signed retreat agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4404 people who have been retired, 4267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Pension insurance coverage covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of fishermen who retire.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the Yangtze River's main stream shoreline utilization projects, complete a new round of Yangtze River drainage and drainage surveys and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "Three Phosphorus" (referring to phosphate mines, phosphorous chemicals and phosphorous gypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote special actions for afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements of the special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on fishing and retreat in the Yangtze River basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25. Xu Zhengyu, Director of the Financial Affairs and Treasury Bureau of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Association) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the "regulation disturbance" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the exchange guarantee level of the strong party.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: The banking system has no obvious signs of capital outflows. On the contrary, more than US $11 billion in funds have flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offering fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly risen.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic fund" to create about 30,000 time-bound jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand People Plan" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other companies with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's financial technology talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore renminbi business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and surrounding areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: "The Lancet" praised China's anti-epidemic efforts to encourage countries to learn from experience-Chinanews.com
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article stated that in the past ten years, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) that year.
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author said that when the SARS outbreak broke out in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new crown virus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new crown virus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. When the country declared a state of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research was carried out very quickly and strictly. In May and July, respectively, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were announced in "The Lancet."
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are very worthy of reference and learning.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisive reliance on scientific evidence to make correct decisions, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and take action on it in the most beneficial way for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, the National Health and Construction Commission of China dispatched three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new crown virus. mt: The article finally emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" plans to pay tribute to the anti-epidemic hero-Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers' heroes in the fight against the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Pictures Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (picture left), held talks and exchanges with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor."
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control through "Chinese Doctor"!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of the film "Captain of China" to make the film "Chinese Doctor" under the arrangements and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau. This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the country to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic, and will take Wuhan medical staff and provincial and municipal aid medical teams as the background of the characters. From the perspective of human nature, using unique narratives and highly impactful lens language, the panorama shows the touching story of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice on the anti-epidemic front line.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that at the first time on the day when Wuhan was unblocked, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and dispatched a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, face-to-face exchanges with hundreds of medical workers to understand and collect information. At present, it has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to aid Wuhan, the Guangdong aid to Hubei medical team, and the white-clothed angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., have photographed a large number of precious first-hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made more public appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line, they are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen "I and My Motherland" and "Chinese Captain" before and thought that the way to tell the big pattern story from the perspective of ordinary people is very good.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the dissemination of the film, academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, it is best to show it abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" from the 1980s. "After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was" Man to Middle Age. "At that time, my doctors and friends abroad were crying. If" Chinese Doctor "could play such a role, it would be great."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control. "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, since the primitive society, mankind has weathered thousands of difficulties and dangers. Today, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. "Next, we must pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to the comfort of people's hearts."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: Cultural Travel "Red Fruit" Gathers Shaoshan-Xiangtan First Red Fair - Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily News Network-Huaxing Online

mt: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products of the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be on until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of bright spots.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Cultural and Tourism Bureau, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Anse Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial non-heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting inheritors, focusing on the promotion of Yanan folk custom products, and took this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect "-Chinanews.com
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: Recently, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team has made significant progress on the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and has successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology."
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit responsible for the "greenhouse effect."
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of attention of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology. It separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck difficulty in capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation method.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared with this new technology is close to the current theoretical separation upper limit of such membrane materials.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "New technology provides new ideas for membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to process flue gas in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign the "long contract" of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance to build a "blog link" -Xinhuanet
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance established a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of special committees established include the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a 3-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the link role of the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom signed a 3-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation, and the revised and improved articles of association were also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee, filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest constitution, the exhibition union will introduce the rotation mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will put forward suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive associated companies to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry enterprises.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a public health and epidemic prevention committee for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, Fu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the 3rd CIIE established a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. As of now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established at the initiative of the exhibitors. It aims to become an exchange and cooperation platform for high-quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing among all exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: So far, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: 3-year-old girl in Belgium died of new crown virus infection-Xinhuanet
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection and was the youngest person in the country to die of new crown disease.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Kateri said that the girl already had other serious diseases before contracting the new crown virus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old recently died of the new crown virus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Katri said that 85% of newly diagnosed new crowns in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded people who are healthy and younger not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "Although it is rare for young people to die from new crown virus infection, no one is now immune."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crowns in Belgium increased by 89% over the previous week, and an average of 2.9 people died of the new crown virus infection every day, up from the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was "among the best" in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data shows that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Carter warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually cause an "avalanche."
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency micro-feature]
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" Start-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily News Network-Huaxing Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale financial media operation "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system were seen by guests at the scene and drove slowly out of the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a moderately prosperous society in an all-round way and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also a year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty."
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media operation "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Finance Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: This action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities across the country, dig out living poverty alleviation stories, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of the village, and show how villagers can break through the dilemma of survival and development and move towards the road to wealth.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: This operation will last more than 3 months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter set out from Xuzhou and took two routes, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey exceeds 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of reporting format, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is a bold fusion.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Financial New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be completed mainly on the noon news program "World Finance" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12: 00-13: 00), and the golden news section "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Finance Channel will open a column for poverty alleviation reports (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20: 30-21: 30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a 1-hour live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits. By downloading CCTV Finance APP, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the raffle.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan."
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and television broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Equipped with a Sanxun broadcast area, the broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The broadcast area can also be expanded automatically, with an external expansion platform, with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and taciturn
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: BEIJING, July 26 According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a treasure of religious and historical buildings in Nantes, France, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th local time, Nantes prosecutors announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction".
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has admitted that he started the fire in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The person's lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: This person entered France through asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire occurred and taken in in the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: Prosecutors pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police station.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: However, the church said it still couldn't believe that this usually very kind, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church he loved so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows firefighters rescuing at the scene.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, because professional engineers in the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, this person was arraigned again.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if convicted of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to the report, the fire caused serious losses to St. Pierre and St. Paul's Cathedral. The organ in the church was completely burned down, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also seriously damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane "Hannah" makes landfall in Texas or causes river surge and flash flood - Chinanews.com
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: BEIJING, July 26 (Xinhua) -According to comprehensive foreign media reports, Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas at 5:00 p.m. local time on the 25th, which will bring strong winds and torrential rain, soaring river water and possibly life-threatening flash floods to Texas.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rain across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, which may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: According to the report, the area most seriously affected by Hurricane Hannah is from the south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and large-scale flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency because of the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that at a time when Texas is being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, rainfall in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rainfall will also occur in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the Polish Ministry of Justice said Saturday.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty required schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling on the rights of students' parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Justice Minister Joblo held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Giobro said, "The treaty contains some elements that we think are harmful."
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw.
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held banners that read "Law and Justice Party is a hell for women."
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice Party government said the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to the Vietnam News Agency, Grivory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Grivory said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and promotion of its image to the outside world.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He stressed that "ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam."
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivory said analysts recognized Vietnam's peace initiative.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and put forward constructive peace measures on the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.
