mt: On the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of ASEAN, Grivory believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grivory suggested maximizing the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, so as to create a platform for economy, security and stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Grivory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, so as to actively welcome foreign capital inflows, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the submission of the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the province's Anshan-Beilong and Anlu industrial-city-service zones to the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju and Shuangxi-Neihuang, so as to form a land fund for attracting investment.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters, so as to be included in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense security, protecting the ecological environment and ensuring food security, thus boosting the balanced development of industry; It has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to call for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery and auxiliary industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on speeding up the investment in the infrastructure of the logistics center of Beijiang City and develop simultaneously with the industrial park cluster, so as to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, improve the value of goods, optimize the supply chain and develop multimodal transport, thus creating attraction for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Network) In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases in many days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government temporarily decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry and even anger when they heard of the decision, because the news came suddenly and caught people off guard.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before Britain issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain would be quarantined for 10 days.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon their plans for a holiday in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and people cannot keep social distance. At one time, the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: It's safe here
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the British decision, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the epidemic situation in the country was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist resorts is far lower than that in Britain.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, Spain's Catalonia region has also restarted the "grounded order".
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet / Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of mid-volt: Beijing bid farewell to the high temperature and heat and start the rainfall mod - Xinhuanet
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: The convective weather of strong winds and showers in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and heat shrouded in Beijing in recent days, and a new round of rainfall will last for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ℃; At night, there is light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the minimum temperature at night is 23 ℃.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: From the 24th to the 25th, the whole city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37 ℃, and the local high temperature exceeded 40 ℃.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: The summer day is the hottest, humid and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the valley, every family fills the barn, and there is a folk saying that "one volt of dumpling and two volts of noodles".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, there will be rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department reminds the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's "mid-volt" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "mid-volt", people will feel weak and loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: Diet can choose mung beans, coix seed and other foods with the functions of clearing heat and relieving summer heat, invigorating the spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and balsam pear, which can help to stimulate appetite and dispel summer heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" will be launched next week, led by Xue Zhaofeng "Knowledge Sponso - Xinhuanet
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There are new variety shows on the line.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: Interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong Online! Hello Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new all-age youth classroom, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "Duan Zishou" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge interesting knowledge classes.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to show the most interesting side of their subject through attitude knowledge output to impress the audience present.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The "Youdao Asking Group" composed of audiences of all ages will ask ever-changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult for the "knowledge sharing officer" to teach and adding a little exciting atmosphere to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to reports, among the "knowledge sharing officers", there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joined the "Ding Dong Assistant" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create an "open class for youth for all".
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and the fight against the epidemi - Chinanews.com
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26-The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, Zhang Jianzong, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic situation in Hong Kong continues to be grim. If the epidemic deteriorates, the SAR Government will decisively take stricter control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention of introducing a "home order" or a "foot ban order" to restrict citizens from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled "The situation is grim and we are fully committed to fighting the epidemic".
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and the next two weeks will be crucial, so we should try our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: Apart from the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, it is also very important for the public to exercise self-discipline and cooperation.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He called on citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: Members of the public should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the testing capacity and refitting the Asia International Expo to work like a "shelter hospital".
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of residential care homes for the elderly, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR Government was building quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories and was expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build 2,000 more isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center and strive to complete them by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: Together with the 800 quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: At present, there are four quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who have independent self-care ability.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China with "undervalued RMB exchange rate"
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties (cable ties) products originating in China and an investigation on the "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time the United States has filed an investigation into the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project in a countervailing case, which China firmly opposes.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release stressed that on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and has not been underestimated.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%, making it the strongest currency in the G20 economy and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States amended its laws and regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: According to the press release, even in accordance with US regulations, there are a large number of errors in the content of the applicant's complaint, which does not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial assistance, benefit granting and specificity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate".
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further rising tension in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply in intraday trading on the 22nd, both falling below the 7.0 yuan mark against the US dollar.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to push up the RMB is worth paying attention to.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The official central parity of the RMB against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: The 26th is the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union address (SONA) during his term of office. On that day, the Philippines has confirmed more than 80,000 cases of COVID-19, of which the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the Presidential Information Department (PCOO) and its directly affiliated institutions has increased to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte to publish SONA.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators at the scene, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants can enter the parliament building only after passing the quick test on the same day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was launched, that is, President Duterte delivered SONA at Maracanan Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats were arranged for the audience.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: According to convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and restore social and economic life; He will also mention the promises he made when he took office, namely, fighting government corruption, fighting illegal drugs and reducing poverty.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulation - Xinhuanet
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early; Prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; Establish a health review system for online games; Employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... Recently, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (Draft for Soliciting Opinions) was officially released, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems as early as possible, the above-mentioned draft for comments proposes that health departments should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: Health examination expenses within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance co-ordination fund according to the standard of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The draft for comments clearly states that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees' work and rest time, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor load, so as to avoid excessive loss of human functions or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health examinations.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the sales location of alcoholic beverages is restricted. Those who violate the regulations will be ordered by the market supervision and management department to make corrections and be fined 30,000 yuan.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to "prohibition of alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the requirements of the Exposure Draft, schools should arrange students' sports activities for more than one hour every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism, sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of teenagers.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions will be fined 20,000 yuan for disclosing patients' privacy without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the Exposure Draft also requires that Shenzhen departments should assess the impact of public policy implementation on people's health before formulating plans and normative documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological environment protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Without assessment or assessment, it will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, and shall not be formulated, promulgated or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Hoh Xil Tibetan antelope enters migration seaso - Xinhuanet
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes that had migrated to the Zhuonaihu area in the hinterland of Hoh Xil were gradually ending their litter and began to return to their original habitat with their cubs.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: Monitoring images near Wudaoliang Protection Station show that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of Qinghai-Tibet Highway and Wudaoliang North Bridge on Qinghai-Tibet Railway, and Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the relocated sheep herd accounts for one quarter to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope herds.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of migration, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes was 4,860, an increase of 338 over 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that this year's migration of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September, and the number of Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, Altun Mountain in Xinjiang and other places go to Zhuonaihu in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher at Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: "The migration of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats one after another after giving birth. At first, the returning population leaving the litter site is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video monitoring and patrol in the main relocation areas.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If Tibetan antelopes are found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control as soon as possible to let the sheep pass through the wildlife passage safely and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible on the way back.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how to relieve the summer heat in daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid the high temperature period, and it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest during this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as playing a sunshade, wearing a sunshade hat, and wearing sunglasses. If conditions permit, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Clothes should be made of light-colored cotton, hemp and silk with good air permeability as far as possible, and chemical fiber clothing should be worn less, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot and cause heatstroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: In hot and sultry weather, prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, your body is already short of water, and each time you drink 150 ml to 200 ml of water, drink warm boiled water, and don't drink ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, while high-temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When sweating more, some salt water can be added appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: Eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content in summer, such as lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, etc.; Fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content is 80% to 90%, can be used to supplement water; Dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should appropriately supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of the human body is vigorous, the consumption is also large, and it is easy to feel tired.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax all systems of the brain and body, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say the best time to go to bed is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: Be careful not to lie under the air conditioning outlet and electric fan during sleep, so as not to suffer from air conditioning diseases and hot colds.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high-temperature operations can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Water or Huoxiang Zhengqi Pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall Public Welfare Exhibitio - Xinhuanet
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the "cloud graduation" season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it is neither in the art museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, which is open to the public free of charge and will last until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that this 2020 Graduate Art Exhibition collected 50 pieces / groups of works by 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extended from the second floor to the sixth floor, and made full use of the light box in the building to display graphic works, maximizing the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Ping, head of Meichen in Chaoyang Joy City, said frankly: "We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the 'cloud' back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people can see young people's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the healing power of art for society and the soul."
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, and selected from them suitable for commercial space display. The forms of the works range from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in history.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying discussed the themes of "encrypted currency", "credit creation" and "transaction" through the work "Sound Money" created by the Ethereum blockchain; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Ji" show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists' understanding of the relationship between human beings and animals; Zhu Zhongyu's work "Winter of Faith-Gift" reminds growing young people, "When one day your career is successful, Do not forget your initiative mind, remember that simplicity and sincerity."
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I brought alcohol cotton and test reports to the exhibition."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work "Yesterday is a Mystery" has a complicated structure and must be done by himself.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: "The exhibition was arranged until 4:30 in the morning, and then it was repaired. The time was very tight. I forgot to take a picture with the work, which was also a bit regrettable."
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he and his classmates will come to Beijing to see his work exhibition.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Reward 50,000 yuan Hubei Enshi praised Shaziba landslide as "the first person to warn" - Chinanews.com
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced the praise of Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who made important contributions to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of 50,000 yuan.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, party members and cadres in the city are called on to learn from his spirit of conscientious duty, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracked and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: As soon as he walked five or six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the township "geological disaster monitor contact group".
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant person in charge of Tunpu Township Natural Planning Institute, the possibility of landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people from 315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of praise, he said: "There is no one to save, this is my responsibility."
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of "female college students lost contact when traveling to Qinghai", search and rescue work continue - Xinhuanet
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" attracted netizens' attention.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of losing contact, and police in many places are going deep along the route where Huang Moumou lost contact and actively carrying out search work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud Public Security Bureau in Haixi Prefecture received a notice from its superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5 and turned off his mobile phone and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River in Sonandajie Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province on July 9, asking for assistance in finding it.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud at 4:00 on July 7.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8:00 on the same day, Huang Moumou, a missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City to G109 National Highway, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonandajie Protection Station at 12:00. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Moumou arrived at Qingshui River area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and shut down in the area at 18:00 on the 9th.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at Nanshankou, Golmud City. Because there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of myself and the vehicle. The police can only drive along the way to find and coordinate with the checkpoints along Tibet. If Huang Moumou is found, immediately contact Golmud Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1:00 a.m. on July 26, Golmud Municipal Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search for the unfrozen spring protection station and Sonandajie protection station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway, and actively contacted Sichuan police, Tibet police and Nanjing police to jointly carry out the work. At present, the search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that netizens and all sectors of society will provide relevant clues to Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in time, so as to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts suggest that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized in outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at any time, do not venture into no man's land, and call the police in time in case of emergencies.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Navy Da - Xinhuanet
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the celebration of Navy Day.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Jinbo) Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases were located, with 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighter planes participated in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first inspected the ship formation in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he arrived in the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and landed to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and the Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the official newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships that the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is relatively large in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, creating the history of the Russian navy.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In view of the new changes in epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: Trade union cadres, workers and model workers from the north and south of Tianshan Mountains walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge, so as to serve the workers and demonstrate the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the condolence group of Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the staff of 12 isolation points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.
