Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into Chang Town, there are more and more residents in Gao'an Chang Town, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after river pollution.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including cleaning and drifting, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also returned from fishing to production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have been completely banned from fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, so far, Chongqing has accumulated 3,403 fishing boats and signed 4,643 fishing boats with withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4404 fishermen have been withdrawn, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Among the 4,404 people who have retired, 4,267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Old-age insurance covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions in depth, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects in the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of "three phosphates" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25-Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remained active and operated in an orderly manner.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation because of the "storm of legislative amendments" and the COVID-19 epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There is no obvious sign of capital outflow from the banking system. On the contrary, more than 11 billion US dollars have flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offering fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communication, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, which make Hong Kong a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of financial technology, the SAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses, so as to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's financial technology talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and its surrounding areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet published an article praising China's anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from experienc - Chinanews.com
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past ten years or so, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When novel coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from Chinese mainland and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of novel coronavirus through research papers published in the Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation. In May and July, the results of the progress made in the early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in the Lancet respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems and effectively improve laboratory capabilities.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisively relying on scientific basis to make correct decisions, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and take action against it in the most beneficial way to society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of novel coronavirus. Their suggestions provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to "close the city" on January 23; When some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; At the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: Finally, the article emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Front desk reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Weiser County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people in the accident.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: Duisburg prosecutors, Weiser County Police Department and Weiser City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, saying that at about 14:40 that day, a two-seater small plane crashed into a house in the attic on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Weiser County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: On the same day, it took off from Mal City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Weisel County, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene pictures reported by DPA showed that thick smoke billowed from the house that was involved in the accident, and firefighters could see that the house was seriously damaged after putting out the fire.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rhine Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: Police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: German Interpol is working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the museum had contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the judgment on the spot, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's "Good Luck" was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awar - Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Director Dapeng's first realistic film "Good Luck" was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Photo courtesy of poster film party
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film "Good Luck" is Dapeng's first realistic work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returned to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to make a literary and artistic film for the New Year. As a result, he encountered a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, sits in the middle of the picture smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and the prospect is the red lanterns that Chinese people must hang on holidays.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes joy and reunion, is in great contrast to the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Third Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Good Luck" originated from "an act of God". A series of sudden changes in the family during the shooting forced the original shooting plan to change accordingly. Life without a script was finally recorded as a movie, but it released tension beyond design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this "providence" and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Good Luck" is full of experiments. The almost full lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of the family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: Marinichev said that the change in value is affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic.
ref: Marinichev said that the change in value was influenced by the devaluation of the Rouble and the pandemic, etc.

mt: "The cost of services is increasing," he said.

mt: Because of the epidemic, people began to spend more time on the Internet. "
ref: For reason of the pandemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet. ”

ref: Marinichev did not rule out a major rise in the annual prices of the Internet, and he thought that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the rise in price.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" plans to shoot to pay tribute to anti-epidemic her - Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers for fighting epidemic heroes, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang (left), director of Bona Film Group, had a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting in the front line of epidemic prevention and control through "Chinese Doctor"!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau, Bona Pictures is organizing the original crew of the film "Chinese Captain" to prepare for the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: Focusing on the front line of anti-epidemic in Wuhan, the film will take Wuhan medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities to help Hubei as the background, and show the touching stories of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice in the front line of anti-epidemic from the perspective of human nature, using unique narration and highly impactful lens language.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that at the first time on the day when Wuhan was unsealed, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, and exchanged face-to-face understanding and collected information with hundreds of medical workers. At present, it has interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, Guangzhou's first aid to Wuhan, Guangdong's aid to Hubei medical team, and angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University and Wuhan Central Hospital, and has taken a large number of precious first-hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who have made more appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard in the front line. They are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, it is best for this film to be shown abroad, and to impress the audience with a real humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was" People to Middle Age ". At that time, my foreign doctor friends all cried. If" Chinese Doctor "can play such a role, it would be great."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

"Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to soothing people's hearts."

mt: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan-Xiangtan First Red Expo-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client Correspondent Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Cloth Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: Red cultural and creative products in the exhibition area and native products in the old revolutionary base areas are dazzling, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: "This Red Expo is not only a demonstration of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and explore development paths."

mt: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting Cultural Tourism", with a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000 square meters, and an atmosphere creation area, a scenic spot exhibition area and an online shopping experience area for red cultural tourism online games have been set up.

mt: 137 enterprises and units from 8 provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou and Yan'an, Shaanxi, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, with 768 kinds of exhibits on display, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will last until July 29th.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan exhibition area has many bright spots.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the development of red industry and red cultural industry.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The red industry exhibition area displays 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises such as Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area displays nearly 200 products from 27 units such as red series books, red series foods and red series cultural and creative products.

The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by Chen Zhan's cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, said that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's excellent red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products were excellent works of 2019 national red cultural and creative products.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cut" and "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui Painting, focusing on promoting Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with enterprises in other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect" - Chinanews.com
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: News from our newspaper reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Relevant achievements have been published as cover articles of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit causing "greenhouse effect".
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of this kind of membrane material at present.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of Tianjin University's Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: Set up a special committee for the first time and collectively sign a "long contract" The 3rd China International Import Expo Exhibitors Alliance to build a "link to enter the Expo" - Xinhuanet

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance held here on the 26th, Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom and other member enterprises of the exhibition alliance signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: The special committee will put forward suggestions for the analysis of the development trend of the industry and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the COVID-19 epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will join hands with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the COVID-19 epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies of novel coronavirus infectio - Xinhuanet

ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency micro-feature]
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media action "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts-Today's Highlights-Hunan Daily Network-Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going to the Village Live to See Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station started from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the eyes of the guests at the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year. We will build a well-off society in an all-round way and achieve the goal of the first century. 2020 is also the year of decisive battle against poverty".
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Going to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation propaganda.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government across the country, dig out fresh poverty alleviation stories, directly attack the great changes in the appearance of villages and villages, and show how villagers break through the predicament of survival and development and move towards the road of becoming rich.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: The operation will last for more than three months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter started from Xuzhou and divided into two roads, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; The other road takes the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In the form of reporting, "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrates.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through CCTV Financial Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio and CCTV Financial New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the noon news program "Tianxia Finance" of CCTV Financial Channel (premiere time:12:00-13:00 from Monday to Sunday), and the prime-time news column "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Financial Channel will set up a poverty alleviation report column (premiere time:20:30-21:30 from Monday to Sunday).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour to each village on the CCTV financial client. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV financial APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking to the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screen and small screen, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Equipped with Sanxun broadcasting area, the broadcasting area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters and a height of 3.98 meters. The box adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can turn up to 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The studio area can also be automatically expanded and an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit arson is usually kind and quiet - chinanews.com
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a religious and historical architectural treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer responsible for guarding the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction".
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has admitted that he started the fire in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to the report, local prosecutor Senas said that the 39 - year - old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The man's lawyer said that the arsonist now regretted doing this.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: This person entered France through asylum a few years ago, and was sheltered in the diocese where the fire occurred, and was taken in in the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: The prosecution pointed out that he had recently tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: However, the church said it still could not believe that the faithful, who were usually very kind and smiling, but did not speak much, would destroy the church he loved so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of illogical problems in his account, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue operations at the scene.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, the man was arraigned again after the professional engineers of the Paris Central Police Laboratory obtained new evidence.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted to the act of arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if found guilty of intentional arson and destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to the report, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul, the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also severely damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunet, the chief architect of the French Historic Preservation Building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the South Cathedral will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane Hannah may cause swollen rivers and flash floods as it makes landfall in Texas - chinanews.com
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, July 26 China News Service reported that Hurricane Hannah made landfall in Texas at 5 p.m. local time on July 25, which will bring strong winds, torrential rain, swollen rivers, and life - threatening flash floods to Texas.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to sweep through parts of southern and northeastern Texas with torrential rain, which may cause some streams to swell and life - threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: According to the report, the area most affected by Hurricane Hannah is south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, while widespread flash floods are possible in the Rio Grande Valley.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th, "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty-two counties in the state declared disaster emergencies because of the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and residents are on standby.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that at a time when Texas is being hit hard by the new coronavirus pandemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, while northern Texas and coastal Louisiana will also receive 3 to 5 inches of rain.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, Hannah formed earlier than previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: Typically, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean does not form until mid - August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: The Polish Ministry of Justice said Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: Poland's right - wing government cabinet said the treaty required schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling on the rights of students' parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Justice Minister Jobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice would make a request to the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: "The treaty contains elements that we think are harmful in the form of meaning," Gioblo said.
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Andrzej Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re - election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against the withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said at a protest march in Warsaw, "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held banners that said, "PiS is a hell for women."
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: PiS has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The PiS government said the treaty did not respect religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: So far, however, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to VNA, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN over the past 25 years.

ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Grivori also believes that Russia, Vietnam, and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources, and land, to actively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technology.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Bac Giang Province will handle the submission of the Prime Minister's proposal to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam - South Korea industrial zone and approve the addition of the province's two industrial - urban - service areas, Anshan - Beilong and Anlu, to the master plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju, and Shuangxi - Neihuang, and has formed a land fund to attract investment.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will make suggestions and suggestions on the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense and security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby boosting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications, as well as urban construction, trade services, workers' housing, and other social infrastructure such as medical, health, and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In industrial areas, Beijiang Province calls for high - tech and clean - tech investment projects in power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, and other fields.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In industrial park clusters, the province calls for small and medium - sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in agricultural products, food processing, and other fields.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of the logistics center in Beijiang City and develop in tandem with industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, thus creating an attraction for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: DETROIT (AP) - In the past two weeks, the number of new coronavirus cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases on several days.

ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

ref: Spain: It is safe here.

ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is far lower than in the UK mainland.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: This decision by the UK is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.
