ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing takes a break from the heat and starts the rainfall pattern - Xinhuanet
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: The wind, showers, and convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the heat and heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainfall will continue for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27C; at night, it was overcast with light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the minimum temperature at night was 23C.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: Previously, from the 24th to the 25th, the whole city of Beijing was under a high temperature blue warning, and the daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37C, with a high temperature of more than 40C locally.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year, and there are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle volt, which is what the Chinese people call "bitter summer".
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When they entered, every family filled the barn, and there was a folk saying that "one volt dumpling and two volt noodles".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, it will be rainy in Beijing in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize visits to mountainous areas and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's "mid - volt" will last for 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "middle volt", people will feel weak and loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: In the diet, you can choose foods such as mung beans and riesling, which have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, invigorating spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: "Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher" goes online next week Xue Zhaofeng leads the "Knowledge Sponsor - Xinhuanet
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: A new variety show is on the line.

ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: They are not only young intellectual role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all - round "Duanzi" who can shake their baggage and are good at education and fun.

mt: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge interesting knowledge classes.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to impress the audience by displaying the most interesting aspects of their subject through attitude - oriented knowledge output.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The "Youdao Ask Group", composed of all - age viewers, will ask a hundred questions on the spot, which will make the teaching of the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" more difficult, and will also add a little excitement to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited Xue Zhaofeng, an economics professor, as the "knowledge promoter" of the program, to join forces with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, "Ding Dong Assistant Teachers", to talk about youth with the audience and create a "National Youth Open Class".
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The Situation Is Severe and All - out Efforts to Fight the Epidemic - chinanews.com
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Zhang Jianzong, said on July 26 that the new coronavirus outbreak situation in Hong Kong continues to be severe, and that if the epidemic turns bad, the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region will decisively take tougher control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention of introducing a "stay - at - home order" or a "foot ban order" to restrict citizens from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled "The Situation Is Severe and All - out Efforts to Fight the Epidemic".
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this outbreak is the most severe in half a year, and that the next two weeks will be critical to prevent further spread of the virus in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self - discipline and cooperation of citizens are also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact, and eat out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: Citizens should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene, and wash hands frequently. They should also suspend non - essential gatherings of relatives and friends or dinners, and reduce visits to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the anti - epidemic work of the SAR Government, and has actively responded to the Chief Executive's latest request to provide assistance in increasing testing capacity and converting AsiaWorld - Expo into a similar "cabin hospital".
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high - risk groups, namely, employees of homes for the elderly, homes for the disabled, and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers, and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving up to 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about cases of infection in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR Government is building quarantine facilities near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, and expects to provide an additional 700 quarantine units by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2,000 quarantine rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, which will be completed by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: Together with the 800 quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: There are currently four quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2,600 quarantine rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government re - opened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who have the ability to take care of themselves.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China for "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate"
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the recent announcement by the U.S. Department of Commerce, the U.S. Department of Commerce has decided to launch an anti - dumping and countervailing investigation into tie - belt products originating in China, as well as an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case to investigate the so - called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" in a countervailing case, and China firmly opposes this.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on this issue on the evening of the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand and adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasized that on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue exceeded the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In February this year, the United States amended its regulations to conduct countervailing investigations against other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: According to the press release, even in accordance with U.S. regulations, the content of the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not meet the necessary countervailing elements such as financial support, grant of benefits, and specificity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations against the so - called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further rise in tensions between China and the United States, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply during the day on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan per US dollar mark.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether this move by the U.S. Department of Commerce is intended to force the yuan to rise is noteworthy.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd, closing at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The midpoint rate of the officially regulated RMB exchange rate against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points to 6.9938 on the 24th.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: On the 26th, the day before Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA), the number of confirmed cases of new coronavirus pneumonia in the Philippines exceeded 80,000, of which the number of confirmed cases among the staff of the Department of Information of the Presidential Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not been in contact with confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release on SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: Martin Andanar, Minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that he had prepared two sets of plans for President Duterte to issue SONA.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Batasang Pambansa Building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members, local government officials, and others to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants passed a rapid test to enter the National Assembly building on the same day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be activated, that is, President Duterte will deliver SONA at the Malacanang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats will be arranged on site.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: As is customary, SONA will broadcast live to the whole Philippines in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: At the time of writing, the Philippine Presidency has not yet confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the new coronavirus outbreak and restore social and economic life, and will also mention his commitment when he took office to fight government corruption, crack down on illegal drugs, and reduce poverty.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers suffering from the pandemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly solicited opinions on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhuanet
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Residents are encouraged to do frequent medical examinations and find problems early; the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited; an online game health review system is established; and employers should be equipped with full - time and part - time health management personnel.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do medical check - ups frequently and find problems early, the draft proposed that the health department should draw up a basic catalogue of health check - up items according to different age, occupation, and other factors.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The cost of the health check - up, which falls within the scope of the basic catalogue of health check - up items, shall be paid by the social medical insurance co - ordinated fund according to the standard of once a year per person.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The draft clearly states that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange employees' schedules, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor loads, avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, employers should provide full - time and part - time health management personnel, and organize and carry out health check - ups for employees on a regular basis.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposed that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors should be prohibited, and that the location of the sale of alcoholic beverages should be restricted, and that those who violate the regulations should be ordered to make corrections by the market supervision and administration department, and a fine of 30,000 yuan should be imposed.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to "banning alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the requirements of the draft, schools should arrange more than one hour of sports activities for students every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the draft also proposed that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and that medical and health institutions should be fined 20,000 yuan for divulging patients' privacy without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population before formulating planning and normative documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological and environmental protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: If it has not been evaluated, or if it will have a serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, it shall not be formulated, introduced, or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Hoh Xili Tibetan Antelope Enters Remigration Season - Xinhuanet
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xili Management Office of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Management Director that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes that had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xili to give birth were ending their calves and beginning to return to their original habitat with their calves.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: Surveillance footage near the Wudaoliang Protection Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes through the 3002 km of the Qinghai - Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge of the Qinghai - Tibet Railway, and the Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: Experts have analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope calves in relocating sheep has accounted for one - quarter to one - fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelope sheep.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said, "At the beginning of the migration, Tibetan antelopes face a high risk of predation, so the number of calves in the herd will be relatively small, and there may even be no calves."
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to statistics from the Hoh Xili Management Office of Jiangyuan Park, Director of Management of Sanjiangyuan National Park, the overall number of Tibetan antelopes returning has been increasing year by year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes returning in 2019 was 4,860, an increase of 338 over 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said, "It is expected that the return migration of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of returning Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: The Tibetan antelope is a national first - class protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, Aljinshan in Xinjiang, and other places go to Zhuonai Lake, located in the hinterland of Hoh Xili, to lamb.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on the protection of Tibetan antelopes in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Provincial Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is the process of female Tibetan antelopes returning to their habitat with their calves after they have given birth. At first, the return migration group that left the calving site is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographical populations and along different paths."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: To ensure the safe return of Tibetan antelope sheep, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xili Management Office of Jiangyuan Park, the director of management of Sanjiangyuan National Park, has arranged staff to continuously carry out video monitoring and district patrols in the main return areas.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If a Tibetan antelope sheep is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the sheep to pass safely through the wildlife passage and ensure that they are as little disturbed by humans as possible on their way back.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how should we relieve the heat in our daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid hot periods, and it is best not to walk or work in the blazing sun around noon, because the sun is strongest in this time period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out at this time, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, a visor, and sunglasses, and if you have conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Try to choose cotton, hemp, and silk textures with light colors and good breathability, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, which can cause heatstroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: In hot and sultry weather, prepare enough water to drink, drink it in time, and do not wait for thirst to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, your body is already short of water, so limit your water consumption to 150 ml to 200 ml at a time, and drink warm water, not ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: Depending on the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, and the high - temperature worker drinks 3 liters to 5 liters of water per day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When sweating more, some salt water can be properly replenished to make up for the salt lost by sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired, and potassium - containing tea is an excellent summer drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: In summer, eat fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people working in high - temperature environments should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium, and other elements.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of the human body is strong, the consumption is also large, and it is easy to feel tired.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax all systems of the brain and body, which is not only beneficial to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say the best bedtime is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: When sleeping, be careful not to lie under air conditioning vents and electric fans, so as not to suffer from air conditioning diseases and hot colds.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are engaged in outdoor activities or high - temperature work should carry heat prevention drugs such as 10 drops of water, Rendan, patchouli water, or patchouli pills with them, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate Art Exhibition Moves into Mall for Public Interest Exhibition - Xinhuanet
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: During the "cloud graduation" season of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warm last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it is neither in the museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Grand Hyatt City, and will be open to the public free of charge until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that the 2020 Graduate Art Exhibition collected 50 pieces / groups of works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China, and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and the light boxes in the building were used to display graphic works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: In the midst of the pandemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Ping, head of Chaoyang Grand Hyatt City Mei Chen, said, "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition to the'cloud 'back to the offline space, and we also hope that more people will see young people's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, so as to amplify the healing power of art to society and the soul."
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, from which they were selected for display in commercial spaces, and that the forms of the works range from traditional on - shelf paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas, and that the volume and richness of the works are the highest ever.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings during the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020 "; Liu Jiaying's work" Sound Money ", created through the Ethereum blockchain, explored themes such as" cryptocurrency "," credit creation ", and" trading "; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Bohemian" both show animals that often accompany humans, from which young artists can see their understanding of the relationship between humans and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu's work "Winter of Faith - Gift" reminds young people growing up, "When they succeed in their careers one day, they will never forget their original intention and remember their simplicity and sincerity."
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who exhibited in person was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and I did a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and I came to the exhibition with the alcohol cotton and the test report."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work "Yesterday as a Mystery" has a complex structure and must be done by hand.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also took on the task of helping his classmates repair damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: "The exhibition will be held until 4:30 in the morning, and then the repair will be done, and the time is very tight, so I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is a bit of a pity."
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he and his classmates would come to Beijing to see the exhibition of his work.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Hubei Enshi Praises "First Early Warning Person" for Sand Dam Landslide - chinanews.com
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City announced that it had praised Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who had made important contributions to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, and sent him a prize of 50,000 yuan.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, Party members and cadres throughout the city are called upon to learn from his spirit of fulfilling their duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative, and being willing to contribute.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred at the sand dam in Mahe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, causing a quake lake to form in the main stream of the Qingjiang River, and 58 - year - old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: As soon as he walked five or six hundred meters from his home, he saw the village road split by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the cornfields, a length of about 50 meters.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming was alert and immediately sent the photos of the cracked highway to the township's "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group".
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: After on - site inspection and judgment by the relevant person in charge of the Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, the possibility of a landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was made immediately.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of valuable time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people from 315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's conscientious and responsible dedication was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of praise, he said, "There is no one to save, it is my responsibility."
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of "female college student lost contact while traveling to Qinghai" Search and rescue work continues - Xinhuanet
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporters Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" attracted the attention of netizens.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, reported on the 26th that Huang, a student of a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of loss of contact, and that the police in many places are going deep along the route of Huang's loss of contact and actively carrying out search work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau in Haixi received a notice from its superiors that Huang, a student of a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5, and on July 9, his mobile phone was turned off and lost contact in the southwest area of Qingshuihe at Sonandajie Protection Station in Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, and asked for assistance in finding it.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation by the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8:00 on the same day, the missing person, Huang, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City towards National Highway G109, and arrived at Sonandajie Protection Station in Hoh Xili at 12:00, and the taxi driver returned alone, and Huang arrived in the Qingshuihe area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and shut down in the area at about 18:00 on the 9th.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: During further investigation, the police found that Huang had passed through the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: The Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region, at Nanshankou, Golmud City, and since there is no video surveillance at the checkpoint, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle, so the police can only search along the route by car, and coordinate with the various checkpoints along the route in Tibet to immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau if they find Huang.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest information, at 1 a.m. on July 26, the Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to search the Freezing Spring Protection Station and Sonandajie Protection Station along the Qinghai - Tibet Highway, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, the Tibet police, and the Nanjing police to carry out joint work, and the search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that if the vast number of netizens and all sectors of society have relevant clues, they will provide them to Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the missing person, Huang, as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts suggested that tourists should be standardized, rational, and civilized in their outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at all times, do not venture into no man's land, and call the police in a timely manner in case of emergency.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia Holds Military Parade to Celebrate Navy Day - Xinhuanet
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the Navy Day celebration.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mo Jingna)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lu Jinbo) Russian fleets held a military parade to celebrate Navy Day on July 26 to commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with a total of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types, and 71 military aircraft participating.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Commander - in - Chief of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships, and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first reviewed the ship parade in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and went ashore to watch the military parade on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Speaking at the military parade, Putin said that the modern technical level of the Russian Navy's equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, Yevmenov, the commander - in - chief of the Russian Navy, said in an interview with Red Star, the official newspaper of the Russian Defense Ministry, that Russia's plans to build ships have been effectively implemented, and that the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to form a maritime fleet, which started the history of the Russian Navy.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The Russian Navy Day is celebrated on the last Sunday of July every year.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In view of the new changes in epidemic prevention and control, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Federation of Trade Unions of the Autonomous Region and actively participated in epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: Trade union cadres, workers, and model workers in the north and south of Tianshan entered the streets, communities, and residents to carry out activities such as delivering food and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and propagating knowledge about epidemic prevention, so as to serve the workers and the masses, and to demonstrate the "hard nuclear force" of trade unions with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the condolence group of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi delivered a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff at 12 quarantine points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District immediately invested more than 1.05 million yuan, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass - roots trade unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union, volunteered to stay on duty in the unit to protect the workers.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He delivered cooking utensils, food, and daily necessities to the newly employed workers living in the dormitory of the unit, and organized the personnel to deliver essential supplies to them every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: "From July 21, the cadres and workers who adhere to the front line of the fight against the'epidemic 'will be surveyed, and 704 front - line workers in Urumqi will be provided with supplementary anti - epidemic supplies and living materials through online orders and door - to - door delivery by businesses."
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The head of the Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere to fight the "epidemic" together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At present, when the summer heat is high, trade unions at all levels keep an eye on front - line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put "cool" care into practice.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a condolence campaign to "send cool" to front - line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the county's police stations, card points, and health systems received drinks, fruits, and other condolence items.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: "Trade union cadres should further improve their political standing, strengthen their responsibility, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire their fighting spirit with action.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: We should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in ensuring epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front - line workers. "
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: Relevant person in charge of the Federation of Trade Unions of the Autonomous Region said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: Direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers in full swing in 2020 - Xinhuanet
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) - The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy and launch the direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers from graduates of ordinary institutions of higher learning in 2020.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year's direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers covers more than 270 general military and local majors in 64 categories, including computers, automation, and machinery, with emphasis on increasing the recruitment of unmanned aerial vehicles, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minor languages, and other majors, and the recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2,000 compared to last year.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers was organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, which began on August 1 and ended on September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: Through the National Conscription Network (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), young conscripts can inquire about the conditions for direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties in various regions, submit registration information online if they meet the scope of specialties and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow - up recruitment work such as medical examination and political assessment in accordance with the unified requirements of the land - requisitioned military service organs.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified young people who are unable to be recruited as non - commissioned officers due to enrollment majors and program restrictions may participate in the recruitment of conscripts, and when they are selected as non - commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in ordinary institutions of higher learning according to the prescribed academic system shall be regarded as the length of service.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: This year, the recruitment of non - commissioned officers will be uniformly organized by the conscription offices of provincial or prefectural and municipal people's governments, and majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of merit on the basis of comprehensive measurement of the academic level of the applicants, the achievements of professional courses while in school, and the obtaining of professional qualification certificates; scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges and universities that meet professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the requirements of normalized epidemic prevention and control, this year's direct recruitment of non - commissioned officers will not arrange to report on their own in principle, and will organize transportation into the camp in tandem with conscripts.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The time for direct enlistment of non - commissioned officers will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for the army to issue the order for non - commissioned officers to serve will be December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The receiving units of the army will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training programs, and conscientiously organize training; after the training is completed, the recruited non - commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese Government is a staunch defender of cyber security - chinanews.com
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com
