mt: chinanews.com, July 26 according to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the UK, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on the wrong remarks about the cyber attack on July 25.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: A reporter asked: According to the media, China - related hacking groups have interfered with the network system of a British company, attacked British and American technology companies with patent data, and hacked into the government networks of EU countries.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace its origins, and diverse actors, so when investigating and characterizing cyber events, sufficient evidence should be produced, and no groundless speculation should be allowed.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesman said that a series of events such as "Prism Gate" in the past proved that the United States has been carrying out the world's largest cyber espionage operation.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace serves the common interests of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or stolen, but achieved through self - reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China filed about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a major country in innovation and intellectual property rights.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Most districts in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high - risk areas - chinanews.com
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporters Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health Commission, reported on the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on July 26, saying that at present, most districts in Urumqi have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigation.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Information Office of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region held a press conference on the 26th to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of new coronavirus pneumonia in Urumqi (of which 5 were confirmed cases of asymptomatic infections) and 38 new asymptomatic infections.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections in Urumqi.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were also basically detected through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said on the 26th that most districts in Urumqi have basically completed free nucleic acid testing.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the testing reagent, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), the testing environment, and the proficiency of the testing personnel.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: Due to various reasons, nucleic acid tests can also produce false negative results.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so - called false negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, people who have been in close contact with confirmed and suspected cases usually need two nucleic acid tests to exclude them.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high - risk areas of the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a negative nucleic acid test may lead to false negatives, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to eliminate them.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that in view of the above situation, and for the sake of the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will conduct a second free nucleic acid test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shaybak District from today, and at the same time carry out "checking heritage and filling gaps".
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shaybak District are high - risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House outbreak expert Fauci: Cautiously optimistic about vaccine development in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He cautioned that it is not clear how the new coronavirus outbreak will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to Johns Hopkins University, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed new coronavirus cases in the United States has reached 4.176,000, with 146,000 deaths.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling with the rebound of the pandemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation varies from region to region and needs to be adapted to local conditions, diverse anti - epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: Outbreaks in one region will eventually affect other regions.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said. "Our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future."
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese - American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for the treatment of AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new coronavirus outbreak in the United States has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus."
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of new coronavirus therapeutics and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leadership Foundation is a non - profit organization dedicated to promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia - Pacific region, and is committed to elevating the status of Asian - Pacific Americans and cultivating young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, U.S. Secretary of Transportation Elaine Chao, U.S. Representative Meng Zhaowen, and founding president of the International Leadership Foundation Dong Jiling spoke at the meeting.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to the Asian - Pacific medical workers and volunteers fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as "social distancing" to contain the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: U.S. - China Trade Talks Representatives Transcript for Meeting in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter as saying that Liu He, the head of the Chinese trade negotiation team and Vice Premier of the State Council, and Lai Haizhe, the co - leader of the US team and trade representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first phase of the China - US trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, due to the new coronavirus outbreak and other factors, China's purchases are still some way from the amount promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first phase of the trade agreement between China and the United States came into force one month after its signing on January 15, and the agreement stipulates that the high - level trade framework group of the two sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: Informed sources said the meeting would be "an important turning point", allowing both sides to assess the progress of the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: However, this person also said that if tensions between the United States and China lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8 has met the semi - annual terms of the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since the beginning of this year, China - US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including the origin of the new coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although US President Donald Trump bragged about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has recently changed.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at the White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of U.S. corn and bought a lot of soybeans in a single day, "this trade agreement is no longer as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached".
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also said that due to the poor relationship between the United States and China, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely, and that "trade issues have lost weight in China - US relations".
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: However, he revealed that the relevant Chinese economic and trade units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States, "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jining, vice president of the U.S. - China Trade National Committee, said that it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies this year.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: Analysts at Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It is better to talk than not talk, although it may only be regarded as routine."
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yuanbao's income declined after the "90s, but instead" retaliated "to save money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: As the income of Yuanbao declined, the "post-90s" not only did not flee Yuanbao, but began to save money "vindictively"?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: In the first half of the year, the "post-90s" were more likely to save money: the amount of money saved per capita increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019, according to the 2020 edition of the Balance Bao Savings Report released by the China New Economy Research Institute and Alipay.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, the "post-90s" are more inclined to save from a single stroke of "small money", with 60% saving less than 20 yuan per stroke on average...
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with balance treasure has also become the saving habit of the "post-90s".
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Data shows that of the 700 million Yuanbao users, 134 million are "post-90s".
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, which means that about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in China are saving money with their balance treasure.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7 - day annualized return of money funds such as Yuanbao has slipped from above 2% at the beginning of the year to around 1.5%.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money for the "post-90s".
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: Against the backdrop of the increase in the "saving effect" of Yuanbao, many young people who are used to using Yuanbao have also been directly transformed into "base people".
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, the number of new "base people" on Alipay has more than doubled year - on - year in the past month, and more and more young people are achieving "advanced" financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yuanbao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more likely to save more money, saving an average of 20% more than boys; 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods than men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: What are the plans of the "post-90s" after saving money?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that the "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the largest number of users take travel as their goal.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" have saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the reopening of cinemas has also provided a new way to shift from saving money to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood - resistant embankment
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, the south of China has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the flood prevention and control situation is very severe, resulting in the disaster in 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities), including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: Disaster situations are orders, disaster areas are battlefields, and in the face of disasters, the Party flag is the battle flag, and Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people's army resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood prevention and relief work, quickly join the front line of flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief, and become the backbone of the people in the disaster areas and a new force in the fight against floods.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood - resistant embankment, which is the embodiment of loyalty and the call of mission.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and a Party member and cadre is a flag.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: In the flood prevention front lines everywhere, Party organizations at all levels, as well as the vast number of Party members and cadres, have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, heeded the call of the Party Central Committee, and, with the action of "look at me", the pace of "follow me", and the courage of "I go first", have built iron fortresses that cannot be crushed, and have raised the backbone of China that cannot be bent.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood - resistant embankment, which is the holding of the position and the clarion call for the charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of the flood disaster, Party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the "battle cry" against the flood, and planted the bright Party flag on the flood - resistant embankment, and the vast number of Party members, cadres, and the people's army held fast to the flood - resistant position, and became the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster areas with the will and actions of "the Party flag is in the position" and "the flood will never recede".
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright Party flag flying high on the flood - resistant embankment is selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, the true character of Party members is demonstrated, and when people's lives and property are seriously threatened, Party members, cadres, and the people's army take care of their families, take care of everyone, selfless dedication, and dare to take responsibility, and take the tough battle of flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief as the main battlefield and military parade ground to comprehensively test their ability, style, and literacy, and it is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster areas to overcome the disaster situation, and builds up a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood prevention, rescue, and disaster relief.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: "People first, life first" is tested not only in ordinary times, but also at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood - resistant embankment, the vast number of Party members, cadres, and the people's army should let the people see the bright red Party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, brighten the Party flag with the steel embankment that cannot be washed away by the flood, and let a bright Party flag fly high on the flood - resistant embankment!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC Trade Ministers Say They Will Accelerate Regional Economic Recovery - Xinhuanet
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) - A video conference of trade ministers of Asia - Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members was held on July 25, and the meeting pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new coronavirus outbreak on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable, and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was chaired by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: The joint statement issued after the meeting said that the trade ministers of APEC members recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non - discriminatory, transparent, and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties pledged to ensure that the emergency measures taken to deal with the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent, and temporary, that they do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and that they abide by the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, the trade ministers of APEC members pledged to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food, and agricultural products in order to cope with the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non - tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross - border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration states that all economies will ensure that their trade measures in response to the epidemic comply with WTO regulations, and commit to take action to reduce non - tariff trade barriers and promote trade in order to promote the flow of goods necessary under the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and that the work of formulating the APEC post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC - related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting at the end of the year.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi Finance issued 280 million yuan of emergency funds to support post - disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - chinanews.com
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Army Group of the People's Liberation Army took advantage of the gap in preparation to help a vegetable growing cooperative in Hukou County to harvest chili peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and if they were not picked in time, the losses would be even greater.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: Photo by Tomita, China News Service
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) The Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance announced on July 26 that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Command, the provincial finance department issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood prevention and rescue and relief work for the affected people.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: The flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and affected an area of 13.169 million mu.

mt: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance issued central disaster relief funds of 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan respectively.

ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observer
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health Commission, from 0 - 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths; and 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (1 in Inner Mongolia, 1 in Shanghai).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and the number of severe cases increased by 7 from the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from overseas (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.

mt: A total of 2,045 cases were confirmed, 1,963 cases were cured and discharged, and there were no deaths.

ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.

ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say collecting immigration data through the U.S. Census for the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives is unconstitutional
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: A number of civil rights organizations and several U.S. cities and counties have sued the U.S. federal government, saying that the Trump administration's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The United States Census will determine the distribution of seats in the House of Representatives of the United States Congress.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: Sarah Brannon, executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA, "This will not work."
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship status of people on the census was difficult to do and "not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties organization, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Board of Management, said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County, and this illegal attempt to scare people away and reduce the size of our immigrant community cannot be allowed to succeed."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Marshall, the Alabama attorney general, called the decree a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and the Electoral College in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents who are legally resident."
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the citizenship question on the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from the census figures of each state, and thus determine whether each state will increase, decrease, or maintain seats in the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: New book reveals that Prince Harry feels his brother is "snobby and arrogant"
ref: Exposures from New Book: Prince Harry Thinks His Elder Brother “Snobbish and Arrogant”

mt: The British "Times" and "Sunday Times" serialized a new book called "Finding Freedom", which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

ref: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl. ”

mt: The report said that when Harry heard William use "this girl" to describe Meghan, he felt arrogant and snobbish in his brother's tone, and he thought he no longer needed to be taken care of.
ref: The report said that when Harry heard William described Meghan as “this girl”, he felt the arrogance and snobbishness from his brother's tone, and in addition, he believed that he did not need any others to take care of him and remind him.

mt: Harry and Meghan announced in January that they planned to live a more independent life and would support themselves.
ref: Harry and Meghan announced this January that they planned to live a more independent life and would earn their own living.

ref: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, now they are living with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue new careers.

mt: At the time, the marriage was seen as injecting Hollywood glamour and a new - age vibe into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most high - profile celebrity couples in the world today.
ref: At that time, this marriage was regarded as an injection of Hollywood's glamour and flavor of the new times into the British royal family, and the two became one of the contemporary celebrity couples drawing the highest level of attention around the globe.

mt: Zheng Thi Xin, Minister Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the provincial government of Vientiane, the Lao Veterans Association, and other representatives attended the ceremony.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony was attended by Tay Thi Son, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, and the representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association, etc..

mt: The memorial ceremony for the heroes and martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and the delegates offered incense to the heroes and martyrs one after another to remember their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony for Martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and representatives lit incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering the martyrs' great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

mt: Minister Counselor Zheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly remember the revolutionary heroes and martyrs of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes and martyrs who died for the independence and freedom of the two countries, and it is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development, and consolidate bilateral relations.
ref: Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Laos to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries, and to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of the two countries; meanwhile, this is a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence and national unity, seek national development, and consolidate their relations together.

mt: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao - Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.
ref: On January 23, 1946, a day of 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Laos-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically during an attack on the stronghold Phonehe.

mt: The victory of the attack was a historic victory for the two countries in the early stages of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.
ref: The victory of this attack became a victory of historic significance for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

mt: Ms. Zheng Thi Xin stressed that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes and martyrs who died for the cause of the national liberation struggle of the two countries, and stressed that the young areas of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the old - timers and make due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam - Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.
ref: Ms. Tay Thi Son stressed that the two peoples will always remember the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the cause of struggle for national liberation of the two countries, and meanwhile, he emphasized that the young generation of the two countries will continue to carry forward the old-timers’ tradition of being brave and strong, and make their due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperous development of the two countries.

mt: A milestone!

mt: Inter unlocks 3,000 th Serie A match - chinanews.com
ref: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A match - www.chinanews.com

ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter beat Genoa 3 - 0 away from home, surpassing Atalanta to move up to second place, and 4 points behind leaders Juventus with one more match to play, and still retain the hope of competing for the title.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: So far, out of 3,000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter have won 1,489 of them, drawn 834, and lost 677, a win rate of 49.6%.

ref: The Nerazzurri have won league titles 18 times and have never been relegated.

mt: Liu Yunlong, an Old Face of Spy Drama, Plays a Stumbling Actor - Xinhuanet
ref: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy war drama, plays a stuttering leading actor - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, and Li Liqun, the large - scale spy drama "The Chance of Winning" landed at Guangdong Satellite TV's "Vibrant Theatre" at 7:30 p.m. on July 16.
ref: The large-scale spy war drama “Winner”, produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starred by Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., landed in the GRT Satellite Channel’s “Golden Drama” at 7:30 pm on July 16.

mt: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurks in a Japanese pseudo - police station, who, together with Soviet agents, assassinated the leader of the Japanese agents and crushed the Japanese army's startling plot.
ref: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurked in the Japanese puppet police station, who joined Soviet agents to assassinate the Japanese agent leader and smash the terrible conspiracy of the Japanese army.

mt: The Chance of Winning is based on historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives.
ref: The “Winner” is adapted from historical facts, and its material is taken from Soviet military archives which have been dusty for many years.

mt: During the defense of Moscow, the Soviet Red Army's Far East elite advanced westward to help, and at this time, the "northward advance faction" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought it was an opportunity to take advantage of the situation and intended to send troops.
ref: During the Fight for Moscow, the elite of the Far East of the Soviet Red Army rushed westward to help, while the "Northward School" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought that there was an opportunity to send troops.

mt: The Chinese Communist Party and the intelligence agents of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union jointly implemented the "Mudanullah" plan to solve the danger of being defeated by the enemy.
ref: In order to solve the crisis of being attacked from both sides of the abdomen, the intelligence personnel of the CPC and the CPSU jointly implemented the "Mudan Ula" plan.

mt: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well - known screenwriter, has been polished several times, which makes the plot twists and turns burn the brain.
ref: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well-known screenwriter, has polished this film several times, which makes the plot tortuous and brain-burning.

mt: Liu Yunlong served as both producer and leading actor in "The Chance of Winning".
ref: Liu Yunlong is the producer and the leading actor in the “Winner”.

mt: In the play, he plays Tang Fei, the head of the criminal section of the Linhe Police Department, a stuttering policeman who feels happy and even a little ruffian, while his real identity is that of an underground member of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In the play, Tang Fei, played by Liu Yunlong, is the criminal section chief of Linhe Police Department; and he is a stuttering policeman who is quite happy and even a little angry, but his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

mt: Cai Meng, the heroine who plays opposite her, is the head of the Linhe Security Bureau, and is appreciated by her Japanese boss, Fukuhara, and has a delicate relationship with Tang Fei that is both enemy and friend, and ambiguous.
ref: Cai Meng, the heroine who played the opposite play, is the head of Linhe Security Bureau, who is highly appreciated by Japanese boss Fukuhara; and there is a subtle relationship between Cai Meng and Tang Fei, which is both enemy and friend and ambiguous.

mt: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "We Are Young in Those Years" to Erqing in "Yanxi Raiders", all of which impressed the audience and were recognized for their acting skills.
ref: In recent years, Su Qing has tried many different roles, from Lu Ruowen in the “Those Years We Are Young” to Er Qing in the “Story of Yanxi Palace”, all of which impressed the audiences deeply and were recognized by the audiences for her acting skills.

mt: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong were paired for the first time, and the setting of a stuttering sheriff paired with a charming policewoman was interesting and innovative.

mt: In addition to the two main characters, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Shen Junyi, and many other powerful actors joined in "The Chance of Winning", and the old play "Bone Racing" is also one of the highlights of the play.
ref: In addition to the two protagonists, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi in the “Winner”, and the old actors are also one of the highlights of this film.

ref: It is understood that the “Winner” is also very sophisticated in production, and the crew spans nearly 2,000 kilometers in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces for shooting and framing.

mt: In order to restore the strange urban features of the Northeast during the Japanese period, the production team worked day and night to carefully polish every detail of the scene construction and props, so that the scenes in the play were exquisite and rich in historical texture.
ref: In order to restore the grotesque city features during the Japanese occupation period in Northeast China, the artists and props group of the crew worked day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, which made the scenes in the play delicate and rich in historical texture.

mt: Greenfield Launches a New Round of Mixed Reform Shanghai State - owned Assets to Transfer 17.5% of Shares - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: On July 26, Greenfield Holdings (600606. SH) issued the Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Part of the Company's Shares and Resumption of Trading by State - owned Shareholders through Public Call for Transferees.
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of the layout of state - owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenfield, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate ") and Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as" Shanghai City Investment ") intend to transfer part of the company's shares by agreement through open solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred does not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenfield.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred shall not be lower than the higher of the following: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company for the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, the new strategic investors in Greenfield are still inconclusive, and according to the information published in the announcement, the new strategic investors need to pay about 14 billion yuan to take the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenfield.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of the share transfer, it is expected that Greenfield will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenfield Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market - oriented rules under a purely state - owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state - owned holding and employee - owned shares; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross - shareholding and mutual integration of state - owned and non - public capital; and from 2015 to the present, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenfield's current mixed reform plan is similar to that of Gree, and in December 2019, Zhuhai Mingjun, led by Gaolin Capital, took over 15% equity of Gree Electric Appliance (000651. SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder, and after completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliance implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plan and no real controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Both Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai City Investment are state - owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the State - owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission (SASAC) of Shanghai, and Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenfield's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state - owned assets and state - owned enterprises in the new stage in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, which fully demonstrates the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions, and by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: Can Andy Lau and Liu Qingyun "dismantle" a new spark - Xinhuanet
ref: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "create” a new spark - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Bomb Disposal Expert 2 was recently announced to be released on December 24, making it the first film scheduled for the New Year's Eve season.

mt: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but the complexity of Andy Lau's new role can be felt in the preview: he broke a leg, put on a prosthetic limb, and was pursued by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex - girlfriend Ni Ni.
ref: It's still the Shock Wave, but we can feel the complexity of Liu Dehua's new role from the preview: he breaks a leg, puts on a prosthetic leg, is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and is directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

mt: What is the relationship between the three, what Andy Lau did at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what ups and downs his career as a bomb disposal expert has gone through, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.
ref: What is the relationship between the three persons, what did Liu Dehua do in Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

mt: It is understood that the highlight of the film is the world landmark buildings in Hong Kong, which, together with the top - notch special effects production team, bring a shocking and realistic visual impact.

ref: (Reporter Nie Qing)

mt: chinanews.com, July 26 Sputnik reported that July 26 was the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - Integrated Sputnik reported that, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: Russian President and Commander - in - Chief of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were reviewed.
ref: Vladimir Putin, Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, and in this place, 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

mt: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia, to celebrate Navy Day.
ref: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on Navy Day, and sailed by a dinghy in the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the military parade at sea, and then reviewed the troops at the main viewing platform.

ref: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improved.

ref: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade that, "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircrafts and other air vehicles, unique weapons and special equipment. ”

mt: On June 24 local time, Russia held a military parade in Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.
ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitization and effective defense means to achieve unique advantages.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.
