ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, a series of ships were on static display next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most notable of which was the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: To avoid the spread of the new coronavirus, only local residents and specially invited guests will be able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The Russian Navy Day is celebrated on the last Sunday of July every year.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: chinanews.com, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on July 26 that the city has so far withdrawn 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: This year, 53 - year - old Li Daiguo said in an interview with a reporter from China News Service that his grandfather had been fishing in the Longxi River, and that he had been fishing with his father since he was 11 years old, rocking a small boat, along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Longevity, and that every time he left his home for 10 days and a half months, he relied on fishing to support his family.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, there have been more and more residents in the town, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants, and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollutes the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The fish scales caught are all black, and when cut open, they are also black inside."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government has begun to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing the river, patrolling the river, and managing aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishing and converted to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Biological Reserve and the relevant waters of the main urban areas have implemented a total ban on fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has withdrawn a total of 3,403 fishing boats and signed a withdrawal agreement for 4,643 fishing boats, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three - year task, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been withdrawn, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4,404 people who have retired, 4,267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Pension insurance covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in - depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean - up and rectification of the shoreline utilization projects of the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of survey of sewage outlets entering the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphorus chemical industry, and phosphogypsum reservoirs), clean - up and rectification of small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements of the special rectification of illegal wharves and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the prohibition and withdrawal of fishing in the Yangtze River basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong - Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canadian Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation because of the "law storm" and the new coronavirus outbreak.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There are no obvious signs of capital outflow from the banking system; on the contrary, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months, and there have been a series of public offering fund - raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the new coronavirus outbreak has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high - speed communication, free circulation of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, have made Hong Kong a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the "Epidemic Prevention and Anti - Epidemic Fund" to create about 30,000 time - bound jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the SAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Program" to support local fintech companies, start - ups, and other enterprises with fintech - related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents, and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong - Hong Kong - Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet article praises China's anti - epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from their experiences - chinanews.com
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th stating that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new coronavirus outbreak at this stage, without widespread transmission, and has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: According to the article, over the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new coronavirus than it was for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The authors say that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was initially ill - prepared, especially because the pathogen could not be determined.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were quickly able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and under the state of emergency declared, such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation, and the results of the early trials of the new coronavirus vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet in May and July respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for rapid and effective national responses to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low - and middle - income countries, are worth learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, it is necessary for powerful high - level officials to decisively make correct decisions based on scientific basis, so that the new coronavirus outbreak can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take action against it in a way that is most beneficial to society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "seal the city" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts suggested the necessity and urgency of building a cabin hospital, the government quickly made the decision and quickly implemented it; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also enabled the epidemic to be controlled quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: Finally, the article emphasizes that to deal with global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond to them.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Yang Hong, Chief Taiwan Reporter
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi - story residential building in Wethel County, North Rhine - Westphalia, Germany, killing a total of three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg prosecution, the Weatherall County Police Department, and the Weatherall City Fire Department jointly issued a statement in the evening of the same day, saying that at around 14:40 that day, a small two - seater plane crashed into a home in the attic of a multi - story residential building on Weatherall Street, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from the city of Marr in the Ruhr region of North Rhine - Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wethel County, and then took off again, before crashing into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The deceased may be a female occupant of the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two - year - old child in the room was only slightly injured and was safely rescued.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but their mood remained calm.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: Footage from the scene reported by the German news agency DPA showed smoke billowing from the house where the accident occurred, and after firefighters put out the fire, the house was severely damaged.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the crash is not clear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: Citing the police, the Rheinische Post reported that there were clues that the plane may have disintegrated before it hit a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: The police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found in the area around the scene of the accident.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: The German criminal police, together with the Duisburg prosecution and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau, are investigating the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf on the same day that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department, and judging from the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's "Good luck" shortlisted for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.

mt: The first realistic film directed by Dapeng, "Good luck", was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award at the Shanghai Film Festival, and the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Photo of the poster

mt: The film "Good luck" is director Dapeng's first realistic - themed work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy film director who, on a whim, returned to his hometown in rural Northeast China, hoping to make a literary film about his family's New Year, only to encounter a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members, who had gathered for the film, completed the final party.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, one of the family members, "Uncle Three" Wang Jiang, sits in the center of the picture smoking a cigarette, with the black land of Northeast China covered in silver in the background, and the red lantern that Chinese people must hang during the Chinese New Year holidays in the foreground.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes festive and reunion, is in great contrast to the lonely figure of Wang Jiang, and seems to reveal the complexity and tangle of this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Uncle Three" Wang Jiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are done by the real director's family, and the film's experimental audio - visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality, bringing the audience a new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Good luck" originated from "a providence", and a series of sudden family changes during filming forced the original shooting plan to be changed, and life without a script was eventually recorded as a film, but it released tension beyond the design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this "providence", and how should he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Good luck" is experimental, and the almost all - vegetarian lineup and innovative audio - visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a film, and wrapped in real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families in the family presented in the film, and as the family party in the film comes to an end, it evokes a series of thoughts.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" Pays Tribute to Anti - Epidemic Heroes - Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, the chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, the director (pictured left), had a discussion and exchange with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti - epidemic film "The Chinese Doctor".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Through "The Chinese Doctor", Bona Pictures hopes to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting in the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, under the arrangement and deployment of the Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Film Administration, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, Bona Pictures has organized the original cast of the film "Captain China" to prepare the film "The Chinese Doctor", which reflects the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the new coronavirus outbreak.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: Focusing on the front line of the fight against the epidemic in Wuhan, the film will take the medical staff of Wuhan and the medical teams of provinces and cities in Hubei as the background, and from the perspective of human nature, the film will use a unique narrative, as well as an impactful lens language, to show the moving stories of the Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice in the front line of the fight against the epidemic.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unsealed, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team of photographers to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to meet hundreds of medical workers face - to - face to understand and collect information, and so far has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to help Hubei, as well as white - clad angels at the forefront of the anti - epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital, and captured a large number of precious first - hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film during the symposium: "I look forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line, and they are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain China" before, and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China," he said.
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized, and he hoped that the film would impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, this film should also be shown abroad, and should impress the audience with true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" from the 1980s, "After so many years, I was most impressed by the film" Man to Middle Age "after the reform and opening up, and at that time, my foreign doctor friends all watched and cried, and if" The Chinese Doctor "could play such a role, it would be great."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "The Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people will always be smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have weathered thousands of difficulties and dangers since primitive society, and that today's modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with the fact that medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new coronavirus outbreak, people will no longer be as passive as before, "Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to soothing people's hearts".
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)
ref: (By Wang Jinyue)

mt: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - The First Red Fair in Xiangtan - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing Red Boat Mold, Shaoshan Bronze Statue of Mao Zedong, Yan'an Fabric Flower Crafts, Yongshun Bacon in Western Hunan... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, the first Red Cultural Industry Expo in Xiangtan was held at the Shaoshan Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, as well as local products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.
ref: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."
ref: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and discuss the ways of development. ”

mt: According to the relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Red Fair in Xiangtan, with the theme of "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting the Rise of Cultural Tourism", the total exhibition area of the fair is nearly 3,000 square meters, and an atmosphere - building area, an exhibition area for scenic spots, and an online shopping experience area for Red Cultural Tourism were set up.
ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: 137 enterprises and units from eight other provinces, including Jiaxing in Zhejiang Province, Zunyi in Guizhou Province, and Yan'an in Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province, were invited to participate in the exhibition, exhibiting a total of 768 kinds of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition and sales area will be on display until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the red industry and the development of the red cultural industry.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The Red Industry Exhibition Area displays 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises, including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiangdian Power, and the Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area displays nearly 200 products from 27 units, including the Red Series of Books, the Red Series of Food, and the Red Series of Cultural and Creative Products.
ref: The Red Industry Exhibition Area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co., Ltd., and XEMC. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the cloth and flower handicrafts and paper - cutting works of art exhibited by Chen.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, Director of the Yan'an Cultural and Tourism Bureau, said that the exhibition carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Anse Paper - cutting" and "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song", as well as the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan cloth pile painting, to focus on promoting the special products of Yan'an folk customs, and to take this opportunity to communicate with other units and enterprises in the exhibition area to promote cross - regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Solve the "Greenhouse Effect" - chinanews.com
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Solve the "Greenhouse Effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: Recently, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University has made significant progress in "membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide", and has successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: The results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are responsible for the "greenhouse effect".
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and utilize the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists' attention.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane Separation" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty in capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The research team of Tianjin University innovated and explored the influence of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N - methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of mixed matrix membranes prepared with this new technology is close to the theoretical upper limit of such membrane materials at present.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides a new idea for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said, "We hope that this technology will provide strong support for coal - fired power plants and chemical enterprises to treat flue gas in the future, and will play a significant role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: For the first time, a special committee was set up to collectively sign a "long contract" for the third CIIE exhibitor alliance to build a "CIIE bond" - Xinhuanet
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) - On July 26, the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd Import Expo set up a professional committee here for the first time, and the first batch of special committees were established, including the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee, and 35 member enterprises also signed a three - year long - term cooperation memorandum, and the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance continues to strengthen its role as a link.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a number of CIIE member enterprises, including Hyundai of South Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Newshland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three - year long - term cooperation memorandum, and the revised and improved constitution of the CIIE was also published for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The establishment ceremony of the Dairy Industry Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest constitution, the Alliance will introduce the rotating mechanism of the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, the CIIE will integrate the resources of the entire industrial chain of the industry, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry enterprises.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a special committee on public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new coronavirus outbreak.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: Qiu Jianping, General Manager of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Greater China, as the Vice President of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronavirus outbreak.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third CIIE set up a public health and epidemic prevention zone for the first time, and so far nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, covering an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established at the initiative of exhibitors, aiming to become a platform for exchanges and cooperation between high - quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing between exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic, trade, and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) in the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: So far, 142 enterprises have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: 3 - year - old girl dies of new coronavirus infection in Belgium - Xinhuanet
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: Belgian health authorities said on Thursday that a 3 - year - old girl died of the new coronavirus infection, making her the youngest person to die of the new coronavirus in the country.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Boudwin Katri, a spokesman for the Belgian health department, said that the girl had other serious diseases before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18 - year - old recently died of the new coronavirus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Katri said that 85% of the new coronavirus diagnoses in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "Although it is rare for young people to die of the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, the number of new confirmed coronavirus cases in Belgium increased by 89% compared to the previous week, with an average of 2.9 deaths per day from the new coronavirus infection, up from 1.7 per day in the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new coronavirus in Belgium's population was "among the highest" in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: According to the latest data, a total of 64,847 people have been infected with the new coronavirus in Belgium.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Katri warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on Wednesday that the rules on people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and that the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) "Xinhua News Agency Micro - Feature"
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (our reporter) On July 25, the large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation", hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station, set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying the 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the watchful eye of the guests.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, and we will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 will also be a decisive year in the fight against poverty".
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large - scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure of the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station to promote the fight against poverty in line with this major theme.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The campaign will go into poverty - stricken villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, excavate vivid poverty - stricken stories, directly attack the great changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers can break through the predicament of survival and development and become rich.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: The operation will last for more than three months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: From Xuzhou, the reporter took the southwest route through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet, and other places, and the northwest route through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei, and other places, covering more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of reporting form, "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is boldly integrated.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the Central Radio and Television Station's CCTV Financial Channel, the Central Radio and Television Station's Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio, and CCTV Financial New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the midday news program "World Finance" of CCTV Financial Channel (premiere time: Monday to Sunday 12:00 - 13:00), and the prime - time news program "Economic Information Network" of CCTV Financial Channel will open a poverty alleviation report column (premiere time: Monday to Sunday 20:30 - 21:30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, each village visited by the caravan will be broadcast live on the CCTV financial client for up to one hour, and viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the raffle by downloading the CCTV financial APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live and Watching Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to break through and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The vehicle is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G + 4K / 8K + AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: The broadcast area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The broadcast area can also be expanded automatically and is connected to an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Zhang Jike Lin Xiaozai team to support the muscle teenagers - Xinhua
ref: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai team up support muscular teenagers - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Sports teenagers hot blood competition show "sports bar teenagers" in July 11 officially landed in Hunan TV.
ref: On July 11, the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, a hot-blooded sports show for sports teenagers, officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV.

mt: The sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozake crossed the stage together, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui reviews have their own style, and the "behemoth" like power pulling rod device hardcore on the field, more let the program "burning" force.
ref: Zhang Jike, the sports leader, and Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, crossed the industry on the same stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on each other’s styles, and the the “monster”-like power pulling device came on the stage with difficulty, which made the program very "burning".

mt: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, the appearance of the stunning audience at the same time, the "strong conflict" "strong confrontation" "strong heart" on the competition stage also received attention.
ref: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance surprised the audience; at the same time, the “strong conflict”, “strong confrontation” and “strong heart” on the arena also received attention.

mt: Among them, " strong conflict" from super A sports student Qiao Wenyi, he openly provoked the same track in the "beautiful boy" called Xu Zhi Bin, choked Xu Zhi Bin appearance conditions should go to singing and dancing show, and even put "lost Don't cry your makeup off".
ref: The “strong conflict” comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student; before the competition, he openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as “beautiful boys” in the track, choking that Xu Zhibin should go to the sing and dance program in view of his appearance condition, and even releasing the malicious words of “don’t cry your makeup when you lose”.

mt: A speech to the field of teenagers and sports leaders are sucked back a breath of cold air.
ref: Some remarks made teenagers and sports leaders on the field breathe in a gasp.

mt: The "strong confrontation" was more like a fight of the gods, as Sun Jianqi, known as the "King of Magic", ran into Zhang Xindong, who was also strong, and staged a strong showdown.
ref: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight, and Sun Jianqi, who is known as the "Great Devil", and Zhang Xindong, who has the same strength, performs a strong confrontation.

mt: Their identities are also unexpected: Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special operations officer and a three-time Warrior Medal winner.
ref: Their identities are unexpected; Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare player and a winner of the Warriors Medal for three times.

mt: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.
ref: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audiences sweat for them.

mt: Under the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Bar Junior", was also watching the game carefully.
ref: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, also watched the game carefully.

mt: In the commentary session, he was also very attentive, patient and encouraging to the losing side of the teenager, helping to review each mistake point in the process.
ref: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping him to review every mistake in the process.

mt: The sports assistant Lin Xiaozai is a fancy assistant, she did not hide her appreciation for the teenagers with online strength.
ref: Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, is a fancy assistant, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers who have beauty strength.

mt: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of the sports boys, she was even more impressed.
ref: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, she was even more admired.

mt: Also sports leaders Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui have their own style, one is a calm and relaxed faction "prophet", a smile to disperse the nervous atmosphere of the "flooded girl".
ref: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles; one is a calm “prophet”, and the other is a “girl with prehistorical power” who dispels tension with a smile.

mt: In addition, Jixie and Liu Ye as sports assistants, but also around the sports teenagers to create a lot of laughs.
ref: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

mt: France Nantes church fire: parish volunteer admits to arson, usually kind and reticent - CNN
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to foreign media reports, on July 18, Nantes, France's religious and historical architectural treasures, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, was severely damaged in a fire, the large organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On July 26, Nantes prosecutors announced that a parish volunteer responsible for guarding the cathedral had been charged with "arson".
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has admitted that he set the fire in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: Local prosecutor Senas said the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted to lighting three fires in the cathedral during the night, according to reports.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The man's lawyer said the arsonist now regrets having done such a thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: The man entered France several years ago through the asylum route and was given asylum in the parish where the fire took place, where he was taken in at the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: The prosecution noted that recently, he tried to renew his visa and is in dialogue and communication with the police department about it.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But the church says it still can't believe that this usually very kind, smiling, but not very talkative believer would destroy the church he loves so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the July 18 fire, the volunteer had already been questioned by police for illogical problems in his account, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows firefighters at the scene of the rescue.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: In the evening of the 25th, the man was summoned again because of new evidence obtained by professional engineers from the laboratory of the Paris Central Police.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man confessed to the act of arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros if convicted of intentional arson and destruction.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: The fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul, with the organ inside the church completely destroyed and the stained glass windows behind the organ severely damaged, according to reports.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: The chief architect of the French historic preservation building, Brunet, believes that a conservative estimate of the Nantes Cathedral restoration work will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane "Hanna" landfall in Texas may cause river flooding and flash floods - CNN
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: July 26 (Xinhua) -- Comprehensive foreign media reports, at 5 p.m. local time on the 25th, Hurricane "Hanna" landed in Texas, will bring strong winds and rain to Texas, river flooding, may also trigger life-threatening flash floods.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.
