mt: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane "Hanna" is expected to carry heavy rainfall, sweeping through parts of southern and northeastern Texas, the rain may cause some of the streams to rise and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: The report said that the most serious impact of Hurricane "Hanna" is south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, while the Rio Grande Valley may erupt into widespread flash flooding.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: The state has 32 counties under a state of disaster emergency because of the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city of more than 320,000 people, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are standing by.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott added that the hurricane cannot be allowed to bring more casualties to Texas at a time when the state is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches overnight on the 26th, with 3 to 5 inches of rain also expected in northern Texas and coastal Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, the formation of "Hanna" earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty on the prevention of violence against women, the Justice Ministry said Saturday.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: Poland's right-wing government cabinet says the treaty tramples on the rights of students' parents by requiring schools to teach them topics about gender issues.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Justice Minister Joe Blow held a press conference and said his Justice Ministry on Monday will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Iobulo said, "The treaty contains some elements of what we consider to be a harmful ideological nature."
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of his main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested against the withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and several other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempert, one of the organizers of the protest, said at a protest march in Warsaw.
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters carried banners that read, "The Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland's previous centrist-run government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice government said the pact was not respectful of religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But as of now the party has not decided to withdraw from the pact.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to Vietnam News Agency, Grivory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN for 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Grivory said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and promotion of its image abroad.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He stressed that "ASEAN should therefore be grateful to Vietnam."
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivory said analysts recognized the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures for problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding Vietnam's cooperation with Russia in the framework of ASEAN, Grivory believes that Vietnam provides support to Russia's cooperative relations with ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits in the framework of this cooperation.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, was able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grivory proposed to maximize the expansion of the free trade area between the ASEM and ASEAN countries, thus creating a platform for economic and security stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Grivory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: By the end of 2020, Beijng will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, to proactively welcome the inflow of foreign investments, especially from multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, the province will submit to the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the document that adds the province's two industrial-urban-services zones of An Son - North Long and An Luc to the master plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zones until 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Bei Giang province is making efforts to accelerate the progress of projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in Hoa Phu, Quang Chau, and Sungei-Nai Huan clusters of industrial zones to form a land fund for investment promotion.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: Within 2020, the Department of Industry and Trade of the Province of Beuk Giang is involved in making proposals on the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: The province has determined that the development of industrial clusters will be combined with the security of national defense, protection of ecological environment and food security, which in turn will contribute to the balanced development of industry; comprehensive infrastructure of electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and other social infrastructure such as urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and health care, education, etc.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In industrial zones, the province is calling for high-tech, clean-tech investment projects in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province calls for small and medium scale investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially in agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, the province will focus on accelerating investments in the infrastructure of logistics centers in the city of Beijng to develop in parallel with the industrial park cluster in order to optimize the flow of goods, money and contribute to reducing production costs, increasing the value of goods, optimizing the supply chain, developing multimodal transport, thus creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Deutsche Welle) - The number of new coronary cases in Spain has risen sharply in the past two weeks, with thousands of new cases on multiple days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list as of 00:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists on vacation in Spain have expressed surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, as the news came out of nowhere and caught them off guard.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for those returning to Norway from Spain.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium are advising their residents to abandon their plans to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding areas ahead.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The beaches in these areas are so overcrowded that people cannot maintain social distance from each other, and police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beachgoers.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar of Spain's industry
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: It's safe here
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the decision made by Britain, Spain's Foreign Ministry said Sunday that the country's outbreak was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media, " Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to convince the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is much lower than in the UK mainland.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: To prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Spanish region of Catalonia has also restarted the "no-footing order".
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar of the Spanish industry, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to have a major impact on Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet/Renchen (DPA, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: First day of mid-volley: Beijing bids farewell to high temperature and heat, starts rainfall mode - Xinhua
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: BEIJING, July 26 (Xinhua) -- July 26 was the first day of this year's "mid-volley".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: The windy and convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispersed the heat that had been gripping the Beijing area for days, and a new round of rainy weather will last for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily high temperature of only 27°C. The night will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the night's low temperature will be 23°C.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: The previous 24 to 25 days, the city of Beijing in the high temperature blue warning, most areas of the daily maximum temperature in about 37 ℃, local high temperature of more than 40 ℃.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: The volcano is the highest temperature of the year, humid, hot and muggy days, there are "three volcanoes" a year, the hottest in the middle of the volcano, the Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: At the beginning of the volcano, families fill their barns, and folklore has the saying "a volcano of dumplings and two volcanoes of noodles".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, the next three days, Beijing more cloudy and rainy weather.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department prompted the public to minimize the mountainous areas to play, beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's "mid-volley" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "ambush", people will feel weak, loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: You can choose to eat mung beans, barley and other foods with heat, spleen and appetite, as well as bitter vegetables, bitter melon and other bitter foods, which can help increase appetite and get rid of the summer heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: Dingdong on line! The teacher is good" next week on line Xue Zhaofeng lead "knowledge initiator - Xinhua
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Another new variety show is coming online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong! Teacher is good", will be broadcast on Hunan TV from July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, a group of faceless and talented teachers will take the field, the challenge of interesting knowledge output.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Unlike the serious image of teachers in the public mind, "Dingdong Online! Teacher is good" is a group of knowledge representatives with both face and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young knowledgeable role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-rounded "doujinshi" who can shake the baggage and are good at teaching and entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will be challenged to a fun knowledge class.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to show the most interesting side of their subjects through knowledge output with attitude to impress the audience.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The all-ages audience will ask a variety of questions on the spot to make the lessons of the "knowledge sharing officers" more difficult and add some excitement to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: It is revealed that the "knowledge sharing officers" include Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the affiliated high school of Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher of examinations and research, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience, and other outstanding young teachers, who will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways. They will show the audience the "hard core" knowledge of various subjects in unexpected ways.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the program's "knowledge initiator", together with "Dingdong assistant teacher" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, and the audience to talk about youth, to create a "national youth open class The "Youth Open Class".
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Hong Kong SAR Government Chief Secretary for Administration: the situation is serious, all efforts to fight the epidemic - CNN
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Constitutional Affairs of the HKSAR Government, Mr. Matthew Cheung, said on the 26th that the situation of the new pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be serious, and if the epidemic turns bad, the SAR Government will decisively take more severe control measures to further restrict the business premises and reduce the space for people to go out.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: But at this stage the SAR government has no intention of introducing "home order" or "no-footing order" to restrict the public to go out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: Zhang Jianzong published a weblog entitled "the situation is serious, all efforts to fight the epidemic".
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this wave of the epidemic is the most serious in six months, the next two weeks will be very critical, to try to prevent the virus in the community to spread further.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation of the public is also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He urged the public to stay at home as much as possible and to reduce social contacts and eating out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: The public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands regularly, and suspend non-essential gatherings or dinners with friends and relatives and reduce visits to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the Central Government has been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and support the SAR Government's work to prevent and combat the epidemic, and actively respond to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the detection capacity and the conversion of AsiaWorld-Expo into a similar "square hospital" work.
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Mr. Cheung said that the SAR Government's free virus testing for specific high-risk groups, namely staff of residential care homes for the elderly, residential and nursing homes for the disabled, restaurant staff, cab drivers and property management staff, involving up to 400,000 people, is in full swing.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He was very concerned about the cases of infection in RCHEs and the SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for RCHE residents.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said the SAR government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, which is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build 2,000 more isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre and aim to complete them by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: Together with the isolation and quarantine center has been put into use 800 rooms, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: Hong Kong currently has four operating quarantine centers, providing a total of about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who are capable of independent self-care.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: U.S. launches countervailing investigation on China for the first time on the basis of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: The U.S. Department of Commerce recently announced its decision to initiate an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into ties (cable ties) originating in China and to launch an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" program.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the U.S. has opened an investigation into the so-called "RMB exchange rate undervaluation" item in a countervailing case, which China firmly opposes.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the 23rd evening, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and that the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasized that, in general, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and is not undervalued.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, between early 2005 and May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated currencies globally.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Commerce Department noted that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations under World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The U.S. regulation change in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: Even according to the U.S. regulations, the applicant's complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary elements of countervailing such as financial support, benefit award and exclusivity, the press release said.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urged the U.S. side to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Influenced by the further rise in tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB depreciated significantly against the U.S. dollar during the 22nd session, both falling below the RMB7.0 per dollar mark.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the U.S. Department of Commerce's move is intended to force up the yuan deserves attention.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of the yuan against the U.S. dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd, closing at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The median exchange rate of the yuan against the dollar, which is officially regulated, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: The 26th was the day before President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) in his term of office, the day the Philippines accumulated more than 80,000 confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia, with the number of confirmed cases among the employees of the Presidential Information Office (PCOO) and its direct agencies increasing to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: In response, the PCOO has prepared a task force of staff who have not been in contact with the confirmed cases to work with President Duterte in issuing the SONA press release.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Minister Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on 26th that two plans have been prepared for President Duterte to deliver the SONA.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to the A plan, Duterte will deliver the SONA in the afternoon of 27th at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Because of the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and lawmakers, and another video conference room was set aside for other cabinet members, local government officials and others to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All attendees passed a rapid test to enter the Capitol building that day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the attendees tests positive, Plan B is activated, i.e. President Duterte delivers the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer seats are arranged to hear the meeting.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: As is customary, the SONA will be broadcast live to the entire country in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine presidency has not yet confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanar said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the New Coronary Pneumonia epidemic and restore socio-economic life; it will also mention his promises when he took office, namely to fight government corruption, illegal drugs and poverty reduction.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, reviving the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who have suffered in the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen open for comments on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhua
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Xinhua Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) to encourage residents to do physical examinations diligently, early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers to be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel ...... A few days ago, "Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (draft for comments)" officially Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do medical check-ups, early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for public comments, health departments should be based on different age, occupation and other factors to develop a basic catalog of health check-ups.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-ups will be paid by the social health insurance fund at the rate of once a year per person.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The draft for comments clearly, the employer shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time of employees, the heavy load of mental and physical work of employees, the implementation of the rotation system, to avoid excessive loss of human body functions or physical and mental health injury to employees' health, while strictly enforcing the system of paid leave for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, the employer should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize health checks for employees.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: In the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposed to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, while the sale of alcoholic beverages location restrictions, for violations of the provisions, will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to correct, a fine of 30,000 yuan.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "more sports".
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the draft requirements, schools should arrange for students to spend more than one hour on physical activity every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the Internet Internet service business premises health supervision system, the establishment of online game health review system, to promote the healthy growth of young people to create a good interaction space, interaction culture.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the consultation draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions are fined 20,000 yuan for leaking patient privacy without consent, etc.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen in the development of urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development and other planning, regulatory documents and approval of major construction projects and the implementation of major public service projects before, should assess the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Without assessment or assessed will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or the health of the residents, shall not be developed and introduced or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Tibetan antelopes in Cocosili enter return season - Xinhua
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: Monitoring images near the Wudaoliang Protection Station show that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 kilometers and the Qinghai-Tibet Railway Wudaoliang North Bridge one after another, the Tibetan antelopes have begun to return.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the returning herd accounts for one-fourth to one-fifth of the overall number of Tibetan antelope herd.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said, "At the beginning of the return migration, Tibetan antelope face a higher risk of predation, so the number of young in the herd will be relatively small, and there may even be no young."
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to the statistics of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Three Rivers National Park Administration, the overall number of Tibetan antelopes returning to the park is rising year by year, with 4,860 Tibetan antelopes returning in 2019, 338 more than in 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelope this year is expected to end in early September, and the number of returning Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase."
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: The Tibetan antelope is a national-level protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from the Three Rivers Source in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Arjinshan in Xinjiang are going to lamb at the Zhuo Nai Lake located in the hinterland of Cocosiri.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, an expert in Tibetan antelope conservation in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Zoological Research Institute (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "The return migration of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitat one after another with their young after they have finished giving birth. Initially, the herds that leave their litters are relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths, depending on the geographic population."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe return of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that recently, the Yangtze River Source Park of the Three Rivers National Park Administration has arranged staff in the main return migration area, continuous video monitoring and precinct patrols.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If a Tibetan antelope herd is found trying to cross the highway, patrol members will be the first time to carry out temporary traffic control, so that the flock safely through the wildlife channel to ensure that it is on the way back to the migration as little as possible by human interference.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how exactly do you beat the heat in your daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts recommend that you try to avoid high temperature periods when you go out in summer. It is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon because the sun is strongest during this time and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out at this time, be sure to do a good job of protection, such as playing umbrellas, wearing sun hats, wearing sunglasses, the best conditions to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Clothes try to use light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, silk texture, less wear chemical fiber clothing, so as not to sweat a lot when the heat can not be timely, causing heatstroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: High temperature hot weather, to prepare sufficient water to drink in a timely manner, do not wait until thirsty to drink water, because once you feel thirsty that the body has been dehydrated, each drink of water control at 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, do not drink ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the general staff drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, high-temperature workers, drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water per day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When sweating more can be properly supplemented with some salt water to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, making people feel tired and weary, potassium tea is an excellent summer drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons and other water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can be hydrated, but also to meet the body's nutritional needs.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people working in a hot environment should be properly supplemented with drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: Long days and short nights in summer, high temperatures, the body's metabolism is strong, consumption is also large, easy to feel fatigue.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can make the brain and body systems are relaxed, both for work and study, is also a measure to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is 22:00 to 23:00, the best time to get up is 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: Take care not to lie under air conditioning vents and electric fans while sleeping to avoid air conditioning disease and heat stroke.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are active outdoors or working in high temperatures can carry with them heatstroke prevention medicines such as ten drops of water, Ren Dan, patchouli or patchouli pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate art exhibition moved into shopping mall for public interest - Xinhua
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the season of "cloud graduation" at major universities, a rare offline art exhibition of graduates opened last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: But it was neither in an art museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and was open to the public for free until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The exhibition space extends from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and makes full use of the light boxes in the building to display flat works, so as to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: Under the epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Ping, the person in charge of the aesthetics of Chaoyang Joy City, said frankly: "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition towards the 'cloud' back to the offline space again, also hoping to let more people see the youth's exploration of themselves and their understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and the soul. "
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works exhibited in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several art colleges and universities, from which those suitable for commercial space were selected. The works range from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installation, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the largest volume and richness ever.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao's "The First Battle of 2020" expresses his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creation language; Liu Jiaying's "Sound Money" explores "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction" and other issues through the ethereum blockchain. Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Custody" both show animals that are often accompanied by humans, from which we can see the young artists' understanding of the relationship between humans and animals. Zhu Zhongyou's work "Winter of Faith - Gift" is a reminder to the growing young people, "When one day your career is successful, don't forget the original heart and remember the simplicity and sincerity."
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who set up the exhibition in person was Li Jingyin from the sculpture department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7, when I was actually a little worried about the epidemic, and also had a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and came to set up the exhibition with alcohol sponges and test reports."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work "Yesterday is like a mystery" has a complex structure and he had to do it himself.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also took on the task of helping his classmates repair their broken works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: "Setting up the exhibition until 4:30 a.m. and then doing the repair, the time was so tight that I forgot to take a picture with the work, which was also a bit regrettable."
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hopes that when the epidemic is more stable, he and his classmates will come back to Beijing to see the exhibition of his works.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Rewarded 50,000 yuan Hubei Enshi praise sand dam landslide "warning the first person" - CNN
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) July 26, Enshi City, informed the important contribution of geological disaster site monitor Chen Guangming for the Shaziba landslide early warning, and sent him a bonus of 50,000 yuan.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, the city's party members and cadres were called upon to learn his spirit of dedication, courage, initiative and devotion.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shazi Dam, Ma Shi Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, resulting in the formation of a weir in the main channel of the Qingjiang River. 58-year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracked walls of the villagers' homes and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: He just walked out of his home five or six hundred meters, he saw the village group road cracked four or five centimeters, along the road has been extended to the corn field, the length of about 50 meters.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming was alerted and sent the photos of the cracked road to the township's "geohazard monitor contact group" at the first opportunity.
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: The person in charge of natural planning in Tumbao Township looked at the site and judged that the possibility of landslides was high, and then made the decision to evacuate the people.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people in 315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: No one was killed or injured in this major geological disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible dedication was praised by the public.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of praise, he said, "There is no such thing as saving anyone, it's my responsibility. "
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police informed the "female college students to Qinghai tourism lost" details search and rescue work is continuing - Xinhua
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Xinhua Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) recently, "a female college students to travel to Qinghai Golmud after the loss of" the matter triggered netizens concern.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The public security bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a university student in Nanjing, Huang Moumou is still in a lost state, the police are deep along the lost place of Huang Moumou, actively carry out the search work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Golmud City, Haixi Prefecture, received a notice from the higher level, Nanjing University student Huang Moumou on July 5 by Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud, on July 9 in Qinghai Province, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qumalai County, Sonam Dajie protection station southwest of the Clearwater River area at the cell phone off and lost, requesting assistance to find.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Huang entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on the 7th.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8:00 that day, the lost person Huangmoumou took a cab from Golmud City Yellow River Hotel towards the G109 national highway, and 12:00 arrived in Cocosili Sonam Dajie protection station, the cab driver returned alone, Huangmoumoumoumoumoumoumou arrived at 15:00 on the 7th Sonam Dajie protection station near the Clearwater River area until 18:00 on the 9th in the area shut down.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed through the Naiji Gou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: Naiji Gou checkpoint is the Tibet Autonomous Region Naqu City in Golmud City, the southern mountain pass set up checkpoints, due to the checkpoint no video surveillance, can not determine my own and the vehicle information, the police can only drive along the way to find, coordinate the Tibetan checkpoints along the way if found Huang Moumou, immediately contact with the Golmud City Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, July 26 at 1:00 a.m., Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment, to the Qinghai-Tibet Highway along the Frozen Spring Protection Station, Sonam Dajie Protection Station to find, and actively contact with the Sichuan police, Tibetan police, Nanjing police to work together, the search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and the community if there are relevant clues, timely to the police in Golmud and Nanjing Jiangning police to provide, and strive to find the lost person Huang Moumou early.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.
