mt: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists in the outdoor activities should be standardized, rational, civilized, always pay attention to the roadside warning signs, do not risk entering the uninhabited areas, encounter unexpected situations, to promptly report to the police.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia celebrates Navy Day with military parade - Xinhua

mt: The history of the Russian Navy began in 1696, when Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet.

mt: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to the new changes in the prevention and control of the epidemic, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the autonomous regional federation of trade unions and actively participated in the prevention and control of the epidemic.

mt: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transport Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they are doing their best to provide services to prevent and control the epidemic and steadily promote the development of transportation, creating a strong atmosphere of unity to fight the "epidemic".
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: The current summer heat, trade unions at all levels focus on the key areas of the epidemic prevention and control of front-line workers, the "cool" care and concern to the implementation.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: July 19, Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched to the epidemic prevention and control of front-line workers "to send cool" condolence activities, the county police stations, card stations and health systems received drinks, fruit and other condolences.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: "Trade union cadres should further improve the political stance, strengthen responsibility, warm the hearts of people with care, with action to inspire morale.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: We should give full play to the role of trade union organizations to coalesce workers and unite them, do a good job of epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of the majority of workers, and send care to front-line workers."
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers work in full swing - Xinhua
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Xinhua Jia Qilong), the Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice, the deployment of the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary higher education graduates work.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covering computers, automation, machinery and other 64 categories of more than 270 military general professional, focusing on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, small languages and other professional recruitment efforts, the scale of recruitment compared to last year increased by nearly 2,000 people.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the work of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and compulsory recruitment of simultaneous organization and implementation, August 1, the end of September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: You can check the conditions of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit the registration information online if you meet the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the physical examination, political examination and other follow-up recruitment work according to the unified requirements of the conscription place military service organs.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: The qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruitment and plan can participate in compulsory recruitment, and when they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in general higher education according to the prescribed academic system is considered as service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: This year, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers by the provincial or municipal people's government conscription office unified organization, registration potential rich professional will be a comprehensive measure of the level of education, professional course performance during school, to obtain vocational qualifications based on merit selection; scarce professional will be oriented to the local professional requirements, with the advantages of recruiting colleges and universities to recruit counterparts.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the normal epidemic prevention and control requirements, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in principle, do not arrange their own reporting, will be synchronized with the organization of conscripts transported into the camp.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers into the military time from September 1, 2020, the troops issued a non-commissioned officer posting orders for December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The unit will scientifically develop the enlistment and professional training program, and carefully organize the training; after the completion of training in accordance with the principle of professional counterparts, recruitment and use of the same, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be unified and precisely assigned to the corresponding professional and technical positions.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Embassy spokesman: Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security - CNN
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, a spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks on July 25.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: A reporter asked a question: According to the media, China-related hacking groups have interfered with the network systems of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies with proprietary data, and hacked into the networks of European Union governments.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a firm defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: The cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace and has a variety of actors, so sufficient evidence should be produced when investigating and characterizing cyber incidents, and there should be no unfounded speculation.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesman said that the past series of incidents, such as Prism Gate, proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber-secrecy operation.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The speaker noted that China's achievements in science and technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been achieved through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) route in 2019, with an annual growth rate of 10.6 percent, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications submitted.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a major innovation and IPR country.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been basically completed in most districts, secondary testing in high-risk areas - CNN
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: Urumqi, July 26 (Xinhua Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) - Urumqi Health Commission Director Zhang Wei said on July 26, while briefing the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, that at present, free nucleic acid testing in most districts of Urumqi city has been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: A group of experts from the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on nucleic acid testing and epidemiological findings.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, there were 22 new confirmed cases of new crown pneumonia in Urumqi (including 5 cases of asymptomatic infected to confirmed cases) and 38 new asymptomatic infected cases.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic cases in Urumqi.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were also basically detected through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Health Care Commission, said on the 26th that free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi has been largely completed in most districts.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the testing reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the person being tested, the cooperation of the person being tested when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may result in the specimen not being taken in place), as well as the testing environment and the operational proficiency of the testing personnel.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: For various reasons, nucleic acid testing can also result in false negative results.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: A false negative means that the person tested is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test results are negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases, it usually takes two nucleic acid tests to rule them out.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the outbreak, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a single negative nucleic acid test has the potential to be a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also needed to rule it out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said, in view of the above, for the sake of the health of the city's ethnic groups, starting today, Urumqi will carry out the second free nucleic acid testing in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shaibak District, and also carry out the "check and fill in the gaps".
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shaybak District are high-risk areas for the outbreak.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about developing a vaccine by early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the remarks at a web-based video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on 25.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He cautioned that it is unclear how the new crown epidemic will develop in the fall and winter, or what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to Johns Hopkins University data, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4,176,000 and 146,000 deaths.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said some areas of the United States are currently struggling with the rebounding epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic varies from region to region and requires locally tailored response plans, diverse strategies to combat the epidemic do not mean that regions are not closely linked.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: An outbreak in one region will eventually affect other regions.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: "This is not a time for complacency," Fauci said, "Our work is not done, and we must step up our efforts and be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future."
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: D.Y. Ho, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for AIDS, noted at the conference that the new U.S. epidemic has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: "Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus."
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He called on the public to buy time for scientists to step up the development of a cure and vaccine for New Crown by taking practical action.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization whose mission is to promote international exchange activities in the U.S. and the Asia-Pacific region, and is dedicated to elevating the status of Asian Pacific Americans and nurturing young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, U.S. Secretary of Transportation Xiaolan Zhao, U.S. Congressman Zhaowen Meng and International Leadership Foundation Founding President Jiling Dong spoke at the conference.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to the Asian Pacific Islander medical workers and volunteers on the front lines of the epidemic, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the "social distance" and other epidemic prevention guidelines to contain the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: U.S. and China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on 25 August, citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter, that the head of China's trade negotiation team, Vice Premier Liu He, and the co-leader of the U.S. team, Trade Representative Lai Hoi-chul, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, the Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement because of the new coronavirus outbreak and other factors.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say recent U.S.-China closures of each other's consulates, along with other disputes, could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade deal, which took effect a month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group of top officials from both sides should meet every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: The source said the meeting would be "an important turning point" that would allow the two sides to assess progress on the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But the source also said that if U.S.-China tensions lead to a lack of willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haider and Liu He has met the semi-annual meeting clause of the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including a series of issues such as the origin of the new crown virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although U.S. President Donald Trump bragged about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently made record-breaking single-day purchases of U.S. corn and bought a lot of soybeans, "this trade deal is not as meaningful to me now as it was when it was reached."
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations, and that "trade issues have lost weight in U.S.-China relations.
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: But he revealed that Chinese economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We've done our best to buy, so any additional purchases would be difficult."
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: U.S.-China National Trade Council Vice President Peng Jie-ning said it was "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and said China has made progress this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: Analysts at Plenum, an independent research firm, said "talk is better than no talk, even though it may only be treated as routine."
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: The balance of the earnings down "after 90" but "revenge" to save money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the balance of the treasure earnings down, "after 90" not only did not flee the balance of treasure, but began to "revenge" to save money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: China New Economy Research Institute and Alipay recently released the "BalancePay Post-90s Money Saving Report" (2020 Edition), which shows that in the first half of the year, the "post-90s" love to save money: the per capita amount of money saved increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, the "post-90s" tend to start saving with a "small amount of money", with 60% of them saving less than 20 yuan per pen on average....
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with BalanceBao has also become a saving habit for the post-90s.
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: The data shows that 134 million of the 700 million users of BalanceBao are "post-90s".
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, which means that about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in the country are using BalanceBao to save money.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized return of money funds such as BalanceBao has slipped from above 2% at the beginning of the year to about 1.5%.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of the "post-90s" saving money.
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: And in the context of the "saving effect" of BalanceBao, many young people who are used to using BalanceBao are also directly transformed into "fundies".
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, nearly a month on Alipay new "fundies" year-on-year growth of more than 1 times, more and more young people in Alipay to achieve "advanced" financial management.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Alipay into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, on average 20% higher than the amount of money saved by boys; 60% of the users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more stable financial management methods compared to men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what are the plans of the "post-90s"?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users have travel as their saving goal.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Due to the epidemic, many post-90s are saving money to prepare for their travels after the epidemic; the resumption of cinema business also provides a new way to shift from saving money to spending.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: The newest and brightest party flag is flying high on the flood control dike
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, the south of China is affected by continuous rainfall, flood control and anti-flood situation is very serious, resulting in Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, Hubei and other 26 provinces (regions and cities) affected.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster is an order, the disaster area is the battlefield, before the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag, party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work, quickly join the flood control and rescue relief front line, become the backbone of the masses in the disaster area, flood fighting force.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag fluttering high on the dike is the embodiment of loyalty, but also the call of duty.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: Before the disaster, a party organization is a fighting fortress, a party member cadres is a banner.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: Around the front line of the flood, party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres reflect a high degree of loyalty to the party, listen to the call of the central party to "look at my" action, "follow me" pace, "I first on The courage of "look at me" action, "follow me" pace, "I go first", build a steel fortress that can not be broken, and a Chinese backbone that can not be bent.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The brightly colored party flag fluttering high on the anti-flood dike, is the position of holding fast, but also the call to charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of flooding, party organizations at all levels acted quickly to sound the "charge" to fight the floods, the bright party flag on the dike to fight the floods, the majority of party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters in the position to fight the floods, with the "party flag in the position on", "the floods never retreat until the floods retreat. The will and action of "never retreat until the flood" has become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright party flag fluttering high on the flood control dike is selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, showing the true colors of party members, in the people's lives and property under serious threat, party members and cadres, the people's sons and daughters of the family, care for everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take charge, to win the hard battle of flood control, flood rescue and relief, as a comprehensive test of ability, style, quality of the main battlefield, the parade ground, it is this selfless dedication and the spirit of bearing, greatly encouraged the people in the disaster area to overcome the disaster confidence and determination, and cohesion to win the flood control and rescue and relief of a strong spiritual force.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: "People first, life first", both in the usual test, more in the critical moment to accept the test.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: In the flood control levee, the majority of party members and cadres and the people's sons and daughters, to let the people everywhere at any time can see the bright red party flag, the struggle of the figure, the voice of encouragement, with the flood can not collapse the steel levee for the party flag to add color, so that a bright party flag in the flood control levee fluttering high!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC members' trade ministers' meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members' trade ministers' video conference held on July 25 pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's informal APEC Leaders' Meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: A joint statement issued after the meeting said APEC member trade ministers recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: The parties committed to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the outbreak are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary barriers to trade and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In their statement, APEC member trade ministers pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of goods and services necessary to minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the outbreak by enhancing supply chain resilience and promoting connectivity.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: APEC member trade ministers agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitate the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on facilitating the flow of essential commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration said that economies will ensure that trade measures they take in response to the outbreak are WTO-compliant and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff barriers to trade, trade facilitation, etc. to facilitate the necessary movement of goods under the outbreak.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysian Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings in video format, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi financial emergency issued 280 million yuan of funds to support the post-disaster relief and reconstruction around - CNN
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, the officers and soldiers of a department of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who had come to the aid of the local flood fight, used the break in preparation to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County to harvest peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: By the previous heavy rainfall, the cooperative planted hundreds of acres of red pepper seriously affected, if not timely picking losses will expand.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: China News Agency reporter Futian photo
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance 26 news, according to the work of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Command deployment and requirements, the province's financial emergency issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds, for flood control and rescue and relief work to provide financial security for the affected people.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, Jiangxi floods and disasters have been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: Floods have led to direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas of the province, the affected area of 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi provincial finance has issued a central disaster relief funds of 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the province's emergency management special funds in three consecutive batches of 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction around.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th, before the arrival of the flood season, has issued all kinds of disaster prevention and mitigation funds 173 million yuan, to ensure the early detection of risk prevention, early disposal, early resolution, to provide financial support for the flood rescue work.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in high and slow retreat.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: Jiangxi Provincial Defense Committee adjusted the emergency response of flood control down to level II at 18:00 on 24th; the level of provincial disaster relief emergency response was adjusted from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health and Wellness Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health Commission news, July 25 0-24 hours, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, of which 11 cases were imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 cases in Guangdong, 1 case in Tianjin, 1 case in Fujian and 1 case in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning). No new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case from Inner Mongolia and 1 case from Shanghai).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: There were 19 new cases discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases than the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There were 82 confirmed cases (including 2 serious cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: The total number of confirmed cases is 2045, the total number of cured cases is 1963, and there are no fatal cases.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cured and discharged cases, 4,634 cumulative fatal cases, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases on the same day (no cases imported from abroad); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 cases imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: The total number of confirmed cases received from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan is 3009.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, 2505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1455 cases discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged) and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged, 7 deaths).
ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say collecting immigration data through the U.S. Census for House seat allocation is unconstitutional
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Several civil rights groups and several U.S. cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the U.S. federal government, saying the Trump presidency's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the American Civil Liberties Union, told Voice of America, "It's not going to work to do that."
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's demand to determine the citizenship status of people who take the census in the census is difficult to do and "not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Several cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Garvey, chairman of Arlington County's governing board, said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count every person living in Arlington County and not allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and compress the numbers of our immigrant community to succeed."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, "The allocation of congressional House seats and Electoral College seats for each state must be based on the number of residents who live in each state and who are legally resident."
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including citizenship questions in the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population from the census so the administration can exclude those undocumented people from each state's census numbers and use it to determine whether each state will add or subtract or keep House seats.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: Every 10 years, the U.S. has to reallocate House seats based on population changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: New book reveals Prince Harry felt his brother was "snobbish and arrogant"
ref: Exposures from New Book: Prince Harry Thinks His Elder Brother “Snobbish and Arrogant”

mt: The British newspaper The Times and The Sunday Times serialized a new book called "Finding Freedom", which depicts Prince Harry's (Prince Harry) and his wife Meghan (Meghan Markle)'s journey through the royal life.
ref: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” have published a new book titled “Finding Freedom” in installments, which describes the psychological journey of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle during their living of the royal life.

mt: But Reuters reports that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying they were not interviewed by the author and did not provide any content.
ref: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they have neither accepted the author's interview nor provided any content.

mt: The Sunday Times reports that the new book cites sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before their wedding, Prince William wanted to make sure Meghan, a former Hollywood actress, had no ulterior motives for Harry.
ref: Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted an informant as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

mt: According to the source, William said to Harry at the time: "You don't feel the need to rush (to marry Meghan).
ref: According to an informant, William said to Harry at the time: “Don't feel you need to rush (in marrying Megan).

mt: You can try to take time to get to know the girl."
ref: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl. ”

mt: The newspaper said that when Harry heard William use "this girl" to describe Meghan, he felt arrogant snobbery from his brother's tone, and he also thought he no longer needed to be reminded to take care of others.
ref: The report said that when Harry heard William described Meghan as “this girl”, he felt the arrogance and snobbishness from his brother's tone, and in addition, he believed that he did not need any others to take care of him and remind him.

mt: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will be self-reliant.
ref: Harry and Meghan announced this January that they planned to live a more independent life and would earn their own living.

mt: The two officially stepped down from their roles as senior members of the royal family in March and are now living in Los Angeles, California, with their son Archie to pursue new careers.
ref: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, now they are living with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue new careers.

mt: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.
ref: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

mt: The marriage was seen at the time as injecting Hollywood glitz and new age flair into the British royal family, making the pair one of the most talked about celebrity couples in the world today.
ref: At that time, this marriage was regarded as an injection of Hollywood's glamour and flavor of the new times into the British royal family, and the two became one of the contemporary celebrity couples drawing the highest level of attention around the globe.

mt: The ceremony was attended by Minister Counsellor of the Embassy of Vietnam in Laos, Mr. Zheng Thixin, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, representatives of the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association and other representatives.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony was attended by Tay Thi Son, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, and the representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association, etc..

mt: The ceremony was held in a solemn atmosphere, where the representatives offered incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony for Martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and representatives lit incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering the martyrs' great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

mt: In his speech, Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Lao to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of both countries, to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of both countries, as well as a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence, national unity, build national development together and consolidate the relationship between the two countries.
ref: Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Laos to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries, and to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of the two countries; meanwhile, this is a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence and national unity, seek national development, and consolidate their relations together.

mt: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnamese Combat Union died bravely during the attack on Phonehe stronghold.
ref: On January 23, 1946, a day of 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Laos-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically during an attack on the stronghold Phonehe.

mt: The victory of this attack became a historic victory for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.
ref: The victory of this attack became a victory of historic significance for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

mt: Ms. Tay Thi Son emphasized that the people of both countries will always remember the martyrs who died for the cause of national liberation struggle of both countries, and also stressed that the young generation of both countries will continue to carry forward the tradition of bravery and strength of the old generation and make their due contribution to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperity of both countries.
ref: Ms. Tay Thi Son stressed that the two peoples will always remember the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the cause of struggle for national liberation of the two countries, and meanwhile, he emphasized that the young generation of the two countries will continue to carry forward the old-timers’ tradition of being brave and strong, and make their due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperous development of the two countries.

mt: A milestone leap!
ref: Milestone Leap!

mt: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match - CNN
ref: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A match - www.chinanews.com

mt: (CNN) - Inter Milan, the traditional giants of Serie A, celebrated a milestone match in the early morning of July 26, Beijing time.
ref: Www.chinanews.com Client, July 26 - In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Inter Milan, a traditional top club of Serie A, ushered in a milestone battle.

mt: According to the Italian media, the away game against Genoa was the 3000th Serie A game in Inter Milan's history, and the Blue Blacks were the first team to unlock this milestone.
ref: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

mt: Since the league was reorganized in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.
ref: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

mt: According to the Italian media, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa was the 3000th match in the history of the Blue Blacks.
ref: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri.

mt: In this milestone match, Inter Milan beat Genoa by three goals on the road.
ref: In this milestone match, Inter Milan won Genoa C.F.C. by three goals away game.

mt: Lukaku scored twice and substitute Alexis Sanchez also contributed a goal.
ref: In this match, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

mt: The game was in Inter's rhythm from the beginning, and the strong attack was finally converted into a goal in the 34th minute.
ref: The match entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the crazy attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

mt: Bilagui crossed the ball from the left and Lukaku scored with a header from the middle.
ref: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku made a header from the middle.

mt: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan made the same move, Moses broke through the right side and passed to Sanchez, who scored from the middle.
ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3:0 away from home, overtaking Atalanta to move up to 2nd place, 4 points behind leader Juventus with one more game to play, and still retaining their title hopes.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: So far, in the 3,000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1,489, drawn 834 and lost 677, with a winning rate of 49.6%.
ref: So far, Inter Milan has won 1489 of the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, drew 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

mt: During this period, the team scored 5038 goals and conceded 3102 goals, with an average of 1.68 goals scored per game.
ref: During the period, Inter Milan scored 5,038 goals and lost 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

mt: The Blue and Blacks have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.

mt: The old face of spy drama Liu Yunlong plays a stuttering male lead - Xinhua
