mt: Greenland opens a new round of mixed reform Shanghai state capital to transfer 17.5% of shares -Economic Observation Network-Professional financial news website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observation Reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the State-owned shareholders' intention to transfer some shares of the company by way of public solicitation of transferee agreement and resumption of trading".
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The content of the announcement shows that, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned capital and state-owned enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned capital and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred will not be lower than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days prior to the prompt announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company for the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, the new strategic investor for Greenland is still inconclusive, according to the announcement of public information estimates, the new strategic investor to take the 17.5% stake transferred in this hybrid reform of Greenland need to pay about 14 billion yuan of funds.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under a purely state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved a state-controlled, employee-owned shareholding system; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-ownership and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and from 2015 to the present, it is listed on the stock exchange, becoming a wholly-owned company. From 2015 to the present, the overall listing and becoming a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland's current mixed reform program is similar to Gree, in December 2019, High Tide Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder, and after completing the mixed reform, Gree implemented a modern corporate management approach such as executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai City Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai Municipal State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important step for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new phase of state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the body, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to listed companies. Support enterprises to further improve marketization, enhance freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: CHONGQING, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Chongqing Development and Reform Commission released a news release on July 26, saying that the city has so far retired 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54 percent of all fishermen involved .

mt: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with CNN that his grandfather's generation fished in Longxi River, and he followed his father's fishing since he was 11 years old, rocking a small boat and traveling along Longxi River, up to Chongqing Liangping and down to Changshou, each time he left home for 10 days and half a month, relying on fishing to sustain his family's life.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: But from 1997, as the rural population gradually to the field town, Gaoan field town in more and more residents, resulting in more and more serious environmental pollution.

mt: Li Daiguo said that it was getting more and more difficult to fish after the river was polluted.

mt: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including drift cleaning, river patrol, aquatic resources management and protection.

mt: The number of fishermen who have retired from fishing is 4404, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Pension insurance coverage of 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen who have retired from fishing.

mt: Next, Chongqing City will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the use of the Yangtze River main stream shoreline project cleaning and rectification, complete a new round of Yangtze River outfall census and carry out the corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (phosphorus mine, phosphorus chemical and phosphogypsum reservoir) rectification tasks, small hydropower cleaning and rectification work, promote the Yangtze River on both sides of the The government has also taken special actions to reforest both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the results of the special rectification of illegal docks and illegal sand mining on the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on fishing and retrieval in the Yangtze River basin.

mt: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong SAR Government, Mr. Hui Ching-yu, said that Hong Kong's financial markets remain active and operate in an orderly manner.

ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through a research paper published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and such research has been conducted very quickly and rigorously through close collaboration within the country in the face of a declared national emergency, with results of progress in early trials of a new coronavirus vaccine developed in China published in The Lancet in May and July, respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: The Chinese experience demonstrates the importance of investing in the national health and research system to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: It is well worthwhile for other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, to learn from and emulate this.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience proves that a strong research base must be followed by strong top-level decisiveness to make the right decisions based on scientific evidence, which has led to effective control of the new crown outbreak.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in the way that is best for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early stages of the outbreak, China's National Health Construction Commission sent three teams of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the New Guinea virus, and their recommendations informed the decision to "seal off" the city on January 23; when experts raised the need and urgency of building the Fangzhai Hospital, the government made a quick decision and implemented it quickly; and At the same time, widespread community and public participation enabled the outbreak to be contained quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: The article concludes by emphasizing that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: 'Chinese Doctor' prepares for filming to pay tribute to epidemic heroes - Xinhua

mt: Recently, with Chinese filmmakers' respect for the heroes fighting against epidemics, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) had a discussion and exchange with academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the shooting and production of the film "Chinese Doctor" on the theme of fighting against epidemics.
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: Currently, under the arrangement and deployment of the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film "Chinese Captain" to prepare the film "Chinese Doctor", which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in the fight against the new pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's fight against the epidemic, and will take Wuhan's medical staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities to aid E. China's medical team as the background of the characters, from the perspective of human nature, using a unique narrative, as well as a very impactful camera language, a panoramic view of the front line of the fight against the epidemic is full of dedication and sacrifice of Chinese medical staff's touching story.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that the first time when Wuhan was unsealed, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a film crew to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, communicating with hundreds of medical workers face to face and collecting information, and has already interviewed some of the most important medical professionals on the epidemic front, including academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong who helped E, as well as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central and South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc. A lot of valuable first-hand video information was captured by the angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, including Zhong Nan Hospital of Wuhan University and Wuhan Central Hospital.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the film shooting in the symposium: "I am looking forward to it, I hope you will not only visit some experts who show their faces more, but also interview more medical personnel who work hard at the front line, they are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said he had previously seen "My Country and I" and "The Chinese Captain" and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When it comes to the dissemination of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a human perspective: " It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. "
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s, "After so many years, my deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film is still "Man to Middle Age", when my doctor friends abroad wept, and it would be remarkable if "Doctor China" could play such a role."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, " I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said, although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to the present, humans have survived thousands of difficulties and dangers, and now modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, plus medical personnel around the world, and even the people have a basic understanding of scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic, people will no longer be as passive as before, "the next two aspects to pay attention to One is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to focus on soothing people's hearts.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect" - China News Network
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of the new hybrid substrate membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: By Shang Rui, reporter: Recently, Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team has made significant progress in "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which significantly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: The results were published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology".
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and CO2 emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and utilize human carbon dioxide emissions is the focus of scientists' attention.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation" is a new technology of carbon dioxide capture, which is energy efficient and simple to operate with the help of membrane materials.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to let the membrane material "breathe" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The research team of Tianjin University innovated and explored the effect of different solvents on the performance of membrane gas separation through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more uniformly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The hybrid matrix membranes prepared with this new technology have carbon dioxide separation performance close to the theoretical separation limit of such membrane materials currently available.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides a new idea for carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said, " We hope this technology will provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a significant role in areas such as controlling greenhouse gas emissions."

mt: (Guo Qian) 【Xinhua News Agency micro special article
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale integrated media action "go village live to see the poverty" set off - Today's News - Hunan Daily Online - 华声在线
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily - New Hunan Client, July 25 (Our reporter) On July 25, the large-scale integrated media action "Walk the village live to see the poverty" sponsored by the Central Radio and Television Administration's Financial Program Center set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove out of the scene under the eyes of the guests at the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society and achieve the first hundred-year goal, 2020 is also the year of decisive victory in the fight against poverty".
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale integrated media action "Go to the Village Live to See Poverty Eradication" is an important initiative of the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to match this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty eradication.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go to the villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the central government to dig out the vivid stories of poverty eradication, to hit the dramatic changes of village appearance, and to show how the villagers break through the difficulties of survival and development and go to the road of prosperity.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: This operation will last for more than 3 months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: Reporters from Xuzhou, divided into two ways, all the way to the southwest line, through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the journey of more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In the form of reporting, "go live to see the village out of poverty" bold integration.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcasted through CCTV financial channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Traffic Radio and CCTV Financial New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be done mainly on CCTV Finance Channel's midday news program "World Finance" (first broadcast time: 12:00-13:00 from Monday to Sunday), and CCTV Finance Channel's prime-time news column "Economic Information" will open a column on poverty eradication (first broadcast time: 20:30-21:30 from Monday to Sunday).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour in the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits, and viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Live Village Watching Poverty Alleviation" has made a breakthrough and created the first "Outfield New Media Caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, using 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Configured with three news broadcast area, the broadcast area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide, 3.98 meters high, the box adopts hydraulic automatic unfolding structure, the maximum can be turned up 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The broadcast area can also be automatically unfolded, and external expansion platform, an area of more than 50 square meters, can meet the requirements of most of the program scenes.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: China News Service, July 26 (Xinhua) According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral of St. Peter and St. Paul, a treasure of religious and historical buildings in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the large organ was completely destroyed.

ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: Poland to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women

mt: Poland's Ministry of Justice said Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Justice Minister Gioblo said at a press conference that his Ministry of Justice will submit a request to the Ministry of Labour and Family on Monday to begin withdrawing from the treaty.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: " The treaty contains some elements of meaning-form nature that we consider to be harmful, " Gioblo said.

mt: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

mt: Some protesters held banners that read " Law and Justice is a hell for women. "

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice Party government said the treaty did not respect religion and required liberal social policies to be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Grivoli said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN to improve its status and promote its image abroad.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: " ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam, " he stressed.
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivoli said that analysts recognized the peace initiative put forward by Vietnam.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peaceful measures on the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivoli believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, will be able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grivoli proposed to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, so as to create a platform for economic and security stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Grivoli also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to proactively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups with value chains and the transfer of advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the proposal to submit the Prime Minister's decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-South Korea industrial zone and approve the addition of the two industrial-city-service districts of Anshan-Beilong and Anlu in the overall plan for the development of Vietnam's industrial zone by 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to speed up the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju and Shuangxi-Neihuang, so as to form a land fund for attracting investment.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Bureau of Industry and Trade of Beijiang Province will participate in the planning of industrial zones and industrial clusters to be incorporated into the provincial plan.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with ensuring national defense security, protecting the ecological environment and ensuring food security, thus promoting the balanced development of industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province has made great efforts to call for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in electric power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries, etc.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production and utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang Logistics Center and develop simultaneously with the industrial park cluster in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, so as to create attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: In the past two weeks, the number of cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases appearing in several days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0: 00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be isolated for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists on holiday in Spain expressed surprise, worry and even anger when they heard of the decision, because the news was sudden and caught by surprise.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is also on holiday in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning to Norway from Spain would be isolated for a period of 10 days.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium have advised their residents to abandon plans for a holiday in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: Beaches in these areas are overcrowded and people cannot maintain social distance, and police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: It's safe here
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said Sunday that the epidemic in the country was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media: " Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. "
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist resorts is much lower than in the UK.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalan region of Spain has also resumed the " foot ban. "
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular resorts for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet / Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing leaves high temperature and heat to start rainfall mode-Xinhuanet
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's " Zhongfu. "
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: The gale and rain convective weather in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and heat that had enveloped Beijing for several days, and a new round of rainfall will last for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11: 00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ℃; there was light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning) at night, and the minimum temperature at night was 23 ℃.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: In the previous 24 to 25 days, the whole city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37 ℃, and local high temperatures exceeded 40 ℃.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Fu Tian is the highest temperature, humid and sultry day of the year. There are " three volts " in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. This is when the Chinese people say " bitter summer. "
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the barn, families fill the barn, and there is a folk saying of " one-volt dumplings and two-volt noodles. "
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, the weather in Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department reminded the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's " Zhongfu " has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the " middle volt, " people will feel physical weakness and loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: On the diet, you can choose mung beans, coy nuts and other foods that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, strengthening spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter cabbage and bitter gourd, which can help to increase appetite and dispel heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " will go online next week Xue Zhaofeng leads the " Knowledge Initiator-Xinhuanet
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There are new variety shows online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new all-age youth classroom, and a group of attractive and talented teachers will play to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Unlike the serious impression of teachers in the public mind in the past, " Ding Dong Online! Good Teacher " gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young knowledge role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round " paragraph players " who can shake burdens and are good at teaching and fun.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models, as " knowledge sharing officers, " will challenge interesting knowledge classes.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to show the most interesting side of their subject through the output of knowledge with an attitude to impress the audience.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The " Tao Ask Group " composed of all-age audiences will ask changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult for the " knowledge sharing officer " to teach and adding a bit of excitement to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: It is revealed that the " knowledge sharing officers " include outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher at the middle school attached to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will show the " hard core " knowledge of various disciplines to the on-site audience in unexpected ways.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the " knowledge initiator " of the program, together with " Ding Dong teaching assistants " Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk about youth with the audience and create a " public youth class for all. "
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is serious and make every effort to fight the epidemic-Chinanews.com
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 (Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government), said on the 26th that the situation of the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic situation deteriorates, the SAR Government will decisively take stricter control measures to further restrict the operation of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the SAR government has no intention of introducing a " home order " or " foot ban order " to restrict citizens from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: Zhang Jianzong published a blog entitled " The situation is severe and make every effort to fight the epidemic " on the same day.
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this wave of epidemic is the most severe in half a year, and the next two weeks will be very critical. We should try our best to prevent the further spread of the virus in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, citizens' self-discipline and cooperation are also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He called on citizens to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: Members of the public should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash hands frequently. They should also suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and reduce them to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the Central Government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the epidemic prevention and anti-epidemic work of the SAR Government, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing the detection capacity and retrofitting AsiaWorld-Expo for work similar to a " shelter hospital. "
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely staff of residential care homes for the elderly, homes for the disabled and nursing homes, restaurant staff, taxi drivers and property management staff, has been fully launched, involving up to 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about the infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR Government is building quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island, New Territories, and is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2,000 isolation rooms at the Penny's Bay Quarantine Centre, which will be completed by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: In addition to the 800 isolation and quarantine centers that have been put into use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: There are currently four isolation and quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 with independent self-care.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: The United States launched a countervailing investigation against China for the first time with " undervalued RMB exchange rate "
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the recent announcement by the US Department of Commerce, it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on strap (strap) products originating in China, and launched an investigation on the " undervalued RMB exchange rate " project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case in a countervailing case to investigate the so-called " undervalued RMB exchange rate " project, which China firmly opposes.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a special press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand and adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been underestimated.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated more than 17% against the US dollar.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the currencies with the largest appreciation in the world.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States amended its regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed by many parties.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: The press release said that even according to US regulations, the applicant's complaint contained a large number of errors and did not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial support, benefit granting and exclusivity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations into the so-called " undervalued RMB exchange rate. "
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further rise in tensions between China and the United States, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, both falling below the threshold of RMB 7.0 against the US dollar.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the US Department of Commerce's move is intended to force up the RMB is worthy of attention.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The midpoint rate of the officially regulated RMB against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: On the 26th, the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, more than 80,000 cases of COVID-19 pneumonia were confirmed in the Philippines, of which the number of confirmed cases by the staff of the Presidential Information Department (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Minister Martin Andanal said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for President Duterte to publish SONA.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a special video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants passed a rapid test to enter the Capitol building on the same day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was launched, that is, President Duterte delivered SONA at the Malacanan Palace of the presidential palace, and fewer seats were arranged for the hearing.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: According to the convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine presidential palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanal said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life; it will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely anti-government corruption, fight against illegal drugs and reduce poverty.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers suffering from the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly solicit opinions on the introduction of health regulations-Xinhuanet
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) encourages residents to do medical check-ups frequently and find problems early; prohibits the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establishes an online game health review system; Employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health managers... Recently, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (Draft for Consultation) was officially released, and Shenzhen residents will have their own " health law. "
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The health examination expenses that fall within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance coordination fund according to the standard of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.
