ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is a manifestation of loyalty and a call for mission.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a flag.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations and cadres of party members at all levels demonstrate a high degree of loyalty to the Party, listen to the call of the Party Central Committee, and build iron fortresses that cannot be washed down with the actions of " look at me, " the pace of " follow me, " and the courage of " I go first. "
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is the adherence to the position and the horn of the charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of the flood, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, blew the " emergency call " for fighting the flood, and planted the bright party flag on the embankment for fighting the flood. Party members, cadres and people's soldiers adhered to the position of fighting the flood, and became the most reassuring and trustworthy solid barrier for the people in the disaster area with the will and actions of " the party flag is in the position " and " the flood will never retreat. "
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting levee is selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: At a time of crisis, it shows the true character of party members. At a time when people's lives and property are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, people's children and soldiers give up their families and take care of everyone, selfless dedication, dare to take responsibility, and take winning the tough battle of flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and military parade ground for comprehensively testing ability, style and literacy. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly encourages the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disaster, and gathers a strong spiritual force to win flood control, flood rescue and disaster relief.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: " People first and life first " is tested not only in peacetime, but also at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood-fighting levee, the cadres of the party members and the people's soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle and the voice of encouragement everywhere at any time, use the steel levee that cannot be washed down by the flood to add luster to the party flag, and let the bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC member trade ministers said they will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhuanet
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The video conference of trade ministers of APEC members was held on the 25th. The meeting pledged to work to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: The joint statement issued after the meeting said that the trade ministers of APEC members recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties undertake to ensure that the emergency measures taken to deal with the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and abide by the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, the trade ministers of APEC members pledged to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain flexibility, and minimize interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in order to deal with the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: The trade ministers of APEC members agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict the trade of necessary goods, and reiterated their commitment to promoting the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that all economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in line with WTO regulations, and pledged to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the necessary commodity flow under the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Azmin Ali, Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating the APEC post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agrees to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings during the informal APEC leaders' meeting at the end of the year.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi Finance urgently issued 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various places-Chinanews.com
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Army Group of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who helped the local flood fighting took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable growing cooperative in Hukou County grab chili peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red chili peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if they were not picked in time.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: Photo by China News Service reporter Futian
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial finance urgently issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood control and rescue work and disaster relief work.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: The floods have caused the province's agricultural and rural direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan and affected an area of 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan of central disaster relief funds respectively.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to the changes of the disaster situation, 20.3 million yuan of provincial disaster relief funds were issued in three batches from the provincial emergency management special funds to support post-disaster relief, recovery and reconstruction in various places.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: The relevant person in charge of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks, and to provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high and slow retreat.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: Jiangxi Provincial Defense Index lowered the flood control emergency response to level II at 18: 00 on the 24th, and adjusted the provincial disaster relief emergency response level from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning-Economic Observation Network
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health and Health Commission, from 0: 00 to 24: 00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 cases in Guangdong, 1 case in Tianjin, 1 case in Fujian and 1 case in Shandong) and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang and 13 cases in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; 2 new suspected cases, all imported cases (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 case in Shanghai).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and the number of severe cases increased by 7 compared with the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: A total of 2045 cases were confirmed, 1963 cases were cured and discharged, and there were no deaths.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24: 00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 288 confirmed cases (including 18 serious cases), a total of 78,908 cured and discharged cases, a total of 4,634 deaths, a total of 83,830 confirmed cases and 3 suspected cases.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been tracked, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: Thirty-one provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 cases were confirmed on the same day (no imported from abroad); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 imported from abroad).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: A total of 3009 confirmed cases were reported from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, there were 2505 cases in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases discharged and 18 deaths), 46 cases in the Macao Special Administrative Region (46 cases discharged) and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged and 7 deaths).
ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for the allocation of seats in the House of Representatives
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights organizations and several American cities and counties have filed a lawsuit against the US federal government, saying that the Trump presidential palace's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the US census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: " This will not work, " Sarah Brannon, an executive lawyer for the American Civil Liberties Union, told VOA.
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of people surveyed in the census is difficult to do and " not very reliable. "
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Management Board, said, " The United States Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County. This illegal attempt to scare people away and reduce the number of our immigrant community cannot be allowed to succeed. "
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a " victory " for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: " The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents living legally, " he said.
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The US Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the issue of citizenship in the 2020 census.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit data on undocumented people from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented people from state census figures and determine whether each state increases, decreases or maintains seats in the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years according to demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: The new book reveals that Prince Harry thinks his brother is " snobbish and arrogant "
ref: Exposures from New Book: Prince Harry Thinks His Elder Brother “Snobbish and Arrogant”

mt: The British Times and Sunday Times serialized a new book called Finding Freedom, which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife, Megan Markle.
ref: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” have published a new book titled “Finding Freedom” in installments, which describes the psychological journey of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle during their living of the royal life.

mt: But Reuters reported that Harry and Megan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying they had not been interviewed by the author or provided any content.
ref: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they have neither accepted the author's interview nor provided any content.

mt: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Megan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Megan, a former Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

mt: Greenfield Launches a New Round of Shanghai State-owned Assets to Transfer 17.5% Shares-Economic Observation Network-Professional Financial News Website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observer Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenfield Holdings (600606.SH) issued the " Indicative Notice that state-owned shareholders intend to transfer part of the company's shares and resume trading through public solicitation of transferees. "
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The contents of the announcement show that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the ownership structure of Greenfield, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as " Shanghai Real Estate ") and Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as " Shanghai City Investment ") intend to transfer part of the company's shares by agreement through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of Greenfield's total share capital.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the indicative announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investors of Greenfield. According to the announcement and public information, it is estimated that the new strategic investors will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% stake transferred by Greenfield this time.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenfield still has no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change greatly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its inception, Greenfield Holdings has carried out many institutional and mechanism reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the joint-stock system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenfield's current reform plan is similar to that of Gree. In December 2019, high-level capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliance (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the reform, Gree Electric Appliance implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plan and no real controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai City Investment are state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenfield Holdings, said that Greenfield's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned enterprises in the new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully shows the new reform ideas adapted to local conditions and tailored to local conditions. By introducing new excellent strategic shareholders to listed companies, support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including clearing and floating, river patrol, and management of aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishing and became a member of the river patrol team to protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Biological Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, so far, Chongqing has withdrawn 3,403 fishing vessels and 4,643 fishing vessels that have signed withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year tasks, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4,404 people who have retired, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Old-age insurance covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects in the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of survey of sewage outlets into the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification task of " three phosphorus " (referring to phosphate ore, phosphorus chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special action of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification achievements of illegal wharves and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the prohibition and withdrawal of fishing in the Yangtze River basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar jointly organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canadian Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the " legislative reform storm " and the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and biased towards the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There are no obvious signs of capital outflows from the banking system; on the contrary, more than $11 billion has been flowing in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: The total amount of bank deposits has also continued to increase in the past few months. There has been a series of public offering fund-raising activities in the stock market, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communication, free flow of information and capital, and simple and low tax system, make Hong Kong a leading international financial centre.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK $6 billion in the " Anti-epidemic Fund " to create about 30,000 time-bound jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: In order to support the development of fintech, the SAR Government has also launched the " One-thousand Plan " to subsidize local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related business, in order to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian enterprises to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet published an article praising China's anti-epidemic efforts to encourage countries to learn from their experiences-Chinanews.com
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at this stage, without large-scale spread, and has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past ten years, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author said that when SARS broke out in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially the pathogen could not be determined.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world of the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency declared by the state, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation. In May and July, the results of the early trial progress of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are very worthy of reference and learning.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience has proved that on the basis of strong research, there must be strong high-level people who decisively rely on scientific basis to make correct decisions, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, China's National Health Construction Committee sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the COVID-19 virus. Their suggestions provided the basis for the decision of Wuhan on January 23. When experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and quickly implemented it. At the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: Finally, the article emphasizes that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Front desk reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Weisel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: Duisburg prosecutors, the Weiser County Police Department and the Weiser City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at around 14: 40 on the same day, two small planes crashed into a house on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Huiberskamp Street in Weiser County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from Mal City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Weiser County, took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female household in the hit house and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room was only slightly injured and was safely rescued.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the house were not injured in the accident, but their mood has not yet recovered.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene footage reported by the German News Agency showed that smoke billowed from the house in the accident, and the house was severely damaged after firefighters put out the fire.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rhine Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it crashed into a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: Police said that many parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: German criminal police are working with the Duisburg prosecution and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf on the same day that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the judgment of the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's " Good luck " was shortlisted for the Golden Viscount Award-Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Viscount Award.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Dapeng's first realistic film, " Good luck, " was successfully shortlisted for the Golden Viscount Award at this year's Film Festival, and the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Poster side for pictures
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film " Good luck " is Dapeng's first realistic theme work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Viscount Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy film director who returned to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to turn his family into a literary film for the New Year. As a result, he encountered a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members who gathered for the film finished the final party.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, sits in the middle of the picture smoking. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang during the holidays.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes joy and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which also seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in the relationship of this large family.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except that the daughter of " third uncle " Wang Jixiang is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of " Good luck " originated from " a providence. " A series of sudden family changes during filming forced the original filming plan to be changed. Life without a script was finally recorded as a film, but the tension beyond design was released.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this " providence " and how should he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that " Good luck " is full of experiments. The lineup of almost all people and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a film. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. With the end of this family gathering in the film, it evokes a series of thoughts.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

mt: NEWS .GOV.MO: COVID-19 Infection Response Coordination Center Enquiry Hotline Statistics (08H00, July 25 - 08H00, July 26)
ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

mt: From 08H00 on July 25 to 08H00 on July 26, 2020, the enquiry hotline of the COVID-19 Infection Response Coordination Center received a total of 292 telephone enquiries.
ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: 291 enquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:
ref: The 291 enquires about the COVID-19 pandemic were transferred to the representatives of relevant departments for follow-up, as shown below:

mt: 271 cases by the Health Bureau (involving: inquiring about isolation; inquiring about nucleic acid testing; inquiring about two places; health codes; others).
ref: Health Bureau: 271 enquiries (involving: quarantine; nucleic acid testing; two-site licenses; health code; and others. )

ref: Public Security Police Force Headquarters: 17 enquiries (involving: entry-exit measures; entry-exit measures for vehicles with Canton and Macao’s driving licenses; Zhuhai’s hotline for government affairs; and Visa stay period. )

mt: Tourism Bureau 1 case (involving: inquiring about isolated hotels.)
ref: Tourist Administration: 1 enquiry (involving: hotels for quarantine )

ref: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau: 1 enquiry (involving: how Macau students can return to the UK for study. )

ref: Marine and Water Bureau: 1 enquiry (involving: whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare to the Marine and Water Affairs Bureau, and the matters concerning nucleic acid testing. )

mt: Marinichev said that the change in value is affected by the devaluation of the ruble and the epidemic.
ref: Marinichev said that the change in value was influenced by the devaluation of the Rouble and the pandemic, etc.

mt: " Service costs are increasing, " he said.
ref: He said, “The cost of services is increasing.

mt: Because of the epidemic, people are beginning to spend more time on the Internet. "
ref: For reason of the pandemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet. ”

mt: Marinichev does not rule out that Internet prices will rise seriously this year, and believes that operators can provide customers with higher speed and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the price rise.
ref: Marinichev did not rule out a major rise in the annual prices of the Internet, and he thought that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the rise in price.

mt: " Chinese Doctor " plans to pay tribute to the heroes of fighting the epidemic-Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of the heroes of Chinese filmmakers fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), held a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film " Chinese Doctor. "
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Pictures hopes to use " Chinese Doctor " to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Films is organizing the original crew of the film " Captain of China " to prepare the film " Chinese Doctor " under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau. This is a film that reflects the unity of the people of the whole country to fight the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: Focusing on the front line of fighting the epidemic in Wuhan, the film will take Wuhan medical staff and provincial and municipal medical teams as the background. From the perspective of human nature, using unique narrative and highly influential camera language, the panorama will show the touching stories of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice on the front line of fighting the epidemic.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that at the first time on the day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona overcame many difficulties, sent a shooting team deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanged understanding and collected information with hundreds of medical workers face-to-face. At present, it has interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to help Wuhan, the Guangdong Wu Medical Team, as well as the white angels at the forefront of the anti-epidemic front, such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital and Wuhan Central Hospital, and took a large number of precious first-hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film at this symposium: " I am looking forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who have made more appearances, but also interview more medical staff who have worked hard on the front line. They are the majority. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen " Me and My Motherland " and " Captain of China " before and thought it was a good way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: " Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China. "
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: " In addition to being shown in China, it is best to show this film abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with the true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. "
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also deeply recalled the film " People to Middle Age " in the 1980s. " After so many years, what impressed me most about the film after the reform and opening up was " People to Middle Age. " At that time, my doctors and friends abroad all cried. If " Chinese Doctor " could play such a role, it would be great. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if " Chinese Doctor " could resonate with foreign audiences, it would be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control. " I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. "
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, since the primitive society, mankind has overcome thousands of difficulties and risks. Now the modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. " Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to pay attention to the comfort of people's hearts. "
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the " greenhouse effect " -Chinanews.com
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the " greenhouse effect "
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University made significant progress towards " carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method " and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The " greenhouse effect " is a major environmental problem besetting human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the " greenhouse effect. "
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: " Membrane separation method " is a new carbon dioxide capture technology. It separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials. It has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material " breathe deeply " and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation method.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the influence of different solvents on the separation performance of membrane gas through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: Experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the membrane material are more evenly distributed and " more breathable, " effectively improving the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of this kind of membrane material.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: " The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. "
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team of Tianjin University, said: " We hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play an important role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. "
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of COVID-19 infection, which is the youngest person in the country to die of COVID-19.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of COVID-19 infections in the Belgian population was " among the highest " in Europe.
