ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say collection of immigration data through U.S. Census for House seat allocation is unconstitutional
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Civil rights groups and several U.S. cities and counties have sued the U.S. federal government, saying the Trump administration’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. census are unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the distribution of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: "It's not going to work," ACLU executive attorney Sarah Brannon told VOA.
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship status of those taking the census in the census is difficult and "not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years," said Garvey, chairman of the Arlington County Board of Management. "We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County and not allow this illegal attempt to scare away and shrink our immigrant community."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other groups and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: "The allocation of House and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents who are legally resident," he said.
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including a citizenship question on the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Donald Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit census data on the undocumented population so that the administration can exclude those undocumented people from state census numbers and use that to determine whether each state is gaining, losing or maintaining House seats.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes House seats every 10 years based on demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: New book reveals: Prince Harry thinks brother is 'snobbish'

ref: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl. ”

mt: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as "the girl", he felt the arrogance and snobbery in his brother's tone, and he also believed that he no longer needed reminders.
ref: The report said that when Harry heard William described Meghan as “this girl”, he felt the arrogance and snobbishness from his brother's tone, and in addition, he believed that he did not need any others to take care of him and remind him.

mt: Harry and Meghan announced plans in January to live a more independent life and will support themselves.
ref: Harry and Meghan announced this January that they planned to live a more independent life and would earn their own living.

mt: After officially stepping down as senior members of the royal family in March, the two are currently living in Los Angeles with their son Archie to pursue a new career.
ref: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, now they are living with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue new careers.

mt: Harry and Meghan married in May 2018.
ref: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

mt: At the time, the marriage was seen as injecting Hollywood glamour and new-age flavor into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most high-profile celebrity couples in the world today.
ref: At that time, this marriage was regarded as an injection of Hollywood's glamour and flavor of the new times into the British royal family, and the two became one of the contemporary celebrity couples drawing the highest level of attention around the globe.

mt: Zheng Thi Xin, Minister Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, representatives from the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese General Association, representatives of the Vientiane Provincial Government, and Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony was attended by Tay Thi Son, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, and the representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association, etc..

mt: The memorial ceremony for the heroes and martyrs was held in a solemn and solemn atmosphere. Delegates successively offered incense to the heroes and martyrs, in memory of their great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony for Martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and representatives lit incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering the martyrs' great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

mt: Minister Counsellor Zheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the old Vietnamese and Lao people to jointly commemorate the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express their gratitude to the heroes and martyrs who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. It is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall the two countries working side by side to fight the common enemy, strive for national independence, national reunification, jointly build national development and consolidate bilateral relations.
ref: Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Laos to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries, and to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of the two countries; meanwhile, this is a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence and national unity, seek national development, and consolidate their relations together.

mt: Seventy-four years ago, on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.
ref: On January 23, 1946, a day of 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Laos-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically during an attack on the stronghold Phonehe.

mt: The victory of the offensive was a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.
ref: The victory of this attack became a victory of historic significance for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

mt: Ms. Zheng said that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes who sacrificed their lives for the national liberation struggle of the two countries. She also stressed that the younger generations of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the older generations, and make due contributions to the continuous blossoming of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.
ref: Ms. Tay Thi Son stressed that the two peoples will always remember the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the cause of struggle for national liberation of the two countries, and meanwhile, he emphasized that the young generation of the two countries will continue to carry forward the old-timers’ tradition of being brave and strong, and make their due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperous development of the two countries.

mt: Milestone crossing!

mt: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match - ChinaNews.com

mt: Chinanews client, July 26th. In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, the traditional giants of Serie A, Inter Milan, ushered in a milestone battle.
ref: Www.chinanews.com Client, July 26 - In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Inter Milan, a traditional top club of Serie A, ushered in a milestone battle.

mt: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.
ref: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

mt: Inter are the only team that has never missed Serie A since the league was restructured in 1929, and the only team that has never been relegated.
ref: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

mt: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3000th game in the history of the Nerazzurri.
ref: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri.

mt: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa by three goals away.
ref: In this milestone match, Inter Milan won Genoa C.F.C. by three goals away game.

mt: Lukaku scored twice, and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.
ref: In this match, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

mt: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the start, and the storm finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.
ref: The match entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the crazy attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

mt: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku flanked the goal with a header from the middle.
ref: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku made a header from the middle.

mt: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan followed suit. Moses made a cross from the right, and Sanchez flanked and pushed the shot in the middle. Before the end, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long-distance through in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and passed Romero and then pushed the empty goal to score the score at 3:0.
ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3-0 away, surpassed Atalanta in points and moved up to the second place, trailing the leader Juventus by 4 points in the case of one more game, and still retained the hope of winning the title.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: So far, in the 3,000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan have won 1,489 games, drawn 834 games, and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.
ref: So far, Inter Milan has won 1489 of the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, drew 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

mt: During this period, the team scored 5,038 goals and conceded 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.
ref: During the period, Inter Milan scored 5,038 goals and lost 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

mt: The Nerazzurri have won the league 18 times and have never been relegated.
ref: The Nerazzurri have won league titles 18 times and have never been relegated.

mt: Liu Yunlong, an old face of a spy war drama, plays a stuttering actor - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Liu Yunlong, the old face of spy war drama, plays a stuttering leading actor - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starring Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., the large-scale spy drama "Winning Odds" landed on Guangdong Satellite TV's "Dynamic Theater" at 7:30 pm on July 16.
ref: The large-scale spy war drama “Winner”, produced by Liu Yunlong, directed by Yin Fei, and starred by Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, etc., landed in the GRT Satellite Channel’s “Golden Drama” at 7:30 pm on July 16.

mt: The drama tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who was lurking in the Japanese and puppet police stations, and Soviet agents to assassinate the leader of the Japanese agents and smash the shocking conspiracy of the Japanese army.
ref: The play tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), an underground member of the Communist Party of China who lurked in the Japanese puppet police station, who joined Soviet agents to assassinate the Japanese agent leader and smash the terrible conspiracy of the Japanese army.

mt: "Winning Odds" is adapted from historical facts, and the material is taken from the dusty Soviet military archives for many years.
ref: The “Winner” is adapted from historical facts, and its material is taken from Soviet military archives which have been dusty for many years.

mt: During the defense of Moscow, the elites of the Soviet Red Army from the Far East marched westward for assistance. At this time, the "northern faction" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought it had an opportunity and wanted to send troops.
ref: During the Fight for Moscow, the elite of the Far East of the Soviet Red Army rushed westward to help, while the "Northward School" of the Japanese Kwantung Army thought that there was an opportunity to send troops.

mt: In order to relieve the danger of being attacked by the enemy, the CCP and the Soviet Communist intelligence personnel jointly implemented the "Mudan-Ula" plan.
ref: In order to solve the crisis of being attacked from both sides of the abdomen, the intelligence personnel of the CPC and the CPSU jointly implemented the "Mudan Ula" plan.

mt: Based on this historical background, the well-known screenwriter Deng Yuan has been polished several times, making the plot twists and turns.
ref: According to this historical background, Deng Yuan, a well-known screenwriter, has polished this film several times, which makes the plot tortuous and brain-burning.

mt: Liu Yunlong is the producer and actor in "Winning Odds" at the same time.
ref: Liu Yunlong is the producer and the leading actor in the “Winner”.

mt: In the play, he plays Tang Fei, the chief of the criminal department of the Linhe Police Department, a stuttering policeman with a sense of joy and even a little rudeness, and his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In the play, Tang Fei, played by Liu Yunlong, is the criminal section chief of Linhe Police Department; and he is a stuttering policeman who is quite happy and even a little angry, but his real identity is an underground member of the Communist Party of China.

mt: Cai Meng, the heroine who plays the opposite play, is the chief of the Linhe Security Bureau, who is highly appreciated by the Japanese boss Fukuhara, and there is an ambiguous and ambiguous relationship with Tang Fei.
ref: Cai Meng, the heroine who played the opposite play, is the head of Linhe Security Bureau, who is highly appreciated by Japanese boss Fukuhara; and there is a subtle relationship between Cai Meng and Tang Fei, which is both enemy and friend and ambiguous.

mt: Su Qing has tried many different types of roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in "Those Years We Were Young" to Erqing in "Story of Yanxi Palace", all of them left a deep impression on the audience and their acting skills were recognized.
ref: In recent years, Su Qing has tried many different roles, from Lu Ruowen in the “Those Years We Are Young” to Er Qing in the “Story of Yanxi Palace”, all of which impressed the audiences deeply and were recognized by the audiences for her acting skills.

mt: This time Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time. The setting of the stammer sheriff and the charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.
ref: This time, Su Qing and Liu Yunlong are partners for the first time; and the arrangement of stuttering police chief with charming policewoman is quite interesting and innovative.

mt: In addition to the two protagonists, many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi have joined in "Winning Odds". The old drama is also one of the highlights of the play.
ref: In addition to the two protagonists, there are many powerful actors such as Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, and Shen Junyi in the “Winner”, and the old actors are also one of the highlights of this film.

mt: It is understood that the production of "Winning Odds" is also very sophisticated. The crew spanned nearly 2,000 kilometers to shoot scenes in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces.
ref: It is understood that the “Winner” is also very sophisticated in production, and the crew spans nearly 2,000 kilometers in Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces for shooting and framing.

mt: In order to restore the bizarre cityscape during the Japanese colonial period in Northeast China, the art and props team of the production crew worked day and night to carefully polish every detail of the scene construction and props, so that the scenes in the play were exquisite and full of historical texture.
ref: In order to restore the grotesque city features during the Japanese occupation period in Northeast China, the artists and props group of the crew worked day and night, carefully polishing every detail of the scene construction and props, which made the scenes in the play delicate and rich in historical texture.

mt: Greenland starts a new round of mixed-ownership reform, Shanghai state-owned assets intends to transfer 17.5% of shares - Economic Observer - Professional Financial News Website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observer reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "Informative Announcement on State-owned Shareholders' Proposal to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resumption of Trading by Agreement through Public Solicitation of Transferees".
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structure adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") plan to transfer part of the company's shares through public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the reminder announcement date (July 27, 2020); the audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investor of Greenland. According to the information published in the announcement, the new strategic investor needs to pay about 14 billion yuan to take over the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may undergo major changes.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under a purely state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holding and employee stock ownership; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company as a whole.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to that of Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over a 15% stake in Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group stepped back as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric Appliances implemented a modern enterprise management method such as an executive incentive plan and a structure without actual controllers.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new stage of reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: Can Andy Andy Liu Qingyun "dismantle" new sparks? - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "create” a new spark - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: "The Hurt Locker 2" was recently announced to be released on December 24, becoming the first film to be scheduled for the Lunar New Year.

mt: The "Bomb Defenders 2" also makes people look forward to whether this pair of trump cards can create new sparks.

mt: He is still a bomb disposal expert, but he can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role from the preview of the final file: he has a broken leg, wears a prosthesis, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.
ref: It's still the Shock Wave, but we can feel the complexity of Liu Dehua's new role from the preview: he breaks a leg, puts on a prosthetic leg, is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and is directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

mt: What is the relationship between the three, what exactly did Andy Lau did at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of cases he was involved in, and what twists and turns did he go through in the career of the bomb disposal expert? All kinds of mysteries make people curious.
ref: What is the relationship between the three persons, what did Liu Dehua do in Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

mt: It is understood that the main part of the film is the scene of the world's landmark buildings in Hong Kong, coupled with the top special effects production team, bringing shocking and realistic visual impact.
ref: It is understood that the main event of the film is to take pictures of the world landmarks in Hong Kong on the spot, and with the top special effects production team, so it brings shocking and vivid visual impact.

mt: (Reporter Nie Qing)
ref: (Reporter Nie Qing)

mt: China News Service, July 26. According to a comprehensive Russian satellite network report, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - Integrated Sputnik reported that, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: Russian President Vladimir Putin, Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were inspected.
ref: Vladimir Putin, Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, and in this place, 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

mt: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.
ref: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: According to reports, Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and passed by a small boat on the Gulf of Finland next to the ships that will participate in the sea parade, and then reviewed the troops under review at the main ceremonial platform.
ref: It’s reported that Putin celebrated naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, sailed by the naval ships which would appear in the maritime parade on the Gulf of Finland in a small boat, and then reviewed the paraded troops on the main viewing stand.

mt: Putin said that the Russian navy fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the equipment level is constantly improving.
ref: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improved.

mt: "The Russian navy fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic diving cruisers and multipurpose submarines, aircraft such as the latest aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at a military parade on Russian Navy Day.
ref: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade that, "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircrafts and other air vehicles, unique weapons and special equipment. ”

mt: On June 24, local time, Russia held a military parade on Red Square to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.
ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will gain a unique advantage through digitalization and effective defense.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.

mt: According to the report, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt. A total of 46 ships participated, including the "Admiral Kasatonov" frigate, the "Admiral Kulakov" large anti-submarine ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines and so on.
ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, a series of ships are statically displayed beside the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which is the replica of the first Russian battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests are allowed to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The last Sunday in July is Russian Navy Day.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that 4,404 fishermen have been repatriated in the city so far, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com that his grandfather fished in the Longxi River, and he followed his father fishing since he was 11 years old. He rode a boat along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Changshou. Every time he left home for ten and a half months, he depended on fishing to support his family.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into Changzhen, the number of residents in Gaoanchang Town has become more and more serious, and the resulting environmental pollution has become more and more serious.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The scales of the fish that were caught were black, and the inside was also black when cut open."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing is becoming more and more difficult after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including clearing, river patrol, and aquatic resources management and protection.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and changed production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve in Chongqing and the relevant waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on fishing.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of the Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has accumulatively withdrawn 3,403 fishing vessels and signed 4,643 fishing vessels with withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the three-year total tasks, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been repatriated, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Among the 4,404 people who have withdrawn their catch, 4,267 people have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have withdrawn from the catch.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: The endowment insurance coverage covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of the fishermen returning from fishing.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of shoreline utilization projects on the Yangtze River, complete a new round of Yangtze River sewage outfall census and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification work, promote the special campaign for afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the construction of green mines, and strengthen the illegal sand catchment and illegal docks in the Yangtze River area.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 (Xinhua) The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, Xu Zhengyu, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and operates in an orderly manner.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar was stable and favored the strong-side convertibility guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There are no clear signs of outflows from the banking system, instead, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and there has been a flurry of public offerings in the stock market, which has seen an increase in market turnover.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, have made Hong Kong a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and education.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Program" to subsidize local fintech companies, start-ups and other companies with fintech-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, recruit local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian companies to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, international asset and wealth management center and global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet praises China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from experience - China News Service
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, the new crown epidemic has been effectively controlled at this stage, and there has been no large-scale transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past decade, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China much more prepared for the new crown than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The authors say that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially since the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the novel coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data internationally on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state of emergency, such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation. In May and July, the results of the progress of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were announced in The Lancet.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows the importance of investing in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from and learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience proves that, on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decision-making based on scientific evidence decisively, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand its value, and act on it in the best way for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early stage of the outbreak, China's National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for Wuhan's decision to "lock down the city" on January 23; when experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the widespread participation of the community and the masses also brought the epidemic under control quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: The article concludes by emphasizing that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Main station reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, killing three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg prosecutor, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening that at about 14:40 that day, a two-seat small plane crashed into the residence on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from the city of Mull in the Ruhr district of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County and took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female occupant in the house that was hit and two passengers on a small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene of the scene reported by the German Press Agency showed that the house where the accident was involved was once billowed with thick smoke. After the firefighters extinguished the fire, it could be seen that the house was seriously damaged.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: The cause of the plane crash is currently unknown.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: "Rhine Post" quoted police sources as saying that there are clues that the plane may have disintegrated before hitting the residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: Police said several parts of the crashed plane were found in the vicinity of the accident scene.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: The German Criminal Police is working with the Duisburg prosecutor and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf on the same day that the embassy contacted the local police station and the fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's "Lucky Wishes" nominated for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Dapeng's first reality-themed film "Lucky Wishes" was successfully nominated for the Golden Goblet Award at this year's Shanghai Film Festival. At the same time, the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Poster
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film "Lucky Wishes" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and it is also his second association with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells such a story: a comedy director came back to his hometown in the northeast countryside on a whim, hoping to make a movie about how the family celebrates the New Year, but encountered a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for the filming completed the final gathering.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, is sitting in the center of the picture, smoking a cigarette. The background is the black land of Northeast China dressed in silver, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people always hang on New Year's Day.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lanterns symbolizing joy and reunion form a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "third uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundaries between drama and reality, bringing the audience a brand-new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence". During the filming period, a series of sudden family changes forced the original shooting plan to change accordingly. The life without a script was finally recorded as a movie, but it released a tension beyond the design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How did director Dapeng face this "destiny", and how should he continue to meet the various changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Lucky Wishes" is full of experiments. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn the life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the movie. With the end of the family gathering in the movie, a series of thoughts will be aroused.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: The 291 inquiries about the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:
