mt: "Chinese Doctor" filming to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers fighting the epidemic, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and director Liu Weiqiang (left) held a discussion with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical care and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Films is organizing the film "Chinese Doctor" under the arrangement of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, to organize the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film that reflects the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee and the unity of the people across the country to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the front line of Wuhan's anti-epidemic battle. It will take Wuhan medical staff and the medical teams of various provinces and cities as the background of the characters. From the perspective of human nature, it uses a unique narrative and highly impactful lens language to show a panoramic view of the touching stories of the Chinese medical staff who are full of dedication and sacrifice in the anti-epidemic front line.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that as soon as Wuhan was unblocked, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic to communicate face-to-face with hundreds of medical workers and collect information. At present, we have interviewed Academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person from Guangzhou to assist Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to assist Hubei, and Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital and other frontline anti-epidemic angels.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also put forward expectations and hopes for the filming in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope you will not only visit some experts who are more visible, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard on the front line. They are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had seen "Me and My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before, and thought it would be a good way to tell a large-scale story from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from a human point of view: "This film is not only screened in China, but it is also best to be screened abroad. In a way that can be understood by domestic and foreign audiences, it should impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People Reaching Middle Ages" in the 1980s. "After so many years, the film I have had the deepest impression on after the reform and opening up is "People Reaching Middle Ages". At that time, my foreign doctors and friends all cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be very remarkable."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have survived thousands of hardships since the primitive society. Nowadays, modern society has advanced medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical staff and even ordinary people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will no longer be as passive as before. "Next, we should pay attention to two aspects of work. One is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and the other is to focus on comforting people's hearts."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)
ref: (By Wang Jinyue)

mt: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan - News of the First Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's News - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Mao Zedong Bronze Statue, Yan'an Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25th, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, the first Xiangtan Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in the Shaoshan Global Tourism Consulting Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, native products from the old revolutionary base areas, etc., attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.
ref: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: "The Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."
ref: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and discuss the ways of development. ”

mt: According to the relevant person in charge of the executive committee of the first Xiangtan Red Expo, the theme of this Red Expo is "promoting red culture and boosting cultural tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3,000 square meters, and it has set up an atmosphere creation area, a scenic area exhibition and exhibition area and a red cultural tourism online shopping experience area.
ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: Eight provinces and cities including Jiaxing, Zhejiang, Zunyi, Guizhou, Yan'an, Shaanxi, and 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province were invited to participate in the exhibition. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, and red cultural and creative products.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be on display until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: the development of red industry and the development of red cultural industry.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The red industry exhibition area exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable and Xiangdian Power, and the red cultural industry development exhibition area exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including red series books, red series food, and red series cultural and creative products.
ref: The Red Industry Exhibition Area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co., Ltd., and XEMC. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks on display.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition has carefully selected excellent red cultural and creative products in Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are outstanding works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the inheritors of the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Song" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui Painting, focusing on promoting Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with other companies in the exhibition area to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of the preparation technology of a new mixed matrix membrane
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Reporter from this newspaper Shang Rui reported: Recently, Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team has made significant progress in the "capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation method", and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of the membrane material.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem plaguing human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of using the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovative ideas, and through repeated experiments, explores the influence of different solvents on the membrane gas separation performance.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the theoretical separation upper limit of the current type of membrane material.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of Tianjin University's atmospheric environment and bioenergy team, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas in coal-fired power plants and chemical companies in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: Establishing a special committee for the first time and collectively signing a "long-term contract" The third China International Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance builds a "China Import and Export Fair" - Xinhuanet
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third China International Import Expo was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitor Alliance of the Third China International Import Expo established a professional committee here for the first time. The first batch of committees included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum of participation, and the role of the alliance of exhibitors in the Expo has been continuously strengthened.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the Exhibitor Alliance of the 3rd China International Import Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member enterprises of the exhibition alliance, including Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, signed a three-year long-term cooperation memorandum of cooperation.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The inauguration ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest charter, Zhanmeng will introduce a rotation mechanism for the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will make recommendations for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, the whole industry chain resources of the industry will be integrated, large and small, and related enterprises will be driven to participate in the exhibition, and the Expo will become a gathering place for industry enterprises.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a special committee for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the third China International Import Expo, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostic business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third China International Import Expo has set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to communicate and cooperate, to connect exhibitors with information and resource sharing platforms, and to provide a think tank for promoting economic and trade exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the exhibitor alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies from coronavirus - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection, the youngest person in the country to die from the new crown virus.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Carter said that the girl had other serious illnesses before she contracted the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old young man recently died from the new coronavirus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Katri said that 85 percent of new cases of coronavirus in Belgium last week were under the age of 60.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded healthy, younger people not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "While it is rare for young people to die from COVID-19, no one is immune now."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crown in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from the new crown virus infection, up from the previous week's daily average of 1.7.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was "the highest" in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of over 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Carter warned earlier this week that people must act before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually create an "avalanche".
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Vermes announced on the 23rd that the relevant rules for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media campaign "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts - Today's News - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client July 25th (our reporter) On July 25th, the large-scale financial media action "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems slowly drove to the scene under the watch of the guests.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centenary goal. 2020 is also a decisive year in the fight against poverty."
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure for the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station to do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation in order to cooperate with this major theme.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go to poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities across the country, excavate vivid stories of poverty alleviation, directly address the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages, and show how villagers have broken through the difficulties of survival and development and walked towards the road to prosperity.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: The operation will last for more than 3 months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter set off from Xuzhou and divided his troops into two routes. One route took the southwest route, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route took the northwest route, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In the form of reporting, "Walking Village Live Watching Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrated.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel of the Central Radio and Television General Station, the Voice of Economics of the Central Broadcasting Corporation, China Communications Broadcasting, and the new media of CCTV Finance and Economics.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the TV live broadcast will be mainly completed on CCTV Finance Channel's noon news program "World Finance" (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), CCTV Finance Channel's prime news column "Economic Information Network" will set up a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live broadcasts for up to one hour on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits. Viewers can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" made a breakthrough and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcast system, and uses 5G 4K/8K AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide and 3.98 meters high. The box body adopts hydraulic automatic expansion structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees at most.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The studio area can also be automatically expanded, and an external expansion platform is connected, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Zhang Jikelin Xiaozhai team up to support muscular teenagers-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai team up support muscular teenagers - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Sports youth hot-blooded competition show "Sports Boys" officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV on July 11.
ref: On July 11, the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, a hot-blooded sports show for sports teenagers, officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV.

mt: Sports leader Zhang Jike and sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai cross-border on the same stage. Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on their own styles, and the hard core of the "monster"-like power pulling device made the show more "burning".
ref: Zhang Jike, the sports leader, and Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, crossed the industry on the same stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on each other’s styles, and the the “monster”-like power pulling device came on the stage with difficulty, which made the program very "burning".

mt: In the first episode, 11 young athletic teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance was amazing to the audience. At the same time, the "strong conflict", "strong confrontation" and "strong heart" on the arena also attracted attention.
ref: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance surprised the audience; at the same time, the “strong conflict”, “strong confrontation” and “strong heart” on the arena also received attention.

mt: Among them, the "strong conflict" comes from Super A sports student Qiao Wenyi. He openly provoke Xu Zhibin, who is known as the "Beautiful Man" on the track before the game. He choked that Xu Zhibin's appearance conditions should be sung and jumped on the show, and even put out the cruel words of "If you lose, don't cry your makeup."
ref: The “strong conflict” comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student; before the competition, he openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as “beautiful boys” in the track, choking that Xu Zhibin should go to the sing and dance program in view of his appearance condition, and even releasing the malicious words of “don’t cry your makeup when you lose”.

mt: The remarks made the teenagers and sports leaders on the field take a breath.
ref: Some remarks made teenagers and sports leaders on the field breathe in a gasp.

mt: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fight between the gods. Sun Jianqi, known as the "big devil", meets the equally powerful Zhang Xindong and staged a strong confrontation.
ref: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight, and Sun Jianqi, who is known as the "Great Devil", and Zhang Xindong, who has the same strength, performs a strong confrontation.

mt: And their identities are unexpected. Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, and Zhang Xindong is a retired special forces member and three-time Warrior Medal winner.
ref: Their identities are unexpected; Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare player and a winner of the Warriors Medal for three times.

mt: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole. The long-lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audience sweat for them.
ref: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audiences sweat for them.

mt: In the tense situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Boy", also watched the game seriously.
ref: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, also watched the game carefully.

mt: In the comment section, he was also very careful, patiently encouraged the teenager who lost the game, and helped every mistake in the process of resuming the game.
ref: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping him to review every mistake in the process.

mt: Sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist. She makes no secret of her appreciation for the youths who are online.
ref: Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, is a fancy assistant, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers who have beauty strength.

mt: When I learned about the daily training of sports teenagers who are overloaded, I admire them even more.
ref: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, she was even more admired.

mt: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also the sports leaders, have their own styles. One is a "prophet" of the calm and relaxed school, and the other is a "preliminary girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.
ref: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles; one is a calm “prophet”, and the other is a “girl with prehistorical power” who dispels tension with a smile.

mt: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.
ref: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: diocese volunteers admit to arson, usually kind and reticent-Chinanews.com
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous religious and historical architectural treasures in Nantes, France, the famous St. Peter and St. Paul Cathedral, were severely damaged in a fire, and the large pipe organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a diocese volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has admitted that he was lighting the fire in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old volunteer from the diocese of Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The person’s lawyer said that the arsonists now regret doing such a thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: This person entered France through the route of asylum a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and taken in in the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police station.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But the church said that he still couldn't believe that this very kind, smiling, but quiet believer would destroy the church he loves so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day the fire broke out on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned and investigated by the police because of a logical problem in the narrative, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows firefighters at the scene rescue.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, as professional engineers from the laboratory of the Central Police Department in Paris obtained new evidence, this person was once again interrogated.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted to his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if the crime of deliberate arson and destruction is convicted, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to reports, the fire caused serious damage to the Cathedral of St. Pierre and St. Paul. The pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunel, the chief architect of the French historical preservation building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane "Hanna" landed in the United States, may trigger river surges and flash floods-Chinanews.com
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26. According to comprehensive foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hannah landed in Texas, USA. It will bring strong storms and rain to Texas, surge in river water, and may also trigger life-threatening flash floods.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said that hurricane "Hanna" is expected to carry heavy rain, sweeping through parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to skyrocket and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: According to reports, the most severely affected by Hurricane Hannah is the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River, and the Rio Grande Valley may have a large-scale flash flood.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbott said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty-two counties in the state entered a disaster emergency due to the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed libraries and museums, and residents are waiting.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that as Texas is hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane can no longer bring more casualties to Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches on the night of the 26th, and 3 to 5 inches of rain will also appear in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean usually does not form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland will withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty for the Prevention of Violence against Women.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty required schools to teach students on gender issues and violated the rights of students’ parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference and said that his Ministry of Justice will ask the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty on Monday.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Giobro said, "The treaty contains some elements that we consider to be harmful."
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw that "the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held up banners that read "Law and Justice Party is a hell for women."
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters report)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to Viet News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Greivoli said that Russia and the Asia-Europe Economic Union believe that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN’s improvement of its status and the promotion of its image to the outside world.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He emphasized, “ASEAN should thank Vietnam for this.”
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivori said that analysts approve of Vietnam's peace initiative.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures on the issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Greivoli believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this cooperation framework.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Greivoli proposed to maximize the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Greivoli also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to actively welcome the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups that have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Bac Giang Province will complete the submission of the Prime Minister’s decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone and approve the addition of the province’s Ansan-Beilong and Anlu industrial-urban-service industry zones to the 2020 Vietnam’s industrial zone development master plan.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Bac Giang Province is striving to accelerate the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in the industrial park clusters of Hephu, Gwangju, Sungai Neihuang, etc., to form a land fund for investment promotion.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Bureau of Industry and Trade will participate in the planning of industrial parks and industrial clusters and provide suggestions and suggestions for inclusion in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Bac Giang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with the protection of national defense, the protection of the ecological environment, and the protection of food safety, thereby boosting the balanced development of industry; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunications, and is integrated with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing, and other social infrastructures such as health care and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province is calling for investment projects in high-tech and clean technology in the fields of electric power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the production and utilization of local labor, especially in the fields of agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang City's logistics center and develop simultaneously with industrial park clusters to optimize the circulation of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese website) In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed new crown cases in Spain has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases in multiple days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government made an interim decision on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list starting at midnight on the 26th local time. People entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists who were on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger when they heard this decision, because the news came unexpectedly and caught them off guard.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps (Grant Shapps) is currently on holiday in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before the United Kingdom issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway would undergo a 10-day quarantine.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon their plans for vacations in Barcelona and surrounding areas ahead.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and social distancing cannot be maintained between people. At one time, the police needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: It's safe here
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the decision made by the United Kingdom, the Spanish Foreign Ministry said on Sunday that the country’s epidemic was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist destinations is much lower than that of the British mainland.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban".
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to greatly affect Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet/Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to the high temperature and heat, opens the rain mode-Xinhuanet.com
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhong Fu".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: In the early morning of the 26th, the strong winds and showers and convective weather dispelled the high temperature and heat that had been shrouded in Beijing for several days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27℃; at night, there were light to moderate rain (with weak lightning) and the lowest temperature at night was 23℃.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: From the 24th to the 25th, the city of Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37℃, and the local high temperature exceeded 40℃.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year. There are "three-volts" throughout the year, and the hottest is in the mid-volt. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the vault, every family fills up the barn. There is a folk saying that "one dumpling and two noodles".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, there will be more rainy weather in Beijing in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The Meteorological Department reminds the public to minimize travel in the mountains and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year’s "Zhong Fu" has 20 days, starting on July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "Zhong Fu", people will feel fatigue and loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: In the diet, you can choose mung beans, barley, and other foods that have the effects of clearing heat and relieving heat, invigorating the spleen and appetizing, as well as bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be online next week, Xue Zhaofeng leads the "Knowledge Promoter"-Xinhuanet
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There is another variety show online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong Online! Hello Teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20th.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth classroom for all ages, and a group of handsome and talented teachers will enter the battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the public minds in the past, "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young intellectual role models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-around "joke players" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining and entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge role models as "knowledge sharing officers" will challenge interesting knowledge classes.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to show the most interesting aspect of their subject through an attitude of knowledge output to impress the audience present.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The "You Dao Questioning Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise ever-changing questions on the spot, making it more difficult to teach the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" and adding a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to reports, the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" includes outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher in the middle school affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examinations, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will present the "hard core" knowledge of various subjects to the audience in an unexpected way.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, and joined the "Dingdong Assistants" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia to talk about youth with the audience and create a "public youth youth class".
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government: The situation is grim and the fight against the epidemic is fully committed-Chinanews.com
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government Zhang Jianzong said on the 26th that the new crown pneumonia epidemic situation in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic worsens, the Special Administrative Region government will decisively adopt more stringent control measures to further restrict business premises and reduce public outing space.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.
