ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that, in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi will conduct a second free nucleic acid test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District, and carry out "checking for omissions" at the same time.
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House epidemic expert Fauci: cautiously optimistic about the development of a vaccine in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He reminded that it is not yet clear how the new crown epidemic will develop in autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be. "The only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21.00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4.176 million and 146,000 have died.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and a response plan based on local conditions is required, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close contact between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: The epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: "Now is not the time to be complacent," Fauci said. "Our work has not been completed. We must intensify our efforts and we must also be vigilant about the uncertainties in the future."
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese American medical expert and founder of the "cocktail therapy" for AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new crown epidemic in the United States has not reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: "Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus."
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He Dayi urged the public to use their own actions to buy time for scientists to speed up the development of new crown treatment drugs and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leaders Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, US Representative Meng Zhaowen, and the founding chairman of the International Leaders Foundation Dong Jiling, etc. spoke at the meeting respectively.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who were fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the "social distancing" and other epidemic prevention guidelines to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: Representatives of U.S.-China Business Talks to meet in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong’s South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous source on the 25th as reporting that China’s trade negotiating team leader, Vice Premier Liu He, and US team co-leader and trade representative Lai Haizhe are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first phase of the Sino-US trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has substantially increased its purchases of American agricultural products in the past few months, due to factors such as the new crown virus epidemic, China's purchases are still some distance from the amounts promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say that the recent closure of each other's consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, may undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first phase of the Sino-U.S. trade agreement came into effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the high-level trade framework group formed by the two sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for both parties to assess the progress of the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But this person also said that if the tension between the United States and China leads to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two parties may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. Disputes between the two sides include a series of issues such as the origin of the new crown virus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although US President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of US corn in a single day and has also bought a lot of soybeans, "but this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was reached."
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government consultant also believes that due to poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to take place, and "trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations."
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: However, he revealed that Chinese economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult."
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the US-China Business Council, said that maintaining the momentum of the first phase of the agreement is “more important than ever” and that China has made progress this year in further opening up its financial markets to US companies.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: An analyst at Plenum, an independent research company, said: "It is better to talk than nothing, although it may only be regarded as a routine matter."
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu'ebao's income declines, "post-90s" but "retaliatory" to save money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the decline in Yu'e Bao's income, the "post-90s" not only did not escape from Yu'e Bao, but began to "retaliate" to save money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: The "Yuebao Post-90s Post-90s Savings Report" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, post-90s are more likely to save money: the amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: What's interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from a small amount of money, and 60% of the savings are less than 20 yuan per transaction...…
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu'e Bao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Data shows that among the 700 million Yu'ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s."
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of every 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu'e Bao to save money.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of currency funds such as Yu'ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money for the "post-90s".
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: In the context of the enhancement of Yu'e Bao's “saving money effect”, many young people who are accustomed to using Yu'e Bao have directly transformed into “basic people”.
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: According to data from Alipay, as of July 13, the number of new "basic people" on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved "advanced" financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu'e Bao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls tend to save more, on average 20% higher than boys. Among users who hold funds on the Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose more stable financial management methods than men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what plans does the "post-90s" have?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal to save money.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many “post-90s” save money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the resumption of movie theaters also provides a new way to switch from saving money to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, under the influence of continuous rainfall in southern China, the situation of flood prevention and flood fighting is very severe, causing 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei to be affected.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster situation is the command, and the disaster area is the battlefield. In front of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people’s children resolutely implemented the spirit of General Secretary Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, quickly joined the front line of flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief, and became the backbone of the people in the disaster area and a new force in the fight against floods.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call of duty.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a banner.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have shown a high degree of loyalty to the party. They obeyed the call of the Party Central Committee to build an unbreakable steel fortress with the action of "see me", the pace of "follow me", and the courage of "I go first."
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag flutters high on the flood-fighting embankment, which is a stronghold of position and a clarion call for charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of floods, party organizations at all levels acted swiftly, sounded the "Charge" to fight floods, and planted bright party flags on the flood-fighting embankment. The majority of party members and cadres and people's soldiers stood firmly on the flood-fighting positions, using the will and actions of "the party flag is in the position" and "the flood never retreats and never retreat" has become the most assured and trustworthy solid barrier for the masses in the disaster-stricken areas.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The bright party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, the true qualities of party members are manifested. When the lives and property of the people are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, the people’s children’s shelters, take care of everyone, selflessly dedication, dare to take responsibility, and win the hard battle of flood prevention and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground for comprehensive inspection of ability, style and quality. It is this kind of selfless dedication and determination of the masses to win the disaster prevention and the spirit of fighting disasters.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: "The people are supreme, life is supreme" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood-fighting levee, the broad masses of party members and cadres and the people’s children and soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, struggling figures, and voices of encouragement at any time and anywhere, and use the steel dams that cannot be washed by floods to add luster to the party flag, and let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting levee!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC member trade ministers meeting said it will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) A video conference of APEC members' trade ministers was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC informal leaders' meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: The joint statement issued after the meeting stated that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to promote economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties promise to ensure that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, and will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, while complying with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers promised to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection through strengthening the flexibility of the supply chain, and minimize the interference in the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: APEC member trade ministers agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers restricting the trade of necessary commodities, and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to prevent the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that the economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in compliance with WTO regulations, and pledged to take actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion to promote the flow of necessary commodities during the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: The Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, Azmin Ali, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for APEC cooperation after 2020 is proceeding in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings in the form of video, but it does not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the end of the APEC informal meeting of leaders.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi Finance urgently releases 280 million yuan of funds to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions-chinanews
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who rushed to help the local flood fight took advantage of the standby gap to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County to grab peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted by the cooperative were severely affected, and the losses would increase if they were not picked in time.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: Photo by China News Agency reporter Tomita
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the province’s fiscal emergency issued 280 million yuan of central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood prevention and relief work for the victims.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: The flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan in agriculture and rural areas in the province, and the affected area is 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: On July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi Provincial Finance successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan for the central disaster relief fund.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the provincial emergency management special funds, the provincial disaster relief funds of 20.3 million yuan were issued in three consecutive batches to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide financial support for flood fighting and rescue work.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China's largest freshwater lake, is slowly receding from a high level.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: At 18:00 on the 24th, the Jiangxi Provincial Defense Command lowered the flood control emergency response to level II; the provincial disaster relief emergency response level was adjusted from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning-Economic Observer Network
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health Commission, 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases from 0-24 on July 25, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths (1 new case, 1 imported case in Inner Mongolia, 1 new case, 1 imported from Shanghai).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, and 673 close contacts were released from medical observation. There were 7 more severe cases than the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: A total of 2045 confirmed cases, a total of 1963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there are currently 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), a total of 78,908 cured and discharged cases, a total of 4,634 deaths, a total of 83,830 confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 imported from abroad); 17 confirmed cases (no imported from abroad) on the same day; 10 cases of medical observation were released on the same day (7 imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 imported from abroad).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: A total of 3009 confirmed cases have been notified from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, there were 2505 cases in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1455 cases discharged, 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau Special Administrative Region (46 discharged cases), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 discharged cases and 7 death cases).
ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights organizations and several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the Trump Presidential Palace’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the distribution of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "This will not work."
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship of the census in the census is difficult and "not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we must not allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and shrink the number of our immigrant communities."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and electoral college seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number of residents living legally."
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing the Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population collected by the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the census figures of the states and determine whether each state will increase, decrease, or maintain seats in the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives every 10 years based on demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: New book broke the news: Prince Harry thinks his brother is "snobbish and arrogant"
ref: Exposures from New Book: Prince Harry Thinks His Elder Brother “Snobbish and Arrogant”

mt: The British "Times" and "Sunday Times" serialized a new book titled "Finding Freedom", which depicts the royal life of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.
ref: The British “Times” and “Sunday Times” have published a new book titled “Finding Freedom” in installments, which describes the psychological journey of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle during their living of the royal life.

mt: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan had disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they had not accepted the author's interview or provided any content.
ref: However, Reuters reported that Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, saying that they have neither accepted the author's interview nor provided any content.

mt: The Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted sources as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.
ref: Sunday Times reported that the new book quoted an informant as saying that when Harry and Meghan were dating before marriage, Prince William wanted to confirm whether Meghan, who was originally a Hollywood actress, had ulterior motives for Harry.

mt: According to a source, William said to Harry at the time: "Don't feel the need to rush (marry Megan).
ref: According to an informant, William said to Harry at the time: “Don't feel you need to rush (in marrying Megan).

mt: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl."
ref: You can spend as much time as possible to get to know this girl. ”

mt: The report said that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as "this girl", he felt arrogant and snobbish in his brother's tone, and he also thought that he no longer needed others to take care of him.
ref: The report said that when Harry heard William described Meghan as “this girl”, he felt the arrogance and snobbishness from his brother's tone, and in addition, he believed that he did not need any others to take care of him and remind him.

mt: Harry and Meghan announced in January this year that they plan to live a more independent life and will support themselves.
ref: Harry and Meghan announced this January that they planned to live a more independent life and would earn their own living.

mt: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, they now live with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue a new career.
ref: After the two officially removed their status as high-ranking members of the royal family in March, now they are living with their son Archie in Los Angeles to pursue new careers.

mt: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.
ref: Harry and Meghan got married in May 2018.

mt: At that time, the marriage was regarded as injecting the glamour of Hollywood and the new era into the British royal family, and the two became one of the most watched celebrity couples in the world.
ref: At that time, this marriage was regarded as an injection of Hollywood's glamour and flavor of the new times into the British royal family, and the two became one of the contemporary celebrity couples drawing the highest level of attention around the globe.

mt: The Minister Counselor of the Embassy of Vietnam in Laos, Zheng Shixin, representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Association, representatives of the Vientiane Provincial Government, and the Lao Veterans Association attended the memorial ceremony.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony was attended by Tay Thi Son, Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, and the representatives of the Vietnamese Buddhist Association in Laos, the General Association of Vietnamese in Laos, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association, etc..

mt: The memorial ceremony for the heroes was held in a solemn and solemn atmosphere. Representatives successively offered incense to the heroes and cherished the great achievements of the heroes and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.
ref: The Memorial Ceremony for Martyrs was held in a solemn atmosphere, and representatives lit incense to the martyrs one after another, remembering the martyrs' great achievements and the special solidarity between Vietnam and Laos.

mt: Minister Counselor Cheng Thi Xin said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Lao Vietnamese and Lao people to cherish the memory of the revolutionary heroes of the two countries and express gratitude to the heroes who sacrificed for the independence and freedom of the two countries. It is also a good opportunity for the two peoples to look back on the two countries working together to fight against common enemies, strive for national independence, national unity, and jointly build national development and consolidate relations between the two countries.
ref: Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Laos to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries, and to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of the two countries; meanwhile, this is a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence and national unity, seek national development, and consolidate their relations together.

mt: On January 23, 1946, 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnam Fighting Alliance died heroically when attacking the Phonehe stronghold.
ref: On January 23, 1946, a day of 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the Laos-Vietnam Combat Alliance died heroically during an attack on the stronghold Phonehe.

mt: The victory of this offensive became a historic victory for the two countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.
ref: The victory of this attack became a victory of historic significance for both countries in the early stage of the revolutionary struggle for national liberation.

mt: Ms. Cheng Shixin emphasized that the people of the two countries will always remember the heroes who sacrificed for the national liberation struggle of the two countries. At the same time, the young area of the two countries will continue to carry forward the heroic and strong traditions of the older generations, and make due contributions to the continuous blossoming and fruiting of Vietnam-Laos relations and the prosperity and development of the two countries.
ref: Ms. Tay Thi Son stressed that the two peoples will always remember the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the cause of struggle for national liberation of the two countries, and meanwhile, he emphasized that the young generation of the two countries will continue to carry forward the old-timers’ tradition of being brave and strong, and make their due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperous development of the two countries.

mt: A milestone leap!
ref: Milestone Leap!

mt: Inter Milan unlocks 3000th Serie A match
ref: Inter Milan unlocks the 3000th Serie A match - www.chinanews.com

mt: Chinanews client, July 26th. In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, the traditional Serie A giant Inter Milan ushered in a milestone battle.
ref: Www.chinanews.com Client, July 26 - In the early morning of the 26th Beijing time, Inter Milan, a traditional top club of Serie A, ushered in a milestone battle.

mt: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.
ref: According to Italian media statistics, the away game against Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th Serie A game in the history of Inter Milan, and the Nerazzurri is also the first team to unlock this milestone.

mt: Since the league reform in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never missed Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.
ref: Since the league was reformed in 1929, Inter Milan is the only team that has never been absent from Serie A and the only team that has never been relegated.

mt: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa is the 3,000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri team.
ref: According to Italian media reports, the match between Inter Milan and Genoa C.F.C. is the 3000th match in the history of the Nerazzurri.

mt: In this milestone battle, Inter Milan defeated Genoa with three goals away.
ref: In this milestone match, Inter Milan won Genoa C.F.C. by three goals away game.

mt: In this campaign, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.
ref: In this match, Lukaku scored twice and Sanchez, who came off the bench, also contributed a goal.

mt: The game entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the storm finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.
ref: The match entered the rhythm of Inter Milan from the beginning, and the crazy attack finally turned into a goal in the 34th minute.

mt: Biraji made a pass from the left, Lukaku outflanked the header and scored the goal.
ref: Biraghi made a cross from the left, and Lukaku made a header from the middle.

mt: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same. Moses made a cross from the right and Sanchez succeeded in an outflanking push. Before the end, Lukaku scored twice, and Brozovic sent a long-distance straight pass in the counterattack. Lukaku broke into the penalty area and passed Romero before pushing an empty goal to score the score, setting the score at 3:0.
ref: In the 82nd minute, Inter Milan did the same thing; Moses made a breakthrough on the right and made a pass, Sanchez's middle road was successful, and before the final game, Lukaku scored twice; and in the counterattack, Brozović sent a long-distance straight plug, and after Lukaku broke into the restricted area and slipped past Romero, he pushed an empty goal and fixed the score at 3: 0.

mt: Inter Milan defeated Genoa 3-0 in an away game, and the points overtook Atlanta to rise to second place. After more than one game, they fell behind the leader Juventus by 4 points, still retaining the hope of the championship.
ref: Inter Milan defeated Genoa C.F.C. 3-0 away game, and the score surpassed Atalanta B.C. to rise to the second place; and after one more game, it was 4 points behind the leader Juventus, and still kept the hope of winning the championship.

mt: So far, in the 3000 Serie A games spanning nearly 90 years, Inter Milan has won 1,489 of them, tied 834 games, and lost 677 games, with a winning percentage of 49.6%.
ref: So far, Inter Milan has won 1489 of the 3000 Serie A matches spanning nearly 90 years, drew 834 games and lost 677 games, with a winning rate of 49.6%.

mt: During the period, the team scored a total of 5,038 goals and lost 3,102 goals, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

mt: Greenland launches a new round of mixed-use reform, Shanghai State-owned Assets Planning to Transfer 17.5% of the Shares-Economic Observer Network-Professional Financial News Website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observer Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued the "Reminder Announcement on the Transfer of Part of the Company's Shares and the Resumption of Trading through Public Solicitation of Transferees by State-owned Shareholders."
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: The content of the announcement shows that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") intend to transfer part of the company's shares through public solicitation of transferees, and the total shareholding ratio to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the informative announcement date (July 27, 2020); the company’s audited net asset value per share in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, the new strategic investor in Greenland is still inconclusive. According to the estimation of the public announcement, the new strategic investor will need to pay about 14 billion yuan to acquire the 17.5% of the equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of the share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may undergo major changes.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under the purely state-owned system in accordance with market rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the state-owned holding and employee-owned shareholding system; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland’s current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented modern corporate management methods such as executive incentive plans and no actual control structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly-owned by the Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, Chairman and President of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned and state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned and state-owned enterprises in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, 53, said that his grandfathers had been fishing in Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he has been fishing with his father, shaking his boat, and traveling along Longxi River, up to Liangping in Chongqing, and down to longevity. Every time he leaves home, he spends ten and a half months on fishing to support his family.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, with the gradual influx of rural population into the township, there are more and more residents in Gaoanchang Town, which causes more and more serious environmental pollution.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River became a stinking ditch.

mt: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open."

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing has become more and more difficult after river water pollution.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including cleaning up the river, patrolling the river, and managing and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen's catch and switched to production, and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.

mt: Starting from January 1, 2020, Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban on catching.

mt: According to data from the Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has retired 3,403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing retreat agreements have been signed, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, speed up the cleanup and rectification of the Yangtze River's shoreline utilization projects, complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the “three phosphorus” (referring to phosphate mines, phosphorous chemicals and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower cleanup and rectification work, promote the special actions of afforestation on both sides of the Yangtze River, and strengthen the construction of illegal fishing and greening of the Yangtze River.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25. Xu Zhengyu, Director of the Financial Affairs and Treasury Bureau of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and orderly.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is experiencing difficult conditions due to the "Regulation Amendment Disturbance" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the strong exchange guarantee level.

ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu is optimistic about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.

mt: "The Lancet" published an article praising China's efforts to fight the epidemic, encouraging countries to learn from experience-chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage, and there has been no large-scale spread, and the domestic epidemic has been controlled to a large extent.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past ten years, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparations for the new crown much better than that of the severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author stated that when the SARS outbreak broke out in 2002, China was underprepared at first, especially the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus and warned the world about the threat of the new crown virus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. When the country declares a state of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research is carried out very quickly and strictly. In May and July, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed by China were announced in the "Lancet" respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China’s experience shows that it is very important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for the country to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are very worth learning.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China’s experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level decisive and scientific basis to make correct decisions, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: At the beginning of the outbreak, the National Health and Construction Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new crown virus. Their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to “close the city” in Wuhan on January 23. When experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly. At the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: At the end of the article, it is emphasized that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Headquarters reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The accident resulted in three deaths.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: Duisburg prosecutors, Wesel County Police Department and Wesel City Fire Department issued a joint statement that evening, saying that at about 14:40 that day, a two small plane crashed into a home on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wesel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from Mar City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, and took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The deceased may be a female resident in the crashed house and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not yet recovered.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene screen reported by Deutsche News Agency showed that the house that was involved in the accident had billowing smoke. After the firefighters extinguished the fire, the house was seriously damaged.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is still unclear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The "Rhine Post" quoted the police as reporting that there are clues that the plane may have disintegrated before it hit a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: The police said that several parts of the crashed plane were found near the scene of the accident.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: The German Interpol is working with the Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that the consulate had contacted the local police and fire departments. According to the judgment on the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's "Auspicious Ruyi" shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Award-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com
