mt: The film "Auspicious Ruyi" is director Dapeng's first realistic work, and it is also his second bond with the Golden Goblet Award.

mt: The film tells the story: a comedy director came back to his hometown in the northeastern rural area on a whim, hoping to make a literary and artistic film for the family during the New Year, but he encountered a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for making the movie completed the final gathering.

ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lanterns, which symbolize joy and reunion, form a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the "three uncle" Wang Jixiang's daughter, which is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The film's experimental audio-visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audience a new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence". A series of sudden family changes during filming forced the original filming plan to be changed. The life without script was eventually recorded as a movie, but it released tension beyond design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How exactly does the director Dapeng face this "province" and how should he continue to embrace the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Auspicious Ruyi" is full of experimentation. The almost amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turn life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find themselves and their family members from the family shown in the film. As the family gathering in the film ends, a series of thoughts are aroused.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" shoots to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers’ heroes fighting the epidemic, Bona Pictures Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) had a discussion with Academician Zhong Nanshan on the production of the anti-epidemic film "Chinese Doctor" in Guangzhou.
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Pictures hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be screened nationwide as a tribute film celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Pictures is under the arrangements of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau, organizing the original crew of the film "Captain of China" to make the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film that reflects the unity of the people across the country to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: The film focuses on the frontline of Wuhan's anti-epidemic. It will take Wuhan medical staff and the medical teams of various provinces and cities as the character background. From the perspective of human nature, using unique narratives and highly impactful lens language, it will panoramically show the touching stories of Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice in the anti-epidemic frontline.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that on the first day of Wuhan’s unblocking, Bona Company overcame numerous difficulties and dispatched a photography team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, face-to-face exchanges with hundreds of medical workers, and collect information. So far, it has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to aid Wuhan, the Guangdong aid to Hubei medical team, as well as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnanyi Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: "I look forward to it. I hope that you will not only visit some of the more publicity experts, but also interview more medical staff who are working hard on the front line. They are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had watched "My Motherland and Me" and "Captain of China" before and thought that the way to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people is very good.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the dissemination of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people in foreign countries like to label the virus as politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of human nature: "In addition to being shown in China, the film should also be shown abroad. It must be understood by domestic and foreign audiences and impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "Man to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, I am most impressed with the movie "Man to Middle Age" after the reform and opening up. At that time, my doctor friends abroad were crying. If "Chinese Doctor" could play such a role, it would be great."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, humans have survived all kinds of dangers since primitive society. Nowadays, modern society has advanced medical technology and social management measures. Coupled with the basic understanding of scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic by medical staff and even the common people all over the world, people will no longer be as passive as before. “Next, we must pay attention to two aspects of work, one is to study how the world can strengthen cooperation with people’s souls.”
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be on until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Fair, the Xiangtan exhibition area is full of highlights.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan Exhibition is divided into two parts, the red industry and the development of the red cultural industry.

mt: The red industrial area exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiangdian Power. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by the exhibited handicrafts of cloth pile flowers and paper-cut art.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products are the 2019 national red cultural and creative products.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting inheritors to focus on the promotion of Yan'an folk custom products, and take this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition area units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"-Chinanews
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps crack the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: News from our newspaper reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team made significant progress on the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide" and successfully developed a new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improved the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Related results have been published as the cover article of the international journal "Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology".
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental issue that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit responsible for the "greenhouse effect".
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of attention of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to let the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck difficulty in the use of membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and through repeated experiments, explored the influence of different solvents on the performance of membrane gas separation.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that using N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material are more evenly distributed and "more air-permeable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology has a carbon dioxide separation performance close to the current theoretical separation upper limit of this type of membrane material.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "The new technology provides new ideas for the capture of carbon dioxide by membrane separation."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Team of Tianjin University, said: "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the future coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to deal with flue gas, and play a major role in the control of greenhouse gas emissions and other fields."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: Established a special committee for the first time and collectively signed a "long agreement" The third CIIE exhibitors alliance to build a "CIIE link"-Xinhuanet
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance, which was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance established a professional committee here for the first time. The first special committees established include the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Committee. 35 member companies have also signed a 3-year long-term participation memorandum. The role of the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd CIIE Exhibitors Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of exhibition alliance member companies such as Hyundai Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum. The revised and improved Articles of the Exhibition were also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest charter, Zhanmeng will introduce a rotation mechanism for the lead unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The special committee will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trends and promote the sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, it will integrate the resources of the entire industry chain to drive related companies to participate in the exhibition, and build the CIIE into a gathering place for industry companies.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of a public health and epidemic prevention committee for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the 3rd CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott’s rapid diagnostics business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The inauguration ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee was filmed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third CIIE set up a special area for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the CIIE Exhibitor Alliance was established voluntarily by exhibitors. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors' exchange and cooperation, a platform for sharing information and resources between exhibitors, and a think-tank platform for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) around the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies from new coronavirus infection-Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: The Belgian health department said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl died of a new crown virus infection and was the youngest patient in the country to die from the new crown virus.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Belgian health department spokesperson Budwin Catri said that the girl had already had other serious diseases before contracting the new crown virus; in addition to this girl, another 18-year-old recently died of the new crown virus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Catery said that 85% of newly diagnosed new crowns in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded people who are healthy and younger not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "Although it is rare for young people to die from the new coronavirus infection, no one is now immune."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, the number of new confirmed cases of new crowns in Belgium increased by 89% compared with the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from new crown virus infections, which was higher than the daily average of 1.7 people in the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of people infected with the new crown virus in the Belgian population was “ranked among the best” in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new crown virus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Carter warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowballs get bigger and bigger and eventually cause an "avalanche."
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: In order to curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmes announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations on people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the plan for further lifting of restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) 【Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature】
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: The large-scale integrated media operation "Live Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" starts-today's news-hunan daily net-huasheng online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale media integration campaign "Live Village Live Watching Poverty Alleviation" sponsored by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems were watched by the guests and slowly drove into the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that “2020 is a year of milestone significance. We will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects and achieve the first centennial goal. 2020 is also a year of resolute victory in poverty alleviation”.
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center of China Central Radio and Television to cooperate with this major theme and promote poverty alleviation.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: This action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities across the country, dig out live poverty alleviation stories, directly hit the huge changes in the appearance of the village, and show how the villagers can break through the plight of survival and development and become rich.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: This operation will last more than three months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter departed from Xuzhou and divided the troops into two routes, all the way to the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other way to the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, the travel distance exceeded 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of report form, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrated.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravan will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed in the noon news program "Tianxia Finance" of the CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), and the prime news section of the CCTV Finance Channel "Economic Information Network" will open a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a 1-hour live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client for every village it visits. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make breakthroughs and pioneered the "Outfield New Media Caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G 4K/8K AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: Equipped with Sanxun studio area, the studio area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box body adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can be turned up by 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The studio area can also be expanded automatically, with an external expansion platform, covering an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

ref: Their identities are unexpected; Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare player and a winner of the Warriors Medal for three times.

mt: At the beginning of the game, the two teenagers tried their best to quickly pull out the small pole, and the enduring confrontation on the big pole made the audience squeeze for them.
ref: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audiences sweat for them.

mt: Under tight conditions, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of "Sports Boys", also watched the game seriously.
ref: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, also watched the game carefully.

mt: In the comment session, he was also very attentive. He patiently encouraged the boy who lost the game and helped every mistake in the replay.
ref: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping him to review every mistake in the process.

mt: While sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai is a fancy assist, she has not concealed her appreciation of the young men who are strong online.
ref: Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, is a fancy assistant, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers who have beauty strength.

mt: It is even more admirable to learn about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers.
ref: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, she was even more admired.

mt: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles. One is the "Prophet" who is calm and calm, and the other is the "Honghuang Girl" who uses a smile to dispel the tension.
ref: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles; one is a calm “prophet”, and the other is a “girl with prehistorical power” who dispels tension with a smile.

mt: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.
ref: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit arson
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26. According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the religious and historical buildings of Nantes, France, and the famous St. Peter and St. Paul Cathedral were severely damaged in a fire, and the organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th local time, the Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer who was in charge of the security work in the cathedral has been prosecuted on charges of "arson destruction".
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He has confessed that he is igniting himself in the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to reports, local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old diocese volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The person's lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing this kind of thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: The man entered France by refuge a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire broke out, and was taken in in the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, he tried to renew his visa and was in dialogue with the police.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But the church said that he still couldn't believe it. This believer who was usually very kind and smiling, but didn't talk much would destroy the church he loved so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had been questioned by the police for investigation because of illogical problems in the narrative, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: The picture shows the firefighters rescue at the scene.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, because the professional engineer of the Paris Central Police Laboratory obtained new evidence, this person was summoned again.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if the charge of deliberate arson damage is established, the suspect may face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to reports, the fire caused severe damage to the Basilica of St. Pierre and St. Paul, the pipe organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the pipe organ were also severely damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brune, the chief architect of the French historical protection building, believes that it is conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral will take at least 3 years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane "Hannah" landed in Texas, may cause river surges and flash floods
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26th. Comprehensive foreign media reports that the hurricane "Hannah" landing in Texas, United States at 5 pm local time on the 25th will bring strong storms and storms to the Texas River, and may cause life-threatening flash floods.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said that Hurricane Hannah is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas. The rain may cause some rivers to surge and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: According to reports, the most severely affected by Hurricane Hannah is the area south of the city of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Grand River, and a large-scale flash flood may occur in the Rio Grande Valley.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Texas Governor Abbot said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge."
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: There are 32 counties in the state that have entered a disaster emergency due to hurricanes.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: The city of Corpus Christi, with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and residents are waiting in line.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that while Texas is suffering from a new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to cause more casualties in Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will also be 3 to 5 inches of rain in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, "Hannah" was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: In general, the first hurricane in the Atlantic Ocean will not form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland will withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European treaty to prevent violence against women.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: The Polish government cabinet on the right said that the treaty requires schools to teach students about gender issues, trampling the rights of students’ parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Polish Minister of Justice Gibro held a press conference and said that the Ministry of Justice he headed will make a request to the Ministry of Labor and Family on Monday to start withdrawing from the treaty.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Giobolo said, "The treaty contains some elements that we believe are harmful to form."
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling alliance partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: During the successful re-election campaign this month, Polish President Duda made hostility to homosexual rights one of the main issues.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests in Warsaw and some other cities against the withdrawal of the Convention.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protest, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence”.
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held banners that read "The Law and Justice Party is a hell of women."
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: The Law and Justice Party has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland’s previous centrist ruling government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters report)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: According to Vietnam News Agency, Grivori believes that Vietnam has made tremendous contributions to the development of ASEAN in the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also a locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Griveri said that Russia and even the Asia-Europe Economic Union believes that Vietnam has contributed to ASEAN's improvement of its status and its image.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He emphasized that "ASEAN should therefore thank Vietnam."
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivori said that analysts give recognition to the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share experiences with ASEAN countries and propose constructive peace measures to the problems facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of ASEAN, Griveri believes that Vietnam provides support for the cooperative relationship between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia gain benefits under this framework of cooperation.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Asia-Europe Economic Union, including Russia, and Vietnam can enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grivori suggested maximizing the free trade area between the Asia-Europe Economic Union and ASEAN countries to create an economic, safe and stable platform.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Griveri also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now until the end of 2020, Beijiang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in infrastructure, human resources and land, in order to actively welcome foreign capital inflows, especially multinational groups that own value chains and transfer advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Beijiang Province will handle the submission and approval of the Prime Minister’s decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone to add the two industrial-city-services zones of Anshan-Beilong and Anlu in the province to the overall plan for the development of Vietnam’s industrial zone by 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Beijiang Province strives to accelerate the progress of various projects, especially in infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hefu, Gwangju, and Shuangxi-Neihuang, and forms a land fund for investment attraction.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Beijiang Provincial Industry and Trade Bureau will participate in making suggestions on the planning of the designated industrial zones and industrial clusters to be included in the provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Beijiang Province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with the protection of national defense security, protection of the ecological environment, and food security, thereby promoting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive power, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications infrastructure, and is combined with urban construction, trade services, worker housing, and other social infrastructures such as health and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Beijiang Province is striving to appeal for high-tech and clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In industrial park clusters, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production and utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products, food processing and other fields.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Beijiang Province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of Beijiang City's logistics center, and develop it in parallel with industrial park clusters to optimize the flow of goods and currency and help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transport, thereby creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Voice of Deutschland China) Over the past two weeks, Spain’s new crown and confirmed crown cases have rebounded sharply, and thousands of new cases have appeared in many days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government temporarily decided on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists who are on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and even anger at the decision, because the news was unexpected and unexpected.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: According to reports, British Transport Minister Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Before the release of isolation measures in the UK, Norway has also announced that people returning from Spain to Norway will be subject to a 10-day quarantine.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium advise their residents to abandon their vacation plans in Barcelona and the surrounding area.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The beaches in these areas are overcrowded and there is no way to maintain social distance between people. The police once needed to take measures to reduce the number of beach tourists.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: here is safe
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the British decision, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the country's epidemic was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya emphasized to the media: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands from the isolation measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate of these two tourist resorts is much lower than that of the British mainland.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "foot ban".
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The British decision is expected to greatly affect the Spanish tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet/Ren Chen (German News Agency, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of mid-voltage: Beijing will not say goodbye to the high temperature and scorching heat
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26th (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26th is the first day of this year's "middle".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: The strong wind and shower convection in the early morning of the 26th dispelled the high temperature and scorching heat that have enveloped the Beijing area for days. A new round of rain will continue for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory announced at 11:00 on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak lightning) in Beijing on 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27℃; there were light to moderate rain at night (with weak lightning), and the minimum temperature at night was 23℃.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: In the previous 24 to 25 days, the whole city of Beijing was in the high-temperature blue warning. The daily maximum temperature in most areas was around 37℃, and local high temperatures exceeded 40℃.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Futian is the hottest, humid, and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in a year, and the hottest is in the middle. The "bitter summer" that Chinese people say is at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the downfall, every family fills up the barn, and there are folk sayings that "one dumpling makes two dumplings".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to current forecasts, it will be rainy in Beijing in the next three days.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department reminds the public to minimize mountain play and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's "medium" has 20 days, starting from July 26 and ending on August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "medium", people will feel weak and lack of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: In the diet, you can choose foods such as mung beans, barley, etc. that have the effect of clearing heat and relieving heat, strengthening the spleen and appetizing, and bitter foods such as bitter vegetables and bitter gourd, which can help increase appetite and eliminate summer heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: "Dingdong Goes Online! Good Teacher" comes online next week, Xue Zhaofeng leads "Knowledge Promoter-Xinhua Net
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There are new variety shows online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Dingdong is online! Good teacher" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV starting July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, a group of talented and talented teachers will be on the battlefield, challenging the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impressions of teachers in the past in the public's mind, "Ding Dong Goes Online! Good Teacher" gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both value and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only role models of youth knowledge from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "satin hand" who can carry the burden and be good at entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: On the show, this group of outstanding young people's role models as "knowledge sharing officers" will challenge interesting knowledge classrooms.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to impress the audience by outputting knowledge with attitude and showing the most interesting aspect of their subject.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The "Youdao group" composed of audiences of all ages will ask a variety of questions at the scene, which will increase the difficulty of the "knowledge sharing officer" teaching and add a little exciting atmosphere to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to reports, among the "knowledge sharing officers" were outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a master teacher in postgraduate examinations, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience. They will present the "hard core" knowledge of various disciplines to the audience in an unexpected way.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge promoter" of the program, together with "Dingdong Assistant Teachers" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk with the audience about youth and create "Open Youth Class for All."
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: the situation is grim
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26. The Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, Zhang Jianzong, said on the 26th that the situation of the new coronary pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe. If the epidemic situation deteriorates, the SAR government will resolutely take stricter control measures to further restrict the operation of business sites and reduce the space for citizens to go out.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the SAR Government has no intention to introduce a "home order" or "foot restraint order" to restrict citizens from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation and Fighting against Epidemic Diseases" that day.
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said that this outbreak is the most severe in half a year, and it will be critical in the next two weeks, and we must do our best to prevent the virus from spreading further in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR government, self-discipline and cooperation among citizens are also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He urged citizens to stay at home as much as possible to reduce social contact and dining out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: The public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, and pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and washing hands frequently, and should suspend non-essential family and friends gatherings or dinners and reduce to the market.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic and anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing testing capabilities and refitting the Asia World Expo to work similar to "square cabin hospitals".
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the SAR Government has provided free virus detection for specific high-risk groups, namely, elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, involving up to 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about the cases of infections that appear in residential care homes for the elderly. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for the residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
