ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR Government is constructing isolation and quarantine facilities near the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island in the New Territories. It is expected that an additional 700 isolation rooms will be provided by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2,000 isolation rooms in the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center and strive to complete it by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: In addition to the 800 isolation and quarantine centers already in use, the Penny's Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: There are currently four isolation and quarantine centres in operation in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility on the 24th for the treatment of patients under the age of 50 with independent self-care capabilities.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: U.S. launches anti-subsidy investigation against China with “undervalued RMB exchange rate” for the first time
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce’s recent announcement, it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and anti-subsidy investigation on cable ties (string ties) originating in China, and launched an investigation into the “undervalued RMB exchange rate” project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: The Chinese Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has initiated investigations into the so-called “undervalued RMB exchange rate” project in anti-subsidy cases, and China firmly opposes this.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China issued a press release on this evening on the 23rd, stating that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of exchange rates.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasized that, generally speaking, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable equilibrium level and has not been underestimated.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated against the US dollar by more than 17%.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the renminbi's nominal effective exchange rate appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%. It is the strongest currency in the G20 economy and one of the largest appreciations in the world.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that exchange rate issues exceed the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with WTO rules.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States revised its regulations in February this year to conduct an anti-subsidy investigation on the exchange rates of other countries. It has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed in many ways.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: The press release stated that even in accordance with US regulations, the content of the applicant’s complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary elements of anti-subsidies such as financial assistance, grant of benefits and specificity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: China urges the United States to abide by existing international rules and stop countervailing investigations of the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate."
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further increase of tensions in Sino-US relations, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the US dollar depreciated sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan mark of 1 dollar to RMB.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the move by the US Department of Commerce intends to force the RMB to rise is worth watching.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The central parity rate of the RMB against the US dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: The 26th is the day before the fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) issued by Philippine President Duterte. In the same day, the Philippines has accumulatively diagnosed 80,000 new cases of pneumonia. Among them, the number of confirmed diagnoses by the staff of the Presidential Department of Public Information (PCOO) and its direct agencies increased to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not been in contact with the confirmed staff to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Minister Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB Radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for President Duterte's SONA approach.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to plan A, Duterte will announce SONA in the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic situation, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants can pass the quick test on the same day to enter the Congress building.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B was initiated, that is, President Duterte issued SONA at the Maracañang Palace of the Presidential Palace, and fewer hearing seats were arranged on site.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: By convention, SONA will broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanal said that President Duterte's SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the new coronary pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life; it will also mention his commitment when he took office, namely, anti-government corruption, combating illegal drugs and poverty reduction.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered in the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly seeks opinions on promulgating health regulations-Xinhuanet
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian and Bai Yu) Encourage residents to perform physical examinations and find problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish an online game health review system; employers must be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel... The "Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Consultation Draft)" was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "Health Law".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do medical check-ups and find problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic list of health check-up items based on factors such as different ages and occupations.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The cost of health checkups that fall within the scope of the basic list of health checkup items shall be paid by the Social Medical Insurance Co-ordination Fund at the rate of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The draft for solicitation of opinions clearly stated that the employing unit should reasonably allocate human resources, arrange staff rest time, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workload, to avoid excessive loss of human function or physical and mental health damage to employees’ health, and strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and organize regular health examinations for employees.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: With regard to the physical and mental health of minors, the consultation draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and the sales locations of alcoholic beverages are restricted. Any violation of the regulations will be ordered to be corrected by the market supervision and management department and imposed a fine of 30,000 yuan.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to "prohibition", minors also have to "exercise more".
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the request for comments, the school should arrange for students to spend more than one hour in sports activities every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, public security, cultural, radio, television, tourism, sports, online supervision, and health and other departments should improve the health supervision system of Internet access service business sites, establish an online game health review system, and create a good communication space and communication culture for the healthy growth of young people.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the consultation draft also proposed that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical and health institutions should disclose patient privacy fines of 20,000 yuan without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of the residents, the consultation draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should evaluate the impact of public policy implementation on the health of the population before formulating plans, regulatory documents related to urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization, ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, and approval of major construction projects and major public service projects.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Without assessment or after assessment, it will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Kekexili Tibetan antelope enters relocation season-Xinhua
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes who had previously moved to the Zonai Lake area in the hinterland of Kekexili were ending their litters and returning to their original habitats.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: Surveillance footage near the Wudaoliang Protection Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three antelope cubs through the Qinghai-Tibet Highway at 3002 kilometers and the Wudaoliang North Bridge on the Qinghai-Tibet Railway. The Tibetan antelope has begun to move back.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: Experts analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the repatriating flocks accounted for one quarter to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early period of relocation, Tibetan antelope faced a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to the statistics of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelope repatriations is increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelope repatriations was 4,860, an increase of 338 from 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is expected to continue to increase."
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: Tibetan antelope is a national first-level protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from the Three River Sources in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountains in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Kekexili to produce lambs.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher from the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Endangered Animals Research Institute) said: "Tibetan antelope repatriation is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats with their cubs after they give birth. Initially, the repatriation group leaving the littering place is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats according to different geographic populations and along different paths."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe relocation of Tibetan antelope herds, the reporter learned that a few days ago, the Sankeyuan National Park Administration Yangtze River Source Park Cocoa Xili Management Office has arranged staff in the main relocation area to continue to carry out video surveillance and patrol in the jurisdiction.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If it is found that a herd of Tibetan antelopes is trying to cross the road, the mountain patrol team will perform temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the flock to safely pass through the wild animal passage and ensure that it is as little as possible from human interference on the way back.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how to relieve the heat in daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that when you go out in summer, try to avoid the high temperature period. It is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you have to go out during this period, you must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, wearing a sun hat, and wearing sunglasses. It is best to apply sunscreen if possible to prevent sun damage.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Try to use light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, and silk as much as possible, and wear less chemical fiber clothing to avoid heat dissipation and sweating.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: In hot and sultry weather, prepare plenty of water and drink it in time. Don't wait for thirst before drinking. Because once the body feels thirsty, it means that the body is already dehydrated. Each time the water is controlled at 150ml to 200ml. Drink warm water and don't drink ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water per day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When you sweat more, you can add some salt water to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the human body is prone to lack of potassium in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired. Potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a moisture content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish moisture; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people working in high-temperature environments should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the body's metabolism is strong, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22:00 to 23:00, and the best time to get up is from 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: When sleeping, be careful not to lie under the air outlet of the air conditioner and the electric fan, so as not to cause air conditioning disease and fever.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or performing high-temperature operations can carry ten heat-reducing medicines such as ten drops of water, dandan, Huoxiangzhengqi water or Huoxiangzhengqi pills, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate Art Exhibition Moved into the Public Welfare Exhibition of the Mall-Xinhuanet
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the "Cloud Graduation" season of various universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition warmly opened last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it is neither in the art gallery nor on the campus, but appears in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City and is open to the public free of charge until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has collected 50 pieces/groups of works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extends from the second floor to the sixth floor, and fully utilizes the light boxes in the building for the display of flat works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: Under the epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Pingping, person in charge of Chaoyang Joy City Beauty Chen, said: "We have chosen to bring the graduation exhibition to the "cloud" back to the offline space again. We also hope that more people will see the youth's exploration of themselves and their understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and soul."
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works in this exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art colleges, and they were selected for commercial space display. The forms of the works range from traditional easel paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas. The volume and richness are the highest in the years.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in this epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual in the first battle of 2020. Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" through the Ethereum blockchain explores the theme of "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction". Zhang Jiaqi's "cats don't remind you of the day". The artist's works are related to people. The animals that are seen in the world are always accompanied by humans.
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who personally set up exhibitions is Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a bit worried about the epidemic situation. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I brought it with alcohol cotton and a test report."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: The structure of his work "Yesterday Like a Mystery" is relatively complicated, and must be done by oneself.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping his students repair damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: "The exhibition will be held until 4:30 in the morning, and then it will be repaired. The time is very tight. I forgot to take a picture with the work, which is a bit regretful."
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hoped that when the epidemic became more stable, he would come to Beijing with his classmates to see his exhibition.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Reward 50,000 yuan, Hubei Enshi commends the "first warning person" of the sand dam landslide
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City reported that Chen Guangming, a geological disaster site monitor who had made an important contribution to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, gave him a 50,000 yuan bonus.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, the city's party cadres were called on to learn his spirit of fulfilling his duties, daring to act, take the initiative, and be willing to give.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunpu Township, Enshi City, which resulted in the formation of a dammed lake on the main channel of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned of the cracks in the walls of the villagers' home and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home, and he saw the village group road split by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the corn field, about 50 meters in length.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming was alert and sent the photos of the cracked road to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Group" in the township as soon as possible.
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: After checking and judging on site by the relevant person in charge of the Natural Planning Institute of Tunpu Township, the possibility of a landslide is very high, and a decision was made to evacuate the masses.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely warning has won 36 hours of valuable time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people in 315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: There were no casualties in this major geological disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's earnest and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: Faced with praise, he said: "There is no one who saved, this is my responsibility."
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of "female college students lost contact in Qinghai tourism" search and rescue work continues-Xinhua
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin and Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai Province" attracted netizens' attention.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud, Haixi Mongolian-Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Nanjing University student Huang Mou is still in a state of loss of contact.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Security Detachment of the Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Prefecture received a notification from a superior that Huang Moumou, a Nanjing University student, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5th. On July 9th, the mobile phone was shut down and lost contact at the southwestern area of Qingshuihe River, Sonam Dage Protection Station, Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of the Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud at 4 on the 7th.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8:00 on the same day, the missing person Huang Moumou took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel, Golmud City, toward G109 National Road, and arrived at the Cococili Sonan Dajie Protection Station at 12 o'clock. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Mou arrived at the Qingshui River area near the Sonan Dajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th and was shut down in the area until 18:00 on the 9th.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: The Naijigou checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by the Nanqu City of Tibet Autonomous Region in Nanshankou, Golmud City. Since the checkpoint has no video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the identity of the person and the vehicle. The police can only drive the car to search along the way. If the various checkpoints along the Tibet line find Huang Moumou, they will immediately contact the Golmud Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1 a.m. on July 26, the Golmud City Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to the Non-Frozen Spring Protection Station and Sonan Dajie Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search, and actively contacted the Sichuan Police, Tibet Police, and Nanjing Police to work together. The search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that if the netizens and all walks of life in the society have relevant clues, they will promptly provide them to the Golmud police and the Nanjing Jiangning police in an effort to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts reminded tourists to be normative, rational and civilized in outdoor activities, pay attention to roadside warning signs at any time, do not risk entering unmanned areas, and report to the police in case of emergencies.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia hosts parade to celebrate naval festival-Xinhuanet
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, ships lined up to participate in the naval festival celebrations.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Issued by Xinhua News Agency (photo by Mo Jingna)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26th (Reporter Lu Jinbo) The Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the naval festival and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleets held military parades in the seas where their bases were located. A total of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participated.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Putin, the highest commander of the armed forces, attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 soldiers, 46 ships and more than 40 fighters participated in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first reviewed the formation of ships in the waters of the Naval Base in Kronstadt, Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: Afterwards, he took a speedboat to the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg and landed, watching the parade on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin said in a military parade that the modernization of the Russian navy’s equipment has continued to improve in recent years. The Russian navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, the commander-in-chief of Russia’s Navy, Yevmenov, recently said in an interview with the Russian Defense Ministry’s “Red Star News” that Russia’s plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is relatively large in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great embarked on the formation of a maritime fleet, inaugurating the history of the Russian Navy.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The last Sunday of July every year is the Russian Navy Festival.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to new changes in epidemic prevention and control, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have actively participated in epidemic prevention and control in response to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: The cadres, employees, and labor models of trade unions in the north and south of the Tianshan Mountain walked into street communities and residents, carried out activities such as food delivery, medicine delivery, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge. They served the staff and workers, and demonstrated the "hard core power" of the trade unions with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the condolences group of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi sent a group of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff of 12 isolation points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak, the total amount of funds in Tianshan District was more than 1.05 million yuan, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and Chairman of the Trade Union of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering and Construction Co., Ltd., received the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control and volunteered to stay at the unit on duty to protect employees.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities for the employees who lived in the unit dormitory and newly hired employees, and organized the staff to send them the necessary materials for life every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: "From July 21st, the cadres and employees who stick to the front line of "epidemic disease" will be figured out, and the online order will be placed, and the business will be delivered to the door. The 704 first-line workers in the Urumqi area will first supplement the epidemic prevention supplies and daily supplies."
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Union told reporters that in the face of sudden outbreaks, they will do their best to ensure the prevention and control of the outbreak, steadily promote the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere to fight the epidemic together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At the current high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels are paying close attention to the front-line workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending cool" to the ground.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a "send cool" condolences to the frontline employees of epidemic prevention and control. The county's police stations, card points and health systems received condolences such as beverages and fruits.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: "Trade union cadres should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibility, warm people's hearts with care, and encourage fighting spirit with action.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade union organizations in cohesion and unity of employees, to provide service guarantee for epidemic prevention and control, to actively protect the health rights and interests of employees, and to send care to the frontline employees."
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: Relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: The work of direct recruiting officers will start in 2020-Xinhuanet
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently issued a notice to deploy and recruit non-commissioned officers directly from college graduates in 2020.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year's direct recruiting officers cover more than 270 military and general majors in 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery. They focus on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and small languages. The recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2,000 compared with last year.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the work of recruiting non-commissioned officers and the compulsory recruiting were organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and ending on September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: The recruited youths can check the conditions for direct recruits and the distribution of recruited majors through the National Recruitment Network (http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit online registration information that meets the professional scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the land acquisition military service organs.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified young people who cannot be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment of majors and planning restrictions can participate in the conscript of compulsory soldiers. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years they are enrolled in ordinary colleges and universities in accordance with the stipulated educational system is regarded as the service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: This year's recruitment of noncommissioned officers is organized by the provincial or prefecture-level People's Government Recruitment Office. Enrollment majors will be selected on the basis of comprehensive evaluation of the level of enrollment, academic performance during the school period, and obtaining professional qualification certificates. Scarce majors will be targeted for local colleges that meet the professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the requirements for normalized prevention and control of the epidemic situation, direct recruiting officers will not arrange for self-registration in principle this year, and they will be organized into the battalion synchronously with compulsory soldiers.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is calculated from September 1, 2020, and the time for troops to issue orders for non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The army receiving unit will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training programs and carefully organize the training; after the training is completed, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the corresponding professional technical positions according to the principle of professional counterparts and consistent recruitment.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson in the British Embassy: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26. According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom, on the 25th, a spokesperson for the Chinese Embassy in the United Kingdom responded to reporters' questions about the erroneous comments about the cyber attack.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesman emphasized that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has consistently resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: A reporter asked: According to the media, hacker organizations related to China had interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks against British and American technology companies with patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has consistently resolutely opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace has strong virtuality, difficult source tracing, and diverse behaviors. When investigating and qualitative cyber incidents, sufficient evidence should be produced and no unreasonable guesses can be made.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesman said that a series of incidents such as the "Prism Gate" proved that the United States has been conducting the world's largest cyber-theft operation.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but were obtained through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, making it the country with the largest number of international patent applications.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a major country in innovation and intellectual property.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Urumqi free nucleic acid testing has been completed in most areas
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) Urumqi City Health and Health Committee Director Zhang Wei said on the 26th when reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi, that most of the free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi City has been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The expert group of the State Council and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid detection and epidemiological investigations.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to inform Xinjiang of the epidemic situation and its prevention and control.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 0:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new cases of new coronary pneumonia were diagnosed in Urumqi (of which 5 were transferred from asymptomatic infections to confirmed cases), and 38 new cases of asymptomatic infections were added.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, there are 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic patients in Urumqi.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The asymptomatic infections newly added on the 25th were basically detected by free nucleic acid detection and active screening throughout the city.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th that most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi City have been basically completed.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in the country, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid detection, such as the sensitivity of the detection reagents, the infection time and detoxification time of the test personnel, the cooperation of the test person when the sample is taken (the difference in the degree of cooperation may cause the sample not to be in place), the test environment, and the proficiency of the test personnel.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: For various reasons, nucleic acid testing can also produce false negative results.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so-called false negative means that the subject is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed cases and suspected cases, it usually takes two nucleic acid tests to rule out.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if fever and respiratory symptoms occur, a negative nucleic acid test may have a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that in view of the above, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, from today on, Urumqi City will conduct second free nucleic acid tests in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and carry out "check and fill in the gaps".
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House epidemic expert Fuch: cautiously optimistic about the vaccine developed in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Foch made the above remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He reminded that it is still unclear how the new crown epidemic will develop in autumn and winter, and the final impact of the epidemic. "The only way to end this is that each of us chooses to be part of the solution."
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4.176 million, and 146,000 deaths.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fodge said that some areas of the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebound epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation differs from place to place and needs a response plan tailored to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: The epidemic in one area will eventually affect other areas.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: "Now is not a time for complacency," Foch said. "Our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant about the uncertainty of the future."
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new US epidemic has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus."
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He Dayi called on the public to use their actual actions to buy time for scientists to step up the development of new crown treatment drugs and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.
