mt: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization whose purpose is to promote international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to enhancing the status of Americans of Asian-Pacific origin and nurturing young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, U.S. Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, U.S. Rep. Meng Zhaowen and Founding Chairman of the International Leadership Foundation Dong Jiling, etc. spoke at the meeting.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: In particular, they paid tribute to medical workers and volunteers of Asian-Pacific origin who were fighting against the epidemic, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the "social distance" and other epidemic prevention guidelines to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: U.S.-China Trade Talks Representative Meets in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong’s South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous source as saying on the 25th that the head of China’s trade negotiating team, Vice Premier Liu He, and the US team’s co-leader and trade representative Lai Haizhe are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the implementation of the first-phase trade agreement between China and the United States.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has substantially increased the amount of US agricultural products purchased in the past few months, due to factors such as the new coronavirus epidemic, China’s procurement volume is still some distance away from the amount promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts said that the recent closure of each other’s consulates by the United States and China, together with other disputes, may undermine any progress in trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The first-phase trade agreement between China and the United States came into effect one month after it was signed on January 15. The agreement stipulates that the trade framework group composed of high-level parties of the two sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: According to people familiar with the matter, the meeting will be "an important turning point," allowing both parties to evaluate the progress of the agreement.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But this person also said that if tensions between the United States and China lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two parties may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Since the beginning of this year, Sino-US relations have deteriorated rapidly. The disputes between the two sides include a series of issues including the origin of New Coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although US President Trump boasted of his achievements in the first phase of the agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at the White House press conference on the 23rd that although China's recent single-day purchase of US corn has broken records and bought a lot of soybeans, "but this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me as it was when it was originally reached."
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government consultant also believes that due to the poor US-China relations, a new round of trade negotiations is unlikely to proceed, "Trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations."
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: However, he revealed that China's economic and trade related units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult."
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the US-China National Trade Commission, said that maintaining the momentum of the first phase of the agreement was "more important than ever" and pointed out that China has made progress in further opening the financial market to US companies this year.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: Analysts at independent research firm Plenum said: "It is better to talk than not to talk, although it may only be regarded as a routine matter."
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu'ebao's income goes down "post-90s" but saves money "revengely"?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the decline in Yu'ebao's income, not only did the "90s" not escape from Yu'ebao, but began to "revenge" to save money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: The "Yuebao treasure post-90 savings report" (2020 version) recently released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, the "post-90s" love saving more: the amount of savings per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared with 2019.
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, "post-90s" are more inclined to start with a small sum of money, and 60% of the average amount of money saved is below 20 yuan...
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu'ebao has also become a "post-90s" saving habit.
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Statistics show that of the 700 million Yu'ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s" users.
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about three out of every four "post-90s" are using Yubao to save money.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized return rate of currency funds such as Yu'ebao has fallen from a level higher than 2% at the beginning of the year to about 1.5%.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money after the "90s."
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: In the context of the increase in the "saving effect" of Yu'ebao, many young people who are accustomed to using Yu'ebao are directly converted into "basic citizens."
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "base people" on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year, and more and more young people have realized "advanced" financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu'ebao to the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of monetary funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, an average of 20% higher than the amount of money saved by boys; 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose a more stable financial management method than men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what are the plans for "post-90s"?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users use travel as their goal.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the resumption of business in movie theaters also provides a new way for saving money to switch to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let the bright party flags fly high on the flood control embankment
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, southern China has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the situation of flood control and flood control is very severe, causing disasters in 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) in Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster situation is the order, the disaster area is the battlefield, and the party flag is the battle flag in the face of the disaster. Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of party members and cadres, and the people's children and soldiers resolutely fell into practice. General Secretary Jin Ping's important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work quickly joined the flood prevention and relief frontline, and became the backbone of the masses in the disaster area and a vital force in the fight against floods.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The bright party flag fluttering high on the flood control embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call to mission.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disaster, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member cadre is a banner.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of fighting floods in various places, party organizations at all levels and the vast number of party members and cadres showed a high degree of loyalty to the party. Following the call of the Party Central Committee, with the action of "see me", the "follow me" pace, and the courage of "I come first", we built an unbreakable steel fortress and stood up the Chinese spine.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: Bright party flags flutter high on the flood-resistant embankment, which is the standpoint of the position and the horn of the charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of floods and floods, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the flood rush, and put bright party flags on the embankment. The vast number of party members and cadres, people's soldiers and soldiers stood firmly on the fronts for flood control. The will and actions of "party flags are on the ground" and "the flood will never retreat and the soldiers will not be recruited" have become the most reliable and reliable solid barriers for the people in the disaster area.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: Bright party flags fluttering high on the flood control embankment are selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: The moment of crisis shows the true nature of party members. At the moment when the lives and property of the people are seriously threatened, party cadres, people's children, servants, family members, and everyone are selflessly dedicated and dare to take the hard battle of winning flood control and flood relief as a main battlefield for comprehensive inspection capabilities, style, and literacy. It is this strong spirit of selfless dedication and determination to fight disasters.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: "People are supreme, life is supreme", it is tested both at peacetime and at critical times.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood control embankment, the vast number of party members and cadres and the people's soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement at any time, and use the steel dams that cannot be washed down by the flood to add luster to the party flag, and let a bright party flag fly high on the flood resistance embankment!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC member trade ministers meeting said it will accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhuanet
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Kuala Lumpur, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The APEC video conference of trade ministers of APEC members was held on the 25th. The meeting promised to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the organizer of this year’s APEC leaders’ informal meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: A joint statement issued after the meeting stated that APEC member trade ministers recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trading and investment environment at this challenging time to promote economic recovery.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties are committed to ensuring that the emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, will not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt the global supply chain, while complying with World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In their statement, APEC member trade ministers promised to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of necessary goods and services, promote interconnection through strengthening supply chain resilience, and minimize interference with the flow of medical supplies, food, and agricultural products to respond to the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: APEC member trade ministers agreed that it was necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers restricting the trade of essential commodities and reiterated their commitment to promote the necessary cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of necessary commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that all economies will ensure that the trade measures they have taken to respond to the epidemic are in compliance with WTO regulations, and promised to take action to reduce non-tariff trade barriers and trade promotion in order to promote the necessary commodity flow in the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: The Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, Azmin Ali, who presided over the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating the APEC post-2020 cooperation vision is being promoted in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agrees to hold APEC related meetings in video format, but it does not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the informal meeting of APEC leaders at the end of the year.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi finances 280 million yuan in emergency funds to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers from the 71st Army of the People's Liberation Army of the local anti-flood team used the gap in preparation to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County snatch the peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rains, hundreds of acres of red peppers planted in the cooperative were severely affected, and the loss will increase even if they are not picked in time.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: China News Service reporter Photo by Tomita
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: China News Service Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) The Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the provincial financial emergency issued 280 million yuan in central and provincial disaster relief funds to provide financial guarantee for flood prevention and disaster relief.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have escalated.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: Flood and waterlogging disasters have caused a direct economic loss of 10.07 billion yuan in the agricultural and rural areas of the province, with an area of 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: On July 17 and July 22, the Jiangxi Provincial Government successively issued 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan in central disaster relief funds.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to the changes in the disaster situation, from the province's emergency management special funds, the provincial-level disaster relief funds were distributed in three batches of 20.3 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, various disaster prevention and mitigation funds had been allocated 173 million yuan, to ensure early detection, early treatment, and early resolution of risk prevention, and provide financial support for flood relief.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, China's largest freshwater lake, is slowly receding.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: The Jiangxi Provincial Defense Index lowered the flood control emergency response to level II at 18:00 on the 24th; and adjusted the provincial disaster relief emergency response level from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Various work such as disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 newly confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning-Economic Observation Net
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health and Health Commission, on July 25 from 0 to 24 hours, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 newly confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, 1 in Shandong), 35 local cases (22 in Xinjiang, 13 in Liaoning); no new deaths, 1 new case in Shanghai (1 imported cases, 2 suspected cases in Shanghai), 1 suspected case (internal), 1 suspected case (internal), 2 suspected cases (internal), 1 suspected case (internal), 2 suspected cases (inland), 1 suspected case (internal case), 1 suspected case (new case), 2 suspected cases (internal case), 1 suspected case (1 new case), 1 suspected case (1 new case), 2 suspected cases (1 case)
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases of discharge were cured, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and the number of severe cases increased by 7 compared with the previous day.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported overseas (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: A total of 2045 confirmed cases were diagnosed, and 1963 cases were cured and discharged, with no deaths.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cases were discharged, 4,634 deaths, 83,830 confirmed cases, and 3 suspected cases.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts were tracked, and 11762 close contacts were still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 imported overseas); 17 cases were confirmed as confirmed cases (without overseas import); 10 medical observations were released on the same day (7 imported overseas); 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 imported overseas).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: A total of 3,09 cases of confirmed diagnoses have been received from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, 2,505 cases in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1,455 cases discharged and 18 deaths), 46 cases in the Macau Special Administrative Region (46 cases discharged), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged, 7 deaths).
ref: Among them, there were 2,505 cases in Hong Kong SAR (1,455 cases discharged from hospital, and 18 deaths), 46 cases in Macau SAR (46 cases discharged from hospital), and 458 cases in Taiwan (440 cases discharged from hospital and 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through the US Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights organizations and several U.S. cities and counties have sued the U.S. federal government, saying that Trump’s attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The US Census will determine the allocation of seats in the US House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: Sara Brannon, executive lawyer of the American Civil Liberties Union, said to VOA, "It won't work."
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's request to determine the citizenship of the census takers in the census is difficult to achieve and "not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties organization, Commonwealth, filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia also joined the lawsuit on Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Chairman of the Board of Management of Arlington County, Gavi, said, "The US Constitution requires an accurate inventory of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count everyone living in Arlington County. This illegal attempt to scare away people and reduce the number of our immigrant communities will not succeed."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praise President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said, "When assigning seats to the House of Representatives and the Electoral College in each state, it must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents who are legally resident."
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The US Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues on the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing the US Census Bureau’s Secretary of Commerce Ross to submit data on undocumented population from the census so that the executive would exclude those undocumented populations from the state’s census figures and determine whether each state would increase or decrease or maintain the number of seats in the House of Representatives.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: Every 10 years, the United States redistributes seats in the House of Representatives according to demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: Greenland opens a new round of mixed reform Shanghai State-owned Assets plans to transfer 17.5% of shares-Economic Observation Net-Professional Financial News Website
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observation Network reporter Rao Xianjun On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "Informative Announcement on State-owned Shareholders' Proposal to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resumption of Shares by Public Call for Transferee".
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the greenfield equity structure, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Real Estate") and Shanghai City Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai City Investment") plan to transfer part of the company's shares held by open transfer of the transferee. The total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 175% of the total share capital of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time is not lower than the higher of the following: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the reminder announcement date (July 27, 2020); the company's audited net asset value per share in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion about the new strategic investors in Greenland. According to the information announced in the announcement, the new strategic investors need to pay about 14 billion yuan to acquire the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland still has no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system of state-owned holdings and employee shares; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a state-owned and non-public capital cross-shareholding and integrated mixed ownership system; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland’s current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Gao Lian Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over the 15% equity of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retired as a minority shareholder. After completing the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented a modern corporate management method such as an executive incentive plan and a structure without actual controllers.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Both Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are state-owned enterprise groups wholly-owned by the Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Greenland Holdings Chairman and President Zhang Yuliang said that Greenland’s move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and accelerate the new phase of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprise reforms in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new ideas of reforms that are tailored to local conditions and tailored to the needs of the company.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has withdrawn 4,404 fishermen so far, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: In an interview with a China News reporter, Li Daiguo, 53, said that his grandfather was fishing at the Longxi River. He started fishing with his father at the age of 11 and rocked the boat. He traveled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing, and then to Longevity. Each time he left home for ten days and a half, he lived on his family by fishing.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, as the rural population gradually rushed into Changzhen, there were more and more residents in Gao'anchang town, and the environmental pollution caused by it became more and more serious.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants, and farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River had turned into a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The fish scales caught are all black, and the inside is black after being cut open."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that it is increasingly difficult to catch fish after the river is polluted.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local government has made great efforts to control the pollution of Longxi River, including cleaning, river patrol, and management of aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from fishermen and became a member of the patrol team to manage aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, the Chongqing Aquatic Biological Reserve and the relevant waters of the main urban area have implemented a comprehensive ban.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of the Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission, as of now, Chongqing has accumulated 3403 fishing vessels and 4643 fishing vessels that have signed a withdrawal agreement, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year mission, respectively.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4,404 fishermen have been retired, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Among the 4,404 people who have retreated, 4,267 people have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have retired.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Pension insurance coverage covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of retired fishermen.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the cleanup and rectification of utilization projects along the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of Yangtze River sewage outfall surveys and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "Three Phosphorus" (referring to phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical industry and phosphogypsum reservoir) rectification tasks, small hydropower cleanup and rectification work, promote the implementation of illegal mining and rectification projects on the Yangtze River, and strengthen the illegal mining of the Yangtze River.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25th: Xu Zhengyu, Director of the Financial Affairs and the Treasury Department of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government, said that Hong Kong's financial market remains active and operating in an orderly manner.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said in an online seminar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canada Federation) on the 24th (Toronto Time) that Hong Kong is experiencing a difficult situation due to the "revision storm" and the new coronary pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and favors the strong exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: The banking system shows no obvious signs of capital outflows. On the contrary, more than $11 billion in capital inflows have been incurred since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: Bank deposits have also continued to increase in the past few months. The stock market has a series of public offerings and fund-raising activities, and market transactions have repeatedly increased.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the New Coronary Pneumonia epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong’s basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has many advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple low tax system, making Hong Kong continue to be a leading international financial center.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR Government has set aside HK$6 billion in the "Anti-epidemic and Anti-epidemic Fund", and will create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the SAR Government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Program" to subsidize local fintech companies, start-ups and other companies with fintech-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talent and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Xu Zhengyu is optimistic about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian companies to take advantage of Hong Kong's advantages and its position as an international financial center, international asset and wealth management center, and global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: "Lancet" article praises China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The 25th issue of The Lancet magazine stated that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion, is similar in size to Europe or the United States. At this stage, the new crown epidemic has been effectively controlled, and there has been no further widespread transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past ten years or so, China has made a lot of investment in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The author said that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially unprepared, especially the pathogens could not be determined.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the type of virus and shared genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus, and warned the world of the threat of the new crown virus through a research paper published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Under the state's declaration of emergency, through close domestic cooperation, such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously. In May and July, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed by China were announced on the Lancet.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system to effectively improve laboratory capabilities.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are very worthy of reference and learning.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, a strong senior must resolutely rely on scientific evidence to make correct decisions, which will effectively control the new crown epidemic.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way to society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early stage of the outbreak, the China National Health and Construction Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to close the city on January 23 in Wuhan. When an expert proposed the necessity and urgency of building a sheltered hospital, the government quickly made the decision and implemented it quickly. At the same time, the community and the masses of the people participated in the situation quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: The article finally emphasized that in response to global health emergencies, countries need to strengthen global cooperation and jointly respond.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Correspondence reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane hit the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The accident killed three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg prosecutor, Wesel County Police Department and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening, at about 14:40 that day, a small plane crashed into a penthouse at the top of a multi-storey residential building on Faberscamp Street in Wessel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from Mar, Ruhr, North Rhine-Westphalia that day, stopped again at Wessel County Airport, and then took off again, then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on a small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the room suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the residents in the room were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not calmed down.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scenes reported by the German News Agency showed that the houses in the accident had thick smoke, and the firefighters showed that the houses were seriously damaged after extinguishing the fire.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is unclear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: "Rheinland Post" quoted police as saying that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated before it hit a residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: Police said that many parts of the crashed aircraft were found in the vicinity of the accident site.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: The German Criminal Police is investigating the cause of this accident with the Duisburg prosecutor and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Bureau.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that day that the museum contacted the local police station and fire department. According to the scene judgment, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Director Dapeng's "Auspicious Ruyi" shortlisted for Jinjue Award-Xinhuanet
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the list of officially selected films for the Golden Jubilee Awards.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Director Dapeng's first real-life film "Auspicious Ruyi" was successfully shortlisted for this year's Golden Jury Award, and the film officially released its first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Poster for photo
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film "Auspicious Ruyi" is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng and his second connection with the Golden Jubilee Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells a story: a comedy director had a whimsy and returned to his hometown in the northeast of the country, hoping to make a family festival into a literary film, resulting in a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for making the movie completed the final gathering.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, a member of the family — “Uncle San” Wang Jixiang sits in the middle of the screen smoking a cigarette. The background is silver-covered black earth in the northeast. The foreground is a red lantern that Chinese people must hang every year.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes the celebration and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang. It also seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncles" Wang Jixiang is played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real family of the director. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a new immersive movie watching experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a god's will". During the shooting, a series of sudden changes in the family made the original shooting plan have to change accordingly. Life without a script was eventually recorded as a movie, but it released tension beyond design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this "Providence" and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this Providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Auspicious Ruyi" is full of experimentation. The almost all-person lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the package of real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their family from the family presented in the film. With the ending of the family party in the film, a series of thoughts are evoked.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

mt: NEWS.GOV.MO: New Coronavirus Infection Response Coordination Center query hotline statistics (July 25, 08H00 to July 26, 08H00)
ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: The 291 enquiries about the epidemic situation were immediately transferred to the relevant department representatives for follow-up. The situation is as follows:

ref: Marine and Water Bureau: 1 enquiry (involving: whether Hong Kong fishing vessels entering the port need to declare to the Marine and Water Affairs Bureau, and the matters concerning nucleic acid testing. )

mt: Marinichev said that the change in value was affected by the depreciation of the ruble and the epidemic.
ref: Marinichev said that the change in value was influenced by the devaluation of the Rouble and the pandemic, etc.
