ref: He said, “The cost of services is increasing.

mt: Due to the epidemic, people started to spend more time on the Internet."
ref: For reason of the pandemic, people are starting to spend more time on the Internet. ”

mt: Marinychev does not rule out that Internet prices will rise sharply in the year, and believes that operators can provide customers with higher speed and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with price increases.
ref: Marinichev did not rule out a major rise in the annual prices of the Internet, and he thought that operators could provide customers with higher speeds and more services to offset people's dissatisfaction with the rise in price.

mt: "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes-Xinhuanet
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the respect of Chinese filmmakers to fight against epidemic heroes, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) and academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou had a discussion on the production of the anti-epidemic movie "Chinese Doctor".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Films hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be screened nationwide as a gift to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: Currently, Bona Pictures is under the arrangement of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Administration, with the support of the Guangdong Film Bureau and the Hubei Film Bureau, to organize the film "Chinese Captain" to make the film "Chinese Doctor". This is a film reflecting the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee and the people of the whole country to unite to fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: Focusing on Wuhan's anti-epidemic line, the film will use Wuhan's medical staff and various provinces and cities' medical aid teams as backgrounds. From the perspective of human nature, it will use unique narrative and powerful lens language to provide a panoramic view of the moving story of the Chinese medical staff full of dedication and sacrifice.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that on the first day of Wuhan's unblocking, Bona Company overcame many difficulties, sent a team to go to the epidemic front, exchanged face-to-face exchanges with hundreds of medical workers, and collected information. At present, interviews have been made with academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person in Guangzhou Chi aid Wuhan, Guangdong medical aid team, as well as the video of the Jinyitan Hospital in Wuhan, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also put forward expectations and hopes for the filming of the film in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it. I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have made a lot of appearances, but also interview more medical staff working hard on the front line. They are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he had read "My Motherland" and "Captain of China" before, and thought that it would be good to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that currently some people abroad like to label the virus politicized. He hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to screening in China, this film is best to be screened abroad. It is necessary to impress the audience with real humanism in a way that can be understood by domestic and foreign audiences."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the movie "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s. "After so many years, the most impressive thing about the movie after the reform and opening up was "People to Middle Age". At that time, my doctor friends abroad all cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be amazing."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the prevention and control of the current international epidemic. "I believe people are always smarter than viruses."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, since the primitive society, humans have survived all kinds of dangers. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures. In addition, medical personnel around the world and even ordinary people have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic. People will not be as passive as before. "The next thing is to pay attention to two aspects of work. The first is to study how the world strengthens cooperation.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: (Reporter Wang Jinyue)
ref: (By Wang Jinyue)

mt: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan-Xiangtan's First Red Expo Meeting-News Today-Hunan Daily-Huasheng Online
ref: “Red fruits” of cultural tourism gather in Shaoshan - News about the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo - News Today - hnrb.voc.com.cn - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily·New Hunan Client Reporter Jiang Rui Correspondent Xiao Yan
ref: Hunan Daily Hunan Today Client Reporter: Jiang Rui Correspondent: Xiao Yan

mt: Jiaxing Red Boat Mould, Shaoshan Bronze Statue of Mao Zedong, Yan'an Budui Flower Crafts, Xiangxi Yongshun Bacon... On July 25, the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan.
ref: Red boat moulds from Jiaxiang, Mao Zedong’s bronze statue from Shaoshan, paste-on-paste pate-surpate artworks from Yan’an, Yongshun bacon from Xiangxi… The 2020 Hunan Red Tourism Culture Festival opened in Shaoshan on July 25.

mt: As one of the main activities, Xiangtan’s first Red Cultural Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan Tourism Consulting and Distribution Center.
ref: As one of the main activities, the First Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was developed at Shaoshan Global Tourism Advisory and Distribution Center.

mt: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products, and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy it.
ref: The exhibition area is full of red cultural and creative products and native products from the old revolutionary areas, attracting tourists from all over the world to buy them.

mt: "The Red Expo is not only a showcase of the achievements of the national red cultural industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and companies to exchange experiences and discuss development paths."
ref: "This Red Expo is not only a display of the achievements of the national red culture industry, but also an important platform for exhibitors and enterprises to exchange experience and discuss the ways of development. ”

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Executive Committee of the First Red Fair in Xiangtan introduced that the theme of this Red Fair is "Promoting Red Culture and Boosting the Temperature of Cultural Tourism". The total exhibition area is nearly 3,000 square meters. An atmosphere creation area, scenic exhibition exhibition area and red cultural tourism online shopping experience area are set up.
ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: 137 enterprises and units from 8 provinces and municipalities including Jiaxing, Zunyi, Guizhou, and Yan'an, Shaanxi, and Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou, and other places in our province were invited to exhibit. A total of 768 exhibits were exhibited, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, special food products, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, etc.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be displayed until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Red Expo, the highlights of the Xiangtan exhibition area were numerous.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: According to the person in charge of the exhibition area, the Xiangtan exhibition is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The Red Industrial Zone exhibited 31 exhibits from 6 companies including Hualing Xianggang, Hualing Cable and Xiangdian Power. The Red Culture Industry Development Zone exhibited nearly 200 products from 27 units including Red Series Books, Red Series Foods, and Red Series Cultural and Creative Products.
ref: The Red Industry Exhibition Area exhibited 31 exhibits of 6 enterprises, including Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd. of Hunan Valin, Hunan Valin Wire & Cable Co., Ltd., and XEMC. The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists were attracted by Chen Zhanfu's handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, Director of Yan'an Cultural Tourism Bureau, introduced that the exhibition carefully selected Yan'an's outstanding red cultural and creative products in the past two years, of which 16 products were excellent works of national red cultural and creative products in 2019.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited national-level intangible cultural heritage protection projects "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and provincial-level non-heritage projects Yanchuan Budui Painting inheritors, focusing on the promotion of Yan'an folk custom products, and taking this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units and promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane separation technology helps to crack the "greenhouse effect"-chinanews
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane separation technology helps solve the "greenhouse effect"
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Schematic diagram of new hybrid matrix membrane preparation technology
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Reporter Shangrui reported: Recently, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team has made significant progress on the "membrane separation method for capturing carbon dioxide", and has successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology to greatly improve the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Related achievements have been published as cover articles in the international journal "Greenhouse Gases: Science and Technology".
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect."
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: How to efficiently capture and use carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists.
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: How to make the membrane material "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck of the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: The research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and explored the effects of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the distribution of carbon nanotubes in the produced membrane material is more uniform and "more breathable", which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: With the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology, the carbon dioxide separation performance is close to the theoretical upper limit of the current separation of such membrane materials.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: "New technology provides new ideas for membrane separation to capture carbon dioxide."
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: Li Run, a member of the atmospheric environment and bioenergy team at Tianjin University, said: "We hope this technology will provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical companies to deal with flue gas, and play a major role in the control of greenhouse gas emissions."
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: Established a special committee for the first time, signed a "long contract" collectively, and joined the Exhibitors' Union of the 3rd Expo to build a "connection link"-Xinhua
ref: The special committees set up for the first time and “long-term contract” signed collectively, and the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance builds a "CIIE bond" – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the 3rd China International Expo in Shanghai on July 26th.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the Exhibitors Union of the Third Import Expo set up a professional committee for the first time here. The first batch of established special committees included the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee. 35 member companies also signed a three-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the Exhibitors' Union of the Third China World Expo held here on the 26th, a group of member companies of Hyundai, Dow Chemical, Shiseido, New Zealand, New Zealand, Siemens, Michelin, France, and AstraZeneca signed a three-year long-term participation memorandum of cooperation. The revised and improved regulations of the exhibition are also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Dairy Professional Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Dairy Industry taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: According to the latest regulations, Zhanmeng will introduce the rotation mechanism of the leading unit to strengthen the function of the special committee.
ref: According to the latest constitution, the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance will introduce the leading unit rotation mechanism to strengthen the function of the special committees.

mt: The Special Committee will make recommendations for industry development trend analysis and promote sustainable development of the industry.
ref: The special committees will make suggestions for the analysis of industry development trend and promote the sustainable development of the industry.

mt: At the same time, the integration of the industry's entire industry chain resources to promote the participation of related companies to participate in the Expo will build the Expo into an industry gathering place.
ref: At the same time, they will integrate the resources of the whole industry chain, drive related enterprises to participate in the exhibition through that large enterprises lead small ones, and thus develop the CIIE into a highland for gathering of industrial enterprises.

mt: The establishment of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee for the first time is particularly important for the fight against the new coronary pneumonia epidemic.
ref: The establishment of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic for the first time is particularly important for the current fight against COVID-19 pandemic.

mt: As the vice chairman unit of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Committee of the Third Expo, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnosis business in Greater China, said that in the next step, Abbott will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new coronary pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the Public Health and Epidemic Prevention Professional Committee photographed in Shanghai on July 26.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third public expo set up a public health and epidemic prevention zone for the first time. Up to now, nearly 50 global companies have signed up for the exhibition, and the exhibition area exceeds 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first Expo in 2018, the Exhibitors Alliance was established by the exhibitors on its own initiative. It aims to become a platform for high-quality exhibitors to exchange and cooperate, to connect all parties to the information and resource sharing platform, as well as a think-tank platform to promote economic and trade exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions).
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: Up to now, 142 companies have joined the Exhibitor Union, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: Belgian 3-year-old girl dies of New Coronavirus infection-Xinhua
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: During the peak of the European epidemic, the proportion of new coronavirus infections among the Belgian population was "top of Europe".
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data shows that 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.

mt: Cathar warned earlier this week that people must take action before the snowball rolls over and eventually causes an "avalanche."
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature]
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: Large-scale financial media action "Let's go live in the village to see poverty alleviation" set off-today's news-Hunan Daily-Huasheng Online
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily, New Hunan Client, July 25 (Reporter) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television Station departed from Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Two caravans carrying 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting systems were sent to the scene by the guests and slowly drove to the scene.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "2020 is a landmark year. We will build a well-off society in an all-round way and achieve the goal of the first century of struggle. 2020 will also be a year of decisive battle against poverty."
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure of the Central Radio and Television Central Financial and Economic Program Center to cope with this major theme and do a good job in promoting poverty alleviation.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will walk into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, dig out fresh stories of poverty alleviation, and see how villages and villages change dramatically, showing how villagers have broken through the dilemma of survival and development and are on the road to prosperity.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: This operation will last for more than 3 months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter departed from Xuzhou, divided into two roads, taking the southwest route all the way, passing Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other route was taking the northwest route, passing Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of reporting format, "Let's Live in the Village to Watch Out of Poverty" is a bold fusion.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through CCTV Financial Channel of CCTV, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Radio and CCTV New Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly completed on the midday news program "World Finance" of CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00), the CCTV Finance Channel's golden news column "Economic Information Network" will open a poverty alleviation report column (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will broadcast live for up to one hour on each CCTV Finance client. The audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Going Live in the Village and Watching Poverty Alleviation" has the courage to make breakthroughs and pioneered the "outfield new media caravan."
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcast system, using 5G 4K/8K AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline, large and small screens, and TV broadcasting.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: It is equipped with a three-information broadcasting area. The broadcasting area is converted from a container, with a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters. The box body adopts a hydraulic automatic deployment structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The performance area can also be automatically expanded and connected to an expansion platform with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Church fire in Nantes, France: Parish volunteers admit to arson
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: The cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire on July 18, with the large organ completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: Prosecutors in Nantes announced on Tuesday that a parish volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral has been charged with "arson destruction".
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: He confessed that he set fire to the church.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: The 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted to setting fires in three places in the cathedral during the night, the local prosecutor said.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: The man's lawyer said the arsonist now regrets doing this.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: A few years ago, the man entered France through asylum and was sheltered in the diocese where the fire occurred.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: Prosecutors said he recently tried to renew his visa and is in dialogue with the police.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But the church said it still couldn't believe that the normally kind, smiling, but not very talkative believer would destroy the church he loved so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer had already been questioned by police because of a logical problem in his account, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: Pictured are firefighters at the scene.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, the person was once again arraigned, thanks to new evidence obtained by professional engineers in the laboratory of the Paris Central Police.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man confessed to his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: According to reports, if convicted of arson and destruction, the suspect could face 10 years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: According to reports, the fire caused heavy damage to the Saint Pierre and Saint Paul Cathedral, the organ inside the church was completely destroyed, and the stained glass window behind the organ was also badly damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunet, the chief architect of historic buildings in France, believes that the conservative estimate is that the restoration of Nantes Cathedral will take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane Hannah makes landfall in Texas, causing flooding and flooding
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hurricane Hannah made landfall in Texas at 5 p.m. local time on July 25, bringing severe storms, swollen rivers and potentially life-threatening flash floods.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: The National Hurricane Center said Hurricane Hannah is expected to bring heavy rains across southern and northeastern Texas, causing some creeks to swell and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: Hurricane Hannah was the worst affected area south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River, while the Rio Grande Valley could see widespread flash flooding.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge," Texas Governor Abbott said.
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty-two counties in the state have declared a state of disaster emergency because of the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city of more than 320,000 people, has closed its libraries and museums.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that while the state is being hit hard by the new crown epidemic, the hurricane cannot be allowed to cause more casualties in Texas.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches of rain overnight on the 26th, and northern Texas and coastal Louisiana will also see 3 to 5 inches of rain.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, the formation of "Hannah" earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: In general, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic do not usually form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland to withdraw from European treaty to prevent violence against women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, Poland's Justice Ministry said Saturday.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty, which requires schools to teach students about gender issues, tramples on the rights of parents.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Poland's Justice Minister Giublo said at a news conference that his ministry would on Monday make a request to the Ministry of Labour and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: "The treaty contains some elements of morphological nature that we consider harmful," said Giublo.
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Poland's ruling Law and Justice Party and its coalition partners have close alliances with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish President Andrzej Duda has made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Poles, most of them women, protested in Warsaw and some other cities against withdrawing from the convention.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: One of the organizers of the protest, Lempart, said at a protest march in Warsaw that "the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence."
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters held banners that read "Law and Justice is a hell for women".
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: Law and Justice has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland’s previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: The Law and Justice government says the treaty does not respect religion and requires that liberal social policies be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (according to Reuters)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: “Vietnam has made great contributions to ASEAN’s development over the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: Vietnam is not only a responsible member of ASEAN, but also the locomotive of ASEAN.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Grivory said that Russia and the Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) believe that Vietnam has contributed to the promotion of ASEAN's status and its image abroad.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: “Asean should thank Vietnam for this,” he said.
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: Grivori said analysts recognized Vietnam's peace initiative.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with ASEAN countries and propose constructive and peaceful measures on issues facing the Asia-Pacific region, including the East China Sea issue.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: Regarding the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the ASEAN framework, Grivory said that Vietnam supports the cooperation between Russia and ASEAN and helps Russia to benefit from this cooperation framework.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, will be able to enter the ASEAN market after signing a free trade agreement with Vietnam.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grivori proposed to maximize the expansion of the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries in the free trade area, thereby creating a platform for economic and security stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: Grivori also believes that Russia, Vietnam and ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: Between now and the end of 2020, Bac Giang will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructure, human resources and land, to actively welcome foreign inflows, especially for multinational groups with value chains and transfer of advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: In addition, Bac Giang province will process documents to submit to the Prime Minister’s decision to invest in infrastructure construction and operation projects in Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zones and to approve the addition of the two industrial-city-service zones of Ansan-Bac Lung and Anlu in the province’s master plan for the development of Vietnam’s industrial zones up to 2020.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Bac Giang province has made great efforts to accelerate the progress of projects, especially infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park clusters such as Hwaphu, Gwangju, and Sungai-Naehwang, and form land funds for investment promotion.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Bureau of Industry and Trade of Bac Giang Province will participate in the planning of industrial parks and industrial clusters to provide advice and suggestions for inclusion in provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Bac Giang province has decided to combine the development of industrial park clusters with safeguarding national defense security, protecting the ecological environment, and ensuring food security, thereby boosting balanced industrial development; it has comprehensive infrastructure such as electricity, water, transportation and telecommunications, combined with urban construction, trade services, workers’ housing and other social infrastructure such as health care and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang province has called for high-tech, clean technology investment projects in the fields of power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, auxiliary industries and other fields.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In the cluster of industrial parks, the province called for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, utilization of local labor, especially agricultural products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Bac Giang province will focus on accelerating investment in the infrastructure of Bac Giang’s logistics and logistics center, which will be developed in parallel with the industrial park cluster to optimize the flow of goods and currency and help to reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop intermodal transportation, thus creating attractiveness for investors to invest in the province.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: In the past two weeks, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in Spain has rebounded sharply, with thousands of new cases in several days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The British government decided on Saturday night (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list from 0:00 local time on the 26th, and people entering the UK from Spain must self-isolate for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: British tourists on holiday in Spain were surprised, worried and even angry when they heard about the decision.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: Transport Secretary Grant Shapps is reportedly on holiday in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: The UK's quarantine measures came after Norway announced that people returning from Spain would be subject to a 10-day quarantine.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium are advising their residents to abandon plans for a holiday in Barcelona and surrounding areas.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: Beaches in these areas are overcrowded and social distancing cannot be maintained, and police at one point needed to take steps to reduce the number of beachgoers.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: it's safe
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: Spain's foreign ministry said on Sunday that the outbreak was under control in the country.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya said: "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists."
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: The Spanish government will try to persuade the British government to exclude the Balearic and Canary Islands from quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: The reason is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is much lower than in the UK.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: In order to prevent the spread of the epidemic, Spain's Catalonia region has also resumed a "foot ban".
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is an important pillar industry in Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular holiday destinations for British tourists.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The UK's decision is expected to have a major impact on Spain's tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: Quiet/Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: The first day of Zhongfu: Beijing bids farewell to high temperature and heat and opens rainfall mode - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Ni Yuanjin) July 26 is the first day of this year's "Zhongfu".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: On the morning of the 26th, strong winds, showers and convection weather dispersed the high temperature and heat that have shrouded in Beijing for days, and a new round of rain will continue for several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: The Beijing Meteorological Observatory released at 11 o'clock on the 26th that there were scattered showers (with weak lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, and the daily maximum temperature was only 27 ° C; at night, there were light to moderate rain (with weak lightning), and the minimum night temperature was 23 ° C.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: On the 24th to 25th, Beijing was in a high temperature blue warning, with the daily maximum temperature in most areas around 37 °C, and local temperatures exceeding 40 °C.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Futian is the hottest, humid and sultry day of the year. There are "three volts" in the year, and the hottest is in the middle. The Chinese people say "bitter summer" at this time.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: When entering the Fu, every family fills the barn, and the folk have the saying of "one volt dumplings and two fu noodles".
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to the current forecast, the next three days, Beijing and more rainy weather.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological department advised the public to avoid mountain travel as much as possible and beware of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is understood that this year's "Zhong Fu" has 20 days, from July 26 to August 14 end.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: After entering the "medium volt", people will feel tired, loss of appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: Dietary choice of mung beans, barley and other heat-relieving, spleen appetizer of food, as well as bitter herbs, bitter gourd and other bitter foods, can help increase appetite, eliminate summer heat.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: "Ding Dong on the line! Teacher is good" on the line next week Xue Zhaofeng led "knowledge initiator" - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: A new show is online.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV on July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: It is understood that the program will create a new all-age youth classroom, and a group of talented and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impression of the teacher group in the minds of the public in the past, "Ding Dong is online! Teacher is good" is a group of knowledge representatives with both face value and talent.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round "duanzis" who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: In the program, this group of outstanding young knowledge models, as "knowledge sharing officers", will challenge the interesting knowledge classroom.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They need to impress the audience by showing the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through the attitude of knowledge output.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The "Youdao Asking Group" composed of audiences of all ages will raise various questions on the spot, which will make the teaching of the "Knowledge Sharing Officer" more difficult and add a little stimulating atmosphere to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to reports, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher in the Middle School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous postgraduate instructor, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years of experience.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: In addition, the program also invited economics professor Xue Zhaofeng as the "knowledge initiator" of the program, together with "Dingdong Assistant" Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to talk about youth with the audience and create a "National Youth Open Class".
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Hong Kong SAR Government: The situation is grim
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: HONG KONG, July 26 (Xinhua) -- The Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) Government's Chief Secretary for Administration Zhang Jianzong said on the 26th that the situation of the new crown pneumonia epidemic in Hong Kong continues to be severe.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: However, at this stage, the government has no intention of introducing a “stay-at-home order” or a “confinement order” to restrict people from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "The Situation is Serious and Fight the Epidemic".
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said the outbreak was the worst in six months and the next two weeks would be critical to try to prevent further spread of the virus in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: Apart from the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and cooperation are also very important.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He urged the public to stay at home as much as possible, reduce social contact and eat out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: Members of the public should cooperate with the mandatory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash hands frequently.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic work.
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Cheung Kin-chung said that the free virus tests provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely RCHEs, residential care homes for the disabled and nursing home staff, restaurant staff, taxi drivers and property management staff, have been fully implemented, involving up to 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about the cases of infection in RCHEs. The SAR Government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centres for RCHE residents.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said the SAR Government is building an isolation and quarantine facility near the Penny Bay Quarantine Centre on Lantau Island in the New Territories, which is expected to provide an additional 700 isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR Government will build an additional 2,000 isolation rooms at the Penny Bay Quarantine Centre and strive to complete it by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: Together with the 800 units that have been put into use, Penny Bay Quarantine Centre is expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: There are currently four operating quarantine centres in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for patients under the age of 50 who are able to take care of themselves.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: U.S. launches first anti-subsidy investigation against China
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: The US Department of Commerce recently announced that it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties originating in China, and launched an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate" project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case in a countervailing case to investigate the so-called "undervalued RMB exchange rate" project.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: The Chinese Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasizes that, in general, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the renminbi has appreciated more than 17% against the US dollar.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the RMB appreciated by 38% in nominal effective exchange rate and 49% in real effective exchange rate.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations under WTO rules.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States in February this year amended regulations to carry out countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, has been suspected of violating WTO rules, has been opposed by many sides.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: According to the press release, even under U.S. regulations, the applicant’s complaint contains a large number of errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements such as financial assistance, benefit grant and specificity.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.
