mt: China urges the US to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of the RMB."
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further escalation of Sino-US tensions, the offshore and onshore yuan exchange rates against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 yuan per dollar mark.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether the US Commerce Department's move is intended to force up the yuan is worth watching.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate of the RMB against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd to close at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The central parity of the renminbi against the US dollar, which is subject to official control, fell 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: On the 26th, the day before President Rodrigo Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union (SONA) address, the total number of confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia in the Philippines on the same day exceeded 80,000, of which the number of employees of the Presidential Office of Information (PCOO) and its direct agencies increased to 25.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, the PCOO has prepared a task force that has not been in contact with the infected staff to cooperate with President Rodrigo Duterte’s press release on SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Secretary Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that two sets of proposals have been prepared for President Duterte’s SONA approach.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa Building in Quezon City this afternoon.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Due to the epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some government cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was set up for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants will be allowed to enter the Capitol building on the same day through rapid testing.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be launched, in which President Rodrigo Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, with fewer seats for the hearing.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: As is customary, SONA will broadcast live to the whole country in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, Malacañang has not confirmed whether Duterte’s family will attend SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: President Rodrigo Duterte’s SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines in tackling the COVID-19 pandemic and restoring socio-economic life, Andanar said, referring to his commitments when he took office to fight government corruption, fight illicit drugs and reduce poverty.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also outline other plans of the administration, including creating more jobs, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who have suffered during the pandemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen seeks public comments on health regulations - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations to detect problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games;
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to take physical examinations frequently and detect problems early, the above-mentioned draft proposes that the health and health departments should formulate a basic catalogue of health examination items according to different ages, occupations and other factors.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The medical examination fees within the scope of the basic catalogue of health examination items shall be paid by the social medical insurance pooling fund at the rate of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The Draft for Comments clearly states that employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange employees' work and rest time, and implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical workloads to avoid excessive loss of human body functions or physical and mental health injuries to employees' health. At the same time, strictly implement the paid leave system for employees.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, the employer should have full-time and part-time health management personnel, and organize regular health examinations for employees.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft proposes that the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors is prohibited, and at the same time, the sale of alcoholic beverages is restricted. For those who violate the provisions, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30,000 yuan.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to "prohibition", minors should also "more exercise."
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the requirements of the draft, the school should arrange more than one hour of physical activity for students every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, the departments of public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and health shall improve the health supervision system of Internet access service business places, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and communication culture for promoting the healthy growth of adolescents.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the draft also proposes that influenza patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and medical and health institutions will be fined 20,000 yuan for leaking patients’ privacy without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the Draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of public policy implementation on population health before formulating plans and normative documents involving urban spatial planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, and biomedical industry development, as well as approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Where it has not been evaluated or will have a more serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents' health, it shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enter relocation season - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Protection Station of the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring showed that the Tibetan antelopes that had migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Hoh Xil were ending their calving and began to return to their original habitat.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: On July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through the 3002 kilometers of the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge of the Qinghai-Tibet Railway.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: According to experts, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the relocated flock accounts for one-fourth to one-fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Institute of Plateau Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of the migration, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs."
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to statistics from the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes has increased year by year. The number of Tibetan antelopes in 2019 was 4,860, an increase of 338 over 2018.
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: Lian Xinming said: "It is expected that this year's Tibetan antelope relocation will end in early September, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase."
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: The Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altyn Mountain in Xinjiang go to Zhuonai Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope conservation in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Animals), said: "Tibetan antelope relocation is the process of female Tibetan antelopes returning to their habitats after giving birth. At first, the repatriation group leaving the calving area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats according to different geographical populations and along different paths."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe return of the Tibetan antelope, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continue video monitoring and patrolling in the main relocation area.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If a herd of Tibetan antelopes is found trying to cross the road, the patrol team will conduct temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the herd to safely pass through the wildlife channel to ensure that they are as little as possible from human interference on the way back.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how do you cope with the heat in your daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that summer go out as far as possible to avoid high temperature periods, it is best not to walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sun is the strongest during this time, the possibility of heat stroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out during this time, be sure to do a good job of protective work, such as playing umbrellas, wearing sun hats, wearing sunglasses, and the best conditions to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Clothes try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, linen, silk texture, wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, causing heat stroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: Do not wait until you are thirsty to drink water, because once you feel thirsty, your body is already short of water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water a day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water a day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When you sweat more, you can add some salt water to make up for the salt lost by sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, in summer, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency, which makes people feel tired and tired.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc.; fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., with a water content of 80% to 90%, can be used to replenish water; dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people who work in high temperature environments should be properly supplemented with drinks containing potassium and magnesium.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the body's metabolism is strong, the consumption is also large, and it is easy to feel tired.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is conducive to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say the best bedtime is 22 to 23 o'clock, the best time to get up is 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: Be careful not to lie under the air-conditioning vents and electric fans during sleep to avoid air-conditioning diseases and heat colds.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people in outdoor activities or high-temperature operations can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiangzhengqi water or Huoxiangzhengqi pills and other heatstroke drugs, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate art exhibition moved to shopping mall for public welfare exhibition - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the season of "cloud graduation" in major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it is neither in the art museum nor on campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, which is free and open to the public until August 23.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition collected 50 works/groups of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: During the pandemic, this exhibition has a special significance.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Ping, head of the Mei Chen of Chaoyang Joy City, said: “We chose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again, and hope that more people can see the young people’s exploration of themselves and the understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art on society and the soul.”
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works in the exhibition were collected from graduates of several major art schools, and selected suitable for commercial space display. The forms of works range from traditional easel paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas. The volume and richness are the most in the past.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixture of mechanical and manual creative language in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created through the Ethereum blockchain explored themes such as "cryptocurrency", "credit creation", "transaction"; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat Forest" and Qiu Daqiang's "Zhu"
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who set up the exhibition in person was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7. I was actually a little worried about the epidemic at that time. I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance. I came to the exhibition with alcohol cotton and test reports."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work, "Yesterday Is a Mystery," is more complex and must be done by hand.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he also took on the task of helping students repair damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: “The exhibition was set up until 4:30 in the morning, and then repaired. The time was very tight, and I forgot to take a photo with the work. It’s a little regrettable.”
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing to see his works exhibition with his classmates.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Reward 50,000 yuan Hubei Enshi praises Shaziba landslide "early warning first person" jqknews
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily News (Reporter Lin Jing) July 26, Enshi City circular to praise for the Shaziba landslide early warning made an important contribution to the geological disaster site monitor Chen Guangming, and sent him a bonus of 50,000 yuan.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, he called on the party members and cadres of the city to learn from his dedication, dare to take responsibility, initiative, and dedication.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, causing the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River. Chen Guangming, 58, was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the walls of the villagers' homes were cracking and immediately went to the scene to check.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: He just walked out of his home five or six hundred meters, they saw the village road split four or five centimeters, along the road has been extended to the cornfield, about 50 meters in length.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming Dunsheng alert, the first time the road cracking photos sent to the township "geological disaster monitors contact group".
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: The Tunpu Township Natural Planning by the relevant person in charge of on-site inspection and judgment, the possibility of landslide is very large, then make the decision to evacuate the masses.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely warning for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people from 315 households in the affected area won 36 hours of valuable time.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: There were no casualties in this major disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible professionalism was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: Facing the praise, he said, “No one has been saved, it’s my responsibility.”
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of "female college students traveling to Qinghai lost contact" search and rescue work continues - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xining News Agency, Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" attracted the attention of netizens.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student of a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of missing contact.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the Public Security Detachment of the Golmud Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior that Huang Moumou, a student of a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5 and was turned off and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River at the Soonandajie Protection Station in Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province on July 9.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on the 7th.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8:00 on the same day, Huang Moumou, the missing person, took a taxi from the Yellow River Hotel in Golmud City towards G109 National Road, and arrived at the Hoh Xili Sonandajie Protection Station at 12:00. The taxi driver returned alone. Huang Moumou arrived at the Qingshui River area near the Soonandajie Protection Station at 15:00 on the 7th until 18:00 on the 9th. Shut down in the area.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed through the Naijigou checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: The Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at Nanshankou, Golmud City. Because the checkpoint has no video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the information of the person and the vehicle. The police can only search along the road. Coordinating the checkpoints along the road in Tibet. If Huang Moumou is found, immediately get in touch with the Golmud Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1 a.m. on July 26, the Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment to the Non-frozen Springs Protection Station and Sonan Dajie Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search, and actively contacted the Sichuan Police, the Tibet Police and the Nanjing Police to work together.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and all walks of life have relevant clues to provide Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the missing person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized when they are outdoors, and always pay attention to roadside warning signs.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia holds military parade to celebrate Navy Day - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Vessels parade for Naval Day celebrations in St Petersburg, Russia, July 26, 2018.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Xinhua News Agency (photo by Mo Tina)
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: MOSCOW, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Russian fleets held a military parade on July 26 to mark the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located. A total of 15,000 troops, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participated.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 troops, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes participated in the local parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first reviewed the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he arrived in the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the military parade on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin said in a speech at the military parade that the modern technology level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with a unique hypersonic strike system in 2020.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In addition, the Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with the Russian Ministry of Defense organ "Red Star" that Russia's plan to build ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships planned to be received by the Russian Navy in 2020 is the largest in recent years.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great began the creation of a naval fleet.
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.

mt: The last Sunday of July is the Russian Navy Day.
ref: Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to the new changes in epidemic prevention and control, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions and actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: Cadres, workers and model workers of the trade union in the north and south of Tianshan entered the streets, communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivery of vegetables and medicines, disinfection and sterilization, and publicity of epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the workers and the masses and demonstrate the "hard core strength" of the trade union with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the condolence group of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi sent a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff of 12 isolation points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak of the epidemic, Tianshan District immediately invested more than 1.05 million yuan and allocated it to 23 directly affiliated grassroots trade unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: After receiving the company's notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the labor union of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering Co., Ltd., took the initiative to ask to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the new employees living in the dormitory of the unit, and organized the staff to send them the necessary materials for life every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: "Since July 21, the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of the epidemic have been thoroughly investigated, and online orders have been placed and merchants delivered to the door, and 704 front-line workers in Urumqi have supplemented the purchase of epidemic prevention supplies and living materials."
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The person in charge of the Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they have made every effort to ensure the prevention and control of the epidemic, steadily promote the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting the epidemic together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At present, it is a high temperature in summer, and trade unions at all levels are paying close attention to front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and implementing the care and care of "sending cool".
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched a "send cool" condolence activity to the frontline workers of epidemic prevention and control. Police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received drinks, fruits and other condolences.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: "Trade union cadres should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in uniting and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to front-line workers.
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: A spokesman for the regional trade union said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in 2020 in full swing - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission recently issued a notice to deploy the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from ordinary college graduates in 2020.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and civilian general majors in 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, focusing on increasing the recruitment of drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, small languages and other majors.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year, the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be organized and implemented simultaneously with the recruitment of conscripts, which will begin on August 1 and end on September 30.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: Recruited young people can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruiting majors through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn).
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified young people who are unable to be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the restrictions on their majors and plans may participate in the recruitment of compulsory military service. When they are selected as non-commissioned officers at the end of their compulsory military service, the number of years of study in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed school system shall be regarded as service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: This year, the recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be organized by the conscription office of the people's government at the provincial or prefecture level. Majors with rich application potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the academic level of the applicants, the results of professional courses during school, and the acquisition of vocational qualification certificates. Scarce majors will be targeted to local colleges that meet the professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the requirements of normalized prevention and control of the epidemic, this year's direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not arrange self-reporting in principle, and will be organized and operated simultaneously with conscripts.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is from September 1, 2020, and the time when the unit issues the order of non-commissioned officers is December 1, 2020.
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The unit receiving units will scientifically formulate enlistment and professional training programs, and carefully organize training; after the completion of the training, according to the principle of professional counterparts and uniform recruitment, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the counterpart professional and technical positions.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, July 26 (Xinhua) According to the website of the Chinese embassy in the UK, on the 25th, a spokesman for the Chinese embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on the wrong statement about cyber attacks.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesperson stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyberattacks and cybercrimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Q: According to media reports, China-related hacking groups have interfered with the network system of a British company, launched attacks on British and American technology companies with patented data, and hacked into EU government networks.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyberattacks and cybercrimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse in actors. When investigating and characterizing cyber incidents, sufficient evidence should be produced instead of unwarranted speculation.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: The spokesman said that the past "Prism Gate" and a series of incidents prove that the United States has been the world's largest range of cyber theft operations.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: Maintaining peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation were not stolen or robbed, but achieved through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China filed about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country with the largest number of international patent applications.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become an innovation and intellectual property powerhouse.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas jqknews
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: China News Service, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Commission, told the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing in Urumqi on the 26th that at present, most of the free nucleic acid testing work in Urumqi City has been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The State Council expert group and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments of the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to report on the epidemic situation and prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 00:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia were added in Urumqi (of which 5 were converted to confirmed cases of asymptomatic infection), and 38 new asymptomatic infections were added.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, Urumqi has 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infections.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The new asymptomatic infections on the 25th were basically tested through free nucleic acid testing and active screening in the city.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Commission, said on the 26th that most of the free nucleic acid testing work in Urumqi City has been basically completed.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other regions in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the detection reagent, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested personnel, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen is not in place), and the testing environment, the operation proficiency of the inspectors, etc.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: Nucleic acid tests can also give false negative results for various reasons.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed infected, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, for people who have been in close contact with confirmed or suspected cases, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to be excluded.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas of the epidemic, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a negative nucleic acid test may be false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that in view of the above situation, for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi will conduct a second free nucleic acid test in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and carry out "checking for omissions".
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.

mt: White House coronavirus expert Fauci: Cautiously optimistic about vaccine in early 2021
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the remarks at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He cautioned that it is not clear how the new crown epidemic will develop in the autumn and winter, nor what the ultimate impact of the epidemic will be, "and the only way to end this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution."
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21:00 on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4.176 million and 146,000 deaths.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said that some parts of the United States are currently struggling with the rebound of the epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the epidemic situation varies from place to place and needs to be tailored to local conditions, diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there are no close links between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: An outbreak in one region will eventually affect other regions.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: “This is not the time for complacency,” Fauci said. “Our work is not done, we must step up, and we must remain vigilant about the uncertainty of the future.”
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: He Dayi, a Chinese-American medical expert and founder of the AIDS cocktail therapy, pointed out at the meeting that the new crown epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: "Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus."
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: He called on the public to use their own practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up the development of new crown treatments and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization that promotes international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region. It is committed to promoting the status of Asian and Pacific Americans in the United States and cultivating young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, US Secretary of Transportation Elaine Chao, US Congressman Meng Zhaowen and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, spoke at the meeting.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to the Asian Pacific American medical workers and volunteers fighting the epidemic on the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as "social distancing" to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: U.S.-China trade negotiators to meet in August
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: The South China Morning Post quoted an unnamed person familiar with the matter as saying that Chinese Vice Premier Liu He and U.S. trade representative Lai Haizhe are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides’ implementation of the phase one trade deal.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: Although China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, it is still some distance away from the amount promised in the trade deal due to factors such as the new crown virus epidemic.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts say the recent closure of each other’s consulates between the United States and China, along with other disputes, could undermine any progress on trade.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The phase one trade deal, which took effect a month after the signing of the U.S.-China trade deal on January 15, stipulates that a high-level trade framework group from both sides should meet every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: The meeting will be “an important turning point” for both sides to assess the progress of the agreement, the people said.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But the person also said that if tensions between the U.S. and China lead to less willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that Lai Haizhe and Liu He’s May 8 conference call have met the terms of the trade deal for semi-annual talks.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: Relations between China and the United States have deteriorated sharply this year, with disputes over the origins of the coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: U.S. President Donald Trump boasted about his achievements in the phase one deal at the beginning of the year, but his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He told a White House press briefing on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of U.S. corn and a lot of soybeans in a single day, “this trade deal means less to me now than when it was reached.”
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor US-China relations and that "trade issues have lost weight in Sino-US relations."
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: But he revealed that China's economic and trade authorities still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States. "We have tried our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult."
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Kening Peng, vice president of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it was “more important than ever” to maintain momentum in the phase one deal, noting that China has made progress this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: “It’s better to talk than not to talk, although it may be treated as a routine,” said analysts at independent research firm Plenum.
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu'e Bao income declines "post-90s" but "retaliatory" saving?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With the decline of Yu’ebao income, the “post-90s” not only did not flee Yu’ebao, but began to “retaliatory” save money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: According to the “Yuebao Post-90s Savings Report” (2020 version) jointly released by the China New Economic Research Institute and Alipay, in the first half of the year, the “post-90s” are more fond of saving money: the per capita amount of money saved has increased by nearly 40% compared with 2019.
