ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, the "post-90s" are more inclined to start saving from a small amount of money, and 60% of the average amount of money saved per transaction is less than 20 yuan...
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu’ebao has also become a saving habit of the “post-90s”.
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: Data show that of the 700 million Yu’ebao users, 134 million are “post-90s”.
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about three out of every four "post-90s" in China are using Yu'ebao to save money.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized yield of money funds such as Yu’ebao has fallen to about 1.5% from the level of more than 2% at the beginning of the year.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it did not affect the pace of “post-90s” saving money.
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: In the context of the promotion of Yu’ebao’s “saving money effect”, many young people who are accustomed to using Yu’ebao have also been directly converted into “base citizens”.
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "base people" on Alipay has more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and more young people have achieved "advanced" financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu’ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that “post-90s” girls are more inclined to save more money, on average 20% higher than boys; 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more stable financial management methods than men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: What are your plans for the post-90s generation?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that the “post-90s” have the habit of saving money for the goal, and the users who use travel as the goal of saving money are the most.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many “post-90s” saved money to prepare for post-epidemic travel; the reopening of movie theaters also provided a new way to shift from saving money to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let the colorful party flag fly high on the flood levee
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, the south of China has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the situation of flood control and flood control is very grim, causing 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) such as Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong and Hubei to be affected.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster situation is the order, the disaster area is the battlefield, and the party flag is the battle flag in front of the disaster. Party organizations at all levels, party members and cadres, and people's children and soldiers resolutely implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The brightly colored party flag fluttering high on the flood levee is a manifestation of loyalty and a call to duty.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disaster, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member and cadre is a banner.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the front line of flood fighting in various places, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the party, obeyed the call of the party central committee, and built an unbreakable steel fortress with the action of "watch me", the pace of "follow me" and the courage of "I will go first".
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The bright party flag fluttering high on the flood embankment is the position of adherence and the horn of the charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of floods, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the "charge" to fight the flood, and planted the bright party flag on the flood levee.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The brightly colored party flag flutters high on the flood levee, which is selfless dedication and responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: When the people's lives and property are seriously threatened, the party members and cadres, the people's children and their families, care for everyone, selflessly contribute, dare to take responsibility, and win the hard battle of flood control and flood rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground to comprehensively test their ability, style and literacy.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: "People first, life first" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood levee, the majority of party members, cadres and people's children and soldiers should let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle and the voice of encouragement at any time and everywhere.
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC trade ministers meet to accelerate regional economic recovery - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) trade ministers held a video conference on July 25, promising to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the realization of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC informal leaders' meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: A joint statement issued after the meeting said APEC trade ministers recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties commit to ensure that emergency measures taken to respond to the outbreak are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, APEC trade ministers pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services, promote connectivity by strengthening supply chain resilience, and minimize disruption to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: APEC trade ministers agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, reiterating their commitment to facilitating essential cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stem the spread of the virus.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The conference also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential commodities.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration said that economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic are in line with WTO rules, and pledge to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade promotion and other aspects to facilitate the flow of essential goods under the epidemic.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia is still committed to promoting the success of this year’s APEC meeting, and the work of formulating a vision for post-APEC cooperation in 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging physical meetings at the end of the year when APEC leaders meet informally.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi's finance emergency issued 280 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various places jqknews
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction in various regions - www.chinanews.com

mt: On July 24, officers and soldiers of a unit of the 71st Group Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (PLA) who rushed to the local flood-fighting county in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, took advantage of the preparation gap to help a vegetable planting cooperative in Hukou County to grab peppers.
ref: On July 24, in Hukou County, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, officers and soldiers of a certain unit of the 71st Army of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who fought floods in the local area, took advantage of the spare time to help a vegetable planting professional cooperative in Hukou County rush to harvest peppers.

mt: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of acres of red pepper planted by the cooperative were seriously affected.
ref: Affected by the previous heavy rainfall, hundreds of mu of red peppers planted by the cooperative were seriously affected, and the losses would be even greater if the peppers were not picked in a timely manner.

mt: Photo by China News Agency reporter Tomita
ref: Shot by Futian, reporter of China News Service

mt: China News Service, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance announced on the 26th that according to the work deployment and requirements of the Jiangxi Provincial Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, the province's finance emergency issued the central and provincial disaster relief funds of 280 million yuan to provide financial guarantee for flood control and rescue and relief work for the disaster-stricken people.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, Nanchang, July 26 (Yuan Rujing) - Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance reported on the 26th that according to the work arrangement and requirements of Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters, Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance urgently issued RMB 280 million of disaster relief funds at the central and provincial levels to provide fund guarantee for flood control and disaster relief work.

mt: Since July, the flood season in Jiangxi has been escalating.
ref: Since July, the flood season and disaster situation in Jiangxi have been escalating.

mt: Flood disaster has led to the province's agricultural and rural direct economic losses of 10.07 billion yuan, the affected area of 13.169 million mu.
ref: Flood disaster has caused direct economic losses of RMB 10.07 billion and affected area of 13.169 million mu in Jiangxi Province.

mt: July 17 and July 22, Jiangxi provincial finance has issued the central disaster relief funds 60 million yuan and 200 million yuan.
ref: Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance respectively issued RMB 60 million and RMB 200 million of central disaster relief funds on July 17 and July 22.

mt: At the same time, according to changes in the disaster situation, from the province's emergency management special funds issued in three batches of provincial disaster relief funds 20.3 million yuan to support post-disaster relief and reconstruction.
ref: At the same time, according to the change of the disaster situation, RMB 20.3 million of provincial disaster relief funds were continuously distributed in three batches from the special funds for emergency management in Jiangxi Province to support post-disaster relief and recovery and reconstruction in various regions.

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the arrival of the flood season, 173 million yuan of various disaster prevention and reduction funds had been issued to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risk prevention, and provide financial support for flood relief work.
ref: The relevant responsible person of Jiangxi Provincial Department of Finance said on the 26th that before the flood season, the disaster prevention and mitigation funds of RMB 173 million had been allocated to ensure early detection, early disposal and early resolution of risks and provide fund support for flood fighting and emergency rescue work.

mt: At present, the water level of the Jiangxi section of the Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high and slow retreat.
ref: At present, the water level in Jiangxi section of Yangtze River and Poyang Lake, the largest freshwater lake in China, is in a state of high level and slow decline.

mt: Jiangxi Province will reduce the flood control emergency response to level II at 18:00 on the 24th; the provincial disaster relief emergency response level will be adjusted from level II to level III.
ref: At 18: 00 on the 24th, Jiangxi Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters lowered the flood control emergency response to Level II, and adjust the emergency response level of provincial disaster relief from level II to level III.

mt: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction work will continue.
ref: Disaster assessment and post-disaster recovery and reconstruction will continue.

mt: National Health Commission: 46 new confirmed cases on July 25, 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning jqknews
ref: National Health Commission: On July 25, there were 46 new confirmed cases, including 22 in Xinjiang and 13 in Liaoning - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)

mt: According to the National Health Commission, from 0 to 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 46 new confirmed cases, including 11 imported cases (5 in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong).
ref: According to the news from the National Health Commission, during 00:00-24:00 on July 25, 46 new confirmed cases were reported by 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, including 11 cases imported from abroad (5 cases in Inner Mongolia, 3 in Guangdong, 1 in Tianjin, 1 in Fujian, and 1 in Shandong), and 35 local cases (22 cases in Xinjiang, and 13 in Liaoning); there were no new deaths; and there were 2 new suspected cases, both imported from abroad (1 case in Inner Mongolia and 1 in Shanghai).

mt: On the same day, 19 new cases were cured and discharged, and 673 close contacts were released from medical observation.
ref: On that day, 19 cases were newly cured and discharged from hospital, 673 close contacts were released from medical observation, and 7 more serious cases appeared in comparison with the previous day.

mt: There are 82 confirmed cases imported from abroad (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases.
ref: Now, there are 82 confirmed cases (including 2 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases imported from abroad.

mt: A total of 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cured and discharged cases, and no deaths.
ref: Cumulatively, there are 2,045 confirmed cases, 1,963 cases cured and discharged from hospital, and no death cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, according to reports from 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, there were 288 confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), a total of 78,908 cases were cured and discharged, and a total of 4,634 deaths.
ref: As of 24:00 on July 25, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 288 existing confirmed cases (including 18 severe cases), 78,908 cumulative cases cured and discharged from hospital, 4,634 cumulative deaths, 83,830 cumulative reported confirmed cases, and 3 existing suspected cases.

mt: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced, and 11,762 close contacts are still under medical observation.
ref: A total of 779,000 close contacts have been traced cumulatively, including 11,762 close contacts still under medical observation.

mt: 31 provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government) and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); 17 cases were converted to confirmed cases on the same day (no overseas imports); 10 cases were released from medical observation on the same day (7 cases were imported from abroad); 292 cases of asymptomatic infection are still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).
ref: 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 68 new cases of asymptomatic infections (8 cases imported from abroad); and on that day, 17 cases were turned into confirmed cases (no cases imported from abroad), 10 cases were released from medical observation (7 cases imported from abroad), and 292 cases of asymptomatic infections were still under medical observation (91 cases imported from abroad).

mt: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases have been reported from Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
ref: A total of 3,009 confirmed cases were reported in Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan.

mt: Among them, 2,505 cases were in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (1,455 discharged, 18 deaths), 46 in Macao Special Administrative Region (46 discharged), and 458 in Taiwan (440 discharged, 7 deaths).

mt: Experts say gathering immigration data through the U.S. Census for House seat allocation is unconstitutional
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Civil rights groups and several U.S. cities and counties have sued the U.S. federal government, saying the Trump administration’s attempts to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. census are unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the distribution of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: “It’s not going to work,” Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the ACLU, told VOA.
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump’s requirement to determine the citizenship status of those taking the census in the census is difficult to do and “not very reliable.”
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump’s executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years," said Garvey, chairman of the board of management for Arlington County. "We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we must not let this illegal attempt to scare away and shrink our immigrant community succeed."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other groups and individuals praised President Trump’s executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: "The allocation of House and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state and the number of residents who are legally resident," he said.
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including a citizenship question on the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Donald Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross, who oversees the U.S. Census Bureau, to submit data on the undocumented population from the Census, so that the administration can exclude those undocumented people from state census numbers and determine whether each state gains or loses or retains House seats.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The United States reassigns House seats every 10 years based on demographic changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: Greenland starts a new round of mixed reform, Shanghai state-owned assets intends to transfer 17.5% of shares jqknews
ref: Greenland starts a new round of reform of mixed ownership system, and Shanghai SASAC intends to transfer 17.5% of its shares - Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn) - professional financial and economic news website

mt: Economic Observation Network reporter Rao Xianjun July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "state-owned shareholders intend to transfer part of the company's shares and resumption of trading by means of public solicitation of the transferee's indicative announcement."
ref: Economic Observation Network (eeo.com.cn)	Reporter: Rao Xianjun 	On July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) released the "Prompt Announcement on the Proposed Transfer of Partial Shares of the Company by State-owned Shareholders by Way of Public Solicitation of Transferees and Resumption of Trading”.

mt: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structure adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the shareholding structure of greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as “Shanghai Real Estate”) and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the date of the reminder announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, the new strategic investors of Greenland are still inconclusive. According to the public information of the announcement, the new strategic investors need to pay about 14 billion yuan to win the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed ownership reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may change significantly.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it operated under the pure state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the joint-stock system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; since 2015, it has been listed as a public company as a whole.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland’s current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) for 41.662 billion yuan. Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After the completion of the mixed reform, Gree Electric implemented a modern enterprise management method such as an executive incentive plan and no actual controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that the move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and accelerate a new stage of state-owned enterprise reform in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense means to achieve a unique advantage.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.

mt: The main naval parades celebrating Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with 46 ships participating, including the frigate Admiral Kasatonov, the large anti-submarine ship Admiral Kulakov, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates and submarines.
ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, a series of ships are statically displayed next to the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which is a replica of the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century, Poltava.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and special guests will be allowed to enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The last Sunday of July is Russian Navy Day.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission announced on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with Chinanews.com that his grandfather had fished in the Longxi River. Since the age of 11, he had followed his father to fish, rocking a boat, moving along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, down to longevity, every time he left home for ten days and a half months, relying on fishing to support his family.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: However, since 1997, as the rural population gradually swarmed into the town, the number of residents in the town of Gao'anchang has become more and more serious, and the environmental pollution caused by it has become more and more serious.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical plants and farms have been built along the Longxi River, which also pollute the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River became a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: "The scales of the fish that were caught were black, and the inside was black when they were cut."
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing after the river pollution is becoming more and more difficult.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: Local efforts began to make great efforts to control Longxi River pollution, including drifting, river patrol, aquatic resources management and protection.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also retired from the fishermen to change production and became a member of the river patrol team to manage and protect aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, the aquatic life reserve and related waters in the main urban area of Chongqing have been completely banned.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission, up to now, Chongqing has accumulatively retired 3,403 fishing vessels and 4,643 fishing vessels have signed withdrawal agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total tasks of the three years.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: 4404 fishermen have been repatriated, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Among the 4404 people who have been recaptured, 4267 people have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of the fishermen who have been recaptured.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Endowment insurance coverage covers 2,691 people, accounting for 61.10% of fishermen returning from fishing.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out various special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the shoreline utilization projects of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of census of sewage outlets into the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the "three phosphorus" (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical and phosphogypsum reservoirs) rectification tasks, small hydropower clean-up and rectification.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR), Mr Hui Ching-yu, said that Hong Kong's financial market remained active and operated in an orderly manner.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said at a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Chamber of Commerce (Canada Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time) that Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The Hong Kong dollar exchange rate is stable and biased towards the strong-side convertibility guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: There are no clear signs of outflows from the banking system, instead, more than $11 billion has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and there has been a flurry of public offerings in the stock market, with market turnover rising on a regular basis.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Hui said the COVID-19 pandemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong’s fundamental strengths remain intact.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong's many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, continue to make Hong Kong a leading international financial centre.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Hui pointed out that the HKSAR Government has set aside HK$6 billion in the Anti-epidemic Fund to create about 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and academic qualifications.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the HKSAR Government has also launched the “Thousand Talents Programme” to subsidise local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, recruit local talents and enrich Hong Kong’s fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking ahead, Mr Hui expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian companies to leverage on Hong Kong’s strengths and its status as an international financial centre, international asset and wealth management centre and global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby regions.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet praises China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from experience - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage, and there has been no further large-scale transmission, which has largely controlled the domestic epidemic.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health for more than a decade, making China much better prepared for the new crown than it was for severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The authors say that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially ill-prepared, especially since the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species and shared the genome sequencing data internationally on January 11, 2020.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had elucidated the clinical features of the virus, warning the world of the threat of the coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research. Such research has been carried out very quickly and rigorously through close cooperation at home under the state of emergency. In May and July, the results of the progress of early trials of the new crown vaccine developed in China were published in The Lancet.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is important to invest in national health and research systems to effectively improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective national response to health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: Other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, are worth learning from and learning from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China’s experience proves that, on the basis of strong research, it is necessary to have a strong high-level and decisive decision-making based on scientific evidence, so that the new crown epidemic can be effectively controlled.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that governments and their leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the best way for society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early stages of the outbreak, China’s National Health and Construction Commission sent three teams of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus. Their recommendations provided the basis for Wuhan’s decision to “lock down the city” on January 23. When experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and quickly implemented it; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also led to the epidemic being controlled quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: The article concludes by emphasizing that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response in response to global health emergencies.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Headquarters reporter Yang Hong
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel, North Rhine-Westphalia, killing three people.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg prosecution, the Wesel County Police Department and the Wesel City Fire Department said in a joint statement on the evening of the same day that a two-seater small plane crashed into the attic of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wesel County at about 14:40, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from the city of Mull in the Ruhr district of North Rhine-Westphalia on the same day, stopped at the airport in Wesel County, took off again, and then crashed into a residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the house that was hit and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child was rescued with only minor injuries.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the occupants of the house were not injured in the accident.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: Footage from the scene showed smoke billowing out of the house, and firefighters extinguished the blaze.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: The cause of the plane crash is currently unknown.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rheinische Post quoted police as saying there were clues that the plane might have disintegrated before it hit the residential building.
ref: The Rheinische Post quoted the police as saying that there were clues indicating that the plane had disintegrated before crashing into the residential building.

mt: Police said several parts of the plane were found near the crash site.
ref: According to the police, several parts of the crashed plane were found near the accident site.

mt: Interpol is working with Duisburg prosecutors and the German Federal Aviation Accident Investigation Agency to investigate the cause of the accident.
ref: German criminal police are investigating the cause of the accident together with Duisburg Procuratorate and German Federal Bureau of Aircraft Accident Investigation.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf on the same day that the Embassy contacted the local police and fire department. According to the scene, there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

mt: Dapeng's 'Lucky Wishes' nominated for Golden Goblet Award - Xinhua English.news.cn
ref: The Reunions directed by Dapeng was shortlisted for the Golden Goblet Awards - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 18, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected for the Golden Goblet Awards.
ref: On July 18th, the 23rd Shanghai International Film Festival announced the official list of films selected by the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: Dapeng's first realistic film "Auspicious Ruyi" was successfully nominated for the Golden Goblet Award of this year's Shanghai Film Festival. At the same time, the film officially released the first poster.
ref: The Reunions, the first realistic film directed by Dapeng, successfully entered the SIFF Golden Goblet Awards of this film festival, and the film officially released its first poster.

mt: Poster
ref: Poster. The picture is provided by the producer.

mt: The film "Lucky Ruyi" is Dapeng's first realistic theme work, and it is also his second association with the Golden Goblet Award.
ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells the story of a comedy director who returns to his hometown in the northeast rural area on a whim, hoping to make a literary movie about how the family will celebrate the New Year. As a result, he encounters a series of accidents.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

mt: The family members gathered for the filming finished the final party.
ref: The family members gathered for filming finished the final party.

mt: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of the family, is sitting in the center of the frame smoking a cigarette against the background of the black land of the northeast dressed in silver, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people always hang on New Year's Day.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion forms a huge contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement of this big family relationship.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

mt: It is reported that in the film, in addition to the daughter of "three uncle" Wang Jixiang, played by actor Liu Lu, the rest of the scenes are completed by the real director's family. The experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a providence". During the shooting, a series of sudden changes in the family caused the original shooting plan to have to be changed. Life without a script was eventually recorded into a movie, but it released the tension beyond the design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

mt: How does director Dapeng face this "destiny", and how can he continue to meet the changes brought about by this providence?
ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that “Good Luck” is full of experimentation. The almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audiovisual style turn life in front of the camera into a movie. Under the wrapping of real images, the audience will also find themselves and their families from the family presented in the film. The shadow, with the end of the family party in the film, evoke a series of reflections.
ref: There is no doubt that The Reunions is full of experiments; the almost all-round amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style have turned the life in front of the camera into a movie; under the package of real images, the audiences will find the shadow of themselves and their families from the family presented in the film; and with the end of this family gathering in the film, a series of thoughts are aroused.

mt: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics of Novel Coronavirus Infection Response and Coordination Centre Enquiry Hotline (25 July 08H00 - 26 July 08H00)
ref: NEWS.GOV.MO: Statistics through the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center (08H00 July 25 - 08H00 July 26)

ref: From 08H00 July 25 to 08H00 July 26, 2020, the Enquiry Hotline of COVID-19 Infection Response and Coordination Center intercepted 292 telephone enquiries.

mt: The 291 enquiries on the epidemic have been immediately transferred to representatives of relevant departments for follow-up. The situation is as follows:
ref: The 291 enquires about the COVID-19 pandemic were transferred to the representatives of relevant departments for follow-up, as shown below:

ref: Health Bureau: 271 enquiries (involving: quarantine; nucleic acid testing; two-site licenses; health code; and others. )
