mt: He said that the central government has always been very concerned about the changes in the epidemic situation in Hong Kong and supported the SAR government's anti-epidemic work, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive to provide assistance in increasing testing capacity and refitting the AsiaWorld-Expo into a similar "fangcang hospital".
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Zhang Jianzong said that the free virus testing provided by the SAR government for specific high-risk groups, namely residential care homes for the elderly, disabled residents and nursing home employees, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, has been fully launched, involving up to 400,000 people.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He is very concerned about the cases of infection appearing in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR government has arranged specific temporary quarantine centers for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He said that the SAR government is constructing an isolation and quarantine facility near the Chuk Kho Wan Quarantine Center in Taishan, New Territories, and is expected to provide 700 additional isolation rooms by the end of September.
ref: He said that the SAR Government was building isolation quarantine facilities near Penny's Bay Quarantine Center on Lantau Island, New Territories, and it was expected that 700 additional isolation rooms would be provided by the end of September.

mt: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the SAR government will build more than 2,000 isolation rooms at the Chuk Kho Wan Quarantine Center, and strive to be completed by the end of this year.
ref: The Chief Executive also announced on 19th that the SAR Government would build 2000 more isolation rooms at Penny's Bay Quarantine Center, and strive to complete building before the end of this year.

mt: In addition to the 800 quarantine centers that have already been put into use, the Chu Kho Bay Quarantine Center is expected to provide a total of 3,500 quarantine rooms by the end of the year.
ref: By the end of the year, Penny's Bay Quarantine Center was expected to provide a total of 3,500 isolation rooms plus of the 800 isolation rooms which have been put into use by it.

mt: There are currently four operational isolation and quarantine centers in Hong Kong, providing a total of about 2,600 isolation rooms.
ref: There are currently four isolation quarantine centers in operation in Hong Kong, providing about 2,600 isolation rooms.

mt: In addition, the SAR government re-activated the Lei Yue Mun Park Resort on Hong Kong Island on the 24th as a community isolation facility for the treatment of patients under the age of 50 who are capable of taking care of themselves independently.
ref: In addition, on the 24th, the SAR Government reopened the Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island as a community isolation facility to treat patients under 50 who have independent self-care ability.

mt: For the first time, the United States launched a countervailing investigation against China over the “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate.”
ref: The U.S. launches countervailing investigation against China for the first time on the ground of "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate”

mt: In response to the recent announcement by the U.S. Department of Commerce, it decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation on cable ties (tie-ties) products originating in China, and to launch an investigation on the “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate” project.
ref: In response to the U.S. Department of Commerce's recent announcement that it has decided to launch an anti-dumping and countervailing investigation into the ties (cable ties) originated from China and an investigation into the "undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate".

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has filed a case to investigate the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate” project in a countervailing case, and the Chinese side is firmly opposed to this.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce pointed out that this is the first time that the United States has opened a countervailing case to investigate the so-called project "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate" project, which China firmly opposes.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce of China issued a press release on this issue in particular on the evening of the 23rd, saying that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted with reference to a basket of currencies, and the market plays a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.
ref: China's Ministry of Commerce issued a press release on the evening of the 23rd day especially in this regard, said that China implements a managed floating exchange rate system based on market supply and demand, adjusted by referring to a basket of currencies, with the market playing a decisive role in the formation of the exchange rate.

mt: The press release emphasized that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and has not been undervalued.
ref: The press release stressed that, on the whole, the RMB exchange rate is at a reasonable and balanced level and is not undervalued.

mt: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated against the U.S. dollar by more than 17 percent cumulatively.
ref: Since 2005, the RMB has appreciated by more than 17% against the US dollar.

mt: According to the data released by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38%, and the real effective exchange rate appreciated by 49%, making it the most powerful currency in the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.
ref: According to data published by the Bank for International Settlements, from the beginning of 2005 to May 2020, the nominal effective exchange rate of the RMB appreciated by 38% and the real effective exchange rate by 49%, making it the strongest currency among the G20 economies and one of the most appreciated globally.

mt: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the competence of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with the rules of the World Trade Organization.
ref: The Ministry of Commerce pointed out that the exchange rate issue is beyond the authority of members to conduct countervailing investigations in accordance with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: The United States amended its regulations in February this year to conduct countervailing investigations on the exchange rates of other countries, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and has been opposed from many sides.
ref: In February of this year, the United States amended the rules to conduct countervailing investigations on other countries' exchange rates, which has been suspected of violating WTO rules and is opposed by many parties.

mt: The press release said that even in accordance with the U.S. regulations, the applicant’s complaint contained a large number of errors, and did not have the necessary elements of countervailing duties such as financial assistance, granting of benefits, and obligatory nature.
ref: The press release stated that even under the U.S. rules, the applicant's complaint contains numerous errors and does not have the necessary countervailing elements, such as financial support, benefit awarding and exclusivity.

mt: The Chinese side urges the U.S. side to abide by existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called “undervaluation of the RMB exchange rate”.
ref: China urges the U.S. to abide by the existing international rules and stop conducting countervailing investigations on the so-called "undervaluation of RMB exchange rate".

mt: Affected by the further increase in Sino-U.S. tensions, the exchange rates of offshore and onshore RMB against the US dollar fell sharply on the 22nd, and both fell below the 7.0 mark against the US dollar.
ref: Influenced by the further tensions between the U.S. and China, the offshore and onshore RMB exchange rate against the U.S. dollar depreciated sharply during the 22nd session, both falling below the mark of each 7.0 RMB Yuan for 1 U.S. Dollar.

mt: Whether this move by the US Department of Commerce intends to force the RMB to rise is worthy of attention.
ref: It is worth watching that whether the U.S. Department of Commerce’s move is intended to force up the RMB.

mt: The spot exchange rate against the US dollar rose above the 7.0 mark on the 23rd and closed at 6.9961.
ref: The spot exchange rate of RMB against U.S. Dollar rose above 7.0 on the 23rd day, closing at 6.9961.

mt: The officially regulated central parity of the RMB exchange rate against the US dollar was lowered by 17 basis points on the 24th to 6.9938.
ref: The median exchange rate of the RMB against the U.S. dollar, which is subject to official regulation, was lowered by 17 basic points to 6.9938 on the 24th day.

mt: The 26th is the day before Philippine President Duterte’s fifth State of the Nation Address (SONA) during his term of office, when the cumulative number of confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia in the Philippines surpassed 80,000 on that day, of which the number of confirmed cases of the staff of the Presidential Office (PCOO) and its directly affiliated agencies increased to 25 cases.
ref: The 26th was the day before Philippine President Duterte delivered his fifth State of the Union Address (SONA) during his term of office, and on that day, Philippines had over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, among which the number of confirmed cases in the staff of the Presidential Communications Operations Office of Philippines (PCOO) and its affiliated institutions was increased to 25.

mt: To this end, the PCOO has specially prepared a working group who has not been in contact with the confirmed staff members to cooperate with President Duterte’s press release of the SONA.
ref: Therefore, PCOO has specially prepared a working group that has not contacted the staff confirmed as cases of COVID-19 to cooperate with President Duterte's press release of SONA.

mt: PCOO Secretary Martin Andanar said in an interview with DZBB radio on the 26th that two sets of plans have been prepared for the way President Duterte will deliver the SONA.
ref: Martin Andanar, minister of PCOO, said in an interview with DZBB on the 26th that he had prepared two plans for the President Duterte’s announcement of the SONA.

mt: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Philippine Congress (Batasang Pambansa) building in Quezon City on the afternoon of the 27th.
ref: According to Plan A, Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Batasang Pambansa building in Quezon on the afternoon of the 27th.

mt: Because of the epidemic, only 50 seats are arranged on site for some government cabinet members and lawmakers, and a video conference room is set up for other cabinet members, local government officials, and others to watch.
ref: Because of the COVID-19 epidemic, only 50 seats were arranged for some cabinet members and legislators, and a video conference room was established for other cabinet members and local government officials to watch.

mt: All participants can enter the Congress building through rapid testing on the same day.
ref: All participants cannot enter the parliament building until they pass the quick testing on the same day.

mt: Once one of the participants tests positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, President Duterte will deliver the SONA at the Malacañang Palace, the presidential palace, and fewer listening seats will be arranged on-site.
ref: Once one of the participants tested positive, Plan B will be launched, that is, the President Duterte will deliver the SONA at Maracanan Palace, the Presidential Palace, and fewer seats will be arranged at the scene.

mt: As is customary, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippine nation in real time.
ref: Traditionally, the SONA will be broadcast live to the Philippines in real time.

mt: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Office has not confirmed whether Duterte’s family members will attend the SONA.
ref: As of press time, the Philippine Presidential Palace has not confirmed whether Duterte's family will attend the SONA.

mt: Andanar said that President Duterte’s SONA will focus on how the government will lead the Philippines to respond to the new crown pneumonia epidemic and restore social and economic life, and will also mention his commitments when he took office, namely anti-corruption, combating illegal drugs, and reducing poverty.
ref: Andanar said that the President Duterte's SONA would focus on how the government would lead the Philippines to deal with the COVID-19 epidemic and resume social and economic life; and the SONA would also mention the promises Duterte made when he took office, namely, fighting against government corruption, cracking down on illegal drugs and reducing poverty.

mt: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current administration, including creating more job opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who are suffering in the epidemic.
ref: Duterte will also explain other plans of the current government, including creating more employment opportunities, revitalizing the economy, promoting education, and helping overseas Filipino workers who suffered from the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Shenzhen publicly solicits opinions on the introduction of health regulations - Xinhuanet.
ref: Shenzhen solicits public opinions on issuing health regulations – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporter Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) Encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and find problems early; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; employers should equip full-time and part-time health management personnel... The Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Health Regulations (Consultation Draft) was officially released a few days ago, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shenzhen, July 26 (Reporters Mao Siqian, Bai Yu) – We shall encourage residents to take physical examinations for early detection of problems; prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors; establish a health review system for online games; and employers shall arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel ...a few days ago, the Health Regulations of Shenzhen Special Economic Zone (draft for comments) was officially issued, and Shenzhen residents will have their own "health law".

mt: In order to encourage residents to do physical examinations frequently and detect problems early, the above-mentioned consultation draft proposes that the health department should formulate a basic catalogue of health checkup items based on factors such as different ages, occupations, and so on.
ref: In order to encourage residents to take medical examinations frequently for early detection of problems, the above-mentioned draft for comments brings forward that, health departments should develop a basic catalog of health check-up items based on different factors such as age and occupation.

mt: The health checkup fees that fall within the scope of the basic catalogue of health checkup items are paid by the social medical insurance coordinating fund according to the standard of once per person per year.
ref: The cost of health check-ups within the basic catalog of health check-up items will be paid by the integrated fund of social medical insurance at the rate of once a year per person.

mt: The consultation draft makes clear that employers should rationally allocate human resources, arrange staff working hours, implement a rotation system for employees with heavy mental and physical labor load, avoid excessive wear and tear of human functions or physical and mental health damage to employees' health, and strictly implement the employee paid leave system.
ref: The draft for comments makes clearly that the employers shall reasonably allocate human resources, arrange the rest time for employees, execute the system of taking holidays by turns for employees with a heavy load of mental and physical work, so as to avoid employees’ excessive loss of human body functions or injury of physical and mental health, and shall strictly enforce the system of paid leave for employees.

mt: In addition, employers should be equipped with full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize and carry out employee health checkups.
ref: In addition, the employers should arrange full-time and part-time health management personnel, and regularly organize to carry out health check-up for employees.

mt: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the consultation draft proposes that it is forbidden to sell alcoholic beverages to minors, while restrictions on the sales positions of alcoholic beverages are imposed, and for violations of the regulations, the market supervision and management department will order corrections and impose a fine of 30,000 yuan.
ref: In terms of the physical and mental health of minors, the draft for comments proposes to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages to minors, and meanwhile, restricts the place for the sale of alcoholic beverages, and those violating the provisions will be ordered by the market supervision and management departments to make corrections and be punished by a fine of RMB30,000 Yuan.

mt: In addition to "prohibition of alcohol", minors should also "exercise more".
ref: In addition to the "ban on alcohol", minors should also "do more sports".

mt: According to the consultation draft, schools should arrange for students' physical activity time for more than one hour every day.
ref: According to the requirements of the draft for comments, schools should arrange students to spend more than one hour on physical activities every day.

mt: For online games, public security, culture, radio and television tourism, sports supervision, and health departments should improve the health supervision system for Internet service business premises, establish a health review system for online games, and create a good communication space and communication culture for promoting the healthy growth of young people.
ref: For online games, public security, culture, radio, television, tourism and sports, network supervision, health and other departments should improve the health supervision system for the Internet surfing service and business places, establish the health review system for online games, and create a good space and culture of interaction for promoting the juveniles to grow up healthily.

mt: In addition, the consultation draft also proposes that flu patients must wear masks when entering and exiting public places, and medical and health institutions shall be fined 20,000 yuan for leaking patient privacy without consent.
ref: In addition, the draft for comments also proposes that patients with flu must wear masks when entering and leaving public places, and medical health institutions will be fined RMB20,000 Yuan for disclosing patients’ privacy without their prior consent, etc.

mt: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the consultation draft also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should evaluate the impact of public policy implementation on population health before formulating planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, and approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.
ref: It is worth noting that, in addition to the physical and mental health of residents, the draft for comments also requires that all departments in Shenzhen should assess the impact of the implementation of public policies on people’s health before preparing the planning and normative documents involving urban space planning and construction, industrial park planning and construction, resource development and utilization and ecological environmental protection, biomedical industry development, etc., approving major construction projects and implementing major public service projects.

mt: Those that have not been evaluated or will have a relatively serious adverse impact on urban public health or residents’ health shall not be formulated or approved for implementation.
ref: The public policies which are not assessed, or proved after assessment to possibly produce serious negative impact on residents’ health shall not be prepared or issued, or approved to implement.

mt: Kekexili Tibetan antelope enters back migration season-Xinhua.
ref: Tibetan antelope in Hoh Xil enters the moving-back season - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) The reporter learned from the Wudaoliang Conservation Station of the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze Riveryuan Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration that monitoring shows that Tibetan antelopes that had previously migrated to the Zhuonai Lake area in the hinterland of Kekexili are ending their calves one after another and began to return to their original habitat with their cubs.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 25 (Reporter Wang Jinjin) – The reporter learned from Wudaoliang Protection Station, Hoh Xil Management Office, Yangtze River Source Park, Three-River-Source National Park Administration, that monitoring showed that Tibetan antelopes who had migrated to Zhuonaihu Tibetan Antelope Aggregation area, the hinterland of Hoh Xil, were finishing giving birth successively and began to bring their cubs back to their original habitat.

mt: The monitoring footage near the Wudaoliang Conservation Station shows that on July 25, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three Tibetan antelope cubs through 3002 kilometers of the Qinghai-Tibet Highway and the Wudaoliang North Bridge of the Qinghai-Tibet Railway, and the Tibetan antelopes have begun to move back.
ref: According to the monitoring pictures near Wudaoliang Protection Station, on July 25th, about 40 female Tibetan antelopes led three young Tibetan antelopes to pass through the Beida Bridge of Wudaoliang on the Qinghai-Tibet Highway 3002 km in succession, and the Tibetan antelopes have started to move back.

mt: Experts analyzed that in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope pups in the relocated herd accounted for one-fourth to one-fifth of the overall number of Tibetan antelope flocks.
ref: According to expert analysis, in recent years, the number of Tibetan antelope cubs in the Tibetan antelopes moving back accounted for one fourth to one fifth of the total number of Tibetan antelopes.

mt: "In the early stage of relocation, Tibetan antelopes face a high risk of predation, so the number of cubs in the flock will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs," said Lian Xinming, an associate researcher at the Northwest Institute of Plateau Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
ref: Lian Xinming, an associate researcher of the Northwest Plateau Institute of Biology of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, said: "In the early stage of moving-back, Tibetan antelopes face a higher risk of being preyed, so the number of cubs in the Tibetan antelopes will be relatively small, and there may even be no cubs. ”

mt: According to statistics from the Kekexili Management Office of the Yangtze River Source Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration, the overall number of Tibetan antelope relocating is increasing year by year, and the number of Tibetan antelope relocating back in 2019 was 4,860, an increase of 338 from 2018 .
ref: According to the statistics of Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park Administration, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back has been increasing year by year. In 2019, the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back was 4,860, with an increase of 338 compared with 2018.

mt: "It is expected that the relocation of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of relocated Tibetan antelopes is still expected to continue to increase," Lian Xinming said.
ref: Lian Xinming said: "it is expected that the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes will end in early September this year, and the number of Tibetan antelopes moving back is still expected to continue to increase. ”

mt: Tibetan antelopes are a first-class national protected animal.
ref: Tibetan antelope is a national first-class protected animal.

mt: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Aerjin Mountain in Xinjiang go to Zhuonai Lake, located in the hinterland of Kekexili, to lamb.
ref: At the end of May every year, Tibetan antelopes from Sanjiangyuan in Qinghai, Qiangtang in Tibet, and Altun Mountain in Xinjiang all go to Zhuonaihu Lake in the hinterland of Hoh Xil to give birth to lambs.

mt: Wu Xiaomin, a Tibetan antelope conservation expert in China and a researcher at the Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwestern Institute of Endangered Animals), said, "Tibetan antelope relocation is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitat with their cubs one after another after the end of calving. At first, the relocated group that left the calving area is relatively large, but then Tibetan antelopes will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations."
ref: Wu Xiaomin, an expert on Tibetan antelope protection in China and a researcher of Shaanxi Institute of Zoology (Northwest Institute of Endangered Zoological Species), said: "the moving-back of Tibetan antelopes is a process in which female Tibetan antelopes return to their habitats successively after giving birth. At first, the moving-back population leaving the breeding area is relatively large, but then the Tibetan antelope will return to their respective habitats along different paths according to different geographical populations. ”

mt: In order to ensure the safe relocation of the Tibetan antelope herd, the reporter learned that the Kekexili Management Office of the Changjiangyuan Park of the Sanjiangyuan National Park Administration has arranged staff to continue video monitoring and area patrols in the main relocation area.
ref: In order to ensure the safe moving-back of Tibetan antelopes, the reporter learned that the Hoh Xil Management Office of Yangtze River Source Park of Three-River-Source National Park National Park Administration has arranged staff to continuously carry out video surveillance and patrol in the main moving-back areas.

mt: If a herd of Tibetan antelopes is found trying to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will conduct temporary traffic control at the first time to allow the flock to pass through the wildlife passage safely, ensuring that they are as little disturbed by humans as possible during the relocation.
ref: If it is found that Tibetan antelopes try to cross the highway, the mountain patrol team will carry out temporary traffic control at the first time, so that the Tibetan antelopes can safely pass through the wildlife passage, and ensure that they are as little disturbed by human beings as possible during the moving-back.

mt: So, how to relieve heatstroke in daily life?
ref: So, how to get rid of the summer heat in daily life?

mt: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, try to avoid high temperature periods, and it is best not to walk or labor under the hot sun around noon, because the sun is strongest during this period, and the possibility of heat stroke is higher.
ref: Experts suggest that when going out in summer, we should try to avoid the high temperature period, and we'd better not walk or work in the hot sun around noon, because the sunshine is the strongest in this period, and the possibility of heatstroke is higher.

mt: If you must go out during this period, you must do protective work, such as taking a parasol, wearing a sun hat, wearing sunglasses, and if conditions permit, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.
ref: If we have to go out at this time, we must do a good job of protection, such as wearing a parasol, sun hat and sunglasses, and if we have the conditions, it is best to apply sunscreen to prevent sunburn.

mt: Try to use light-colored, air-permeable cotton, hemp, and silk textures as far as possible, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as not to dissipate heat in time when sweating a lot, causing heat stroke.
ref: We should try to choose light-colored, breathable cotton, hemp and silk fabrics, and wear less chemical fiber clothing, so as to avoid heat stroke caused by excessive sweating.

mt: When it is hot and sultry, prepare plenty of water and drink it in time, and don’t wait to drink water when you are thirsty, because once you feel thirsty, the body is already dehydrated, and each time you drink water is controlled at 150 ml to 200 ml, drink warm water, and do not drink ice water.
ref: In hot and sultry weather, we should prepare enough water to drink in time, and don't wait for thirst to drink water, because once we feel thirsty, our body is already short of water, so drink 150 ml to 200 ml each time, and drink warm boiled water instead of ice water.

mt: According to the temperature, the average person drinks 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water a day, and the high temperature workers drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water a day.
ref: According to the temperature, the average person should drink 1.5 liters to 2 liters of water every day, and the high-temperature workers should drink 3 liters to 5 liters of water every day.

mt: When sweating more, some salt water can be properly added to make up for the salt lost by the body due to sweating.
ref: When sweating more, we can supplement some salt water appropriately to make up for the salt lost by sweating.

mt: In addition, the body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which makes people feel tired and tired, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.
ref: In addition, the human body is prone to potassium deficiency in summer, which will make people feel tired and fatigued, and potassium-containing tea is an excellent summer drink.

mt: In summer, eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, etc. Fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, and melons, have a water content of 80% to 90%, which can be used to replenish water. Dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.
ref: In summer, we had better eat more fruits and vegetables with high water content, such as lettuce, cucumber and tomatoes, and fresh fruits, such as peaches, apricots, watermelons, melons, etc., which have a water content of 80% to 90% and can be used to supplement water; and dairy products can not only replenish water, but also meet the nutritional needs of the body.

mt: In addition, people who work in a high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing elements such as potassium and magnesium.
ref: In addition, people working in high temperature environment should properly supplement drinks containing potassium, magnesium and other elements.

mt: The length of summer days and nights, high temperature, the body’s metabolism is strong, it is also consumed, and it is easy to feel fatigued.
ref: In summer, the days are long and the nights are short, the temperature is high, the metabolism of human body is vigorous, the consumption is large, and it is easy to feel tired.

mt: Adequate sleep can relax the brain and body systems, which is not only conducive to work and study, but also a measure to prevent heat stroke.
ref: Adequate sleep can relax brain and body systems, which is beneficial to work and study, and is also a measure to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Experts say that the best bedtime is 22 to 23 hours, and the best time to get up is 5:30 to 6:30.
ref: Experts say that the best time to go to bed is from 22: 00 to 23: 00, and the best time to get up is from 5: 30 to 6: 30.

mt: Pay attention not to lie under the air conditioning outlet and electric fan during sleep, so as to avoid air conditioning diseases and heat stroke.
ref: When sleeping, we should be careful not to lie under the air conditioner outlet and electric fan to avoid suffering from air conditioning diseases and hot cold.

mt: Experts suggest that people who are active outdoors or working at high temperatures can carry ten drops of water, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi water or Huoxiang Zhengqi pills and other heatstroke prevention drugs, or place them in the nearest workplace and use them at any time to prevent heatstroke.
ref: Experts suggest that people who are outdoors or working at high temperature can carry heatstroke prevention drugs such as Shidi Shui, Rendan, Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui or Huoxiang Zhengqi Wan with them, or put them in the nearest workplace to use them at any time, so as to prevent heatstroke.

mt: Graduate art exhibition moved into the mall for public welfare exhibition - Xinhuanet.com.
ref: Graduates' Art Exhibition Moved into Shopping Mall for Public Welfare Exhibition - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: In the season of "cloud graduation" of major colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition opened warmly last weekend.
ref: In the “cloud graduation” season of colleges and universities, a rare offline graduate art exhibition kicked off warmly last weekend.

mt: However, it was neither in the art museum nor on the campus, but appeared in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and was open to the public for free, and will last until August 23rd.
ref: However, it is neither in the art museum nor in the campus, but in the public space of Chaoyang Joy City, and is open to the public free of charge until August 23rd.

mt: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduate art exhibition has solicited 50 pieces/group works from 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Communication University of China and Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts. The exhibition space extends from the 2nd floor to the 6th floor, and makes full use of the light boxes in the building for the flat display of works to maximize the artistic atmosphere of the graduation season.
ref: The reporter learned that this 2020 graduates’ art exhibition collected 50 works/group works of 57 young artists from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, the Communication University of China and the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts, and the exhibition space was extended from 2 floors to 6 floors, and the light boxes in the building were fully used to display the plane works, thus maximizing the artistic atmosphere in the graduation season.

mt: Under the epidemic situation, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.
ref: Under the COVID-19 epidemic, the significance of this exhibition is particularly special.

mt: Ge Pingyan, the head of Chaoyang Joy City Meichen: "We chose to bring the graduation exhibition to the 'cloud' back to the offline space again, and we also hope that more people can see the youth's exploration of themselves and understanding of the world, and amplify the healing power of art for society and the soul."
ref: Ge Ping, head of Meichen, Chaoyang Joy City, said: “we choose to bring the graduation exhibition to the ‘cloud’ back to the offline space again; and we also hope that more people can see the youth’s exploration themselves and understanding of the world, and enlarge the art for society and the healing power of the soul.  ”

mt: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were solicited from graduates of several major art colleges, and from them, they selected works suitable for commercial space display, ranging from traditional shelf paintings and sculptures to new media installations, interactive animations, and VR panoramas, with the most volume and richness in the calendar year.
ref: She revealed that the works exhibited this time were collected from graduates from the above art colleges, and they were selected to be suitable for commercial space display; and the works ranged from traditional easel painting and sculpture to new media installations, interactive animation and VR panorama, with the highest volume and richness in the past years.

mt: Among them, Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through a mixed language of mechanical and manual creation in "The First Battle of 2020"; Liu Jiaying's work Sound Money created through the Ethereum blockchain explored themes such as "cryptocurrency", "creation", "transaction"; Zhang Jiaqi's "Cat" and Qiu Daqiang's "Reinforcement" are both animals that often accompany human beings, from which you can see young artists' understanding of the relationship between humans and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu's work "Faith—Gift in Winter" is to remind young people growing up, "When you have a career one day, don't forget the original heart, remember the simplicity and sincerity."
ref: Li Yunxiao expressed his feelings in the epidemic through the creative language of mechanical and manual mixing in the “First Battle of 2020”; Liu Jiaying's work "Sound Money" created by Ethereum Blockchain discusses the subjects of “cryptocurrency”, “credit creation”, and “transaction”, etc.; Zhang Jiaqi’s “Cat Forest” and Qiu Daqiang’s “Ji” show animals that are often accompanied by human beings, from which we can see young artists’ understanding of the relationship between man and animals; and Zhu Zhongyu’s work “Winter of Faith-Gift” is to remind young people who are growing up, i.e. “when one day has a successful career, do not forget your initiative mind, and remember that simplicity and sincerity.  ”

mt: Among the few graduates who set up the exhibition in person was Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts.
ref: Li Jingyin from the Sculpture Department of the Tianjin Academy of Fine Arts is one of the few graduates who personally arranged the exhibition.

mt: "I came to Beijing on July 7. I was actually a little worried about the epidemic at that time, and I also did a nucleic acid test three days in advance, and I brought alcohol cotton and a test report to set up the exhibition."
ref: “I came to Beijing on July 7. At that time, I was actually a little worried about the epidemic; I also accepted nucleic acid testing three days in advance; and I brought alcohol cotton and testing report for the exhibition. ”

mt: His work "Yesterday as a Mystery" has a relatively complicated structure, and he must do it himself.
ref: His work “Yesterday as a Mystery” has a complicated structure, so he must do it himself.

mt: At the same time, he is also undertaking the task of helping his classmates repair the damaged works.
ref: At the same time, he also undertakes the task of helping students repair damaged works.

mt: "The exhibition was set up until 4:30 in the morning, and then the repair was done. The time was very tight, and I forgot to take a photo with the work, which is also a bit regretful."
ref: “The exhibition was arranged until 4: 30 in the morning, and then I made repair; the time was very tight; and I forgot to take a photo with the work, and it was a bit regrettable. ”

mt: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.
ref: He hopes that when the epidemic situation is more stable, he will come to Beijing with his classmates to see his work exhibition.

mt: (Reporter Li Li)
ref: (Reporter Li Wei)

mt: Rewarding 50,000 yuan, Hubei Enshi commends the "first person for early warning" of the sand dam landslide - Chinanews.com.au.
ref: Reward RMB 50,000; Hubei Enshi praised the “the person first giving early warning" of Shaziba landslide - www.chinanews.com

mt: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) On July 26, Enshi City commended Chen Guangming, a geological disaster point monitor who made important contributions to the early warning of the sand dam landslide, and sent him a 50,000 yuan bonus.
ref: Hubei Daily (Reporter Lin Jing) - On July 26, Enshi City reported and praised Chen Guangming, a monitor of a geological disaster point who made an important contribution to the early warning of Shaziba landslide, and sent him a bonus of RMB 50,000.

mt: At the same time, party members and cadres in the city were called on to learn his spirit of dedication, daring to take responsibility, taking initiative, and willingness to sacrifice.
ref: At the same time, Enshi City called on its party members and cadres to learn from Chen Guangming's spirit of fulfilling duties, daring to take responsibility, taking the initiative and being willing to give.

mt: On July 21, a landslide occurred in the sand dam of Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a barrier lake in the main stream of the Qingjiang River, and 58-year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.
ref: On July 21, a landslide occurred in Shaziba, Mazhe Village, Tunbao Township, Enshi City, which led to the formation of a dammed lake in the main stream of Qingjiang River, and 58-Year-old Chen Guangming was the first person to warn of the landslide.

mt: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned the news of the cracking of the wall in the villagers' home and immediately went to the site to check it.
ref: On the afternoon of July 17, Chen Guangming learned that the wall of a villager' home was cracked, and immediately went to the scene to check.

mt: He just walked five or six hundred meters from his home, and saw that the village group road was cracked by four or five centimeters, extending along the road to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.
ref: He had just walked five or six hundred meters from his home when he saw the village highway split four or five centimeters, extending along the highway to the cornfield, with a length of about 50 meters.

mt: Chen Guangming became alert and sent photos of the cracking of the highway to the township "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group" for the first time.
ref: Chen Guangming was suddenly alert, and immediately sent photos of highway cracking to the "Geological Disaster Monitor Contact Group” of township.

mt: After the relevant person in charge of the Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute inspected and judged on the spot, the possibility of a landslide was very high, and the decision to evacuate the masses was immediately made.
ref: After on-site inspection and judgment by the relevant responsible person of Tunbao Township Natural Planning Institute, he thought that the possibility of landslide was very high, and immediately made a decision to evacuate the masses.

mt: Chen Guangming's timely early warning won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 people from 3,315 households in the affected area.
ref: The timely warning by Chen Guangming has won 36 hours of precious time for the safe evacuation of 1,339 persons from 315 households in the affected area.

mt: No one was injured or killed in this major geological disaster.
ref: No one was caused to death or injured in this serious geological disaster.

mt: Chen Guangming's serious and responsible dedication was praised by the masses.
ref: Chen Guangming has been praised by the masses for his conscientious and responsible professionalism.

mt: In the face of the praise, he said, "There is no one who saved, it is my responsibility."
ref: In the face of praise, he said: "there is no who I saved, and this is my responsibility. ”

mt: Police report details of "female college student lost contact on tour in Qinghai" Search and rescue work continues - Xinhuanet.
ref: The police circulate a notice on the details of “a female college student lost after traveling to Qinghai”, search and rescue work is continuing – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xining, July 26 (Reporter Wang Jinjin Zhou Zhe) Recently, the incident of "a female college student lost contact after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai" has attracted the attention of netizens.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Xining, July 26 (reporters Wang Jinjin, Zhou Zhe) – Recently, the incident of “A female college student lost after traveling to Golmud, Qinghai” has aroused the concern of netizens.

mt: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, reported on the 26th that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, is still in a state of missing contact, and the police in many places are going deep into the area where Huang Moumou lost contact and actively carry out search work.
ref: The Public Security Bureau of Golmud City, Haixi Mongolian and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, informed on the 26th that a female college student from Nanjing Huang XX is still in a lost state, and the police in many places are searching Huang XX actively along the place where she was lost.

mt: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Haixi Prefecture, received a notification from the superior that Huang Moumou, a student from a university in Nanjing, took the Z164 train from Nanjing to Golmud on July 5, and on July 9th, his mobile phone was turned off and lost contact at the southwest area of Qingshui River at Sonandajie Protection Station in Qumalai County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province, and requested assistance in finding it.
ref: On July 10, 2020, the public security detachment of Gelmu City Public Security Bureau of Haixi Prefecture received a notice from the superior on requiring assistance to find Huang XX, a student of a university in Nanjing, who went from Nanjing to Golmud by the train Z164 on July 5, and later on July 9, was lost with her cell phone powered off in the southwest area of Qingshui River, Sonam Dharje Conservation Station, Qumarlêb County, Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, Qinghai Province.

mt: According to the investigation of Golmud City Public Security Bureau, Huang Moumou entered Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on the 7th.
ref: According to the investigation of the Golmud Public Security Bureau, Huang XX entered the territory of Qinghai Province at 19:54 on July 6 and arrived in Golmud City at 4:00 on July 7.

mt: At 8 o'clock on the same day, Huang Moumou, a lost person, took a taxi from Golmud Yellow River Hotel towards G109 National Road, and arrived at Korsili Sonandajie Protection Station at 12:00, and the taxi driver returned alone, Huang Moumou arrived at the Qingshui River area near Sonandajie Protection Station at 7:15 AM until it was shut down in the area at around 18:00 on 9th.
ref: The lost person Huang XX left the Huanghe Grand Hotel in Golmud by taxi and went towards the National Highway G109 at 8:00 that day, and arrived at Hoh Xil Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 12:00, when the taxi driver returned alone. Huang XX arrived in the Qingshui River area nearby Sonam Dharje Conservation Station at 15:00 on July 7, until her cell phone was powered off in this area at around 18:00 on July 9.

mt: In further investigation, the police found that Huang Moumou had passed Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13th.
ref: In the further investigation, the police found that Huang XX had passed through the Naijigou Checkpoint at 17:07 on July 13.

mt: Naijigou Checkpoint is a checkpoint set up by Nagqu City, Tibet Autonomous Region at the Nanshan Pass of Golmud City. Since the checkpoint has no video surveillance, it is impossible to determine the information of himself and the vehicle he was traveling in, and the police can only drive along the way to find out, and coordinate the various checkpoints along the way in Tibet. If Huang Moumou is found, immediately contact the Golmud City Public Security Bureau.
ref: Naijigou Checkpoint is set up by Naqu City of the Tibet Autonomous Region at the south mountain pass of Golmud City, and does not have video surveillance, so it’s impossible to determine the information on this student and the car she took, the police could only search her by driving along the way, and coordinate each Tibetan checkpoint along the way to contact Golmud Public Security Bureau immediately if discovering Huang XX.

mt: According to the latest situation, at 1 a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces to carry rescue equipment and went to the Unfrozen Spring Protection Station and Sonam Dajie Protection Station along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway to find out, and actively contacted the Sichuan police, Tibet police, and Nanjing police to carry out joint work. The search and rescue work is still continuing.
ref: According to the latest information, at 1:00a.m. on July 26, Golmud Public Security Bureau organized rescue forces with rescue equipment to go to Budongquan Conservation Station and Sonam Dharje Conservation Station along Qinghai-Tibet Highway to search the student, and contacted the police of Sichuan, Tibet and Nanjing actively to develop the work jointly, and at present, the search and rescue work still continuing.

mt: The local police hope that the majority of netizens and all walks of life will provide relevant clues to the Golmud police and Nanjing Jiangning police in a timely manner, and strive to find the lost person Huang Moumou as soon as possible.
ref: The local police hope that the netizens and all circles of the society provide relevant clues, if any, to the police of Golmud and Nanjing in time, striving to find the lost person Huang XX early.

mt: At the same time, relevant experts have suggested that tourists should be standardized, rational and civilized when they are outdoors, pay attention to roadside warning signs at all times, never venture into no-man’s land, and call the police in time in case of emergencies.
ref: At the same time, the relevant experts suggest that tourists, when carrying out in outdoor activities, should act in a standardized, rational, civilized way , always pay attention to roadside warning signs, never venture into uninhabited areas, and promptly call the police under emergencies.

mt: Russia holds a military parade to celebrate the Navy Day - Xinhuanet.
ref: Russia celebrates the Navy Day with military parade – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: On July 26, in St. Petersburg, Russia, a fleet of ships participated in the celebration of the Navy Day.
ref: On July 26, ships paraded for the Navy Day celebration in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: Xinhua News Agency (photo by Motina).
ref: By Xinhua News Agency (Photo by Mogina)

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Moscow, July 26 (Reporter Lukinbo) All Russian fleets held a military parade on the 26th to celebrate the Navy Day to commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, MOSCOW, July 26 (reporter Lu Jinbo) – On the 26th, Russian fleets held a parade to celebrate the Navy Day and commemorate the 324th anniversary of the founding of the Russian Navy.

mt: On the same day, the Russian North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleets held military parades in the waters where their respective bases are located, with a total of 15,000 servicemen, 219 ships of various types and 71 military aircraft participating.
ref: On that day, Russia's North Sea, Baltic Sea, Black Sea, Caspian Sea and Pacific Fleet held parades in the seas where their respective bases are located, with the participation of 15,000 soldiers, 219 ships of all types, and 71 military aircrafts.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Putin attended the military parade of the Baltic Sea Fleet.
ref: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces Vladimir Putin attended the parade of the Baltic Fleet.

mt: About 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes participated in the local military parade.
ref: Around 4,000 servicemen, 46 ships and more than 40 warplanes took part in the local parade.

mt: Putin first inspected the fleet of ships in the waters of the Kronstadt naval base in the Baltic Sea.
ref: Putin first reviewed the fleet in the waters of the Kronstadt Naval Base in the Baltic Sea.

mt: After that, he arrived in the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the military parade held on the Neva River.
ref: After that, he arrived at the waters of the Neva River in the center of St. Petersburg by speedboat and went ashore to watch the parade held on the Neva River.

mt: Putin made a speech at the military parade, saying that the modernization and technical level of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years, and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020. In a recent interview, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with the Russian defense ministry newspaper Red Star newspaper that the plan to build Russian ships has been effectively implemented, and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is on a larger scale in recent years.
ref: In his speech at the parade, Putin said that the modernization of Russian naval equipment has continued to improve in recent years and that the Russian Navy will receive a total of about 40 new ships equipped with unique hypersonic strike systems in 2020.

mt: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a maritime fleet, which opened up the history of the Russian Navy.
ref: In addition, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Yevmenov said in an interview with Red Star, the newspaper of the Russian Ministry of Defense, that Russia's plan to build ships is being effectively implemented and the number of new ships the Russian Navy plans to receive in 2020 is the largest in recent years.

mt: The last Sunday in July every year is the Russian Navy Day. #Russian Navy Day;
ref: In 1696, Tsar Peter the Great set out to build a naval fleet, starting the history of the Russian Navy.
Russian Navy Day is celebrated every year on the last Sunday of July.

mt: In response to the new changes in epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participate in epidemic prevention and control work.
ref: In consideration of the new changes in the epidemic prevention and control work, since July 17, the trade unions at all levels in Xinjiang have responded to the call of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions to actively participated in the epidemic prevention and control work.

mt: Tianshan North and South trade union cadres, workers, and model workers walked into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering food and medicine, disinfection and sterilization, and publicizing epidemic prevention knowledge to serve the workers and masses, and demonstrate the “hard core strength” of the trade union with practical actions.
ref: The cadres, staff and model workers of the trade unions across Tianshan went into street communities and residents to carry out activities such as delivering vegetables and medicines, disinfecting and sterilizing, and propagating knowledge of epidemic prevention, serving the workers and masses, and demonstrating the "hard core power" of trade unions with practical actions.

mt: Recently, the condolence team of the Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions in Urumqi City delivered a batch of urgently needed epidemic prevention and control living materials to the staff of 12 isolation points.
ref: Recently, the condolence group of Urumqi Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions sent a batch of urgently needed living materials for epidemic prevention and control to the workers in 12 isolation points.

mt: After the outbreak, Tianshan District total invested more than 1.05 million yuan at the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly-affiliated grassroots labor unions.
ref: After the outbreak of COVID-19 epidemic, Tianshan District Federation of Trade Unions invested more than RMB 1.05 million in the first time, which was urgently allocated to 23 directly affiliated grass-roots trade unions.

mt: After receiving the company’s notice on epidemic prevention and control, Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of China Construction Xinjiang Construction Engineering First Construction and chairman of the trade union, took the initiative to ask for help and chose to stay on duty at the unit to escort the employees.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo, deputy secretary of the Party Committee and chairman of the trade union of CSCEC Xinjiang Construction & Engineering Group No.1 Construction Co., Ltd., took the initiative to volunteer after receiving the notice of the company on epidemic prevention and control, and chose to stay on duty in the unit to escort the employees.

mt: He sent cooking utensils, food, and daily necessities for the employees living in the unit dormitories and newly recruited employees, and organized personnel to send them essential supplies for life every two days.
ref: Zhao Xiangguo sent cooking utensils, food and daily necessities to the employees who lived in the dormitory and who joined the company newly, and organized personnel to send daily necessities to them every two days.

mt: “From July 21, the cadres and employees who are on the front line of the ‘war epidemic’ will be touched down, and the method of online orders and door-to-door delivery will be adopted, and the 704 front-line workers and workers in Urumqi will be the first to purchase supplementary anti-epidemic supplies and living materials.”
ref: "From July 21, the trade unions found out the cadres and workers who stick to the front line of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic', and supplemented and purchased epidemic prevention supplies and living materials for 704 front-line workers in Urumq by adopting online orders and merchants delivering goods to home. ”

mt: The head of the Xinjiang transportation trade union told reporters that in the face of the sudden epidemic, they did their best to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily promote various work in transportation development, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting the “epidemic” together.
ref: The person in charge of Xinjiang Transportation Trade Union told reporters that in the face of sudden occurrence of the COVID-19 epidemic, they made every effort to ensure epidemic prevention and control services, steadily push forward the development of transportation, and create a strong atmosphere of fighting against the 'COVID-19 epidemic' with one heart.

mt: At present, it is the high temperature in summer, and labor unions at all levels are keeping an eye on the frontline workers in key areas for epidemic prevention and control, and put the “sending cool” care and care into practice.
ref: At present, because of the high temperature in summer, trade unions at all levels keep a close eye on the front-line workers in key areas of epidemic prevention and control, and put the care of "sending coolness and refreshing" into practice.

mt: On July 19, the Urumqi County Federation of Trade Unions launched the “sending cool” condolences to frontline workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the county police stations, card points, and health systems received condolences such as drinks and fruits.
ref: On July 19, the Federation of Trade Unions Urumqi County launched a condolence activity of "sending cool and refreshing" to the front-line workers in epidemic prevention and control, and the police stations, checkpoints and health systems in the county received condolences such as drinks and fruits.

mt: “The union cadres should further improve their political standing, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people’s hearts with care, and inspire fighting spirit with actions.
ref: "The cadres of trade unions at all levels should further improve their political positions, strengthen their responsibilities, warm people's hearts with care, and inspire people's morale with actions.

mt: It is necessary to give full play to the role of trade unions in cohesive and unite workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control service guarantees, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of the majority of workers, and send care to frontline workers.”
ref: The trade unions at all levels should give full play to the role of trade unions in rallying and uniting workers, do a good job in epidemic prevention and control services, actively safeguard the health rights and interests of workers, and send care to the front-line workers. ”

mt: The relevant person in charge of the Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.
ref: The relevant responsible person of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions said.

mt: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in 2020 is in full swing-Xinhua.
ref: 2020 Direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in full swing - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (Reporter Jia Qilong) The Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission and the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission recently jointly issued a notice to deploy and launch the direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers in 2020 from graduates of ordinary colleges and universities.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Jia Qilong) – The Political Work Department of the Military Commission, the National Defense Mobilization Department of the Military Commission jointly issued a notice recently to make deployment for the 2020 direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers from the graduates of general institutes of higher education.

mt: This year’s direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers covers more than 270 military and local general majors in 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, focusing on increasing the recruitment of majors such as drones, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, and small languages, and the recruitment scale has increased by nearly 2,000 people compared with last year.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will cover more than 270 general military specialties of 64 categories such as computer, automation, and machinery, and focus on the specialties like UAV, navigation, aerospace, electronic information, minority languages, and nearly 2000 more people will be recruited as compared with the last year.

mt: This year’s direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers is organized and implemented synchronously with the recruitment of conscripts, starting on August 1st and ending on September 30th.
ref: The direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the recruitment of compulsory servicemen will be organized and implemented simultaneously, starting on August 1 and completed on September 30.

mt: The enlisted youth can inquire about the conditions of direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of specialties in various regions through the National Recruitment Website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit the registration information online that meets the scope of specialty and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs in the conscripted areas.
ref: Young applicants can check the conditions for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers and the distribution of recruitment specialties around the country through the national conscription website (website: http://www.gfbzb.gov.cn), submit their registration information online if they meet the specialty scope and recruitment conditions, and participate in the follow-up recruitment work such as physical examination and political assessment according to the unified requirements of the military service organs of the conscription areas.

mt: Qualified youth who fail to be recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the recruitment specialty and program restrictions can participate in the compulsory recruitment, and when the compulsory military service expires, they will be selected as non-commissioned officers, and the years of studying in ordinary colleges and universities according to the prescribed academic system will be regarded as service time.
ref: Qualified youths who are not recruited as non-commissioned officers due to the limitation of recruiting specialty and program can participate in the conscription of compulsory servicemen, if they are selected as non-commissioned officers upon the expiry of obligatory military service, the years of study in general institutions of higher education in accordance with the prescribed academic system will be considered as service time.

mt: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the recruitment offices of the provincial or prefecture-level people’s governments, and majors with rich registration potential will be selected on the basis of comprehensively measuring the academic level of the applicants, academic performance in professional courses during school, and obtaining vocational qualification certificates, etc. Scarce majors will be targeted for targeted counterpart recruitment from colleges and universities that meet the local professional requirements and have recruitment advantages.
ref: The recruitment of non-commissioned officers this year will be uniformly organized by the Conscription Office of the provincial or prefectural or municipal people’s government, for the specialties with rich registration potential, the best applicants will be selected by comprehensively measuring their educational level, scores of professional courses in college, and certificates of professional certificates, etc., for scarce specialties, the personnel will be recruited pertinently from the local colleges and universities which meet specialty requirements and have recruitment advantages.

mt: According to the requirements of normalized epidemic prevention and control, this year’s direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will not in principle be arranged to report on their own, and will be entered into operation battalions synchronously with the compulsory soldiers.
ref: According to the requirements of the normal prevention and control of the pandemic, the non-commissioned officers directly recruited this year, in principle, won’t be arranged to report for duty by themselves, but will be synchronously organized and transported into the camp together with compulsory servicemen.

mt: The enrollment time for direct recruitment of non-commissioned officers will be counted from September 1, 2020, and the time when the troops issue the non-commissioned officer appointment order is December 1, 2020 .
ref: The time of enlistment of non-commissioned officers directly recruited will be calculated from September 1, 2020, and the service order will be issued by the army to non-commissioned officers on December 1, 2020.

mt: The receiving unit will formulate a scientific enlistment and professional training plan, carefully organize the training, and after the completion of training, the recruited non-commissioned officers will be uniformly and accurately assigned to the counterpart professional and technical posts in accordance with the principle of counterpart professional and consistent recruitment.
ref: Troop receiving units will develop enlistment and professional training programs scientifically and organize training in earnest; and then distribute the recruited non-commissioned officers to the technical posts of pertinent specialties uniformly and precisely.

mt: Spokesperson of the Embassy in the UK: The Chinese government is a staunch defender of cybersecurity - Chinanews.com.
ref: Spokesman of Chinese Embassy in the UK: Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security – www.chinanews.com

mt: Chinanews.com, July 26 (Xinhua) -- According to the website of the Chinese Embassy in the UK, on the 25th, the spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in the UK answered a reporter's question on wrong remarks about cyber attacks.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to the news at the website of the Chinese Embassy in London, on the 25th day, the spokesman of the Chinese Embassy in London answered reporters' questions on the wrong remarks about cyber attacks.

mt: The spokesperson stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman stressed that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Some reporters asked: According to the media, a hacking organization related to China has interfered with a British company's network system, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and invaded the government networks of EU countries.
ref: A reporter asked: As claimed by some media, some hacker organizations related to China have ever interfered with a British company's network systems, launched attacks on British and American technology companies that hold patent data, and hacked into government networks of European Union countries.

mt: The spokesperson said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always resolutely opposed and cracked down on any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.
ref: The spokesman said that the Chinese government is a staunch defender of cyber security and has always firmly opposed and combated any form of cyber attacks and cyber crimes.

mt: Cyberspace is highly virtual, difficult to trace, and diverse actors. When investigating and qualifying cyber incidents, sufficient evidence should be presented and no unwarranted guesses should be made.
ref: For strong virtual nature, difficulty in source tracing, and diversified actors of cyberspace, we shall provide sufficient evidence, instead of resorting to unwarranted speculation, when investigating and determining the nature of network events.

mt: According to the spokesperson, a series of incidents such as the "Prism Gate" in the past have proved that the United States has always carried out the world's largest cyber-stealing operation.
ref: The spokesman said that, the U.S. has been conducting the cyber-secrecy operation of the largest scope in the world, as evidenced by the past series of events such as Prism Event.

mt: It is in the common interest of all countries to maintain peace and stability in cyberspace.
ref: Maintaining the peace and stability in cyberspace is in the common interest of all countries.

mt: The spokesperson pointed out that China's achievements in scientific and technological innovation are not stolen or looted, but obtained through self-reliance and hard work.
ref: The spokesman pointed out that China's achievements in technology innovation are not stolen or robbed, but have been made through self-dependence and hard work.

mt: In 2019, China submitted about 59,000 patent applications through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) route, with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country with the largest number of international patent applications filed.
ref: In 2019, China submitted around 59,000 patent applications by means of Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT), with an annual growth rate of 10.6%, becoming the country submitting the most international patent applications.

mt: China has become a powerhouse in innovation and intellectual property.
ref: China has become a great power in innovation and intellectual property.

mt: Most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have basically completed secondary testing in high-risk areas - China News Service.
ref: Free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi, and secondary test is carried out in high-risk areas – www.chinanews.com

mt: Chinanews.com, Urumqi, July 26 (Reporter Sun Tingwen Zhao Yamin) When reporting the latest epidemic situation and nucleic acid testing situation in Urumqi, Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Committee, said on the 26th that at present, most areas of free nucleic acid testing in Urumqi have been basically completed.
ref: Www.wlmq.chinanews.com, July 26 (reporters Sun Tingwen, Zhao Yamin) - Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: The State Council expert group and experts from the autonomous region and Urumqi are making further assessments on the development of the epidemic based on the results of nucleic acid testing and epidemiological investigations.
ref: The expert panel of the State Council and the experts of the Autonomous Region and Urumqi are carrying out further assessment on the development of the pandemic according to the results of nucleic acid test and epidemiology investigation.

mt: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th to inform the situation of the epidemic and prevention and control in Xinjiang.
ref: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Information Office held a press conference on the 26th day to inform about the epidemic situation and prevention & control in Xinjiang.

mt: According to him, from 00:00 to 24:00 on July 25, 22 new confirmed cases of new coronary pneumonia were added in Urumqi (5 of which were asymptomatic infected persons transferred to confirmed cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infected persons were added.
ref: As introduced by him, from 00:00 to 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 22 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 (including 5 confirmed cases transferred from the asymptomatic infection cases), and 38 new asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: As of 24:00 on July 25, there were 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infected persons in Urumqi.
ref: As of 24:00 of July 25, Urumqi had 135 confirmed cases and 147 asymptomatic infection cases.

mt: The newly added asymptomatic infected persons on the 25th were also basically obtained through the city’s free nucleic acid testing and active screening.
ref: The asymptomatic infection cases newly increased on the 25th day were basically discovered through the free nucleic acid test and initiative screening in the city.

mt: Zhang Wei, director of the Urumqi Municipal Health and Health Committee, said on the 26th that most of the free nucleic acid testing work areas in Urumqi have been basically completed.
ref: Zhang Wei, Director of Urumqi Municipal Health Commission, said when reporting the latest pandemic and nucleic acid test on the 26th day that, at present, free nucleic acid test has been basically completed in most areas of Urumqi.

mt: He also said that from the experience of other areas in China, there are many factors that affect the results of nucleic acid testing, such as the sensitivity of the detection reagent, the infection time and detoxification time of the tested person, the cooperation of the tested person when the specimen is taken (poor cooperation may lead to the specimen not being taken in place), as well as the testing environment, and the operating proficiency of the inspection personnel.
ref: He also said that, as seen from the experience of other regions in China, the results of nucleic acid test are affected by many factors, such as the sensitivity of test reagents, the time of infection and detoxification of the tested persons, the cooperation of the tested persons when the specimens are taken (poor cooperation may result in the improper acquisition of specimens), as well as the test environment and the operational proficiency of test personnel.

mt: For various reasons, nucleic acid tests will also have false negative results.
ref: False negative result will possibly appear in the nucleic acid test for various reasons.

mt: The so-called false negative means that the tested person is indeed an infected person, but the nucleic acid test result is negative.
ref: So-called false negative refers to that a tested person is infected actually, but the result of his or her nucleic acid test is negative.

mt: In addition, for people who have had close contact with confirmed and suspected cases, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out.
ref: In addition, two nucleic acid tests are usually required to rule out persons who have had close contact with confirmed or suspected cases.

mt: For people who have been to high-risk areas in the epidemic, if they have fever and respiratory symptoms, a negative nucleic acid test may have a false negative, so two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule out.
ref: For persons who have been to medium- and high-risk areas of the pandemic, and have fever and respiratory symptoms, two nucleic acid tests are also required to rule them out since one nucleic acid test will possibly produce the result of false negative.

mt: He said that in view of the above situation, and for the health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, starting today, Urumqi City will conduct secondary free nucleic acid testing in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibak District, and at the same time carry out "investigating omissions and filling omissions".
ref: He said that, in view of the above-mentioned situation, for the physical health of the people of all ethnic groups in the city, Urumqi will carry out secondary free nucleic acid test and develop “the check and supplement of omissions” in key areas such as Tianshan District and Shayibake District.

mt: It is reported that Tianshan District and Shayibak District are high-risk areas for the epidemic.
ref: It’s learnt that Tianshan District and Shayibake District are high-risk areas of the pandemic.
