mt: White House epidemic expert Fauci: Cautiously optimistic that a vaccine will be developed in early 2021. Fauci said.
ref: White House epidemic expert Fauci: I am cautiously optimistic about the development of vaccines in early 2021

mt: Fauci made the above remarks at a network video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.
ref: Fauci made the above remark at an online video conference hosted by the International Leadership Foundation on the 25th.

mt: He reminded that it is not clear how the new crown epidemic will develop in the autumn and winter, and what the final impact of the epidemic will be, “and the only way to end it all is for each of us to choose to be part of the problem.”
ref: He reminded that it was not clear how the COVID-19 epidemic would develop in autumn and winter, nor what the final impact of the COVID-19 epidemic would be, but "the only way to end all this is for each of us to choose to be part of the solution".

mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University in the United States, as of 21 o’clock on the 25th, the number of confirmed cases of the new crown in the United States has reached 4.176 million, and 146,000 people have died.
ref: According to the data from the Johns Hopkins University of the United States, as of 21: 00 on the 25th, there were 4.176 million confirmed cases and 146,000 deaths in COVID-19.

mt: Fauci said that some regions in the United States are currently struggling to fight the rebounding epidemic.
ref: Fauci said that some areas in the United States were struggling to fight against the rebounding COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Although the outbreaks are different in different places and need to respond to local conditions, a diversified anti-epidemic strategy does not mean that there is no close ties between regions.
ref: Although the epidemic varies from place to place, it is necessary to develop solutions depending on the local conditions, but diversified anti-epidemic strategies do not mean that there is no close connection between regions.

mt: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.
ref: The epidemic in one region will eventually affect other regions.

mt: “Now is not the time to be complacent,” Fauci said, “our work is not done, we must step up our efforts, and we must also be vigilant about the uncertainties of the future.”
ref: "Now is not the time for complacency," Fauci said, and "our work has not been completed, we must step up our efforts, and we must be vigilant against the uncertainty in the future.  ”

mt: Dayi He, a Chinese American medical expert and founder of “Cocktail Therapy” for the treatment of AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the new crown epidemic in the United States has not yet reached its peak.
ref: He Dayi, an American Chinese medical expert and founder of "cocktail therapy" for treating AIDS, pointed out at the meeting that the COVID-19 epidemic in the United States had not yet reached its peak.

mt: “Each of us must do our part to slow the spread of this virus.”
ref: "Each of us must do our part to slow down the spread of this virus.  ”

mt: Dayi He called on the public to use their actual actions to buy time for scientists to step up the development of new crown treatments and vaccines.
ref: He Dayi called on the public to use their practical actions to buy time for scientists to step up research and development of the therapeutic drugs and vaccines for COVID-19.

mt: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization with the purpose of promoting international exchange activities in the United States and the Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and nurturing young international leaders.
ref: The International Leadership Foundation is a non-profit organization aiming at promoting the international exchange activities in the United States and Asia-Pacific region, and is committed to promoting the status of Asian-Pacific Americans and cultivating international young leaders.

mt: On the same day, U.S. Secretary of Transportation Zhao Xiaolan, Federal Congressman Meng Zhaowen, and International Leadership Foundation founding president Dong Jiling, and others, spoke at the meeting respectively.
ref: On the same day, Zhao Xiaolan, minister of the United States Department of Transportation, Grace Meng, member of United States House of Representatives, and Dong Jiling, founding president of the International Leadership Foundation, etc., spoke at the meeting respectively.

mt: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific American medical workers and volunteers fighting the epidemic on the frontline, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to epidemic prevention guidelines such as “social distancing” to curb the spread of the epidemic.
ref: They paid special tribute to the Asian-Pacific medical workers and volunteers who fought the epidemic in the front line, and called on the American public to continue to adhere to the epidemic prevention guidelines such as "keeping social distance" to curb the spread of the epidemic.

mt: Representatives of U.S.-China trade talks rumored to meet in August.
ref: U.S. - China trade talks representatives rumored to meet in August

mt: Hong Kong’s South China Morning Post quoted an anonymous person familiar with the matter on the 25th that the head of China’s trade negotiation team, Vice Premier Liu He and co-leader of the U.S. team, trade representative Lai Haizhe, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides’ implementation of the first phase of the China-U.S. trade agreement.
ref: Hong Kong's South China Morning Post reported on the 25th August by citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter that Liu He, the head of China's trade negotiation team and the Vice Premier of the State Council, and Robert Lighthizer, the co-leader of the U.S. team and Trade Representative, are expected to hold formal talks in August to assess the two sides' implementation of the first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement.

mt: The report said that although China has significantly increased the amount of U.S. agricultural purchases in the past few months, due to factors such as the new coronavirus epidemic, the Chinese side’s purchases are still some distance away from the amount promised in the trade agreement.
ref: According to the report, China has significantly increased its purchases of U.S. agricultural products in the past few months, but because of the COVID-19 pandemic and other factors, Chinese purchases are still some distance away from the quantities promised in the trade agreement.

mt: Analysts said that the recent mutual closure of each other’s consulates by the United States and China, combined with other disputes, may undermine any progress on trade between the two sides.
ref: Analysts said that the closure of each other's consulates by the U.S. and China and their other disputes could derail any progress on trade between the two sides.

mt: The China-U.S. phase one trade agreement, which took effect one month after the signing on January 15, stipulates that a trade framework group formed by high-level leaders of the two sides should hold talks every six months.
ref: The first phase of the U.S.-China trade agreement, which took effect one month after it was signed on Jan. 15, stipulates that a trade framework group composed of high-level officials from both sides should hold talks once every six months.

mt: The meeting will be “an important turning point” for both sides to assess the progress of the agreement, the person said.
ref: A source close to the matter said that, the meeting will be "an important turning point" for the two sides to assess the progress of the agreement.

mt: But the person also said that if the U.S.-China tensions lead to low willingness to talks at this time, the two sides may agree that the May 8 conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He has met the terms of the semi-annual talks in the trade agreement.
ref: But the source also said that if U.S. - China tensions lead to a low willingness to talk at this time, the two sides may agree that the conference call between Lai Haizhe and Liu He on May 8, which meets the terms of the trade agreement to hold talks once every six months.

mt: This year, China-U.S. relations have deteriorated rapidly, with disputes between the two sides including a series of issues such as the origin of the new coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea, and ideology.
ref: Since this year, the China-US relations have deteriorated sharply, and the disputes between the two sides cover a range of issues such as the origin of novel coronavirus, trade, Hong Kong, Xinjiang, the South China Sea and ideology.

mt: Although U.S. President Trump boasted about his achievements in the first phase agreement at the beginning of the year, his attitude has changed recently.
ref: U.S. President Trump has changed his attitude recently, despite boasting about his achievements in the first phase of the agreement earlier in the year.

mt: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd that although China has recently purchased a record amount of U.S. corn and bought a lot of soybeans in a single day, “this trade agreement is not as meaningful to me now as it was when it was reached”.
ref: He said at a White House press conference on the 23rd day that, China’s single-day purchase of U.S. corn has broken the record, and also, China has bought a lot of soybeans recently, "but now, this trade agreement means less to me than it did when it was reached."

mt: An anonymous Beijing government adviser also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations, and “trade issues have lost weight in China-U.S. relations.”
ref: An anonymous adviser from Beijing Government also believes that a new round of trade talks is unlikely due to poor U.S.-China relations and that "the issue of trade has lost its weight in the China-U.S. relations."

mt: But he disclosed that relevant Chinese economic and trade units still met on the 23rd to discuss a series of issues, including how to increase imports from the United States, “We have already done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult”.
ref: But he revealed that China's relevant economic and trade units still met on the 23rd day to discuss a range of issues, including how to increase imports from the U.S. "We have done our best to buy, so any additional purchases will be difficult".

mt: Peng Jiening, vice chairman of the U.S.-China National Trade Commission, said that maintaining momentum in the phase one agreement is “more important than ever,” and pointed to China’s progress in further opening up the financial market to U.S. companies this year.
ref: Jake Parker, the Vice President of the U.S.-China Business Council, said it is "more important than ever" to maintain the momentum of the first phase of the agreement, and that China has made progresses this year in further opening its financial markets to U.S. companies.

mt: "Talking is better than not talking, although it may be seen as routine," said analysts at independent research firm Plenum.
ref: An analyst from Plenum, an independent research firm, said, "It's better to hold talks than not to do so, even though it may only be treated as routine. ”

mt: Yu’ebao’s earnings decline “Post-90s” instead “retaliate” saving money?
ref: Yu Ebao's Revenue Declines, But "Post-90s" to Save Money "in a Retaliatory Way"?

mt: With Yu’ebao’s earnings going down, “Post-90s” not only did not flee Yu’ebao, but began to “retaliate” saving money?
ref: With the decline in the income from Yu Ebao, the "post-90s" did not only escape from it, but began to save money in a "retaliatory" manner?

mt: The “Yuebao Post-90s Saving Money Report” (2020 edition) released by the China Academy of New Economic Research jointly with Alipay a few days ago shows that in the first half of the year, “post-90s” love saving money more: the amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to 2019 .
ref: The "Report on Yu Ebao Savings of Post-90s" (2020 version) recently released by the China Institute of New Economics and Alipay shows that in the first half of the year, "post-90s" love to save money more than before: the average amount of money saved per capita has increased by nearly 40% compared to that of 2019.

mt: Interestingly, “post-90s” are more inclined to start saving from a “small amount of money”, and 60% of the average amount of money saved per transaction is below 20 yuan... ....
ref: What’s interesting is that "post-90s" tend to start saving from “small amounts”, and 60% of the savings are less than RMB20 each...

mt: Saving money with Yu’ebao has also become the “post-90s” saving habit.
ref: Saving money with Yu Ebao has also become the habit of saving money for "post-90s".

mt: The data shows that of the 700 million Yu’ebao users, 134 million are “post-90s”.
ref: Related data indicate that among the 700 million Yu Ebao users, 134 million are "post-90s".

mt: There are 174 million “post-90s” in China, that is, about 3 out of every 4 “post-90s” across the country are saving money with Yu’ebao.
ref: There are 174 million "post-90s" in China, that is to say, about 3 out of 4 "post-90s" in the country are using Yu Ebao to save money.

mt: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return of money funds such as Yu’ebao has slipped to about 1.5% from a level above 2% at the beginning of the year.
ref: At present, the 7-day annualized rate of return from currency funds such as Yu Ebao has fallen to around 1.5% from a level of higher than 2% at the beginning of the year.

mt: Even so, it has not affected the pace of “post-90s” saving money.
ref: Even so, it did not affect the pace of saving money by the "post-90s".

mt: And in the context of the “money saving effect” of Yu’ebao, many young people who are used to using Yu’E Bao have also been directly converted into “basic people”.
ref: In the context of enhanced Yu Ebao's "money saving effect", many young people who are accustomed to using Yu Ebao have also directly become into "fund investors".

mt: Alipay data shows that as of July 13, the “new Jimin” on Alipay in the past month has more than doubled year-on-year, and more and more young people are achieving “advanced” financial management on Alipay.
ref: According to Alipay data, as of July 13, the number of new "fund investors" on Alipay more than doubled year-on-year in the past month, and more and younger people have "upgraded" their wealth management practices on Alipay.

mt: Some analysts believe that the inflow of funds from Yu’ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.
ref: Some analysts believe that the flow of funds from Yu Ebao into the stock market is also an important reason for the clear decline in the share of money funds in June.

mt: The report also shows that “post-90s” girls are more inclined to save more money, with an average amount of money saved by two percent higher than that of boys; among the users who hold funds on the Alipay platform, 60% are men, and women tend to choose a more robust financial management method compared to men.
ref: The report also shows that "post-90s" girls are more inclined to save more money, which is on average 20% higher than that of boys, 60% of users who hold funds on the Alipay platform are men, and women tend to choose more robust financial management methods compared with men.

mt: After saving money, what is the plan for the “post-90s”?
ref: After saving money, what plans do the "post-90s" have?

mt: Alipay data shows that the “post-90s” have the habit of saving money as a goal, and the users who take travel as their goal to save money are the most.
ref: Alipay data indicate that "post-90s" have the habit of saving money for their goals, and the most users make travel as their goal.

mt: Affected by the epidemic, many "post-90s" have saved money to prepare for travel after the epidemic; the resumption of cinemas has also provided a new way to switch from saving to consumption.
ref: Affected by the pandemic, many "post-90s" save money to prepare for post-pandemic travels, and the reopening of movie theaters also provides a new way for them to switch from saving money to start consumption.

mt: Let a brightly-colored party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment.
ref: Erect a Bright Party Flags to Fly them High on Flood-Fighting Embankments

mt: Recently, the south of our country has been affected by continuous rainfall, and the situation of flood control and flood-fighting is very grim, causing disasters in 26 provinces (districts and cities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei.
ref: Recently, southern part of our country has suffered from continuous rainfalls, making flood control situations very severe, 26 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) including Guizhou, Sichuan, Hunan, Guangxi, Guangdong, and Hubei have been affected.

mt: The disaster is the order, the disaster-stricken area is the battlefield, and in the face of the disaster, the party flag is the battle flag. Party organizations at all levels, the majority of party members and cadres, and the people’s disciples resolutely follow the spirit of General Secretary Jinping’s important instructions on flood control and disaster relief work, and quickly devote themselves to the front line of flood control and flood-fighting rescue and relief, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-stricken area and the fresh force of the flood-fighting battle.
ref: The disastrous situation is the order for fighting, and the disaster-hit areas are the battlefields, facing the disaster, the Party flag becomes a battle flag, Party organizations at all levels, the vast number of Party members and cadres, and the people’s army have resolutely implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on flood prevention and disaster relief work, and quickly gone to the front lines for flood control and prevention, becoming the backbone of the masses in the disaster-hit areas and fresh flood-fighting troops.

mt: The brightly-colored party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a manifestation of loyalty and a call of mission.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-resistant embankments are demonstrating the loyalty and calls of duty.

mt: In the face of disasters, a party organization is a battle fortress, and a party member cadre is a flag.
ref: In the face of disasters, a Party organization is a battle fortress, and one Party member or cadre is just a banner.

mt: On the flood-fighting front lines everywhere, party organizations at all levels and the majority of party members and cadres embody a high degree of loyalty to the party, obey the call of the Party Central Committee, and with the actions of “see me,” the pace of “come with me,” and the courage of “I go first,” to build an unbreakable steel fortress and stand up a sturdy and unbending Chinese ridge.
ref: On the front lines of fighting floods in various places, Party organizations at all levels and the vast number of Party members and cadres have demonstrated a high degree of loyalty to the Party, they listened to the calls of the Party Central Committee, and built numerous unbreakable steel fortresses and keep upright their unbendable Chinese backbones with their actions, steps and strong courage.

mt: The brightly-colored party flag fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankment is the perseverance of the position and the clarion call to charge.
ref: The bright Party flags are fluttering high on the flood-fighting embankments, and they are strongholds for protecting battle fields and charging horns.

mt: In the face of flood disasters, party organizations at all levels acted quickly, sounded the “charge trumpets” for flood fighting, and planted the bright-colored party flags on the flood-fighting embankment. The vast number of party members and cadres and the people’s disciples stood firm on the flood-fighting positions, and with the will and actions of “the party flag is at the position,” and “the flood will never recede, never withdraw troops,” became the most assured and trustworthy strong barrier for the masses in the disaster-stricken areas.
ref: In the face of flood disasters, Party organizations at all levels acted swiftly to erect the flags on the flood-fighting embankments, the vast number of Party members and cadres and people’s army are standing firmly on the flood-fighting positions, and their strong will and actions have become the most assured and trustworthy solid barriers for the people in the disaster areas.

mt: The brightly-colored party flag flying high on the flood-fighting embankment is a selfless dedication and a responsibility.
ref: The bright Party flags flying high on the flood-fighting dams represent selfless dedication and responsibility-taking actions.

mt: In times of crisis, show the true character of party members, and at a time when the lives and property of the people are seriously threatened, party members and cadres, the people’s children and soldiers, take care of everyone, selflessly and dare to take responsibility, and regard winning the hard battle of flood control, flood relief, rescue and disaster relief as the main battlefield and parade ground for comprehensive testing of ability, style, and literacy. It is this spirit of selfless dedication and responsibility that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to win the battle against floods, and gathers a strong spiritual force to win the flood control, rescue, and disaster relief.
ref: In times of crisis, the true qualities of Party members shine out, when people’s lives and properties are seriously threatened, Party members and cadres, and the people’s army make selfishless contributions and act responsibly to fight the floods and disasters, they will eventually win the tough battles of flood prevention and their actions will be taken as comprehensive capability style, and quality tests, and it is this spirit that greatly inspires the confidence and determination of the people in the disaster-stricken areas to overcome the disasters, and gather a powerful spiritual force to win flood prevention, flood relief and disaster relief battles.

mt: “People first, life first” is not only tested in peacetime, but also at critical moments.
ref: "The people are supreme and life is most important" is not only tested in peacetime, but also tested at critical moments.

mt: On the flood-fighting embankment, the majority of party members, cadres, and people’s children and soldiers, let the people see the bright red party flag, the figure of struggle, and the voice of encouragement at any time and anywhere, add luster to the party flag with the steel embankment that cannot be washed away by the flood, and let a bright party flag fly high on the flood-fighting embankment!
ref: On the flood-fighting banks, the large number of Party members and cadres and soldiers of the people’s army place the bright flags in ways allowing all the people to see them, allowing people to witness their struggling actions, and hear their encouraging voices at anytime and anywhere. They will add lusters to the Party flags with the unbreakable steel-like dams and make the flags fly high on the flood-control embankments!

mt: APEC member trade ministers say they will accelerate regional economic recovery - Xinhua.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade meeting says to accelerate regional economic recovery-Xinhua Net

mt: KUALA LUMPUR, July 25 (Reporter Lin Hao) The Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) member trade ministers video conference held on the 25th pledged to work to reduce the impact of the new crown epidemic on the regional economy and accelerate the promotion of a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.
ref: Kuala Lumpur, July 25, Xinhua News Agency (By Lin Hao) - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) ministers responsible for trade met by video conference on July 25 and pledged to reduce the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic on the region's economy and accelerate efforts to achieve a resilient, sustainable and inclusive regional economic recovery.

mt: The meeting was hosted by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC leaders' informal meeting.
ref: The meeting was held by Malaysia, the host of this year's APEC Leaders' Informal Meeting.

mt: A joint statement issued after the meeting said that APEC member trade ministers recognize the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.
ref: A joint statement released after the meeting said APEC ministers responsible for trade recognized the importance of a free, open, fair, non-discriminatory, transparent and predictable trade and investment environment to drive economic recovery at this challenging time.

mt: All parties committed to ensure that the emergency measures taken to respond to the outbreak are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, while complying with World Trade Organization rules.
ref: The parties acknowledged to ensure that emergency measures taken in response to the epidemic are targeted, appropriate, transparent and temporary, do not create unnecessary trade barriers and disrupt global supply chains, and comply with World Trade Organization rules.

mt: In the statement, APEC member trade ministers committed to strengthen cooperation to promote the flow of essential goods and services, promote interconnectivity by strengthening supply chain resilience, and minimize disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the outbreak.
ref: In the statement, APEC ministers responsible for trade pledged to strengthen cooperation to facilitate the flow of essential goods and services and enhance supply chain resilience to promote interconnectivity, thereby minimizing disruptions to the flow of medical supplies, food and agricultural products in response to the epidemic.

mt: APEC member trade ministers unanimously agreed that it is necessary to discuss how to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, reaffirming their commitment to promoting essential cross-border movement of people without affecting the measures taken to stem the spread of the outbreak.
ref: APEC ministers responsible for trade agreed on the need to discuss ways to reduce non-tariff barriers that restrict trade in essential goods, and reaffirmed their commitment to facilitating the necessary cross-border movement of people without compromising measures taken to stop the spread of the epidemic.

mt: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the flow of essential goods.
ref: The meeting also issued a declaration on promoting the circulation of essential goods.

mt: The declaration stated that economies will ensure that the trade measures they have taken to respond to the outbreak are in line with WTO regulations, and committed to taking actions in reducing non-tariff trade barriers and promoting trade to facilitate the flow of essential goods under the outbreak.
ref: The declaration said that, economies will ensure that the trade measures they take in response to the epidemic comply with WTO rules, and commit to take action in reducing non-tariff trade barriers, trade facilitation and other areas to facilitate the necessary flow of goods under the epidemic.

mt: Malaysian Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali, who chaired the meeting, said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to promoting the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work of formulating APEC's post-2020 cooperation vision is progressing in an orderly manner.
ref: Presiding over the meeting, Malaysia's Minister of International Trade and Industry Azmin Ali said that despite the impact of the epidemic, Malaysia remains committed to the success of this year's APEC meeting, and the work to develop a vision for APEC cooperation beyond 2020 is progressing in an orderly manner.

mt: Malaysia agreed to hold relevant APEC meetings in video format, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the APEC informal leaders' meeting.
ref: Malaysia agreed to hold APEC-related meetings by video, but did not rule out the possibility of arranging a physical meeting at the end of the year when the APEC leaders meet informally.

mt: Jiangxi Finance Emergency Issued 280 Million Yuan Funds to Support Post-Disaster Relief and Reconstruction in Various Places - China News Service.

mt: Experts say collecting immigration data through the U.S. Census for allotment of House seats is unconstitutional.
ref: Experts say it is unconstitutional to collect immigration data through U.S. Census for seat allocation in the House of Representatives

mt: Some civil rights groups and several U.S. cities and counties have sued the U.S. federal government, saying President Trump's attempt to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census is unworkable and unconstitutional.
ref: Some civil rights organizations and governments of several U.S. cities and counties filed suits against the U.S. federal government, claiming that the attempts made by Trump’s Presidential Palace to exclude undocumented immigrants from the U.S. Census are unworkable and unconstitutional.

mt: The U.S. Census will determine the allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The U.S. Census will determine allocation of seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

mt: "It's not going to work," Sarah Brannon, executive attorney for the American Civil Liberties Coalition, told VOA.
ref: Sarah Brannon, the executive attorney of the American Civil Liberties Alliance, told VOA, "It won't work. ”

mt: She went on to say that Trump's requirement to determine the citizenship status of people receiving the census in the census is difficult to do and "is not very reliable."
ref: She went on to say that Trump's request to identify the citizenship of the people through the census is difficult and "not very reliable. ”

mt: Another civil liberties group, Common Cause, filed a lawsuit Thursday challenging Trump's executive order.
ref: Another civil liberties organization Common Cause filed a lawsuit on Thursday to challenge Trump's executive order.

mt: Some cities in New Jersey, Georgia joined the lawsuit.
ref: Some cities in New Jersey and Georgia joined the lawsuit.

mt: Arlington County, Virginia, joined the lawsuit Friday.
ref: Arlington County, Virginia, also joined the lawsuit on Friday.

mt: Garvey, president of Arlington County's board of management, said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years. We must accurately count every single person who lives in Arlington County and cannot allow this illegal attempt to scare people away and squeeze the number of people in our immigrant community."
ref: Arlington County Board of Management Chairman Garvey said, "The U.S. Constitution requires an accurate count of our population every 10 years.  We must accurately count everyone who lives in Arlington County, and we will not allow this illegal attempt for scaring away people and shrinking the number of our immigrant communities to succeed. ”

mt: Other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.
ref: Some other organizations and individuals praised President Trump's executive order.

mt: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.
ref: Alabama Attorney General Marshall called the executive order a "victory" for the state.

mt: He said that "the allocation of state House seats and Electoral College seats must be based on the number of residents who live in each state and are legally resident."
ref: He said, "The allocation of seats in the House of Representatives and Electoral College seats in each state must be based on the number of residents living in each state, and the number should be that of the residents living legally there. ”

mt: The U.S. Supreme Court last year blocked the Trump administration from including the citizenship question on the 2020 census form.
ref: The U.S. Supreme Court last year prevented the Trump administration from including citizenship issues in the 2020 census form.

mt: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week directing the U.S. Census Bureau's Commerce Secretary Ross to submit data on undocumented populations obtained from the census, so that the administration can exclude those undocumented people from state census numbers and, as a result, determine whether each state increases or decreases or keeps House seats.
ref: President Trump signed an executive order earlier this week instructing Secretary of Commerce of the U.S. Census Bureau to submit data on the undocumented population obtained from the census so that the administration can exclude these undocumented populations from the state census, and in addition to that, the data will be used to determine whether each state will increase or decrease or maintain the seats of the House of Representatives.

mt: The U.S. is to reallocate House seats every 10 years based on population changes.
ref: The United States redistributes the seats of House of Representatives every 10 years based on the demographic changes.

mt: Minister Counsellor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, Mrs. Tseng Thi Sin, along with representatives from the Vietnam Buddhist Association in Laos, the Lao Vietnamese Federation, the Vientiane Provincial Government, the Lao Veterans Association and other representatives attended the memorial ceremony.

ref: Minister Counsellor Tay Thi Son said in his speech that this is an opportunity for the Vietnamese and Lao people in Laos to jointly remember the revolutionary martyrs of the two countries, and to express their gratitude together for the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the independence and freedom of the two countries; meanwhile, this is a good opportunity for the two peoples to recall that the two countries worked side by side to fight against the common enemy, fight for national independence and national unity, seek national development, and consolidate their relations together.

mt: 74 years ago on January 23, 1946, 28 soldiers of the Lao-Vietnamese Fighting Union died heroically while attacking the Phonehe stronghold.

ref: Ms. Tay Thi Son stressed that the two peoples will always remember the martyrs who sacrificed their lives for the cause of struggle for national liberation of the two countries, and meanwhile, he emphasized that the young generation of the two countries will continue to carry forward the old-timers’ tradition of being brave and strong, and make their due contributions to the continued blossoming of Vietnam-Lao relations and the prosperous development of the two countries.

mt: The contents of the announcement show that in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Property") and Shanghai Urban Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Urban Investment") intend to transfer part of the company's shares held by agreement through public solicitation of transferees, and the total proportion of shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.
ref: According to the content of the Announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises, optimize the restructuring of the layout of state-owned assets, and improve the equity structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou (Group) Co., Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou") intend to transfer the Company’s partial shares held by them by means of public solicitation of transferees. The total proportion of shares to be transferred will not exceed 17.5% of the total capital stock of Greenland.

mt: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average prices of the 30 trading days before the prompt announcement date (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value of each share of the company in the most recent fiscal year.
ref: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be less than the higher of: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price for the 30 trading days preceding the date of prompt announcement (July 27, 2020); and the audited net asset value per share of the Company for the latest fiscal year.

mt: At present, there is still no conclusion on the new strategic investors of Greenland. According to the information published in the announcement, it is estimated that the new strategic investors will need to pay about 14 billion yuan in order to take the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed reform of Greenland.
ref: At present, there is not a final conclusion about the new strategic investors of Greenland, as estimated according to the information publicized in the Announcement, new strategic investors need to pay RMB14.0 billion for getting the 17.5% of shares to be transferred in this reform of mixed ownership system.

mt: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is expected that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder and actual controller, but the control structure may undergo major changes.
ref: It is worth noting that after the completion of this share transfer, it is predicted that Greenland will still have no controlling shareholder or actual controller, but the control power structure may change significantly.

mt: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its establishment: from 1992 to 1997, it operated in accordance with market-oriented rules under a purely state-owned system; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the shareholding system with state-owned holdings and employee shares; from 2013-2015, it introduced strategic investors, forming a hybrid ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has been listed as a whole and became a public company.
ref: Greenland Holdings has carried out several institutional and mechanism reforms since its founding: from 1992 to 1997, Greenland operated under a purely state-owned system according to market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, this Company established and continuously improved a stock system of share controlling by state-owned companies and share holding by employees; from 2013 to 2015, it introduced strategic investors to form a mixed ownership system with cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, it has gone listed on the whole and become a public company.

mt: Greenland's current mixed-reform plan is similar to Gree. In December 2019, Hillhouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% of Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) with 41.662 billion yuan, and Gree Group retreated to a minority shareholder. After the mixed reform was completed, Gree Electric implemented modern enterprise management methods such as executive incentive plans and no actual controller structure.
ref: Greenland's present plan for the reform of mixed ownership system is similar to that of Gree, in December 2019, HillHouse Capital led Zhuhai Mingjun to take over 15% shares of Gree Electric (000651.SZ) at the cost of RMB41.662 billion, and Gree Group became a minority shareholder, after completion of the reform of mixed ownership system, Gree Electric implemented modernized corporate management methods, such as the incentive plan for senior executives, and the structure without actual controller.

mt: Both Shanghai Real Estate and Shanghai Urban Investment are state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by Shanghai SASAC. Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland’s move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned and state-owned enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned state-owned enterprises in a new stage in accordance with the requirements of the Party Central Committee. It fully demonstrates the new reform ideas of adapting measures to local conditions and tailoring to genre. By introducing new excellent strategic shareholders to listed companies, it supports enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.
ref: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou are both state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by the Shanghai SASAC (Shanghai State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission), Zhang Yuliang, the chairman and president of Greenland Holdings, said that Greenland's this move is an important action for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new phase according to the requirements of the CPC Central Committee, fully demonstrating the new idea of reform tailored to local conditions and the needs of individuals, by introducing new outstanding strategic shareholders to the listed company, it will support enterprises to further improve the degree of marketization, enhance the freedom of operation and management, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

mt: Can Andy Lau Tsing-Yun "Dismant" New Sparks - Xinhuanet.com.
ref: Can Liu Dehua and Liu Qingyun "create” a new spark - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" recently announced that it will be released on December 24, becoming the first film of the Chinese New Year to be fixed.
ref: The filmmaker recently announced that the Shock Wave 2 would be released on December 24th, becoming the first film to be finalized for the Lunar New Year.

mt: The second film is still directed by Qiu Litao, produced and starring Andy Lau, and unfolds with a brand-new story.
ref: The Shock Wave 2 is still directed by Qiu Litao, supervised by Liu Dehua and starring in it, with a brand-new story.

mt: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the second film also makes the challenge faced by the Bomb Disposal Expert even more difficult. Several shocking glimpses in the preview have made the heart hang in the air, the mushroom cloud of the big explosion, the airport engulfed by fire, and the scene is quite shocking.
ref: It is reported that the addition of the "nuclear bomb" element in the Shock Wave 2 also makes the challenge faced by bomb squad even more difficult, several glimpses in the preview have already made people's hearts hang on the line, and the mushroom cloud of the big explosion and the airport engulfed by flames are quite shocking.

mt: Three years ago, "The Bomb Disposal Expert", produced by the original team, won the fifth-tier box office champion of the year, and won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Qiu Litao × Andy Lau also became the gold medal partner in the audience's mind.
ref: Three years ago, the Shock Wave, produced by the original team, won the May 1st box office champion and won seven nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and Qiu Litao × Liu Dehua also became the gold partner in the audience's mind.

mt: This time, "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" also makes people look forward to whether this ace combination can wipe out new sparks.
ref: This Shock Wave 2 also makes people look forward to whether this ace combination can spark a new spark.

mt: "The Bomb Disposal Expert 2" tells a brand-new story: the former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Andy Lau) fainted at the scene of the bombing case and was listed as a suspect by the police.
ref: The Shock Wave 2 tells a brand-new story: The former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Liu Dehua) faints at the scene of the bombing and is listed as a suspect by the police.

mt: In order to find the truth, he had to ask his friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert, for help.
ref: In order to find the truth, he had to seek help from his good friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Liu Qingyun), who is also a bomb disposal expert.

mt: Pang Ling (played by Ni Ni), who is anxious to solve the case and who is also Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, was also involved.
ref: Pang Ling (played by Ni Ni), the female inspector who is eager to solve the case and Pan Chengfeng's ex-girlfriend, is also involved.

mt: Still a bomb disposal expert, but from the fixed-file trailer, one can feel the complexity of Andy Lau's new role: a leg was broken and a prosthetic limb was worn, while being chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, while being commanded by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni to act.
ref: It's still the Shock Wave, but we can feel the complexity of Liu Dehua's new role from the preview: he breaks a leg, puts on a prosthetic leg, is chased by Liu Qingyun, who is also a bomb disposal expert, and is directed by his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

mt: What exactly is the relationship between the three, what exactly did Andy Lau do at the Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, what twists and turns his career as a bomb disposal expert has gone through, and all kinds of mysteries make people curious.
ref: What is the relationship between the three persons, what did Liu Dehua do in Xiangdao Hotel, what kind of case he was involved in, and what twists and turns he experienced in his career as a bomb disposal expert, all kinds of mysteries make people curious.

mt: It is understood that the highlights of the film are the world landmarks in Hong Kong, which are filmed on the spot, and the top special effects production team brings a shocking and realistic visual impact.
ref: It is understood that the main event of the film is to take pictures of the world landmarks in Hong Kong on the spot, and with the top special effects production team, so it brings shocking and vivid visual impact.

mt: (Reporter Nie Qing)
ref: (Reporter Nie Qing)

mt: China News Service, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Comprehensive Russian Satellite Network reported that July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - Integrated Sputnik reported that, July 26 is the Russian Navy Day, and the main military parades to celebrate the Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt.

mt: Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, Putin, arrived in Kronstadt to participate in the celebration, where 15 ships and submarines were reviewed.
ref: Vladimir Putin, Russian President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived in Kronstadt for the celebrations, and in this place, 15 ships and submarines were inspected.

mt: On July 28, 2019 local time, a grand military parade was held in St. Petersburg, Russia to celebrate the Navy Day.
ref: On July 28, 2019, local time, a grand military parade was held to celebrate the Navy Day in St. Petersburg, Russia.

mt: According to reports, Putin congratulated the naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, and sailed by a small boat next to the ships that will participate in the maritime military parade on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the paraded troops at the subjective stand.
ref: It’s reported that Putin celebrated naval officers and soldiers on the Navy Day, sailed by the naval ships which would appear in the maritime parade on the Gulf of Finland in a small boat, and then reviewed the paraded troops on the main viewing stand.

mt: Putin said that the Russian Navy fleet was loaded with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment has been continuously improved.
ref: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet is equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment is constantly improved.

mt: "The Russian Navy fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submersible cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, aircraft such as the latest aircraft, unique weapons and special equipment," Putin said at the military parade of the Russian Navy Day.
ref: Putin said at the Russian Navy Day parade that, "The Russian naval fleet has warships equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submarine cruisers and multipurpose submarines, the latest aircrafts and other air vehicles, unique weapons and special equipment. ”

mt: On June 24 local time, the Red Square military parade commemorating the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War was held in Russia.
ref: On June 24, local time, Russia held the Military Parade at Red Square to celebrate the 75th Anniversary of Victory in the Patriotic War.

mt: He also said that the Russian Navy fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.
ref: He also said that, Russian naval fleet will gain unique advantages by means of digitalization and effective defense.

mt: Reports said that the main naval parade to celebrate the Russian Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt, with a total of 46 ships participating, including the "Admiral Kasatonov" frigate, the "Veteran Admiral Kulakov" large anti-submarine ship, as well as large landing ships, small guided missile ships, frigates, submarines, and so on.
ref: It’s reported that, the main naval parades to celebrate the Russian Navy Day were held in St. Petersburg and Kronstadt with the participation of 46 naval ships, including the “Admiral Kasatonov” Frigate, the “Vice-Admiral Kulakov” Large Anti-submarine Ship, as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, and submarines.

mt: Among them, the series of ships were statically displayed beside the Hermitage Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of them was the copied Russian first battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.
ref: Wherein, a series of naval ships were displayed in a static way nearby the Palace Bridge in St. Petersburg, and the most notable of which was a replica of the “Poltava”, the first Russian battleship of the early 18th century.

mt: In order to avoid the spread of the new crown virus, only local residents and specially invited guests were able to enter Kronstadt during this year's naval parade.
ref: To avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and distinguished guests can enter Kronstadt during the naval parade this year.

mt: The last Sunday in July every year is Russian Navy Day.
ref: The last Sunday of each July is the Russian Naval Day.

mt: China News Service, Chongqing, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) The Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Commission released a news on the 26th that the city has so far returned 4,404 fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: Www.cq.chinanews.com, July 26 (Reporter Liu Xian) - Chongqing Development and Reform Commission announced on 26 that the city had returned 4,404 fishermen had given up fishing in the city by then, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Li Daiguo, 53, said in an interview with a reporter from China News Network that his grandfather was fishing in the Longxi River, and since he was 11 years old, he followed his father to catch fish, shaking the boat, and walking along the Longxi River, up to Liangping, Chongqing, and down to Changshou, every time he left home for ten days and a half months, relying on fishing to support his family’s livelihood.
ref: In an interview with a reporter from Chinanews.com, Li Daiguo, a 53-year-old fisherman, said they had been fishing in the Longxi River since the generation of his grandfather. He started fishing by following his father since he was 11. Rowing their boat, they travelled along the Longxi River to Liangping, Chongqing upstream and to Changshou downstream. Every departure from home would last for ten to fifteen days. The whole family relied on fishing to maintain family life.

mt: But since 1997, as the rural population gradually rushed to Changzhen, there were more and more residents in Gao’anchang Town, causing more and more serious environmental pollution.
ref: However, since 1997, as the rural population has gradually poured into the town, more and more residents came to live in the fisheries and town, resulting in increasingly serious environmental pollution.

mt: Paper mills, chemical factories, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.
ref: Paper mills, chemical plants, and breeding farms were built along the Longxi River, which also polluted the river.

mt: By 2007 and 2008, the Longxi River turned into a stinking ditch.
ref: By 2007 and 2008, Longxi River had become a stinking ditch.

mt: “The scales of the fish caught are all black, and the inside is also black after being cut open.”
ref: "The scales of the fish caught are all black, and fish interiors were also black after being cut open. ”

mt: Li Daiguo said that fishing after the pollution of the river became more and more difficult.
ref: Li Daiguo said, fishing became more and more difficult after the river water was polluted.

mt: The local area began to make great efforts to control the pollution of the Longxi River, including Qingping, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: The local government began to make great efforts to control the pollution, including cleaning up items floating on the river, patrolling the river, and protecting aquatic resources.

mt: Li Daiguo also changed from fishermen to returning to production, becoming a member of the river patrol team, and protecting aquatic resources.
ref: Li Daiguo also gave up fishing and switched his career to become a river inspection team member for managing and protecting the aquatic resources there.

mt: From January 1, 2020, a comprehensive fishing ban has been implemented in Chongqing’s aquatic biological protection zone and related waters in the main urban area.
ref: Starting from January 1, 2020, a comprehensive ban on fishing was implemented in Chongqing Aquatic Life Reserve and related waters in the main urban area.

mt: According to the data of the Chongqing Municipal Development and Reform Committee, as of now, Chongqing has accumulated 3 340 return fishing vessels and 4,643 have signed back fishing agreements, accounting for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total three-year task.
ref: According to data from Chongqing Development and Reform Commission, as of now, the number of fishing vessels giving up fishing has gradually grown to 3,403 in Chongqing city and number of fishing ships for which fishing abandonment agreements were signed has reached 4,643, which accounted for 63.3% and 86.3% of the total number defined in the three-year overall target plan respectively.

mt: There have been 4,404 return fishermen, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.
ref: 4,404 fishermen have retired from fishing, accounting for 42.54% of all fishermen involved.

mt: Of the 4,404 returned fishermen, 4,267 have achieved employment, accounting for 96.89% of the total returning fishermen.
ref: Among them, 4,267 have been employed, accounting for 96.89% of all.

mt: Endowment insurance coverage covers 1,269 people, accounting for 61.10% of the returning fishermen.
ref: Pension insurance and security were provided to 2,691 of them, accounting for 61.10% of all the retired fishermen.

mt: In the next step, Chongqing will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate the clean-up and rectification of the use of the coastline of the main stream of the Yangtze River, complete a new round of surveys of the discharge outlets of the Yangtze River and carry out corresponding rectification actions, basically complete the rectification tasks of “three phosphorus” (referring to phosphate rock, phosphate chemical industry and phosphogypsum storage), clean up and rectify small hydropower, promote the special actions of afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen the construction of green mines, consolidate the special rectification results of illegal docks and illegal sand mining in the main stream of the Yangtze River, and further promote the ban on capture and withdrawal in the Yangtze River Basin.
ref: Next, Chongqing government will carry out in-depth special rectification actions, accelerate sorting up of the shoreline utilization projects along the Yangtze River, and complete a new round of surveys of the Yangtze River's sewage outlets and carry out corresponding rectification actions, it will basically complete remediation of the three types of enterprises involving phosphorus (phosphate mines, phosphorous chemical plants and phosphogypsum warehouses), cleanup and rectification of small-scale hydropower plants, promote the special afforestation and greening on both sides of the Yangtze River, strengthen construction of green mines, consolidate the achievements from special rectifications of illegal docks and illegal sand mining practices on the mainstream of the Yangtze River to further promote the fishing ban and fishing give-up actions in the Yangtze River Basin.

mt: HONG KONG, July 25 (Xinhua) -- Hong Kong's financial market remains active and operating in an orderly manner, according to the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government's Secretary for Financial Affairs and the Treasury, Mr Hui Zhengyu.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 25 - Xu Zhengyu, the Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, said that the financial market in Hong Kong remains active and functioning in an orderly manner.

mt: He expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: He was optimistic about the financial stability and economy in Hong Kong.

mt: At a webinar co-organised by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong Canadian Chamber of Commerce (Canadian Federation) on the 24th (Toronto time), Mr Hui said that Hong Kong is experiencing difficult conditions because of the "revision storm" and the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At a webinar co-organized by the Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in Toronto and the Hong Kong-Canada Business Association (Canadian General Chamber of Commerce) on July 24 (Toronto time), Xu Zhengyu said Hong Kong is going through a difficult situation because of the "controversy over the amendment of Fugitive Offenders Ordinance" and the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The exchange rate of the Hong Kong dollar is stable and skews to the strong side's exchange guarantee level.
ref: The exchange rate of Hong Kong dollar is stable and tilted towards the guaranteed level of exchange for the strong side.

mt: The banking system has no obvious signs of outflow of funds, on the contrary, more than $11 billion in capital has flowed in since June.
ref: The banking system shows no clear signs of capital outflows, but on the contrary, more than USD11 billion has flowed in since June.

mt: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase in the past few months, the stock market has had a series of public offerings to raise funds, and market transactions have repeatedly risen.
ref: Total bank deposits have also continued to increase over the past few months, and the stock market has seen a spate of public offerings to raise fund, with market transactions rising repeatedly.

mt: Xu Zhengyu said that the new crown pneumonia epidemic has brought pressure to the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's basic advantages remain unchanged.
ref: Xu Zhengyu said the COVID-19 epidemic has put pressure on the global economy and financial markets, but Hong Kong's fundamental strengths remain intact.

mt: Hong Kong has several advantages, including geography, rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system, making Hong Kong a leading international financial centre consistently.
ref: Hong Kong continues to be a leading international financial center for its many advantages, including geography, the rule of law, high-speed communications, free flow of information and capital, and a simple and low tax system.

mt: Hui Zhengyu pointed out that the SAR government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Anti-epidemic Fund" to create about 30,000 time-bound positions in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.
ref: Xu Zhengyu pointed out that the Hong Kong SAR Government has set aside 6 billion Hong Kong dollars in the "Pandemic Prevention and Control Fund" to create around 30,000 time-limited jobs in the public and private sectors in the next two years, covering people with different skills and educational backgrounds.

mt: To support the development of fintech, the SAR government has also launched the "Thousand Talents Plan" to fund local fintech companies, start-ups and other enterprises with fintech-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, employ local talents and enrich Hong Kong's fintech talent pool.
ref: To support the development of financial technology, the Hong Kong SAR Government has also launched the "1,000 Talents Scheme" to subsidize local financial technology companies, start-ups and other enterprises with financial technology-related businesses to create 1,000 new jobs, hire local talents and enrich the financial technology talent pool in Hong Kong.

mt: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed optimism about Hong Kong's financial stability and economy.
ref: Looking forward to the future, Xu Zhengyu expressed the optimism for the financial stability and economy of Hong Kong.

mt: He encouraged Canadian businesses to make good use of Hong Kong's advantages and its status as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center, and a global offshore RMB business hub to develop and invest in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and nearby areas.
ref: He encouraged Canadian companies to seek development and make investments in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area and nearby regions by making best of Hong Kong's strengths and its position as an international financial center, an international asset and wealth management center and a global hub for offshore RMB business.

mt: The Lancet article commends China's anti-epidemic efforts and encourages countries to learn from their experiences - Chinanews.com.
ref: The Lancet published an article praising China’s anti-epidemic efforts and encouraging countries to learn from China’s experience - www.chinanews.com

mt: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th that as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a size similar to that of Europe or the United States, China has effectively controlled the new crown epidemic at this stage without recurring widespread transmission, largely controlling the domestic outbreak.
ref: The Lancet magazine published an article on the 25th, saying that China, as a country with a population of 1.4 billion and a scale similar to that of Europe or the United States, has effectively controlled the COVID-19 epidemic at the present stage, and the COVID-19 epidemic has not spread widely in China again, thus largely controlling the domestic COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: The article said that in the past more than a decade, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which has made China's preparation for the new crown much better than that of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) that year.
ref: The article indicates that in the past decade or so, China has invested heavily in domestic research and public health construction, which makes China's preparation for COVID-19 much better than that for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS).

mt: The authors said that when the SARS outbreak occurred in 2002, China was initially underprepared, especially the pathogen could not be identified.
ref: According to the author, when SARS broke out in 2002, China was not prepared enough at first, especially the pathogen could not be determined.

mt: When the new coronavirus was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were soon able to identify the virus species, and on January 11, 2020, they shared genome sequencing data with the world.
ref: When COVID-19 was discovered in December 2019, Chinese scientists were able to identify the virus species quickly, and shared the genome sequencing data with the international community on January 11, 2020.

mt: By the end of January, doctors from mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical characteristics of the virus, and warned the world of the threat of the new coronavirus through research papers published in The Lancet.
ref: By the end of January, doctors from Mainland China and Hong Kong had clarified the clinical features of COVID-19, and warned the world about the threat of COVID-19 through research papers published in The Lancet.

mt: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research, and such research was carried out very quickly and rigorously through close domestic cooperation when the state declared a state of emergency, and in May and July, the results of the early trials of the new crown vaccine developed by China were announced in The Lancet, respectively.
ref: China has also been at the forefront of vaccine research; under the state of emergency declared by the country, such research has been carried out very quickly and strictly through close domestic cooperation in China; and in May and July, the results of early trials of COVID-19 vaccine developed by China were published in The Lancet respectively.

mt: China's experience shows that it is very important to effectively invest in the national health and research system and improve laboratory capacity.
ref: China's experience shows that it is very important to invest in the national health and research system and effectively improve the laboratory capacity.

mt: This is the basis for a rapid and effective response to national health emergencies and global health security.
ref: This is the basis for China to respond quickly and effectively to health emergencies and global health security.

mt: It is very worthwhile for other countries, especially low- and middle-income countries, to learn from and learn from.
ref: Other countries, especially low-income and middle-income countries, are worth learning from China's experience.

mt: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, a strong high-level executive must decisively make correct decisions with scientific evidence, which makes the new crown epidemic under effective control.
ref: In addition, China's experience proves that on the basis of strong research, there must be a strong high-level institution to make correct decisions decisively based on scientific basis, so that the COVID-19 epidemic can be effectively controlled.

mt: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand the value of science, and act on it in the most beneficial way to society.
ref: The article emphasizes that the government and its leaders must respect science, understand its value, and take actions against COVID-19 in the most beneficial way to society.

mt: In the early stages of the outbreak, China's National Health Commission sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of the new coronavirus, and their recommendations provided the basis for the decision to "close the city" on January 23. When experts raised the necessity and urgency of building a Fangcang shelter hospital, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also enabled the epidemic to be controlled quickly and effectively.
ref: In the early stage of the outbreak of COVID-19, the National Health Commission of China sent three groups of infectious disease experts to Wuhan to investigate the risk and spread of COVID-19, and their suggestions provided the basis for the decision to "Lockdown" in Wuhan on January 23; when some experts put forward the necessity and urgency of building mobile cabin hospitals, the government quickly made a decision and implemented it quickly; and at the same time, the extensive participation of the community and the masses also made the COVID-19 epidemic quickly and effectively controlled.

mt: At the end of the article, it is emphasized that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response in response to global health emergencies.
ref: Finally, the article emphasizes that countries need to strengthen global cooperation and joint response to global health emergencies.

mt: Yang Hong, reporter of the main station
ref: Yang Hong, Headquarters Reporter

mt: On the afternoon of the 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-story residential building in Wessel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, and the accident resulted in a total of three deaths.
ref: On the afternoon of 25th local time, a small plane crashed into the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Wesel County, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, causing three deaths in total.

mt: The Duisburg Prosecutor, Wessel County Police Department and Wessel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that evening that at around 14:40 that day, a two-seat small plane crashed into a residence on the top floor of a multi-storey residential building on Faberskamp Street in Wessel County, killing three people.
ref: Duisburg Procuratorate, Wesel County Police Station and Wesel City Fire Department jointly issued a statement that night, saying that at about 14: 40 that day, a small plane with two seats crashed into the penthouse at the top floor of a multi-storey residential building in Huiberskamp Street, Wesel County, causing three deaths.

mt: It took off from the city of Mar in the Ruhr District of NRW on the same day, took off again after a midway stop at the airport in Wessel County, and then crashed into the residential building.
ref: On that day, the plane took off from Marl City, Ruhr District, North Rhine-Westphalia, took off again after stopping at the airport in Wesel County, and then crashed into the residential building.

mt: The identity of the deceased may be a female resident in the impacted residence and two passengers on the small plane.
ref: The deceased may be a female resident in the impacted house and two passengers on the small plane.

mt: A two-year-old child in the house suffered only minor injuries and was rescued safely.
ref: A two-year-old child in the impacted house was only slightly injured and was rescued safely.

mt: The rest of the occupants in the house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions have not yet calmed down.
ref: The remaining persons in the impacted house were not injured in the accident, but their emotions were still unsettled.

mt: The scene footage reported by the German Press Agency showed that the residence that encountered the accident was billowing smoke at one point, and firefighters could see that the house was seriously damaged after extinguishing the fire.
ref: The scene pictures reported by DPA (Deutsche Presse Agentur) show that the house in the accident once emitted thick smoke, and the house was seriously damaged after the firefighters put out the fire.

mt: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.
ref: At present, the cause of the plane crash is not clear.

mt: The Rhein Post reported, citing police accounts, that there were clues that the plane had disintegrated or disintegrated before it hit the residential building.

mt: The police said that multiple parts of the crashed plane were found in the vicinity of the accident site.

mt: The reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Dusseldorf that day that the embassy got in touch with the local police station and the fire department, and it was judged at the scene that there were no Chinese nationals among the casualties.
ref: On the same day, the reporter learned from the Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf that Chinese Consulate General in Düsseldorf had contacted the local police station and fire department, knowing that there were no Chinese citizens among the casualties according to the judgment on the spot.

ref: The Reunions is the first realistic work directed by Dapeng, and makes him the second connection with the Golden Goblet Awards.

mt: The film tells a story: a comedy director had a whim and returned to his hometown in rural northeast China, hoping to make how a family spends the New Year into a literary film, but encountered a series of accidents as a result.
ref: The film tells a story: a comedy director has a whim and returns to his hometown in Northeast China, hoping to make a art cinema of his family's Chinese New Year, and as a result, he encounters a series of accidents.

The background is the black land of Northeast China draped in silver clothes, and in the foreground is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang during the New Year festival.
ref: In the movie poster released today, Wang Jixiang, a member of this family, the third uncle, sits in the middle of the picture and smokes a cigarette, the background is the northeast black land covered with silver, and the prospect is the red lantern that Chinese people must hang for the New Year.

mt: The red lantern, which symbolizes the joy and reunion, forms a huge contrast with the lonely figure Wang Jixiang, and also seems to reveal the complexity and entanglements in the relationship of this extended family.
ref: The red lantern symbolizing joy and reunion is in great contrast with the lonely Wang Jixiang, which seems to reveal the complexity and entanglement in this large family relationship.

The film's experimental audio-visual style breaks the boundary between drama and reality and brings the audience a brand new immersive viewing experience.
ref: It is reported that in the film, except for the daughter of "Three Uncle" Wang Jixiang, who is played by actor Liu Lu, all other plays were performed by the real director's family, and the experimental audio-visual style of the film breaks the boundary between drama and reality, and brings the audiences a new immersive viewing experience.

mt: According to director Dapeng, the creation of "Auspicious Ruyi" originated from "a heavenly will", a series of sudden family changes during filming, so that the original shooting plan had to be changed along with it, and the life without a script was eventually recorded into a film, but released the tension beyond the design.
ref: According to the director Dapeng, The creation of Reunions originated from “providence”, a series of sudden family changes during the filming made the original shooting plan have to be changed, and life without script was finally recorded as a film, but it released the tension beyond design.

ref: How does the director Dapeng face this “providence” and how can he continue to meet the changes brought by this providence?

mt: There is no doubt that "Auspicious Ruyi" is full of experiments, with an almost all-amateur lineup and innovative audio-visual style turning life in front of the camera into a film, and wrapped in real images, the audience will also find the shadow of themselves and their family members from the family presented in the film, and as this family gathering falls in the film, a series of thoughts are evoked.
