mt: "Chinese Doctor" prepares to pay tribute to anti-epidemic heroes - Xinhuanet.
ref: Chinese Doctors is in preparation for filming, a tribute to the heroes of the epidemic - Xinhua News

mt: Recently, with the tribute of Chinese filmmakers to the anti-epidemic heroes, Bona Film Group Chairman Yu Dong and director Liu Weiqiang (pictured left) held a discussion and exchange with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou on the filming and production of the anti-epidemic theme film "Chinese Doctor".
ref: Recently, Yu Dong, chairman of Bona Film Group, and Liu Weiqiang, director (left), had a discussion and exchange respectfully with Academician Zhong Nanshan in Guangzhou regarding the shooting and production of the film Chinese Doctors on the theme of fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic.

mt: Bona Film hopes to use "Chinese Doctor" to pay tribute to all the medical care and epidemic prevention workers fighting on the frontline of epidemic prevention and control!
ref: By shooting the film Chinese Doctors, Bona Film hopes to pay tribute to all the medical and epidemic prevention workers who are fighting on the front line of epidemic prevention and control!

mt: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film celebrating the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
ref: In 2021, the film will be released nationwide as a tribute film to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

mt: At present, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film "Chinese Captain" under the arrangement and deployment of the Central Propaganda Department and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Guangdong Provincial Film Bureau and Hubei Provincial Film Bureau, to prepare the film "Chinese Doctor", which is a film that reflects that under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee, the people of the whole country are united in the fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: At present, under the arrangement by the Ministry of Propaganda and the National Film Bureau, and with the support of the Film Bureau of Guangdong Province and the Film Bureau of Hubei Province, Bona Film is organizing the original cast of the film Chinese Captain to prepare the film Chinese Doctor, which is a film reflecting the unity of the people of China in fighting against the COVID-19 epidemic under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party.

mt: Focusing on the frontline of Wuhan's fight against the epidemic, the film will take Wuhan medical workers and the provincial and municipal aid medical teams as the background, from a human perspective, using unique narratives, and highly impactful lens language, to show the touching stories of Chinese medical workers who are full of dedication and sacrifice on the frontline of the anti-epidemic frontline.
ref: Focusing on the front line of epidemic prevention and control in Wuhan, the film will use a unique narrative from a humanity perspective and a very impactful camera language to show how Wuhan medical and nursing staff and medical teams from various provinces and cities fight on the front line against the epidemic, and to talk the touching story of dedication and sacrifice in a panoramic view.

mt: It is understood that on the first day of the unblocking of Wuhan, Bona Company overcame many difficulties and sent a shooting team to go deep into the frontline of the epidemic to communicate face-to-face with hundreds of medical workers to learn about and collect information. Currently, it has interviewed academician Zhong Nanshan himself, the first person in Guangzhou to aid Wuhan, the Guangdong medical team to aid Hubei, and the angels in white at the forefront of the anti-epidemic frontline such as Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Zhongnan Hospital, and Wuhan Central Hospital, and took a lot of precious first-hand video materials.
ref: It is reported that on the first day when the Wuhan city lifted its lockdown, Bona overcame many difficulties and sent a team to go deep into the front line of the epidemic, exchanging information with and collecting data from hundreds of medical workers face to face, and at present, Bona has interviewed the angels in white who were at the forefront of the epidemic fight, including Academician Zhong Nanshan, the first person who rushed to Wuhan from Guangzhou, the medical team from Guangdong to assist Wuhan, as well as doctors from Wuhan Jinyintan Hospital, Wuhan Union Hospital, Wuhan University Central South Hospital, Wuhan Central Hospital, etc., and captured a lot of precious first-hand videos.

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the filming during this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope that you will not only visit some experts who have shown more heads, but also interview more medical staff who are buried in the frontline, who are the majority."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also raised his expectations and hopes for the film's shooting in this symposium: "I am looking forward to it, and I hope you will not only visit some experts who frequently appear on media, but also interview more medical personnel who are working hard at the front line, they are the majority. ”

mt: He said that he has seen "My Motherland and I" "Chinese Captain" before, and thinks it is good to tell the story of the big pattern from the perspective of ordinary people.
ref: He said he had previously seen My People My Country and Chinese Captain and thought the approach of telling big-picture stories from the perspective of ordinary people would be good.

mt: "Now some foreign friends still have some misunderstandings about China."
ref: "Now some foreign friends still have some misconceptions about China. ”

mt: When talking about the spread of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that at present, some people abroad like to label the virus as politicized, and he hopes that the film can impress the audience from the perspective of humanity: "In addition to being screened in China, it is best that this film can also be screened abroad, and it should impress the audience with a real humanistic spirit in a way that audiences at home and abroad can understand."
ref: When it comes to the communication of the film, Academician Zhong Nanshan said that some people abroad currently like to politicize the virus, and he hopes that the film will impress the audience from a humanistic perspective: "It is better for this film to be shown abroad in addition to China, and to impress the audience with a true humanistic spirit in a way that both domestic and foreign audiences can understand. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the film "People to Middle Age" in the 1980s, "After so many years, the one that impressed me the most about the movie after the reform and opening up is "People to Middle Age", when doctor friends outside our country all watched and cried. If "Chinese Doctor" can play such a role, it will be remarkable."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan also fondly recalled the 1980s film At Middle Age, "After so many years, I still have the deepest impression of the post-reform and opening-up film At Middle Age, and my doctor friends abroad watched it and cried, and it would be amazing if Chinese Doctors could serve that purpose. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if "Chinese Doctor" can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that if Chinese Doctors can resonate with foreign audiences, it will be very successful.

mt: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the prevention and control of the current international epidemic, "I believe that people are always smarter than the virus."
ref: During the discussion and exchange, Academician Zhong Nanshan also shared his opinions and suggestions on the current international epidemic prevention and control, "I believe that people are always smarter than viruses. ”

mt: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is difficult to predict, human beings have survived many hardships from the primitive society to the present day. Nowadays, modern society has developed medical technology and social management measures, coupled with the fact that medical staff and even the common people all over the world have a basic understanding of the scientific response to the new crown pneumonia epidemic, and people will no longer be as passive as before, "The next thing to pay attention to is two aspects of work, one is to study how to strengthen cooperation around the world, and the other is to focus on soothing people's hearts."
ref: Academician Zhong Nanshan said that although the virus is unpredictable, but from primitive society to date, humans have survived thousands of difficulties, now modern society has developed medical technology and social administration measures, coupled with the basic understanding of the scientific response to the COVID-19 epidemic among medical professionals and even the general public all over the world, people won't be as passive as they used to be, "in the future, we need to study how the world can strengthen cooperation, and to comfort the people who have suffered from the epidemic.

mt: Cultural Tourism "Red Fruit" Gathers in Shaoshan — News of the First Red Expo in Xiangtan - Today's Highlights - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online.

ref: As introduced by relevant principal of the Executive Committee of the First Red Expo, this Red Expo is themed on “Carrying Forward Red Culture to Boost the Development of Cultural Tourism”, covers a total exhibition area of nearly 3,000m2, and sets the atmosphere creation area, scenic spot exhibition and display area, and online tour and shopping experience area of red cultural tourism.

mt: Eight foreign provinces and cities such as Zhejiang Jiaxing, Guizhou Zunyi, and Shaanxi Yan'an, as well as 137 enterprises and units from Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang, Chenzhou and other places in our province are invited to participate in the exhibition, with a total of 768 exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourist routes, red training courses, red cultural and creative products, and so on.
ref: Total 137 enterprises and units from 8 cities of other provinces, including Jiaxing of Zhejiang Province, Zunyi of Guizhou Province, and Yan’an of Shaanxi Province, as well as Changsha, Zhuzhou, Yueyang and Chenzhou of our province were invited to participate in the exhibition, and exhibited 768 kids of exhibits, including red cultural relics, handicrafts, food specialties, tourism lines, red training courses and red cultural and creative products.

mt: The exhibition area will be on display until July 29.
ref: The exhibition will last until July 29.

mt: As the host of the Xiangtan Red Expo, there are many highlights in the Xiangtan exhibition area.
ref: As the host of the Red Expo, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is full of highlights.

mt: The person in charge of the exhibition area introduced that the Xiangtan exhibition area is divided into two parts: red industry and red cultural industry development.
ref: As introduced by the person in charge of the exhibition areas, Xiangtan Exhibition Area is divided into two major parts, namely the red industry and red cultural industry development.

mt: The red industrial exhibition area exhibits 31 exhibits from 6 enterprises including Valin Xianggang, Valin Cable, and Xiang Electric Power, and the red cultural industry development area exhibits nearly 200 products from 27 units including red book series, red food series, and red series of cultural and creative products.

The Red Cultural Industry Development Exhibition Area exhibited nearly 200 products of 27 units, including series of books, red series of food, red series of cultural and creative products.

mt: In the Yan'an exhibition area, many tourists are attracted by the exhibited cloth pile flower handicrafts and paper-cut artworks.
ref: In Yan’an Exhibition Area, many visitors were attracted by the fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate handicrafts and paper-cutting artworks on display.

mt: Ma Dongpo, director of the Yan'an Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, introduced that the exhibitors carefully selected the outstanding red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the national red cultural and creative products in 2019.
ref: As introduced by Ma Dongpo, director general of Yan'an Department Culture and Tourism, excellent red cultural and creative products of Yan'an in the past two years were selected elaboratively for this exhibition, of which 16 products are the outstanding works of the 2019 National Red Cultural and Creative Products Exhibition.

mt: At the same time, they invited the national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cut", "North Shaanxi Folk Song" and the inheritors of the provincial intangible cultural heritage project Yanchuan Budui painting to focus on promoting Yan'an folk special products, and take this opportunity to communicate with other exhibition units and enterprises to promote cross-regional cooperation.
ref: Meanwhile, they invited the inheritors of national intangible cultural heritage protection project "Ansai Paper-cutting", "Northern Shaanxi Folk Songs" and the provincial intangible heritage project “Yanchuan fabric paste-on-paste pate-surpate” to mainly recommend the folk-custom-featured products of Yan’an, and taking this opportunity, they communicated with the units and enterprises of other exhibition areas to promote cross-regional cooperation.

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - Chinanews.com.
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect” - www.chinanews.com

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" - China News Service |
ref: Membrane separation technology helps to solve the "greenhouse effect"

mt: Membrane Separation Technology Helps Crack the "Greenhouse Effect" |
ref: Schematic diagram of preparation technology of new mixed matrix membrane

mt: Schematic diagram of a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, reporter Shang Rui - Recently, the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University made great progress on "carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation method", and successfully researched and developed a new preparation technology of mixed matrix membrane, which greatly improves the carbon dioxide capture performance of membrane materials.

mt: Our reporter Shang Rui reported: A few days ago, the Tianjin University Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team made significant progress in the "membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide", and successfully developed a new mixed matrix membrane preparation technology, which greatly improved the carbon dioxide capture performance of the membrane material.
ref: Related achievements have been published as a cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.

mt: The relevant results have been published as the cover article of the international journal Greenhouse Gas: Science and Technology.
ref: "Greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that puzzles human development, and carbon dioxide emission is the culprit of "greenhouse effect".

mt: The "greenhouse effect" is a major environmental problem that plagues human development, and carbon dioxide emissions are the culprit of the "greenhouse effect".
ref: How to efficiently capture and utilize carbon dioxide emitted by human beings is the focus of scientists' attention.

mt: How to efficiently capture and use the carbon dioxide emitted by humans is the focus of scientists' attention.
ref: "Membrane separation" is a new carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving and simple operation.

mt: "Membrane separation method" is an emerging carbon dioxide capture technology, which separates carbon dioxide gas with the help of membrane materials, and has the characteristics of high efficiency, energy saving, and simple operation.
ref: How to make membrane materials "breathe deeply" and improve the efficiency of gas separation is the bottleneck and difficulty of carbon dioxide capture by membrane separation.

mt: How to make the membrane material "deep breath" and improve the gas separation efficiency is the bottleneck and difficulty of using membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide.
ref: The scientific research team of Tianjin University innovated ideas and explored the impact of different solvents on membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.

mt: The scientific research team of Tianjin University has innovated ideas and explored the effects of different solvents on the membrane gas separation performance through repeated experiments.
ref: The experimental results indicate that with N- methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the generated membrane material are more evenly distributed and “more breathable”, which effectively improves the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.

mt: The experimental results show that with N-methylpyrrolidone as the preparation solvent, the carbon nanotubes in the resulting membrane material are more uniformly distributed and "breathable", effectively improving the gas separation efficiency and rate of the membrane material.
ref: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared by this new technology is close to the upper limit of the theoretical separation of this kind of membrane material at present.

mt: The carbon dioxide separation performance of the mixed matrix membrane prepared with this new technology is close to the theoretical upper limit of the current membrane separation of such materials.
ref: "The new technology provides a new idea for capturing carbon dioxide by membrane separation. ”

mt: "The new technology provides a new idea for the membrane separation method to capture carbon dioxide." "We hope that this technology can provide strong support for the treatment of flue gas by coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises in the future, and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions and other fields," said Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy team of Tianjin University.
ref: Li Run, a member of the Atmospheric Environment and Bioenergy Task Force at Tianjin University, said: "we hope that this technology can provide strong support for future coal-fired power plants and chemical enterprises to deal with flue gas and play a major role in controlling greenhouse gas emissions. ”

mt: First-time establishment of special committee, collective signing of "long-term contract" The 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance Builds "Import Bond" - Xinhua.com.

mt: The scene of the first meeting of the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance filmed in Shanghai on July 26th.
ref: The scene of the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) On the 26th, the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance established a professional committee for the first time here, and the first batch of established special committees included the Public Health Epidemic Prevention Special Committee and the Dairy Industry Special Committee, and 35 member enterprises also signed a 3-year long-term exhibition cooperation memorandum, and the linking role of the Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance has been continuously strengthened.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Shanghai, July 26 (Reporter Zhou Rui) – On the 26th, the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up special committees for the first time, including the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic Prevention, and the Special Committee on Dairy Industry, and 35 member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, and the role of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance as a bond is strengthening constantly.

mt: At the first meeting of the 3rd Import Expo Exhibitor Alliance held here on the 26th, a group of exhibition alliance member enterprises, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, New Zealand New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France, and AstraZeneca of the UK, signed a 3-year long-term cooperation memorandum of cooperation for exhibitors, and the revised and improved articles of association of the exhibition alliance were also announced for the first time.
ref: At the first Conference of the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance held on the 26th, a batch of member enterprises signed the Memo of 3-Year Cooperation for Exhibition, including Hyundai of Korea, Dow Chemical of the United States, Shiseido of Japan, Theland of New Zealand, Siemens of Germany, Michelin of France and AstraZeneca of the United Kingdom, and the revised and improved constitution of the China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was also announced for the first time.

mt: The establishment of a special committee for public health and epidemic prevention for the first time is even more important for the current fight against the new crown pneumonia epidemic.

mt: As the vice chairman unit of the public health epidemic prevention special committee of the 3rd CIIE, Qiu Jianping, general manager of Greater China of Abbott Rapid Diagnostics Business, said that next, Abbott will join hands with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help China and the world fight the new crown pneumonia epidemic.
ref: As the vice president unit of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic of the 3rd China International Import Expo, Abbott, at the next step, will work with more industry partners to explore new solutions and cooperation models to help fight the COVID-19 Pandemic in China and around the world, as said by Qiu Jianping, the general manager of Abbott's rapid diagnostics business in Greater China.

mt: The scene of the establishment ceremony of the public health and epidemic prevention professional committee filmed in Shanghai on July 26th.
ref: The scene of the inauguration ceremony of the Special Committee on Public Health and Pandemic taken in Shanghai on July 26.

mt: It is reported that the third CIIE has set up a special public health and epidemic prevention area for the first time, and as of now, nearly 50 global enterprises have signed up to participate in the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000 square meters.
ref: It is reported that the 3rd China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance set up the special zone of public health and pandemic prevention for the first time. So far, nearly 50 global enterprises have registered for the exhibition, with an exhibition area of more than 10,000m2.

mt: During the first CIIE in 2018, the Alliance of Exhibitors of the International Import Expo was established by exhibitors spontaneously, aiming to become a platform for exchanges and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for information and resource sharing of all exhibitors, and a think tank platform for promoting economic and trade exchanges and development between China and countries (regions) in the world.
ref: During the 1st China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance in 2018, China International Import Expo Enterprise Alliance was established by exhibitors on their own initiative, aiming to become a platform for exchange and cooperation of high-quality exhibitors, a platform for sharing and connecting the information and resources of exhibitors, and a think-tank platform to provide suggestions for promoting economic, trade and business exchanges and development between China and other countries (regions) around the world.

mt: As of now, 142 enterprises have joined the Alliance of Exhibitors, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.
ref: So far, 142 exhibitors have joined the Alliance, covering 23 countries and regions around the world.

mt: 3-year-old girl in Belgium dies of new coronavirus infection - Xinhuanet.com.
ref: A 3-year-old Belgian girl died of novel coronavirus infection – www.chinanews.com

mt: Belgian health authorities said on the 24th that a 3-year-old girl who died of new coronavirus infection was the youngest person to die from the new crown virus in the country.
ref: Belgian Health Authorities said on the 24th day that, a 3-year-old girl died of the novel coronavirus infection, who was the youngest death caused by novel coronavirus infection in this country.

mt: Belgian health department spokesman Budwin Kateri said that the girl had other serious illnesses before contracting the new coronavirus; in addition to the girl, an 18-year-old youth recently died of new coronavirus infection.
ref: Budwin Katerry, the spokesman of Belgian Health Authorities, said that this girl had other serious illnesses before being infected with the novel coronavirus; in addition to this girl, an 18-year-old youth died of the novel coronavirus infection too recently.

mt: Kateri said that 85% of newly confirmed new coronavirus patients in Belgium last week were under 60 years old.
ref: Katerry said that 85% of the new confirmed COVID-19 cases in Belgium last week were aged below 60.

mt: He reminded the healthy and younger people not to take it lightly.
ref: He cautioned the healthy, younger population not to take it lightly.

mt: "While it is rare for young people to die from new coronavirus infection, no one is immune now."
ref: "It is relatively rare for young people to die of the novel coronavirus infection, but no one is immune now. ”

mt: Last week, Belgium's newly confirmed new crown cases increased by 89% from the previous week, and the daily average of 2.9 people died from new crown virus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 the previous week.
ref: Last week, Belgium saw an 89 % increase in the new confirmed cases of novel coronavirus infection compared to the previous week, with a daily average of 2.9 deaths of novel coronavirus infection, higher than the daily average of 1.7 persons in the previous week.

mt: During the peak of the epidemic in Europe, the proportion of new coronavirus infections in the Belgian population was "highest" in Europe.
ref: During the peak period of the epidemic in Europe, Belgium had the "highest" proportion of people infected with novel coronavirus in Europe.

mt: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.
ref: Belgium has a population of more than 11 million.

mt: The latest data shows that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the new coronavirus.
ref: The latest data show that a total of 64,847 people in Belgium have been infected with the novel coronavirus.

mt: Earlier this week, Kateri warned that people must take action before the snowball gets bigger and bigger, eventually causing an "avalanche".
ref: Earlier this week, Katerry warned that people must act before the snowball grows bigger and eventually causes an "avalanche".

mt: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Mayville announced on the 23rd that the relevant regulations for people to wear masks in public places will be stricter, and the program of further lifting of restrictive measures in August will also be suspended.
ref: To curb the rebound of the epidemic, Belgian Prime Minister Sophie Wilmès announced on the 23rd day that the rules regarding people wearing masks in public places will be stricter, and the program to further lift restrictive measures in August will also be temporarily suspended.

mt: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Weibo]
ref: (Guo Qian) [Xinhua News Agency Micro Feature Article]

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" departs - Today's Highlights - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online.
ref: Set off for the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" - Today's News - Hunan Daily Net - www.voc.com.cn

mt: Hunan Daily · New Hunan Client July 25th (Reporter from this newspaper) On July 25, the large-scale financial media action "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" hosted by the Financial Program Center of the Central Radio and Television General Station set off from Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, and two caravans carrying the 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system slowly drove to the scene, watched by on-site guests.
ref: Hunan Daily New Hunan Client, July 25 News (Reporter of this newspaper) - On July 25, crew of the Large-Scale Convergence Media Operation "Live Village Visiting for Poverty Alleviation Observations" hosted by Financial Program Center of China Media Group set out from Xuzhou, Jiangsu, and two caravans equipped with 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system slowly moved out of the site, under the watching of the guests at the scene.

mt: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a milestone year, we will build a moderately prosperous society in all respects, achieve the first centennial goal, and 2020 is also the year of a decisive victory in poverty alleviation."
ref: General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that "2020 is a year of milestone significance, we will transform our society into a moderately prosperous one in an all-around way and achieve the first centenary goal, and 2020 is also a year for winning a decisive victory in the decisive battle for poverty alleviation".

mt: The large-scale financial media action "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" is an important measure by the Central Radio and Television General Station's Financial Program Center to cooperate with this major theme and do a good job in poverty alleviation propaganda.
ref: This operation is an important measure taken by the Financial Program Center to provide support for this major theme and promote publication of poverty alleviation actions.

mt: The action will go into poverty alleviation villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities directly under the Central Government, unearth fresh stories of poverty alleviation, directly attack the dramatic changes in the appearance of villages and show how villagers break through the predicament of survival and development and go on the road to becoming rich.
ref: The operation crew will go into the poverty alleviated villages in more than 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the leadership of central government across the country, and they will collect vivid poverty alleviation stories, directly view the huge changes in village appearances and demonstrate how the villagers broke through the plight of survival and development before becoming prosperous.

mt: This operation will last for more than 3 months.
ref: This operation will last for more than three months.

mt: The reporter starts from Xuzhou, divides soldiers into two routes, one walks the southwest line, passing through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan, Tibet and other places; the other takes the northwest line, passing through Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi, Hebei and other places, with a journey of more than 10,000 kilometers.
ref: The reporters will start off from Xuzhou in two groups, one group will take the route to the southwest region, which will go through Anhui, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Sichuan, Chongqing, Yunnan and Tibet; The other group will march to the northwest region, which will pass Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Xinjiang, Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shanxi and Hebei, their total travel distance will exceed 10,000 kilometers.

mt: In terms of reporting form, "Going the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" boldly integrates.
ref: In terms of reporting format, bold convergence will be adopted by the operation.

mt: The economic development of the villages to which the caravans go will all be broadcast through the CCTV Financial Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Radio, and CCTV New Media Media.
ref: The economic developments of the villages visited by the caravans will be broadcasted through the CCTV Finance Channel, CCTV Economic Voice, China Communications Broadcasting, and CCTV Finance New Media.

mt: Among them, the live TV will be mainly completed on the noontime news program "Tianxia Finance" of the CCTV Finance Channel (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 12:00-13:00 ), and the golden news column "Economic Information Network" of the CCTV Finance Channel will open a column for poverty alleviation reporting (first broadcast time: Monday to Sunday 20:30-21:30 ).
ref: Among them, the live TV broadcast will be mainly conducted in the noon news program "World Business News" of CCTV Finance Channel (initial broadcast time: 12:00-13:00, Monday to Sunday), one special column of poverty alleviation news reporting (initial broadcast time: 20:30-21:30, Monday to Sunday) will be provided in the prime news column of CCTV Finance Channel "Comprehensive Economic News&Information".

mt: At the same time, the caravan will conduct a live broadcast of up to 1 hour on the CCTV Finance client for each village it visits, and the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lottery by downloading the CCTV Finance APP.
ref: At the same time, crews on the caravans will conduct a 1-hour long live broadcast on the CCTV Finance client app for each village they visit, the audience can watch the live broadcast and participate in the lucky draw by downloading CCTV Finance app.

mt: In terms of technology application and studio design, "Walking the Village Live to Watch Poverty Alleviation" bravely made a breakthrough and pioneered the "outfield new media caravan".
ref: In terms of technology application and studio design, the crew has made ambitious breakthroughs and pioneered the use of "Offsite New Media Caravan".

mt: The car is equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud production and broadcasting system, and uses 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to realize the organic combination of online and offline, large screens and small screens, and TV broadcasts.
ref: The caravans are equipped with a 5G new media mobile cloud televised production and broadcasting system, which adopts the 5G+4K/8K+AI technology to achieve an organic combination of online and offline TV broadcasting with large and small screens.

mt: The three-communication studio is configured, which is converted from a container, 12 meters long, 2.55 meters wide, and 3.98 meters high, and the box body adopts a hydraulic automatic unfolding structure, which can be turned up to 120 degrees at most.
ref: It is also equipped a three-communication channel broadcasting studio converted from a container which has a length of 12 meters, a width of 2.55 meters, and a height of 3.98 meters, and the container body adopts a structure that can be automatically unfolded through a hydraulic device and can be turned up by 120 degrees.

mt: The studio area can also be automatically expanded, and is connected to an external expansion platform with an area of more than 50 square meters, which can meet the scene requirements of most programs.
ref: The studio area can also be unfolded automatically and with an external expansion platform, and its area is over 50 square meters, which can satisfy the scene requirements for most programs.

mt: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai Form a Team to Support Youth with Great Muscles - Xinhua Net
ref: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai team up support muscular teenagers - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: The inspiring competitive show for youth sports, We Are The One, was officially broadcast on Hunan TV on July 11.
ref: On July 11, the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, a hot-blooded sports show for sports teenagers, officially landed on Hunan Satellite TV.

mt: The team leader Zhang Jike and Sports Assistant Lin Xiaozhai are from different fields, but worked together, and commenters Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui were each unique in their own way, but the appearance of the hardcore “enormous” strength gin pole made the program more “exciting”.
ref: Zhang Jike, the sports leader, and Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, crossed the industry on the same stage, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui commented on each other’s styles, and the the “monster”-like power pulling device came on the stage with difficulty, which made the program very "burning".

mt: During the first episode, 11 young athletes came to the strength arena, and their appearance stunned the audience while arousing significant attention to their “fierce conflict” “robust confrontation”, and “strong hearts”.
ref: In the first episode, 11 sports teenagers appeared on the power track, and their appearance surprised the audience; at the same time, the “strong conflict”, “strong confrontation” and “strong heart” on the arena also received attention.

mt: Among them, the “fierce conflict” was from the awe-inspiring student athlete Qiao Wenyi, who publicly provoked “handsome boy” Xu Zhibin on the same racetrack with him when he joked that Xu Zhibin should be on a singing and dancing show, insulting his competitor’s appearance, and even saying that “if you lose, don’t cry or your make-up will run”.
ref: The “strong conflict” comes from Qiao Wenyi, a super A sports student; before the competition, he openly challenged Xu Zhibin, who is known as “beautiful boys” in the track, choking that Xu Zhibin should go to the sing and dance program in view of his appearance condition, and even releasing the malicious words of “don’t cry your makeup when you lose”.

mt: His words made all the young people and sports officials gasp.
ref: Some remarks made teenagers and sports leaders on the field breathe in a gasp.

mt: The “robust confrontation” was more like a battle between masters, with “Big Devil” Sun Jianqi competing against the formidable Zhang Xindong in a stunning match.
ref: The "strong confrontation" is more like a fairy fight, and Sun Jianqi, who is known as the "Great Devil", and Zhang Xindong, who has the same strength, performs a strong confrontation.

mt: Their identity was also surprising, with Sun Jianqi an actor who is passionate about fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired commando who has won military medals three times.
ref: Their identities are unexpected; Sun Jianqi is an actor who loves fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired special warfare player and a winner of the Warriors Medal for three times.

mt: At the start of the match, the two pulled on the small gin pole with all their strength, and the audience was anxious to see their more intense confrontation at the large gin pole.
ref: At the beginning of the competition, the two teenagers tried their best to pull out the small pole quickly, and the lasting confrontation on the big pole made the audiences sweat for them.

mt: The atmosphere was tense as one of the hosts of the program, Zhang Jike, also watched the battle intently.
ref: Under the tense competition situation, Zhang Jike, as one of the sports leaders of the “Let’s Exercise, Boys”, also watched the game carefully.

mt: When giving commentary, he was very careful, patiently encouraging the loser and helping him review his mistakes.
ref: In the comment session, he was also very careful, patiently encouraging the teenager who lost the game and helping him to review every mistake in the process.

mt: But sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai was a marvelous helper, who never concealed her appreciation for these good-looking and competitive young athletes.
ref: Lin Xiaozhai, the sports assistant, is a fancy assistant, and she makes no secret of her appreciation for the online teenagers who have beauty strength.

mt: After learning about their over-loaded daily training, she admired them a lot.
ref: When she learned about the overloaded daily training of sports teenagers, she was even more admired.

mt: The other team leaders, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, were each unique in their own way, with one being a calm “predictor”, while the other was the “bubbly optimistic girl” who eased the tension with her warm smile.
ref: Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, who are also sports leaders, have their own styles; one is a calm “prophet”, and the other is a “girl with prehistorical power” who dispels tension with a smile.

mt: As sports assistants, Jike and Liu Ye also discussed several funny topics around young athletes.
ref: In addition, Jike Junyi and Liu Ye, as sports assistants, also created a lot of hilarious topics around sports teenagers.

mt: Fire in Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, France: Parochial Volunteer Who was Kind and Taciturn Confessed to Arson-Ecns.cn
ref: A fire broke out in Nantes church in France: A parish volunteer admitted arson. He is usually kind and taciturn - www.chinanews.com

mt: July 26 (Ecns.cn) According to reports from foreign media, on July 18, the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, a religious, historical, and architectural treasure, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the great organ was completely destroyed.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, on July 18, the famous Cathedral Church of St.Peter and St.Paul, a religious and historical building treasure in Nantes, France, was severely damaged in a fire, and the grand organ was completely destroyed.

mt: On the 26th (CET), Nantes prosecutors announced that a parochial volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."
ref: On the 26th (local time), a Nantes prosecutor announced that a parish volunteer in charge of security work in the cathedral had been charged with “arson and destruction”.

mt: The suspect has already pleaded guilty.
ref: The parish volunteer has admitted that he had started the fire in the church.

mt: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old parochial volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.
ref: According to reports, Sernas,a local prosecutor, said that the 39-year-old parish volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

mt: His lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.
ref: The lawyer of the parish volunteer said that the arsonist now regretted doing such a thing.

mt: He entered France via an asylum claim a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in by the church.
ref: This parish volunteer entered France through asylum several years ago, and was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in in the church.

mt: Prosecutors noted that recently, the suspect tried to update his visa and was in the process of dialogue with the police.
ref: The prosecutor pointed out that recently, the prosecutor tried to renew his visa and was talking with the police station about it.

mt: But workers in the cathedral couldn’t believe that the believer, who was kind and taciturn, would destroy the church he loved so much.
ref: However, the church said that it still couldn't believe that this kind-hearted, smiling but quiet believer would destroy the church that he loved so much.

mt: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer was questioned by police about inconsistencies in his narrative, but he was later released.
ref: On the day of the fire on July 18, this volunteer had been questioned and investigated by the police because of the illogical problems in his narrative, but he was released later.

mt: Image shows rescue by firefighters at the scene.
ref: The picture shows firefighters carrying out rescue at the scene.

mt: On the evening of the 25th, the man was again subpoenaed as a result of new evidence obtained by professional engineers of the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Station.
ref: On the evening of 25th, the professional engineers of the laboratory of Paris Central Police Department obtained new evidence, so this person was arraigned again.

mt: This time, the man admitted to his arson.
ref: This time, this man admitted his arson.

mt: If convicted of the crime of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect will face 10 years' imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.
ref: According to reports, If the crime of intentional arson is convicted, the suspect may face a 10-year imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

mt: It was reported that the fire caused serious damage to the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes: the pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.
ref: According to reports, the fire caused serious losses to the Cathedral Church of St.Pierre and St.Paul, and the organ in the church was completely burned, and the stained glass windows behind the organ were also seriously damaged.

mt: Brunel, the chief architect of French Built Heritage Conservation, believes that a conservative estimate of the required cathedral restoration work would take at least three years.
ref: Brunet, chief architect of French historic buildings, believed that it was conservatively estimated that the restoration of the Nantes Cathedral would take at least three years.

mt: Hurricane "Hanna" Landing in Texas May Trigger Surges and Flash Floods - China News
ref: Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which may cause river surges and flash floods - www.chinanews.com

mt: July 26 (China News) According to reports in foreign media, hurricane “Hanna” landed in Texas at 5:00 p.m. local time on July 25th, bringing strong breeze and rainstorms, surges, and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.
ref: Www.chinanews.com, July 26 - According to foreign media reports, at 5 pm local time on the 25th, Hurricane Hanna landed in Texas, USA, which will bring strong storms, soaring rivers and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

mt: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hanna is expected to carry rainstorms across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, causing surges and life-threatening flash floods.
ref: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hurricane Hanna is expected to carry heavy rain and sweep across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, and the rain may cause some streams to surge and life-threatening flash floods.

mt: It was reported that the area from the south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River was the area most seriously affected by Hanna, while large flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.
ref: According to the report, the area south of Corpus Christi to the mouth of the Rio Grande River was the most seriously affected by Hurricane Hanna, and a large-scale flash flood may erupt in the Rio Grande Valley.

mt: Abbott, governor of Texas, said on July 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. "
ref: Abbott, Governor of Texas, said on the 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. ”

mt: Thirty two counties in the state have entered a state of emergency due to the hurricane.
ref: In Texas, there are 32 counties in a state of disaster emergency due to hurricane.

mt: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents were ready for action.
ref: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of over 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents are treating the hurricane in a strict manner.

mt: Abbott also said that the hurricane cannot allowed to bring more casualties to Texas during the pandemic outbreak.
ref: Abbott also said that while Texas was being hit hard by the COVID-19 epidemic, we could not let this hurricane bring more casualties to Texas.

mt: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas was expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on July 26th, and 3 to 5 inches in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.
ref: According to reports, the precipitation in southern Texas is expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on the 26th, and there will be 3 to 5 inches of rainfall in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

mt: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna formed earlier than in the previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.
ref: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna was formed earlier than the previous Atlantic hurricane season.

mt: Normally, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic don't form until mid-August.
ref: Under normal circumstances, the first hurricane in the Atlantic usually does not form until mid-August.

mt: Poland to Withdraw from the European Treaty on Violence against Women
ref: Poland to Withdraw from European Treaty on Prevention of Violence against Women

mt: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the country's Justice Ministry said Saturday.
ref: The Polish Ministry of Justice said on Saturday that Poland would take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women.

mt: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty violated the rights of parents by requiring schools to teach students about gender issues.
ref: The cabinet of the Polish right-wing government stated that the treaty requiring schools to teach students on gender issues has violated the rights of students’ parents.

mt: Justice Minister Ziobro said at a press conference that his ministry will submit a request on Monday to the Ministry of Labor and the Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.
ref: Polish Minister of Justice Giobro held a press conference, saying that the Ministry he led would raise the request on Monday asking the Ministry of Labor and Family to start withdrawing from the treaty.

mt: That treaty is also called the Istanbul Convention.
ref: That treaty is also known as the Istanbul Convention.

mt: Ziobro said,”The treaty contains elements which we consider to be of a harmful and ideological nature ”
ref: Giobro said, “The treaty contains some elements we consider harmful in ideological nature. ”

mt: Law and Justice, the ruling party of Poland, and its coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.
ref: Poland’s ruling Law and Justice Party and its ruling coalition partners holds a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and promote a conservative social agenda.

mt: Polish president Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.
ref: Polish President Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main topics for discussion during his successful re-election campaign this month.

mt: On Friday, thousands of Polish people (mostly women) protested against withdrawing from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.
ref: On Friday, thousands of Poles (most of them women) held protests against withdrawal from the treaty in Warsaw and other cities.

mt: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempart, one of the organizers of the protest, said during a protest march in Warsaw.
ref: Lempat, one of the organizers of the protests, said in a protest march in Warsaw that “the purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence.”

mt: Some protesters carried banners that said "Law and Justice is women's hell."
ref: Some protesters held up a banner that reads “Law and Justice Party is a hell for women.”

mt: Law and Justice has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.
ref: The Law and Justice Party has long been complaining about the Istanbul Convention

mt: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.
ref: The previous centrist government in Poland ratified the convention in 2015.

mt: Law and Justice says the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught in schools.
ref: The Law and Justice Party government stated that the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught at schools.

mt: But so far, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.
ref: But so far the party has not decided to withdraw from the treaty.

mt: (According to Reuters reports)
ref: (According to a report from Reuters)

mt: The VIetnam News Agency (VNA) reports that Grigory Karasin believes Vietnam has contributed heavily to ASEAN’s development over the past 25 years.
ref: According to the report by Vietnam News Agency, Grigory believes that Vietnam has made great contributions to the development of the ASEAN over the past 25 years.

mt: More than just a responsible member of ASEAN, Vietnam is its “locomotive”.
ref: Vietnam is not only a responsible member, but even the locomotive of the ASEAN.

mt: Grigory stated that both Russia and the Eurasian Economic Union believe Vietnam has contributed greatly to raising ASEAN’s profile and promoting its image in other parts of the world.
ref: Grigory said that Russia and even the Eurasian Economic Union believe that Vietnam has made contributions to improving the status and promoting the image of the ASEAN externally.

mt: He said, “Vietnam deserves ASEAN’s thanks for these things. “
ref: He stressed that "the ASEAN should be grateful to Vietnam for this. ”

mt: He also said that analysts have expressed approval for Vietnam’s peace initiative.
ref: Grigory said that analysts endorse the peace initiative proposed by Vietnam.

mt: Vietnam hopes to share its experience with other ASEAN countries and build constructive, peaceful mechanisms to address issues in the Asia-Pacific region, including those in the East China Sea.
ref: Vietnam is willing to share its experience with each member country of the ASEAN and propose constructive and peaceful measures on the issues faced by the Asia-Pacific region, including the East Sea issue.

mt: In terms of Vietnam-Russia cooperation within the ASEAN framework, Grigory believes ASEAN provides support for the cooperative relationship between Vietnam and Russia, and that Russia benefits from the cooperative framework provided by ASEAN.
ref: With regard to the cooperation between Vietnam and Russia under the framework of the ASEAN, Grigory believes that Vietnam provides support to the cooperative relations between Russia and the ASEAN, and helps Russia to gain benefits under the cooperation framework.

mt: Once a free trade agreement is signed between Vietnam and the Eurasian Economic Union, which includes Russia, the Eurasian Economic Union will be able to enter the ASEAN market.
ref: The Eurasian Economic Union, including Russia, can enter the ASEAN market after signing a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam.

mt: Grigory advises that the free trade area between ASEAN countries and the Eurasian Economic Union be enlarged to the maximum possible extent to create a platform for economic and security stability.
ref: Grigory suggested maximizing the free trade zones between the Eurasian Economic Union and ASEAN countries, thereby creating a platform for economy, security and stability.

mt: At the same time, Grigory believes that Russia, Vietnam, and the Eurasian Economic Union are on the right track, and that each will be able to achieve its goals.
ref: Grigory also believes that Russia, Vietnam and the ASEAN are on the right track and will achieve their goals.

mt: From now until the end of 2020, particularly in terms of basic infrastructure, human resources, and land, Bac Giang Province will possess the conditions necessary to actively seek inflows of foreign investment, especially for multinational groups which possess value chains and transfer advanced technologies.
ref: From now to the end of 2020, Bac Giang Province will have the necessary conditions, especially in terms of infrastructures, human resources and land, to proactively usher in the inflow of foreign capital, especially multinational groups which have value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

mt: Bac Giang Province has also completed and submitted its plan to enact the Prime Minister’s directive to invest in infrastructure building and operations projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and has approved the addition of two industry-city-service zones in the province, Anshan-Beilong and Anlu, to the 2020 Vietnam Industrial Zone Development Master Plan document.
ref: In addition, Bac Giang Province will submit the decision of the Prime Minister of the Government to propose the investments in infrastructures construction and business projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and approve the supplementary listing of An Son-Beilong and An Luc industry-city-service areas of this province in the document of the 2020 Overall Planning for the Development of Vietnam Industry Zone.

mt: At the same time, Bac Giang is working to accelerate progress on every project, especially for infrastructure building and operations in the Hefu, Guangzhou, and Shuangxi industrial zones, to form a land fund to attract investment.
ref: Meanwhile, Bac Giang Province focuses on accelerating the progress of various projects, especially the infrastructure construction and operation projects in industrial park cluster such as Hoa Phu, Gwangju, and Sungei-Naewang, to form land funds for investment promotion.

mt: In 2020, the Department of Industry and Trade of Bac Giang Province will assist in planning industrial zones and clusters, and make suggestions and proposals for these to be included in provincial planning.
ref: In 2020, Bac Giang Provincial Department of Industry and Trade puts forward suggestions on the planning for determining industrial zones and industrial cluster to be included in the provincial planning.

mt: Bac Giang has determined that it will integrate national defense, ecological and environmental protection and food security guarantees into the development of industrial clusters; they will possess comprehensive basic infrastructure for electricity, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications, and will be combined with the basic infrastructure required by other social fields such as city-building, trade services, worker housing, medical treatment, and education.
ref: Bac Giang Province has determined to combine the development of industrial park cluster with guaranteeing national defense security, protecting ecological environment, and guaranteeing food security, thus contributing to balanced industrial development; having comprehensive infrastructures such as electricity, water supply, transportation and telecommunication, and combining them with urban construction, trade services, workers' housing and medical health, education and other social infrastructures.

mt: In industrial zones, Bac Giang Province is seeking high-tech and clean technology investment projects in fields such as power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and their supporting industries.
ref: In the industrial zone, Bac Giang Province focuses on calling for investment projects of high technology and clean technology in the fields of electricity, electronics, telecommunication equipment, precision machinery, and auxiliary industries.

mt: In industrial zone clusters, the province seeks small and medium-scale investment projects for which production and utilization engages local labor, especially in areas such as food products and food processing.
ref: In the industrial park cluster, the province calls for small and medium-sized investment projects in the fields of production, use of local labor force, especially agricultural products, food processing, etc.

mt: In the future, Bac Giang Province plans to accelerate basic infrastructure investment in the logistics center of Bac Giang City and allow it to develop simultaneously with industrial park zones as a means to optimize the circulation of goods and money, effectively lower production costs, enhance the value of goods, improve supply chains, and develop more combined transport networks, and thereby make the province more attractive for investors.
ref: In the future, Bac Giang Province will focus on accelerating the investment in the infrastructures of the logistics centers in Bac Giang City to achieve synchronous development of the industrial park cluster, in order to optimize the circulation of goods and money, help reduce production costs, increase the value of goods, optimize the supply chain, and develop multimodal transportation, thus creating an attraction for investors to make investments in this province.

mt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) Over the past two weeks, the number of new confirmed COVID-19 cases has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases over the past several days.
ref: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) In the past two weeks, Spain saw a sharp rebound in the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19, which increased by more than 1,000 daily for many days.

mt: The UK government issued a temporary decision on Saturday evening (July 25th) that starting on the 26th, local time, Spain will be removed from the travel corridors list, and that people entering the UK from Spain must quarantine for 14 days.
ref: The British Government made a temporary decision on the evening of Saturday (July 25) to remove Spain from the safe travel list since 00:00 on the 26th day local time, and required that people entering the UK from Spain must be quarantined for 14 days.

mt: UK tourists on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and anger when they heard about the decision, as the sudden news caught them off guard.
ref: British tourists going vacationing in Spain successively expressed their surprise, concern and even anger at the decision, since the news came out of the blue and caught them off guard.

mt: Reports state that UK Transportation Secretary Grant Shapps is currently vacationing in Spain.
ref: As report goes, British Minister of Transport Grant Shapps is also on vacation in Spain at present.

mt: Prior to the UK’s announcement of the new quarantine measures, Norway also announced that people traveling to Norway from Spain would need to isolate for 10 days.
ref: Before the UK issued the quarantine measures, Norway had also announced a 10-day quarantine for people returning to Norway from Spain.

mt: France and Belgium advised their residents to preemptively cancel any vacation plans in Barcelona and its surrounding areas.
ref: France and Belgium advised their residents to abandon the plan to vacation in Barcelona and the surrounding area ahead.

mt: The overcrowding on beaches in these areas makes it impossible to maintain social distancing, and police have been required to take measures to reduce the number of tourists on beaches.
ref: The beaches in these areas were so overcrowded that it was impossible to maintain a social distance between people, and once, the police had to take actions to reduce the number of beachgoers.

mt: Tourism is one of Spain’s most important industries.
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain.

mt: Spain: This is a safe place.
ref: Spain: It is safe here.

mt: In response to the UK’s decision, Spain’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs expressed on Sunday that the country’s epidemic was under control.
ref: Aiming at the decision made by the UK, the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Sunday that the pandemic was under control in this country.

mt: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stated to the media, “Spain is a safe place, not just for Spanish citizens, it’s also safe for tourists. “
ref: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stressed to the media that "Spain is safe, not only for Spaniards, but also for tourists. ”

mt: Spain’s government will make attempts to persuade the UK government that the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands should be excluded from the quarantine measures.
ref: The Spanish Government will try to convince the British Government to exclude the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands from the quarantine measures.

mt: Their reasoning is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is significantly lower than in the UK.
ref: The reason is that the infection rates in these two tourist destinations are much lower than in the British Mainland.

mt: The Catalonia region of Spain has also reinstated its “football ban” to curb the epidemic.
ref: To prevent the spread of the pandemic, the Catalonia region of Spain has also restarted the "stay at home order".

mt: Tourism is one of Spain’s pillar industries, and the country is one of the most popular vacation destinations for UK tourists
ref: Tourism is an important pillar industry of Spain, and Spain is one of the most popular vacation destinations for British tourists.

mt: The UK’s decision is expected to have a significant impact on Spain’s tourism industry.
ref: This decision by the UK is expected to have a significant impact on tourism in Spain.

mt: An Jing/Ren Chen (Deutsche Presse-Agentur, Reuters)
ref: An Jing/ Ren Chen (DPA, Reuters)

mt: First day of Zhongfu: Escaping the intense heat as the rainy days start in Beijing -- Xinhua Net
ref: The first day of the second phase of dog days: Beijing temporarily parts from hot summer and starts the rainfall mode – www.xinhuanet.com

mt: BEIJING, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by Ni Yuanjin) July 26 marks the beginning of “Zhongfu (the second phase of Sanfu)” this year.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 26 (reporter Ni Yuanjin) – July 26 is the first day of “The second phase of dog days” this year.

mt: During the small hours of July 26, the convective weather caused by strong wind and sudden downpours dispersed the intense heat that had lasted for several days; the rain will last for another several days.
ref: The strong wind, heavy shower and convective weather on the early morning of the 26th dispersed the hot and scorching heat that had enveloped Beijing for days, and a new round of rainy weather will continue for several days.

mt: According to the report from the Beijing Meteorological Service released at 11:00 on July 26, there will be scattered showers on July 26 in Beijing (with weak thunder and lightning), and the highest temperature will be just 27 degrees Celsius; at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), and the lowest temperature will be 23 degrees Celsius.
ref: The Beijing Meteorological Station released at 11:00 on the 26th that there will be scattered showers (with weak thunder and lightning) in Beijing on the 26th, with a daily highest temperature of only 27°C, and at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), with a nighttime lowest temperature of 23°C.

mt: However, on July 24 and 25, Beijing was under a blue alert for high temperature; the highest temperature of most regions was 37 degrees Celsius, while some regions were even hotter, with a temperature of over 40 degrees Celsius.
ref: On the previous 24th to 25th, Beijing was in the blue warning of high temperature, and the daily highest temperature was about 37°C in most areas, and even above 40°C in local areas.

mt: Sanfu is the period with the highest temperature and humidity within a year, consisting of “three phases” every year, the second of which is the hottest, the period when people “lose their appetites”.
ref: Dog days are the hottest days of the year when it is the hottest, humid and sultry, there are "three phases of dog days" in a year, and the hottest days are in the second phase, when “loss of appetite and weight in summer” that Chinese people say happens.

mt: As the sanfu days draw near, people always fill their homes with diverse grains, and “eating dumplings for the first phase of Sanfu, while eating noodles for the second” is a long-lasting folk custom.
ref: When dog days come, all families fill their barns, and a folk saying goes like that “dumplings for the first phase and noodles for the second phase of dog days”.

mt: According to current weather reports, in the next three days, there will be clouds and rain in Beijing.
ref: According to the current forecast, Beijing will be cloudy and rainy in the next three days.

mt: The meteorological service reminds us that mountain tours should be reduced in case of geological disasters.
ref: The meteorological department advised the public to minimize mountain excursions and beware of geological hazards.

mt: It is estimated that the second phase of Sanfu will last for 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.
ref: It’s learnt that “the second phase of dog days” this year includes 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

mt: During these days, people always feel feeble and have no appetite.
ref: After entering "the second phase of dog days", people will feel weak and lose their appetite.

mt: Therefore, mung beans and coix seeds should be eaten to clear the heat, invigorate the spleen, and stimulate the appetite, and bitter foods such as sow thistle and bitter gourd can also be eaten for the same functions.
ref: People may choose mung beans, Job’s tears, and other foods with the functions of clearing away summerheat, tonifying spleen and stimulating appetite, as well as common sowthistle herb, bitter gourd and other bitter food, which can help to improve appetite and get rid of the summer heat.

mt: Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher Will Be Broadcast Next Week, with Xue Zhaofeng Playing the “Knowledge Initiator” - Xinhua Net
ref: The “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will go online next week, and Xue Zhaofeng leads “Knowledge promoter” - www.xinhuanet.com

mt: There is a new variety show.
ref: New variety shows are online again.

mt: The interactive knowledge sharing program Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher, will be broadcast in Hunan TV on July 20.
ref: Interactive knowledge sharing program “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” will be broadcast on Hunan Satellite TV from July 20.

mt: The program will create a new youth classroom for all ages, with a team of good-looking and accomplished teachers on stage to present challenging and hilarious knowledge.
ref: It is understood that the program will create a brand-new youth class for all ages, and a group of beautiful and talented teachers will go into battle to challenge the output of interesting knowledge.

mt: Different from the serious impression left by teachers upon the general public, Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher brings together a group of good-looking and accomplished knowledge elites.
ref: Different from the serious impression of teachers in the hearts of the public in the past, the “Ding Dong is online! ‘Hello Teacher’” gathers a group of knowledge representatives with both beauty and talent.

mt: They are all young specialists in different subjects, and comprehensive “punsters” good at educating through entertainment.
ref: They are not only young knowledge models from various disciplines, but also a group of all-round “punsters” who can shake their burdens and are good at entertaining.

mt: During the program, these extraordinary young professors will act as “knowledge sharers”, creating a challenging, fun, and educational environment.
ref: In the program, these outstanding young knowledge role models, as “knowledge sharing officers”, will challenge the interesting knowledge class.

mt: They will provide knowledge using their own attitudes and show the most interesting aspects of their subjects to inspire the live audience.
ref: They need to show the most interesting aspects of their disciplines through knowledge output with attitude, so as to impress the audiences present.

mt: The “Panel of Questioners” composed of audience members of all ages will raise diverse questions on the spot, making the job of delivering lectures even more difficult for the “knowledge sharers”, which will also inject a certain edge to the program.
ref: On the spot, the “Youdao Ask Group”, which is composed of audiences of all ages, will put forward ever-changing questions, which will make it more difficult for the “knowledge sharing officers” to teach and add some exciting atmosphere to the program.

mt: According to sources, the “knowledge sharers” include many excellent young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a well-known teacher in guiding students to get good grades in the postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with a decade of working experience, who will present the “hardcore” knowledge of different subjects to the live audience in ways you’d never expect.
ref: According to reports, among the “knowledge sharing officers”, there are outstanding young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a famous teacher for postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with ten years’ experience, and they will show the audiences the “hard core” knowledge of various disciplines in unexpected ways.

mt: Beyond that, the program also invites Xue Zhaofeng, Professor of Economics to act as the “knowledge initiator” and works together with the “Dingdong Teaching Assistants” Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to discuss topics of youth with the live audience and create “Youth Public Lectures for All”.
ref: In addition, Xue Zhaofeng, a professor of economics, was invited as the “knowledge initiator” of the program to talk with the audience about youth and create an “open class for youth for all” together with Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, “Ding Dong Teaching Assistants”.

mt: Chief Secretary for Administration of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: all-out efforts to combat epidemic at critical juncture -Ecns.cn
ref: Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: The situation is grim and fight against the COVID-19 epidemic - www.chinanews.com

mt: HONG KONG, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Chief Secretary for Administration of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Matthew Cheung Kin-chung said on July 26 that the situation of COVID-19 in Hong Kong continued to be severe, and if the epidemic turned worse, the HKSAR Government would decisively enact more stringent control measures to further restrict business operations and reduce the activity space for people.
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Hong Kong, July 26 - Zhang Jianzong, Chief Secretary for Administration of the Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, said on the 26th that the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong continued to be grim, and if the COVID-19 epidemic worsened, the SAR Government would decisively take more stringent control measures to further restrict the operations of business premises and reduce the space for citizens to go out.

mt: But at present, the SAR government has no intention to enact a "Stay-at-Home Order" or "Restriction Order" that restrict people from going out.
ref: However, at this stage, the SAR Government had no intention of introducing a "stay-at-home order" or a "shelter-in-place order" to restrict citizens from going out.

mt: Cheung Kin-chung published a weblog post on the same day entitled All-out efforts to combat epidemic at critical juncture.
ref: On the same day, Zhang Jianzong published a blog titled "Severe Situation, Fight Against the COVID-19 Epidemic".

mt: He said the current wave of the outbreak was the most serious one over the past six months and the coming fortnight would be crucial in the fight against further spread of the coronavirus in the community.
ref: He said that this epidemic was the most severe in the past six months, and it would be crucial in the next two weeks, so we should try our best to prevent the COVID-19 from spreading further in the community.

mt: While the Government would take all necessary measures in this battle, it was equally important for the public to exercise self-discipline and cooperation.
ref: In addition to the necessary measures taken by the SAR Government, self-discipline and co-operation of the citizens were also very important.

mt: He earnestly urged members of the public to stay home as much as possible, minimize social contact, and refrain from dining out.
ref: He appealed to the citizens to stay at home as much as possible and reduce social contact and dining out.

mt: In compliance with the compulsory measures, citizens should wear a face mask to protect themselves and others while observing personal and environmental hygiene and washing their hands frequently, and should also suspend non-essential social or meal gatherings and reduce their visits to markets.
ref: The citizens should cooperate with the compulsory measures of wearing masks to protect themselves and others, pay attention to personal and environmental hygiene and wash their hands frequently, and should suspend unnecessary gatherings or dinners of relatives and friends and go to the market as little as possible.

mt: He emphasized that the Central Authorities had all along taken heed of the changes in Hong Kong’s epidemic situation and staunchly supported the anti-epidemic work of the HKSAR Government, and in response to the recent request of the Chief Executive, the Central Authorities offered timely assistance in enhancing the virus testing capacity and retrofitting AsiaWorld-Expo into a makeshift facility similar to the “mobile cabin hospital” on the Mainland.
ref: He said that the central government had always been very concerned about the changes in the COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong and supported the work of the SAR Government in preventing and fighting the COVID-19 epidemic, and actively responded to the latest request of the Chief Executive, providing assistance in enhancing the testing capability and transforming the AsiaWorld-Expo into a "mobile cabin hospital".

mt: Meanwhile, he stated that the Government’s initiative to provide free COVID-19 testing for designated high-risk groups was running at full steam, which would cover some 400,000 persons including staff of residential care homes for the elderly (RCHEs), residential care homes for persons with disabilities, as well as nursing homes, restaurant workers, taxi drivers, and property management staff.
ref: Zhang Jianzong said that the free COVID-19 testing provided by the SAR Government for specific high-risk groups, namely, employees of elderly homes, disabled homes and nursing homes, restaurant employees, taxi drivers and property management employees, had been fully launched, involving as many as 400,000 persons.

mt: He was very concerned about the recent emergence of local infection cases in RCHEs, so to meet such needs, the Government has arranged to set up designated temporary quarantine centers.
ref: He was very concerned about infection cases in residential care homes for the elderly, and the SAR Government had arranged a special temporary COVID-19 testing center for residents of residential care homes for the elderly.

mt: He also said that quarantine facilities were being built in the vicinity of Penny’s Bay Quarantine Center at Lantau Island, and 700 additional units were expected to be available by the end of September.
